story:
The App

  • Coach to Client® is simple, automated, and affordable digital coaching for new and growing health coaches. 
  • COACHES, check out the CTC Digital Coaching Guide!
  • The primary features are: 
  •        Private chat with exportable+searchable conversations
  •        Customizable, one-touch daily surveys for client AND the coach
  •        Push messages+message scheduling
  •        Coaching groups+forums
  •        Quick referral generation
  • With CTC, coaches and trainers can:
  •        Keep a daily watch on every client's habits & behavior (without being                creepy)
  •        Hold clients accountable for their goals and actions (without being                   pushy)
  •        Build their business and generate qualified referrals (without being                 salesy)
  •        Create a close relationship of trust, accountability and mutual                           transparency (without being overwhelmed) #introvertedcoaches                    #coachesarebusytoo #complicatedtechnologysucks

           


What I Need & What You Get

  • My crowdfunding goal is $35,000
  •      1st priority: Development = $21,000
  •     2nd priority: Marketing = $10,000 (although this may be covered by              monthly revenue after launch)
  •      3rd priority: Hosting = $4,000 (although this may be covered by                      monthly revenue after launch)


A Small Way to Fix Our Big Broken System

  • Health Coaches do really important work and empowering them is what CTC is all about! We are emerging as a powerful new practitioner in the healthcare system. 
  • With lifestyle choices emerging as the primary causes of chronic disease and death, preventative healthcare and mobile healthcare are changing the way disease prevention is understood and practiced
  • There are big shifts happening in healthcare, including patient-centered care and value-based healthcare
  • Our "healthcare" system is in crisis! Despite Americans spending almost $10K/year PER PERSON, the U.S. still has lower life expectancy and higher infant mortality than most high-income countries, and unpaid medical bills are the #1 cause of bankruptcy 
  • “It’s an allusion that medicine is prevention--it’s intervention. Prevention is people taking care themselves.”


The Market

  • The coaching industry is growing FAST $2.356 billion  in 2015, up 19% since 2011
  • Mobile apps account for 90% off all mobile usage
  • Health Tech is getting a LOT of attention from traditional VC's

 The Founder (Me)
  • My private coaching practice is Zone Nutrition Inc, which is a powerful, proprietary and unique method of mindful eating, personalized nutrition, behavior design, and social support
  • My most trusted nutrition inspirations are Dr. John Berardi (I'm a Precision Nutrition devotee), Andrea Nakayama, and the folks at Authority Nutrition
  • I am in a unique position to make this project successful: I'm a health coach so I know how you think/what you want/where [we] hang out online, I'm a total "app-addict" so I know what makes a great user experience, I've tried everything on the market and I've put together only the best features for CTC
  • My development firm, DSXpress, has built a highly successful portfolio of similar projects and is a highly sought-after web and app developer in the South Florida area


Other Ways You Can Show Love

  • Please share this with your network and support me to get the word out and make some noise! Check out the Indiegogo share tools :)
  • Get familiar with the organizations that serve your communities right to effective preventative healthcare and disease prevention
  • Get familiar with the dangerous threats to your food system, agriculture, food waste, food politics, what schools feed your kids, and our public water systems, among many (many) others
  • Be honest about how well you take care of yourself and your family. There's always room for improvement; take it one step at time and ask for help when you need it <3

A Small Way to Fix Our Big Broken System


Health Coaches do really important work and empowering them is what CTC is all about! We are emerging as a powerful new practitioner in the healthcare system. 


With lifestyle choices emerging as the primary causes of chronic disease and death, preventative healthcare and mobile healthcare are changing the way disease prevention is understood and practiced


There are big shifts happening in healthcare, including patient-centered care and value-based healthcare

Our "healthcare" system is in crisis! Despite Americans spending almost $10K/year PER PERSON, the U.S. still has lower life expectancy and higher infant mortality than most high-income countries, and unpaid medical bills are the #1 cause of bankruptcy 

“It’s an allusion that medicine is prevention--it’s intervention. Prevention is people taking care themselves.”



The Market

The coaching industry is growing FAST $2.356 billion  in 2015, up 19% since 2011
Mobile apps account for 90% off all mobile usage
Health Tech is getting a LOT of attention from traditional VC's




 The Founder (Me)



My private coaching practice is Zone Nutrition Inc, which is a powerful, proprietary and unique method of mindful eating, personalized nutrition, behavior design, and social support

My most trusted nutrition inspirations are Dr. John Berardi (I'm a Precision Nutrition devotee), Andrea Nakayama, and the folks at Authority Nutrition


I am in a unique position to make this project successful: I'm a health coach so I know how you think/what you want/where [we] hang out online, I'm a total "app-addict" so I know what makes a great user experience, I've tried everything on the market and I've put together only the best features for CTC

My development firm, DSXpress, has built a highly successful portfolio of similar projects and is a highly sought-after web and app developer in the South Florida area






Other Ways You Can Show Love

 
Please share this with your network and support me to get the word out and make some noise! Check out the Indiegogo share tools :)

Get familiar with the organizations that serve your communities right to effective preventative healthcare and disease prevention
Get familiar with the dangerous threats to your food system, agriculture, food waste, food politics, what schools feed your kids, and our public water systems, among many (many) others
Be honest about how well you take care of yourself and your family. There's always room for improvement; take it one step at time and ask for help when you need it <3

story:
Introduction

ShakeSphere V2 has a round lid and a round base therefore none of your supplements can get stuck in the corners because there are no corners. Due to the unique capsule shape you do not require a mixing ball or a grid in order to achieve superior mixing. The liquid and powder travels in a circular motion therefore allows you to have a frothy shake every time.

 History of ShakeSphere  

ShakeSphere has been invented by Richard Beardsell M35 World and European Champion of 400m and 200m. As an athlete Rick has been struggling with other shakers for years. His product design degree allowed him to do something about it and came up with the idea. Rick has been developing ShakeSphere for years and managed to get backing for previous models.

Design Copyright

ShakeSphere has several granted patents and design registrations globally, so you know you are buying a unique design that has can not be replicated anyhere else.

ShakeSphere Original

 ShakeSphere V2 

We have had each component tested and veryfied for saftey, meaning we have adhered to the strictest codes of conduct to be granted FDA approval with our premium BPA Free premium grade plastics.

New Features in Detail 

 Facts

ShakeSphere is Dishwasher, Freezer and Microwave safe, this is housed in a 100% leakproof, duel hemisphere mixing environment. The rubber seal, under the sliding cap completes what we feel is the perfect Shaker Bottle!

Development Stage

Our team of engineers have worked tirelessly in the development stage, consulting with a variety of technitions and specialits for every component. This has enabled ShakeSphere to be built from the ground up, considering and overcoming problematic issues experienced with exisitng shakers. With your funding we can bring to life a revloutionary portable food and beverage mixing and storage system.

Finished Products

Our exciting colour range.

Capacity

ShakeSphere V2 has a level fill of 700mls to the top of the bottle (excluding the lid). The lid offers further capcity and space for your supplements to mix rapidly!

Pledges 

Added Value to pledges 

Neoprene Case

Protecting and controlling the temperature of your stored nutrition.

This Neoprene case will keep your drinks hot or cold.  

 Zondo Performance T-shirt

This technical short-sleeve t-shirt combines a number of high performance features, making it ideal for a variety of sports and fitness activities.Moisture wicking to keep you cool and dry , quick drying, lightweight , hyper breathable eyelet mesh panels under the arms and on the back of the neck , flat seams for maximum comfort , striking fitted design. Materials: 140gsm smooth polyester. 

Pack of two ShakeSphere Original

ShakeSphere Original has a round base and lid just like the V2. Also comes with an add on storage and pill section for your vitamins. 

How the money will be spent

We need help with the final tooling for the production. 

Production Plan 


Team 

Banana blending skills 


Omelette in 3 minutes

How does it work

Other Ways You Can Help

By sharing our campaign on social media we have a better chance of reaching our target. 
Facebook
Twitter
Instagram
Website

story:
Summary

My name is Daniel Wheeler and I run a company called Life Changing Fitness, although this Indiegogo project is for my new business The 80/20 Lifestyle Plan. This is the next evolutionary step for us as a company to continue changing people’s lives.

Back in 2012 I was morbidly obese, weighing 22.6 stone (146kg). I hit rock bottom before starting out on my own journey towards a happier and healthier lifestyle, losing 8 stone along the way. This is where my passion to change the world began, and eventually led to the creation of The 80/20 Lifestyle Plan.

Our aim is bold: to rid the world of the dieting hamster-wheel and to reduce the obesity epidemic by 90% in the next 50 years. We believe 80/20 can absolutely achieve this, and will also bring about a fundamental shift in how not only the nation but the wider world sees food and happiness.

Please note there are more images and client videos under the main header video to watch.

 

What We Need & What You Get

We are looking for £250,000 to take 80/20 into the next phase in our global journey. This is an exciting opportunity for you not only to pre-book your place on our January launch of The 80/20 Lifestyle Plan, but also to financially invest and become a big part of the reason why the world stops dieting.

Find out more about the perks

What is the Academy that is mentioned in the perks?

At present the dieting industry is a multi-billion-pound industry worth in excess of £100,000,000,000 (100 billion pounds), with the two big dieting giants worth over £3bn combined. We are looking to replace their market share with The 80/20 Lifestyle Plan in the next 10 years. Investing in 80/20 today will allow you to receive a slice of these profits in the near future.

At present we have spent a year in test phase, during which over 500 women and 30 men have trialled 80/20. Our success rate is over 87% in sustained weight loss over a 6-month period, with a 100% success rate in achieving our completed members’ initial goals of seeing progress mentally and physically.

These statistics are unheard-of in the world of weight loss, and we are so proud of what our members have achieved.

We are looking to launch 80/20 to the public in January 2018, and have already secured national press coverage for the end of 2017 to ramp us into a good launch for January.

We have a solid team of 12 professionals working behind the scenes, including myself, Nicky Chapman (psychotherapist), Hannah Sweetman (Head of Nutrition), sports scientists and a business director with 20 years’ experience in the leisure and fitness industry. We have the brawn and the brain power, resource and social footing… we just need a leg-up with finances to secure more marketing, an even stronger team and media creation.

We are offering company shares when purchasing some of the perks to the side. You will not only become a member of The 80/20 Lifestyle Plan when purchasing one of the perks, but you will also receive the listed company shares as an investment too.

Some of these funds will go towards opening a female-only gym facility and operating base for 80/20 in Surrey, which will provide a supported community to empower and educate women.

Any remaining funds will be used to grow the team of experts, to market 80/20 globally through PR, to conduct online and offline marketing, and to start the offline model of a national franchise here in the UK.

The funds for marketing are going to be crucial to the exposure and member sign-ups. One of the key challenges is convincing someone who has dieted for many years that there is a new and sustainable way to achieve their goals. It’s not only a new way, but something that seems fantastical before you are familiar with the science of how The 80/20 Lifestyle Plan works. This has been our biggest challenge by far, so the marketing efforts needed to get this message across need to be creative and convincing, backed up by real success and real people.

We want to give back to those who helped us at the start, and we would love for you to share in our passion to annihilate dieting misery for everyone, forever.

5% of the director shares will be split into shares for you, the investor. Depending on your level of support to the campaign, your shares will vary from non-director shares to full director shares and a voice on the board.

 

If we are unable to meet our total target, then we have prioritised the 80/20 gym and the growth of PR and marketing. This will still allow us to leap a lot further forward than where we currently are.

What else do we do here at 80/20?

For investors

 

The Background of our WHY

Back in 2009 I was working for a large corporate business managing their European online marketing, and had just come out of a long-term relationship. I was obese, lazy and disgusted with what I had become. I was miserable.

I set off on a path that led to losing eight stone, and eventually became a fitness professional and achieved my personal goals of becoming a front-cover fitness model – an ambition that proved short-lived. I quickly realised how much I loved helping other people through their journeys, and quit that very well-paid corporate gig to set up my own business… my new life passion: to change people’s lives.

Fast forward 7 years, having kept the weight off, I started to analyse why some people found it so hard to lose weight compared to others. For me personally, it was a monumental struggle. Day in, day out, I battled through emotional eating, bingeing, being motivated and then demotivated  again. Some days it was hard just to get out of bed.

However, at the same time I saw people in my office who seemed to lose weight quickly – albeit they often put it back on just as fast.

What was the key to sustained, long-term weight loss, without the relapse?

In 2016 I was filmed for Channel 4s documentary Super Slimmers: Did They Really Keep the Weight Off?. This was a defining moment for me, which ultimately led me to develop and launch The 80/20 Lifestyle Plan.

The documentary followed five amazing people who lost a significant amount of weight, but unfortunately piled all the weight back on shortly after.

I was pitched as the fat-loss expert who had managed to not only lose weight, but keep it off for well over six years. How?

  • What made me different from the millions of people who lose weight only to put it all back on?
  • Was it genetics?
  • Was it an obsession with training and exercise?

These questions ran through my mind at the time of filming, and the answers led to the cornerstones of The 80/20 Lifestyle Plan:

  • Education!
  • Moderation!
  • Mindset!

Later that year, my team set to work developing a solution to the dieting industry.

It’s obvious to everyone that diets don’t work. If they did, we would only do them once and the weight would never come back. This isn’t the case for 90% of people.

The big giants in this field ‘boast’ a 40% success rate – meaning that 60% of their members put the weight back on within a year and 60% of THOSE members put more weight back on than they started with. And they blame themselves for their ‘failure’.

This is what I want to change. I want to stop this misery, and I passionately believe that The 80/20 Lifestyle Project is the answer.

Late in 2016 I met an amazing woman called Nicky Chapman (psychotherapist by day, mindset legend by night), who co-founded and co-presents 80/20 with me. We set to work creating the fundamental USP of 80/20…

So what do you learn on 80/20?

*This image shows the 12-week educational program that we present in the test groups. In January, this same content will be spread over 16 weeks due to the feedback we've had from the test members.

Other Ways You Can Help

You may not be in a position to financially invest or purchase a membership to The 80/20 Lifestyle Plan, and that’s OK. If you feel as passionately about this movement as we do, then we would really love you to scream and shout about this campaign on your social media profiles and tag us in to them.

 

Want to know more about Life Changing Fitness?

 

The Team at 80/20 & Life Changing Fitness

 

Some amazing 80/20 Lifestyle Plan client transformations

story:
Hi there,

The story so far

We are three sisters and a brother. We have been raised by two parents that have taught us that love is the most important thing in the world which has kept us bonded. For two years we have all worked together at a café called Thinking (C)up. We have worked there since it opened and helped to build it from the very start. We decorated the entire space and helped to choose suppliers and constructed a concept for the store. Even though the shop belongs to a very dear friend of ours we feel very connected to it and love spending time there. The café is situated near one of the biggest universities in Athens so we serve coffee to thousands of students every day. It has become a hang out and a place to meet, study, laugh and play. We have got to know a lot of them personally and our jobs now feel like a hobby. We are sociable and friendly and all the love we have shown has been reciprocated.


Our lovely students!!

(Photos of the Thinking (C)up, the one that already exists)


The opportunity

We enjoy every day and now we have the opportunity to create a similar space for ourselves. There is a new section of campus being built nearby and we feel like it would be the best chance to provide for the extra students that be filling the university. Our friend who owns the café has suggested that we expand the business and give Thinking (C)up a baby brother down the road. Of course we will continue to support him in every way and pull shifts whenever required. We think the two shops will complement each other beautifully. We’re super excited!!

Hi, thank you all!!


Our dream

Thinking (C)up Petite is going to fulfill a lifelong ambition of working for ourselves and providing many happy faces with good service and a warm cup of coffee. The space we have found is going to be small and cozy to get us started. Since it will be a student meeting place we envision that it will have a mini library for study, a dining table for group discussion and board games for winding down. We will plan student events like welcome week, comedy nights, chess tournaments, quiz nights and Christmas parties. We want to get to know more students and help them to fit in and feel welcome – we think we can provide a space for that to happen!

Our Meeting Room

Photos of Thinking (C)up, the one that already exists.



What we need

To achieve all of this we need a little bit of help. Even though we have all worked for two years and pooled our savings together our total budget is a little  below what we need. We have bought the premises and started to set it up. The bar will be built by us but we must first buy the wood and paint. We’re going to use energy efficient LED bulbs for lighting above the bar. The next steps are buying the supplies. We start with tables and chairs then choose cups and cutlery. We’ll need a few extra because being in Greece some will be placed outside in the sunshine for al fresco dining. The final bit (though equally as important) will be the toilets. We have a clever theme for boys and girls and want it to be kept sanitary at all times.

Our Library 

Photos of Thinking (C)up, the one that already exists.


The Reason

We know we’re taking a big risk, especially during this time of crisis in Greece, but we feel so dedicated and we really want to make it work. We’re young and experienced so we’re going to work our hardest. We’re being reasonable and considerate since we don’t want to let our friend down and ruin this amazing chance that was given to us. By supporting us you will be providing hundreds of Greek students with a place where they can read, feel comfortable and spend quality time with their fellow students.

Photos of Thinking (C)up, the one that already exists.

A big thank you from each of us.
story_txt:
Hi there, 
The story so far
We are
three sisters and a brother. We have been raised by two parents that have
taught us that love is the most important thing in the world which has kept us
bonded. For two years we have all worked together at a café called Thinking (C)up.
We have worked there since it opened and helped to build it from the very
start. We decorated the entire space and helped to choose suppliers and
constructed a concept for the store. Even though the shop belongs to a very
dear friend of ours we feel very connected to it and love spending time there.
The café is situated near one of the biggest universities in Athens so we serve
coffee to thousands of students every day. It has become a hang out and a place
to meet, study, laugh and play. We have got to know a lot of them personally
and our jobs now feel like a hobby. We are sociable and friendly and all the
love we have shown has been reciprocated.Our lovely students!!(Photos of the Thinking (C)up, the one that already exists)
The opportunity
We enjoy
every day and now we have the opportunity to create a similar space for
ourselves. There is a new section of campus being built nearby and we feel like
it would be the best chance to provide for the extra students that be filling
the university. Our friend who owns the café has suggested that we expand the
business and give Thinking (C)up a baby brother down the road. Of course we
will continue to support him in every way and pull shifts whenever required. We
think the two shops will complement each other beautifully. We’re super
excited!! Hi, thank you all!!
Our dream
Thinking (C)up
Petite is going to fulfill a lifelong ambition of working for ourselves and
providing many happy faces with good service and a warm cup of coffee. The
space we have found is going to be small and cozy to get us started. Since it
will be a student meeting place we envision that it will have a mini library
for study, a dining table for group discussion and board games for winding
down. We will plan student events like welcome week, comedy nights, chess
tournaments, quiz nights and Christmas parties. We want to get to know more
students and help them to fit in and feel welcome – we think we can provide a
space for that to happen!Our Meeting RoomPhotos of Thinking (C)up, the one that already exists.
What we need
To achieve
all of this we need a little bit of help. Even though we have all worked for
two years and pooled our savings together our total budget is a little  below what we need. We have bought the
premises and started to set it up. The bar will be built by us but we must
first buy the wood and paint. We’re going to use energy efficient LED bulbs for
lighting above the bar. The next steps are buying the supplies. We start with
tables and chairs then choose cups and cutlery. We’ll need a few extra because
being in Greece some will be placed outside in the sunshine for al fresco
dining. The final bit (though equally as important) will be the toilets. We
have a clever theme for boys and girls and want it to be kept sanitary at all
times.Our Library Photos of Thinking (C)up, the one that already exists.
The Reason
We know
we’re taking a big risk, especially during this time of crisis in Greece, but
we feel so dedicated and we really want to make it work. We’re young and
experienced so we’re going to work our hardest. We’re being reasonable and
considerate since we don’t want to let our friend down and ruin this amazing
chance that was given to us. By supporting us you will be providing hundreds of
Greek students with a place where they can read, feel comfortable and spend
quality time with their fellow students. Photos of Thinking (C)up, the one that already exists.
A big thank
you from each of us.

story:
MY STORY

I am a Senegalese citizen, I live in Dakar, I am 36 years old, and I have four children aged, 4, 6, 8, and 13 years.

Two years ago, after coming back from the funeral of the second of two of my brothers who had died of fulminant hepatitis, aged 25 and 39 respectively, my husband wanted me to undergo medical check-ups

MY DESEASE

It turned out that I suffer from viral hepatitis B and D. Further medical tests showed the presence of liver cirrhosis and several nodules, two of them suspected malignant. The medical treatment at the Hospital of Dakar was totally unsatisfactory.

POSSIBILITY OF TREATMENT IN ITALY

During a visit to Italy, my husband, Djibril Diop, Professor of Physics at the University of Dakar, talked about my disease with colleagues of the Physics Department of the University of Trento, with whom he has had a long collaboration. Aware of the most advanced medical techniques in Europe, they decided to ask for a medical advice from a practitioner of the Hospital of Trento.

THE INTERESTS IN MY PERSON

The head consultant who examined my health records from the Hospital of Dakar understood immediately that the seriousness of my disease did not offer any hope of survival except at a medical centre of excellence. He agreed to receive me at the Trento hospital.

Last May, friends of my husband raised funds for my hospitalization, my travel to Italy, my accommodation, and my stay in Trento.

MEDICAL CARE IN TRENTO AND FINAL DIAGNOSIS

I spent 5 weeks at the Trento Hospital. I' am now much better; however the Italian doctors confirmed the liver cirrhosis and diagnosed the two suspected nodules as malignant. Faced with this fully-developed disease, there is just one therapeutic option: a liver transplant.

MY PLEA FOR HELP

The cost of the transplant is enormous (eighty thousand euros); my family cannot face such a heavy expense. Thanks to the solidarity of the people of Trento people, to whom I am very grateful, I' have collected a large amount of money; however, this is not enough to covering the full cost of the transplant.

I need twenty thousand euros more for the liver transplant, and some more for the anti-rejection medical and pharmacological treatment.

I thank everybody who can help me to survive.

Warm regards,

Bity

CASSA RURALE DI TRENTOIBAN: IT 17 A 08304 01810 000010364561  -  BIC/SWIFT code:  CCRTIT2T76ABeneficiary: G. Dalba

Reason: Pro Bity

For more info:

https://www.facebook.com/Un-nuovo-fegato-per-la-vita-di-Bity-1613281038921327/timeline/

story:
Meet QuenchBot™. A patent pending robotic machine that contains fresh fruits and vegetables to build you a refreshing smoothie on-demand! We have started building a prototype with a local manufacturer, engineers and vending machine distributor (look under Partners). We're looking to raise funds to complete our prototype!



How It Works

  • Walk upto a machine and choose the drink you want from a digital menu.
  • Customize (add, remove, increase, decrease) your ingredients.
  • Pay with your credit card.
  • The Smoothie Robot will collect all the ingredients in a cup, blend it and hand it to you!

How It's Different

Compared to Smoothie Shops, QuenchBot™ has:

  • 100% fresh ingredients. Many smoothie shops use concentrates as some ingredients.
  • The potential to be access anytime. Smoothie shops have fixed hours.
  • The ability to be installed in many locations that don't have space for a shop
  • A fully customizable menu.

Compared to other Smoothie Machines, QuenchBot™ has:

  • Transparent panel to see the ingredients and their freshness
  • Ability to build your own drink
  • Lots of variety
Compared to Bottled Drinks, QuenchBot™:
  • Uses fresh fruits and ingredients
  • Creates a drink on-demand on-the-spot


QuenchBot Locations

Imagine a smoothie shop in a box. If you have space to install and manage a large vending machine, QuenchBot™ is yours! Businesses who can benefit from the machine are the ones looking to:

  • Expand their drinks options
  • Add healthy palatable choices
  • Adopt new technology and automation
  • Reduce maintenance and other costs (self-serve)
Ideal Locations to install QuenchBot™:
  • School cafeteria
  • Corporate kitchens
  • Gym
  • Grocery stores
  • Coffee shops, Cafes, Restaurants
  • Transit centers
  • Malls





Engineering Cost Breakdown

Basic Prototype:

$33,000 = Engineering (Manual and Small-Scale)
                  Documentation = $1000
                  Circuits and Firmware = $12000
                  Equipment and Materials = $5000
                  Dispensing mechanism = $3000
                  Assembly = $12,000
                  Total = $33,000
$4000 = Indiegogo + Processing fees
Total = $37,000

Fully Functional Prototype:

$70,000 = Engineering (Automated and Full-Size)
$30,000 = Equipment and Materials
$11,000 = Indiegogo + Processing fees
Total = $111,000


Business Cost Breakdown

$3000 = Legal (NDA, IP etc.)
$6000 = Patent
$1500 = Business Consultation (financial/marketing)
$1500 = Design (logo, website, product)
$600 = Business license, trademark etc.
$1400 = Indiegogo + Processing fees
Total = $14,000


Near Future Expenses

Prototype Testing and Changes = $15,000 to $30,000
NAMA certification = $150,000 to $300,000
Videos and models = $5000 to $10,000
Outreach (Marketing/Ad) = $10,000 to $20,000
Miscellaneous = $10,000 to $20,000
Rough Total = $200,000 to $400,000


QuenchBot™ Smoothie Tumbler

Here's what the tumbler looks like :) Image with logo coming soon!


Unique Smoothie Recipes 

Amazingly delicious recipes just for you! Perfected by a local chef :)

                                              

            

                      

                              

                        


More Perks?

Would you like to see more perks? Have a suggestion? Let us know! info@falalainnovation.com



     

   Click on the image to go to the corresponding website.    

                               

               



   Click on the image to go to the corresponding website.

story:
CharlesDesigns® would like to thank you for visiting our crowdfunding campaign to ' SAVE THE FIZZ ' with the Innovative New FizzSaver™!

​Watch the 4 Simple Steps to Saving your Fizz...

FizzSaver™ A.K.A. Co2Saver™ By CharlesDesigns® Demostration 4 Simple Steps. Click Link

Welcome everyone, we wanted to make this an Inclusive Crowdfunding Campaign, where we will attempt to include those with special needs, by creating a video for the Write-Up Story itself. 

You may now choose to listen or watch the Write-Up Story, rather then read about us, it's for your convenience especially for those who really need it.


CharlesDesigns® Indiegogo Spokesperson for the FizzSaver™. Click Link


We all love our fizzy drinks, but once you open that can, the clock starts ticking down to a flat, boring, life-less drink. In about 15 minutes most of the freshness and fizz has already been lost! It’s almost impossible to keep your canned drink fresh and fizzy for long. Not only that, but opening canned drinks can be difficult and damaging to fingernails and your fingernail polish. That’s only the beginning. Once that can has been opened, the drink quickly goes flat and pests like bees, flies, ants and other insects are attracted to the canned drink and become a nuisance, or worse still a danger to those allergic to Bees and Wasps and gets stung within the Throat.

" If we could  just save 1 Life, a Child Allergic to Bee or Wasp Stings...It would be All Worth It "

USA: Mothers with Young Children - Testimonial of FizzSaver™ A.K.A Co2Saver™ Product Review. Click Link

The FizzSaver’s innovative design focuses on 3 key benefits;

The Seal, which preserves the fizzy freshness for over an amazing 7 hours.

The Opener, which makes it easy to open your favorite drink and protects fingernails and nail polish.

The Cover which prevents pests like bees, flies, and ants from crawling on the rim, where your mouth touches, or entering the can.
The cover also prevents messy spills.

 Some of the FizzSaver's Usage.


Imagine drinking a fresh and fizzy drink over 7 hours after opening the can. Imagine being able to easily and safely open the can and keep it sealed from pests and spills?! Now you don’t have to imagine! This is the wonderful reality of the FizzSaver™, and we’ve only just scratched the surface of how CharlesDesigns® latest innovation will revolutionize the way you drink canned beverages! The FizzSaver™ is ready to go, so be a part of this amazing project and be among the first to get this revolutionary device in your hands!

7 Hours Fizz Test, Coke 250ml (2inch Rim) Only Half Can of Coke balanced within. Click Link


We hope you enjoyed the Music, we will be using it for the :

FizzSaver™ SnapChat Challenge, Coming Soon...Watch This Space. {...}

Limited Period Only FREE DOWNLOAD on our website FizzSaver™ Music.


A FizzSaver™ Behind The Scenes...Games Release


We’ve engineered the FizzSaver™ to fit a wide variety of canned drinks so that no matter what you’re drinking, the FizzSaver™ is sure to do an amazing job!


We’ve spent over a year testing and refining the FizzSaver™. This is truly a precision engineered device. We believe in this innovative product so much that we took the risk by investing in the tooling and Prototype Overmold for our FizzSaver™ upfront!  Everything has been precision engineered to the highest degree and extensively tried and tested. The wait is over! The FizzSaver™ is ready to go!
Now backers, it’s your turn! Be a part of this revolutionary new product and back us for the Pilot Run Built of the FizzSaver™! Backers will get their FizzSaver’s first and well before the Christmas holidays.
Check out our fantastic rewards tier and join us!

Twins Spokespersons Indiegogo Campaign & Demonstration Co2Saver™ A.K.A FizzSaver™ By CharlesDesigns® Click Link


The FizzSaver™ is created by CharlesDesigns® 

Charles Toh; Product Architect and Inventor. He has been granted 3 patents and has been nominated twice for Singapore's prestigious President Design Awards. Charles and his innovative products have been featured on TV in Singapore and has won the 1st Prize for Best Innovation Award sponsored by MediaCorp of Singapore. For more information, please take a look at our Indiegogo campaign or visit CharlesDesigns.sg

story:
What is GymBag?

GymBag is a subscription box experience which features the newest and most popular fitness brands and products. Upon subscribing, a GymBag box will be delivered to you every month for you to discover, experience, and enjoy.

What Your Pledge Will Do

"A pledge to GymBag, is a pledge to YOU!"

Your pledge will directly contribute to:

1. Creating and delivering the FIRST GymBag box to you!

2. Creating GymBag merch! Wristbands, logo decals, and Blender Bottles!

3. Building a simple, user-friendly website on a subbox platform.
4. Growing our audience which will allow us to offer even greater value in future monthly boxes and reduce shipping costs.

Inside your GymBag box:

- Supplements

- Fitness Clothing

- Gym Gear & Accesories

- Inspirational material

- Headphones

- Water bottles & Shakers

- Protein Bars & Macro-friendly Snacks

- Healthy Cooking Ingredients

- and much more...


Why Buy or Subscribe?

1. Pay $50, receive $75+ Value.
2. Only the best products are included in every GymBag. We will NEVER prioritize profit over offering our members superior quality.

OUR Mission

We know sometimes the fitness lifestyle can become very dull and repetitive when it comes to meals, workouts, and the overall routine. But we also know there isn't a fitness lover out there that doesn't love a fresh pair of running shoes, having a great workout, a brand new container of delicious protein powder, some new workout wear, or even just feeling motivated. 

Here at GymBag, our goal is to combine all of these positive experiences; while eliminating the dull for fitness lovers and enthusiasts. We want to pack the best that fitness lifestyle has to offer into one exciting, fun-filled experience and eliminate the hassle (you're busy enough as it is!) by delivering it straight to your door. This is our mission to give you something new and exciting to look forward to each month.

Stretch Goals

If we raise more money than our target we will:
1. Code and design our very own website
2. Sponsor athletes 
3. Send out boxes for review
4. Investigate the offering of different GymBag subscription options

Example Boxes

"We need a visual!!"
There are a few images of "example boxes" in the Gallery where you can see the types of items that we will be including in each box. Boxes will not likely be as filled as those, however we are prioritizing the inclusion of top quality products such as those. These images serve as our inclusion goals.

story:
The Green Button Campaign has been started by a group of youth activists from Llanelli who want to help end the stigma attached to mental health 1 Button at a time.

The idea behind the Green Button is that the wearer of the button is showing that they are willing to discuss Mental Health issues or listen to someone who may want to talk about there own Mental Health Issue's and do not view it as a "taboo" subject.

We are hoping with the Green Button Campaign that together we can raise the awareness that mental health really needs, in turn helping end the Stigma that is attached to Mental Health and bring this to the forefront of conversation's across the U.K.

We are looking to launch the campaign with the funding raised thru this.

We are also looking to champion other mental health charities and help raise money & awareness for Mental Health & the charities connected to it.

We have already started making the Green Button's as you can see from the photo's attached.

Please help us to help those who need it & help raise awareness for Mental Health, Thank You!

We also have a presence on Twitter @ButtonCampaign

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Short Summary

Coming off the strongest season in program history, our No. 25 nationally ranked Stevens Men's Tennis team is gearing up for their toughest Spring schedule to date. With over ten nationally ranked opponents on the 2016 Spring schedule, the boys will circle the toughest week of their season - March 19-26  in Southern California - as an opportunity to gain invaluable experience vs. some of the top teams in the country. 

Stevens Men's Tennis has seen a meteoric rise in the Division 3 rankings over the past four years, going from previously unranked to top 30 in the country. With four nationally ranked recruiting classes making up the 2015/16 roster, this season could be the most special one yet. 

The four California matches, vs. No. 4 Pomona, No. 6 U of Chicago, No. 9 Bowdoin, and No. 20 Tufts, will provide an incredible opportunity and challenge for the Ducks. 

Being a Division 3 school without athletic scholarships, the tennis trip is not cheap. The total cost per student, including airfare, lodging, and travel, is $1150. Reaching our campaign goal of $7,000 would effectively cut the cost per student in half, at just under $600 out of pocket per student. 

"My favorite part of Spring Break is getting in high quality tennis as well as bonding with the guys on the team. The California trip is an awesome opportunity for amazing competition in beautiful weather." -Jacob Thigpen, Senior, Chemical Engineering. 

"This season could be one for the history books. But those history books can't be written if we don't play those important matches that we play during Spring Break. With your generosity, this chance can become a reality." -Charles Drake, Junior, Finance.


What We Need & What You Get

Being a Division 3 school without athletic scholarships, the tennis trip is not cheap. The total cost per student, including airfare, lodging, and travel, is $1150. Reaching our campaign goal of $7,000 would effectively cut the cost per student in half, at just under $600 out of pocket per student. Every donated dollar will go directly to the students in cutting the cost of their Spring Break trip and nowhere else!

We are going to do with this campaign what we do best - have fun! We are excited to offer a number of exciting perks for donors, including but not limited to being a guest coach and custom player videos sent directly to your e-mail inbox!

The Impact

By contributing to our campaign, you will insure that every team member will be able to attend the trip. As it currently stands, we may be travelling to California without a full roster due to the hefty price tag.

Other Ways You Can Help

Join us on Social Media! We will be updating our indiegogo campaign in its entirety here as well as on our Stevens Men's Tennis Facebook page, so give us a follow there for all updates! You can also follow us and retweet our updates on Twitter at Ducks_Tennis!

story:
THIS CAMPAIGN IS NOW CLOSED

LINK TO NEW CAMPAIGN IS

http://www.indiegogo.com/campaigns/the-sciatic-pain-relief-cushion-ii

 

Who we are

Ian Garside, the inventor of the Sciatic Pain Relief Cushion, understands the debilitating nature of this pain as it is something he himself has suffered with.  

One day he realised that whilst he was seated and the sciatic nerve that was causing him pain was not under pressure it was the most comfortable that he had been.  This lead to Ian developing the concept for the cushion.

When the cushion worked for Ian he became passionate to see it help as many people as possible so that they too could find some relief.  This lead to him setting up a business with Mark Dunwell and Jo Milnes.  Mark is also a Remedial Massage Therapist and has had a long career as a successful operations manager in various manufacturing industries.  Jo has a technical background and many years experience in medical device development and construction.  

The Product

 

After extensive development and testing we have created a cushion that not only works, with 93% of those that have trialled the cushion reporting a reduction in pain, but is also portable and discrete.

How it works

The heart shape of the cushion is the key.  The cushion is placed on the seat with the gap at the rear on the side where you experience the sciatic pain.

When you are suffering with sciatic pain the sciatic nerve is hypersensitive to any stimulation. Small amounts of stimulation can cause excessive pain. One of the keys to recovering from sciatic pain is to calm the nerve from over stimulation.

Nerves are highly sensitive to the mechanical stimulus of stretch and pressure - both of these stimulae happen when you sit, which is why often sitting is uncomfortable if you have sciatica. Appropriate stretching can be beneficial for sciatica, but stretching while the nerve is under pressure can be painful. The Sciatic Pain Relief Cushion allows gentle stretching of the sciatic nerve whilst sitting without the pressure. This can be seen from the pressure mapping results below:

 

The first sciatic pain sufferers to try the cushion saw the benefit  and as more try the cushion the feedback is just as strong, if not stronger.  No product will work for everyone but we are delighted that the cushion is helping such a large percentage of those suffering from sciatic pain.  Those that have tried it whilst pregnant have also found it beneficial in improving their comfort when seated.

 

Testimonials

===========================================================

 

The Development

During the development we have learnt that different seating environments require specific cushions and have developed solutions for the most common seating environments.  There is a solution for driving, one for comfortable chairs/ sofas, and a solution that suits most office chairs. 

Who we have worked with

Versions

There are two sizes of cushion available.

The smaller of the cushions we call the "Car cushion" as this is where most most car seats.  If the seat is leather, or the surface is slippy we recommend that you use the available non slip mat to keep the cushion securely in place. We recommend that the mat is used with the cushion in moving vehicles.

This smaller cushion is also ideal for traditional dining chairs and for use at when commuting or at sporting events, the theatre or cinemas etc.  The carrying handle makes it easy to carry with you, but it will also fit in a standard carrier bag if you wish.

The second cushion is larger (45cm x 45cm) , deeper and has a looser cover - we call this the standard, or larger cushion.  

It is designed to give greater relief when seated on a softer surface, such as an armchair or sofa. The cushion works with the softer seat to reduce the pressure on the sciatic nerve, 

We have structured the rewards so that the best value is when both sizes are purchased at once to help give the greatest relief to you or your loved one.

The Rewards/ Perks

There will be additional rewards added as the campaign runs but the best deals are the first ones where there are limited numbers.

Why are we Crowdfunding?

We are crowdfunding this project so that we have the funds to start manufacturing the cushions. We have a supply chain and all we need now are orders that will raise the capital required to start production.

By contributing to this campaign and ordering cushions you are helping us to scale up and achieve economies that make the price point as low as we can.  In recognition of your support at this early stage of the product we are offering some attractive discounts over the final recommended retail price of the products.  There are Early bird offers for those of you that contribute first, but we have to limit these, so don't expect them to last.

If we don't reach our target you will still receive your perks as the production costs for this first product has already been covered.

At this moment the medical device is only registered in Europe, so we cannot ship products outside this area.  We need to grow before we can afford the registrations costs for the other regions.  We are hoping that there will be sufficient interest from outside the EU to make this a reality so that we could look at launching in other regions in six months time.  If you are not in the EU and would like to be kept informed of our progress please leave a comment so we can respond to you directly and keep in touch.

We want to undertake future research into the effectiveness of the cushion so that we can ensure that it is clear who will benefit and also to help us develop any future versions to widen the number of people that can benefit from this solution.  Crowdfunding will help us achieve this, as surplus funds raised can be channelled into research and evidence gathering.

The road to recovery

We really want as many people as possible to experience the benefits that others have from using the Sciatic Pain Relief cushion.  

Just as importantly we want to hear from you as to how you have got on with the product.  Your input will drive the product improvements and our understanding .  There are so many causes of sciatic pain that we know we will not be able to help everyone, but each person that is helped is a victory. No-one likes to see a friend or loved one suffer.

Help us to help others

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are lucky enough not to suffer sciatic pain we still need your help.  If you can share our campaign then we would be very grateful.  You never know which of your friends are suffering in silence.  Just click on the share icons for this campaign.  It couldn't be easier.  Or you could make a small donation to show your support.  It is much appreciated.

story:
FitTogether is an exercise programme with a simple ambition: to add joy, health and vitality to your life and the life of your little one. 

Through our unique design we provide you the opportunity to enjoy exercise in a time of life when it can be the most difficult to find the opportunity to fit it in.

We are a husband & wife team, Andy & Alison, and we initially came up with the idea after having our first child, Archie. On top of our experience as physiologists and clinical exercise specialists, it took us 7 years to research and hone the concept – studying infant development, optimum carrying methods and the latest sport and rehabilitation science for the postnatal core and pelvic floor ... and most importantly, making exercise fun and enjoyable for the whole family and ensuring you get the results you are looking for!

Before now our classes were only available to you if you lived near us - you can now  change this. By supporting us in this campaign we can take our classes online and and you can be the first to get them in your own home!!

We want to film 2 videos, FitTogether Baby class for parents with their little ones and FitTogether Toddler for parents with their slightly bigger little ones. To do this we need your support & help, it will cost £13,460 to ensure a top quality video for each programme so that you and your children can get the best possible experience. This includes:

  • fees for an award-winning multi-platform film production agency (3 days of filming & 5 days post production)
  • graphic designers (our Toddler class uses Multi Media to keep the little ones more engaged)
  • equipment hire; 2 x cameras & sound equipment
  • studio costs

To say thank you we are offering some amazing perks that have never been available before including:
  • Your own copy of the video - to use in the comfort of your own home at anytime!
  • An exclusive FitTogether Connecta baby carrier - declare your commitment to exercise in these fantastic, versatile carriers (keep looking out for our article on why we choose the carriers we choose and why it is essential to use an appropriate carrier when exercising with your little one).
  • Exclusive designs of t-shirts and onesies - for the little training partners and trainers in your life: "Mummy's/Daddy's Personal Trainer" onesies for babies & "Mummy's/Daddy's Training Partner" t-shirts for toddlers.
  • An opportunity to be in the video with us - this is a unique opportunity to appear in a group track in the video.
  • Personalised nutrition plans - simple and easy to follow, focusing on the science of changing our behaviours to help you achieve your weight loss goals and keep the results.
  • Personal training packages - with over 13 years of success in creating life changing results for his clients, coaching British Team athletes and most recently realising his own goals when he had let stresses and life distract from the most important activity - nourishing and creating health (see picture below), Andy is a World Class exercise, movement and lifestyle coach. Choose your perk as a life changing gift for you or a loved one.

If we do not make the full amount we will be doing everything we can to get these videos made. We may have to cut back on makeup and 'tache wax to do it but we will find a way, we are too passionate about this to not make it happen!

You all can help!

From financial contributions to spreading the word to everyone you know, you all play a vital part in bringing this dream to life! Please use the indiegogo sharing tools when spreading the word so people know where to find us!

Thank you so much

love

Andy, Alison, Archie, Tilly & Nia xxxxx

(The FitTogether Family)


get in touch

backers: indiegogo@fittogether.org.uk
business enquiries: business@fittogether.org.uk
press enquiries: press@fittogether.org.uk

Choose your perk as a life changing gift for you or a loved one.



If we do not make the full amount we will be doing everything we can to get these videos made. We may have to cut back on makeup and 'tache wax to do it but we will find a way, we are too passionate about this to not make it happen!

You all can help! 
From financial contributions to spreading the word to everyone you know, you all play a vital part in bringing this dream to life! Please use the indiegogo sharing tools when spreading the word so people know where to find us!
Thank you so much
love
Andy, Alison, Archie, Tilly & Nia xxxxx

(The FitTogether Family)

get in touchbackers: indiegogo@fittogether.org.ukbusiness enquiries: business@fittogether.org.uk
press enquiries: press@fittogether.org.uk

story:
Short Summary

Hi!  I'm Kate Chapman.  
I'm an actress and singer living in New York City.  
I've done five Broadway shows.
I was also "Mrs. Claus" for The Radio City Christmas Spectacular for five seasons.  Now I'm a graduate student at Goddard College, working toward my Master of Arts in Health Arts and Sciences.  

Several years ago I made slow, gentle, fun changes to my lifestyle that resulted in enormous healing for me.  I lost 100 pounds, reversed several chronic health problems (including a twenty-four year history with ulcerative colitis), and found pleasurable, free ways to feel better.  I was enjoying not being sick, so I wanted to learn how to support others who wanted to feel better, too.  I attended the Institute for Integrative Nutrition where I received my Health Coaching training.  I wanted to learn more, though, and so I entered Goddard College.  

"The Kate Chapman Show:  A Feel Better Hour" is a one-hour talk show and my Master's thesis project.  The show combines my skills as an entertainer as well as my knowledge as a certified Health Coach to bridge the gap between medical modalities and a marketplace overwhelmed with often-conflicting information.

What We Need & What You Get

This pilot will be a one-hour program, complete with "faux" commercials holding the place where future sponsors will be.  These commercials deal with topics applicable to the show, and showcase some of what I see for future episodes.

I watch TV and can't find this kind of show, so I'm creating it.  You can be a part of this creation!  What are your healthcare questions and concerns?  Do you know what a Health Coach does?  What would you ask your very own Health Coach?  Do you wish your doctors and nurses would entertain you as they were treating you?  We will!  And we will provide helpful, insightful, and diverse information along with a song and/or a laugh.

If I don't reach the entire fund goal.....the show must go on.  However, I'm shooting for the BIG VISION with this campaign!  All money raised will go toward the final product, and the final product will be as grand as it can be with the funds raised.  Don't you want to see what the BIG DOLLAR amount show looks like?  Also, if I raise over the amount (how fun would that be!?!), I'll produce more product.

BTW:  The Kate Chapman Show is a sponsored project of Fractured Atlas, a non-profit arts service organization. Contributions for the charitable purposes of The Kate Chapman Show must be made payable to Fractured Atlas only and are tax-deductible to the extent permitted by law.

The Impact

Entertainment is one of the best ways to provide people with information that they will remember.  Our healthcare system is overwhelmed with too many patients and it's not serving us as individuals - because it can't.  There is a way to help out, though, and that's by sharing what each of us knows about feeling better.  Many great, easy, gentle, free remedies are around us all day, every day, but until someone shares how it worked for them, they get overlooked.  We need each other's tales to simplify what has become unnecessarily complicated.  And, let's do it with fun, humor, kindness, compassion, and - most of all - reverence for those receiving the information.

Risks & Challenges

I'll be honest:  I know a whole lot about Broadway.  It's been my "home" for most of my adult life.  I don't know much about television, or producing it.  I've been learning as much as I can by attending every taping of every talk show I can, as well as enlisting the help of friends who are in that end of The Biz, but it's a HUGE learning curve.  I think, though, that my vision is strong, my support system is stellar and full of people who can answer millions of questions, and that I will have a great product in the end.  

I was a little girl from rural Ohio who figured out how to get on Broadway - 5 times.  I believed in myself then, and I believe in myself now....even when I set gigantic goals.  Come, join my team!

Other Ways You Can Help

If extra moolah isn't your thing right now, you can still help!  Send me lots of great energy...AND share this with your friends.  The more people who know, the merrier! I want all of us to feel better.

story:
Overview

I am Juan Toro, purveyor of Don Juan Fitness, a licensed Zumba(r) Instructor, Soccer Official, and disabled combat Veteran.  Muncie Fit-Con is my idea to establish an annual dance fitness event in Muncie, Indiana, in conjunction with the municipal leadership that will be a celebration of cardio fitness and dance.

Muncie Fit-Con will happen on 16 JULY 2016 at Cornerstone for the Arts, Muncie, Indiana, from 2:30 pm to 6pm.  Ticket sales to the General Public will begin on 3 APRIL 2016.

Proud to announce that International Zumba(r) Fitness Presenters Kass Martin and Steve Boedt will be the special Guest Stars

The inaugural Muncie Fit-Con will be a fun-packed three hour event of cardio fitness and dance featuring a selection of our excellent local fitness instructors alongside invited internationally renowned, world-class fitness instructors for the attending public.  Fitness instructors vary in methods and techniques; however the student/participant gains a better outcome when exposed to a full range of fitness instruction.  


We want to put Muncie on the map for fitness in East Central Indiana. We want to bring national and international fitness trainers/presenters and music artists to Muncie in order to showcase local fitness instructors and expose the general public to the benefits of cardio fitness and dance.  The selected instructors are very interested in the health and wellbeing of their students and consistently attempt to reach out to those that need it the most.  I admire that trait and this is my way of showcasing their skills alongside two of the most well-known fitness instructors in the dance fitness world. This way the Muncie public can see how professional and dedicated the local instructors are alongside the internationally famous dance fitness instructors. Additionally, recognizing the positive influence of the Boys and Girls Club of Muncie, this is an opportunity to provide that excellent organization with another venue for their youngsters to express themselves in dance and reap the benefits of cardio fitness.  

What We Want - What You Get

Fitness Instructors have amazing talent and dedication; though at $5/student, most fitness instructors are happy to teach a few students and rarely get an opportunity to teach large classes in truly professional settings.  Many potential fitness students rarely have the time or the inclination to try several different instructors and disciplines to find the right one for their needs.  Your contributions will provide some of the local instructors and interested public to experience cardio fitness and dance in a world-class environment.  Additionally, the local instructors have a tradition of sharing and caring for those that need dance fitness in their lives, donating their time and talent to the Boys & Girls Club of Muncie, local PTO fund drives, local High School prom fund drives, and even a fund drive to help with the medical costs for a professional cheerleader from a local professional sports team.  These dedicated and caring dance fitness instructors support the local community while maintaining busy home and professional lives and teaching their dedicated students.  Therefore, Muncie Fit-Con serves East-Central Indiana fitness needs by providing a world class venue, with world class instructors, and a world class supportive environment.

Your contributions will go towards the very mundane, yet very important tasks of reserving the venue, renting the stage, curtains, and piping, renting the lighting, and placing deposits with the world-class fitness presenters, DJ/Presenter, and a quality sound system.  Additionally, your generous contributions will allow the initial block of tickets to be purchased and provided to the Boys and Girls Club of Muncie.

The cost of starting this endeavor is $6,000. 

Your decision to contribute to this very worthwhile endeavor allows you to participate, if you so choose, or fund the ticket(s) for the Boys and Girls Club of Muncie.  

There are two types of $75 Fit-Con VIP tickets:

Boy & Girls Club Fit-Con VIP – There are 5 tickets available.  These tickets will go directly to a lucky youngster. Provides: Early Bird Check-in, VIP positioning in Rows 1-4, backstage pass, Meet & Greet with all the dance fitness presenters, photo opportunity with the dance fitness presenters, a souvenir wristband and an opportunity to be on stage for the Grand Finale.  The contributor will have Preferred Placement Program Listing as a Very Generous Sponsor of the Boys & Girls Club and Muncie Fitness Jam.

FIT-Con VIP – There are 15 tickets available.  These tickets are for use by the Contributor or may be donated.  Provides: Early Bird Check-in, VIP positioning in Rows 1-4, Meet & Greet with all of the dance fitness presenters, photo opportunity with the fitness presenters, and a souvenir wristband.  The contributor will have Preferred Placement Program Listing as a Very Generous Sponsor of Muncie Fitness Jam.

There are two types of  $60 VIP tickets:

Boys & Girls Club VIP – There are 15 tickets available. These tickets will go directly to a lucky youngster.  Provides: VIP Positioning in Rows 5-8, souvenir wristband, photo opportunity with the dance fitness presenters, and an opportunity to be on stage for the Grand Finale.  The contributor will have Program Listing as a Generous Sponsor of the Boys & Girls Club of Muncie.

VIP – There are 15 tickets available.  These tickets are for use by the Contributor or may be donated.  Provide VIP Positioning in Rows 5-8, souvenir wristband, and a photo opportunity with the dance fitness presenters.

Just Wanna Dance is a $30 General Admission Ticket for use by the Contributor or may be donated.

Of course, a contributor is not obliged to use any of these perks and may contribute any sum to this worthy cause.

Why This Fit-Con is Important

Fitness is a small yet important part of every person’s life regardless of where on the fitness scale one resides.  I believe, wholeheartedly, that many of today’s aches and pains can be alleviated in no small part by better fitness. In many cases, in East-Central Indiana, I find that there’s intention, but no follow-through.  I have also noticed that many of those that need the fitness the most only need a small incentive to begin or continue their path to a healthier lifestyle.  In East-Central Indiana, there is a dearth of activities that bring together people of varying fitness to participate in an event tailored to them.  Rather, there are triathlons, soccer clubs, tennis clubs, 5K and 10K runs, mini-marathons, bicycle races.  All of these worthwhile activities require training, regimentation, and superior singular focus.  This event, for which I am asking contributions, fills a gap that is applicable to most of the population in the area.  By bringing in world class dance fitness instructors, it builds the interest and can give hope, incentive, or motivation to those who cannot participate in highly regimented training, to participate in an event that is fun that raises the heartrate, and feels like one is just dancing.  Your contribution will allow 400 people that absolutely need encouragement, need motivation, and need positive feedback to discover that the local dance fitness instructors and the world class dance fitness instructors share the same enthusiasm for fitness, share the same concern for health, and are willing to show those lucky participants just how much fun being fit can be.  It will show the participants that they don’t need to drive 50-80 miles to find quality, caring, and loving instructors.  

Risks & Challenges

As in every endeavor, there are inherent risks and challenges.  In my estimation, there are two risks that are, if not “show stoppers”, they are “show impeders”.  The greatest risk to this endeavor would be the inability to secure the two top dance fitness instructors.  They have agreed in principle to participate and have placed the date on their calendars.  While they are amenable to altering some terms of the contract, the down payment for their appearance is a critical point that must be met and met without fail.  Without these two giants of the industry, it would be difficult, if not impossible to draw 400 people to the Muncie Fit-Con.  The second risk is the inability to fund a promotional plan that adequately covers East-Central Indiana.  Social media, while important, cannot and does not replace billboard space, posters, and print media advertisement.  A well planned advertising and promotional campaign will need to reach out at the right time and to the right audience to be successful.  That requires an advertising campaign that begins in February 2016, well before the ticket sales to the public begins.  

My plan to mitigate these risks includes this funding campaign.  So whatever is raised by this campaign will go directly to mitigating the identified risks.  I am prepared to negotiate with all concerned to maximize the available time to meet their requirements.  However, failing that, my only other recourse would be to use my VA disability checks to meet the obligations of Muncie Fit-Con, though it may not be enough.  Using my VA disability is a course of action of last resort, as it affects my family's disposable income.  However, it demonstrates how much I believe Muncie Fit-Con is needed in East-Central Indiana.

Share to Contribute

Your contribution is priceless, whether you choose to use the perks, just contribute a particular sum, or share this campaign with your network so that as many potential contributors have the opportunity to make a definitive difference in the lives of at least 400 people in East-Central Indiana.  I encourage you to use the Indiegogo share tools to get this campaign to those who can also make a difference.  You can take great satisfaction of your contribution to assist the inaugural Muncie Fit-Con and make a lasting difference in the fitness and quality of life for so many people.

story:
The Greatest Wealth Is Health 

Due to a healthy body we can work and activities as well as possible. Factors that affect health are environmental, lifestyle, and genetics. Ultra violet rays and air pollution, contaminated water can negatively impact our bodies. Bad lifestyle such as smoking, lazy to exercise, unhealthy eating patterns so affect the health of our body. Excessive stress will aggravate your physical condition aside from genetic factors such as: osteoporosis, heart disease and stroke.

Each person also did not want to experience premature aging. Everyone wants to look younger, especially for women. So, what about your own? Do you want to be healthy? Willing umbrella before it rains. It means that if you care about yourself, then protect yourself early on before it's too late with nutritious natural products.





Glucogen and Teragen using L-Glutathione from Kohjin


Frequently Asked Questions:

Q: Are your products safe for pregnant moms?
A: No. Our products should not be used by those who are pregnant.

Q: Is there anyone who shouldn't use your products?
A: If you have a pre-existing condition or are taking any prescription medication, always consult with your doctor before starting a new regimen.

Q: Are your products safe for kids?
A: Our products are meant for those 17 years of age and older.

Q: Who can I e-mail for customer service and questions?
A: Please e-mail: nickowir@gmail.com


Moment in Indonesia

Product Glucogen, Teragen, Slimmer, and Biocell already very well known and accepted by Indonesian society. Because they feel the benefits using this product.


Moment product already have BPOM RI (Badan Pengawasan Obat dan Makanan Republik Indonesia) or The National Agency of Drugs and Food Controls (NA-DFC) Licenses. Moment product also have Halal certification from MUI.


DISCLAIMER:
Moment Product does not intend for any statements to take the place of advice given by your medical professional. It is intended for informational purposes only. Always consult your medical professional before taking any supplement or beginning a new regimen.


Please Share Our Campaign

We hope you'll join us and are thankful for your pledges. In addition to pledging, sharing this page in social media is very valuable as well!

story:
Short Summary

Chronic pain is epidemic in our society, affecting around 100 million Americans; more than Type II Diabetes, heart disease and cancer combined.*
It’s a significant public health problem that costs the US up to $635 billion annually – approximately $2000 per capita – in health care costs and lost productivity.**
These numbers continue to grow, but what many people don’t know is that chronic pain doesn’t have to be a life sentence. 

Hi, I’m Jennifer Soames. I’ve been a Licensed Massage Practitioner (LMP) for nearly a decade, and a Board Certified Structural Integrator (BCSI) since 2011. I specialize in offering my clients solutions for chronic pain through therapeutic, hands-on bodywork and movement education. 

Most of the clients who come to me have tried about everything under the sun to help free themselves of chronic pain: massage, physical therapy, chiropractic care, pain medication, surgery, etc. Though clients have experienced some help from the aforementioned modalities, they've had limited success and are not willing to settle for a decreased quality of life saddled with chronic pain. People need solutions, not a temporary bandage. 

Using a combination of Structural Integration bodywork (a very specialized form of massage) and yoga, I help individuals release years of tension and pain, restoring their body’s natural function and range of motion. This method is called RolfYoga. 

RolfYoga is a drug-free, non-invasive approach that gives individuals a chance to finally live pain-free, and help them reclaim the joy and quality of life they've been missing for many years. It was created in Pittsburgh in 2009 by visionary Structural Integrator and yoga instructor, L'aura Campisi, and it’s my goal to bring RolfYoga’s innovative healing method to the West Coast, with your help.

Client Testimonial:
“I am not experiencing any of the pain or aches that I have been experiencing for years. All I can say is that if you are suffering, please give [Jennifer] a call – this is one of the most amazing therapies I have ever tried and have had so much success from it!”  – Y.A.

 *1 Source: American Academy of Pain Medicine
** 2 Source: Institute of Medicine


The Project

This campaign will fund the development of a RolfYoga program for the West Coast. RolfYoga is an integrated style of bodywork that combines Structural Integration massage with movement education and yoga to release tension and pain, and improve alignment and range of motion in the body.

RolfYoga was created in Pittsburgh by visionary Structural Integrator and yoga instructor, L'aura Campisi, and has achieved remarkable results with clients being restored to health after years of unnecessary suffering. I am an inaugural student of the RolfYoga method, and it is my goal to complete the full training and mentorship so I may bring the healing power of RolfYoga to the West Coast.

By integrating RolfYoga into my current bodywork practice, it is my passion and mission to serve my clients and community with the best possible care that provides ongoing, lasting relief from chronic pain.


A RolfYoga program in our region will consist of individual client sessions and small group classes to be offered in Renton, Washington, a conveniently short drive from Seattle, the Eastside, and the South end. My goal is to promote RolfYoga classes and services, under one roof where individuals come for healing, support and education in body, mind and spirit.

Your support of this campaign will help bring RolfYoga to the West Coast, improving the physical and emotional health of our families and raising the quality of life in our community.


What We Need & What You Get

My campaign goal is $8,200.

All funds raised will go toward financing my 2016 training and mentorship in RolfYoga and marketing this innovative method on the West Coast. The initial marketing program will consist of a new website, logo and RolfYoga promotional materials.

My campaign goal is $8200. Cost breakdown:

• 300 hour Yoga Teacher Training in Pittsburgh, Summer/ Fall of 2016: $3500
• Travel costs for Pittsburgh (airfare, rental car & food; I’ve secured free lodging):    $1600
• September 2016- Four day training with Sharon Wheeler, one of the premier Structural Integration Practitioners in the world: $400
• New website: $1200
• New logo design and promotional marketing materials: $1500

(photo above: RolfYoga creator L'aura Campisi and I)

What You Get

All donation levels come with a personalized thank-you note from me and updates of my progress through the RolfYoga program, plus:

$50
Social media shout-out

$75
Personal social media shout-out
Copy of Taking Charge e-book

$150
Social media shout-out
Copy of Taking Charge e-book
1 free Balanced Body session

$300
Social media shout-out
Copy of Taking Charge e-book
 2 free Balanced Body sessions

$500
Social media shout-out
Copy of Taking Charge e-book
3 free Balanced Body sessions

$1000
Social media shout-out
Copy of Taking Charge e-book
6 free Balanced Body sessions

The Impact

No longer are medication, surgery or “living with the pain” the only solutions for treating chronic pain. RolfYoga is an effective, proven method for releasing long-held pain patterns, reconnecting with oneself, restoring daily function and feeling vital once again.

I have personally witnessed this approach completely change people's lives. I look forward to having an even greater impact on the lives of others by continuing my education in the RolfYoga method, and sharing its gifts with my community.


Client Testimonial:
“Now, I end my work days far less sore and drained, I can perform vigorous activities with vastly shorter recovery time, and my back and knee pains are virtually non-existent. Jennifer is incredible and her help was worth more
than I could have originally thought. Young or not, if you have aches and pains that you are done dealing with, pay [Jennifer] a visit, and retrieve the tools to move into a more satisfying life.” – K.W.

Your support of this campaign will help bring RolfYoga to the West Coast, improving the physical and emotional health of our families and raising the quality of life in our community.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute financially, you can still help. Here's how:

  • Get the word out and make some noise about this campaign.
  • Send it to everyone in your contacts, tell co-workers, friends and family.
  • Share on Facebook and other social media.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools.
