story:
Short Summary

We are a group of local climbers dedicated to establishing a place for the Brattleboro climbing community to come together. Our 30+ years of combined climbing experience have brought us sport climbing in the Red River Gorge, trad climbing in the White Mountains in New Hampshire, bouldering in Western Massachusetts and deep water soloing in Mallorca.

Climbing is an incredible sport which goes hand in hand with an active lifestyle and love of the outdoors. Climbing gyms are a resource for the community. They offer a safe, inclusive environment for new climbers to get involved with the sport and a training ground for experienced climbers to hone their skills.

The Southern Vermont community has spoken! The response to this project both online and in person has been overwhelmingly positive. We are confident that the community is here to support the BrattCave Bouldering Gym!

 

What We Need & What You Get

The materials we need include lumber, holds and mats. The climbing walls will be made of plywood supported by wooden planks. To protect climbers when they fall, we need foam mats. We will also have to pay for rent and insurance. Here is a list of our needs and their estimated costs.

Lumber: $3,000

Holds: $3,000

Mats: $5,000

Rent and Insurance: $2,000

Other Expenses: $2,000

We will be offering perks including bumper stickers, t-shirts and advance memberships in our gym to people who contribute to our campaign! 

If we do not reach our fundraising goal, we will continue the project anyway! The money will be spent on lumber and construction of the facility.

 

The Impact

By contributing to our campaign, you are helping us create another great resource for the Brattleboro community. BrattCave will be a reason for people to come to Brattleboro and another great way for local people to stay active.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Donations of materials such as holds, mats, lumber, gym equipment and even old futons are greatly appreciated.

Tell your friends! Like us on Facebook, follow us on Instagram to get the latest updates!

story:
Help Me Empower People to Live Well!

It is my goal to empower as many people worldwide as possible to embrace the mind-body connection, living a healthy & conscious lifestyle, and giving hope to those facing health challenges!

  • Thank you so much for checking out my campaign!  My name is Edie Summers, and I have positive recovery from a chronic condition known as ME/CFS/SEID.
  • I have a new book out that details how I used deep nutrition, mindful living, and becoming a conscious consumer in order to heal.  My book is called The Memory of Health, and I need your help to spread the word!
  • As I mentioned, it is my goal to inspire and empower as many people worldwide to embrace a healthy lifestyle, and to empower those facing chronic conditions.  I am seeking your help to do a book tour, targeted at natural foods stores, natural foods expos, and bookstores across the USA and even the globe!

Help me reach more people and I will reward you with my books and coaching programs!

What We Need & What You Get

My goal is to attend Expo East & Expo West (the Expos for the Natural Foods Industry) & Do Talks at Natural Foods Stores That Promote Educational Seminars for Their Customers on Healthy Living & Conscious Consumerism

  • My goal is to attend both Natural Industry Expos (East & West) and to set up talks and book signings at natural food stores across the USA.
  • In exchange for supporting my book tour, I will gift you my books and/or coaching packages based on the level of your donation.
  • I will set up as many talks at stores as I can, based on your donations.

The Impact

Holistic Well-Being is More Important than Ever As Is Being A Conscious Consumer.  We Need to Make The Choices We Make as Consumers Count!

  • Being a socially conscious consumer is more important than ever.  The quickest way to make a difference is with your actions as a consumer.
  • In addition, more people than ever are turning to alternative means to solve their health and wellness challenges.  This is how I became a conscious consumer, in my quest to solve my challenges with chronic fatigue. 
  • This is why the natural foods industry (both their expos and the natural foods stores) are the ideal places to promote my book as well as talk about living a truly healthy lifestyle, overcoming health and wellness challenges, and rising up as consumers to demand change at the grassroots level.
  • My book, The Memory of Health, is not only a story and resource, it is a call-to-action.  I am looking to empower people to realize their own power not only as consumers, but as whole beings, who truly can make a difference.  We CAN make a difference and it starts with what we buy!  This book took me ten years to write.  Help me to spread the message! 

Risks & Challenges

My greatest risk and challenge, I believe, is actively promoting certain brands that have helped me to heal.   Supplements get a lot of bashing, but quality brands can be extremely effective.  It's also about organic food, sustainability, non-GMO's, traceability, core values, and quality of ingredients in products.

  • It is only by taking a stand for what I believe in that change can occur.
  • I am prepared to debate the need for promoting brands as not only vehicles for conscious change, but as offering real help for my condition.

Other Ways You Can Help

Can't contribute?  No problem!  Perhaps you can help me spread the word?

  • If you can, please share on your social media channels.  Perhaps you can interview me on your blog, podcast, etc.?   I can interview you too on my top-rated internet radio show! Much gratitude in advance!
  • Please remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!  Thank you so much!!

Ready?  Here we go!  Let's change the world, one conscious choice at a time.

story:
Hello everyone! We are among one of the many start ups that are using Indiegogo  to launch our patent-pending project, Smoke Ghost. If you smoke, or know someone who does, check out the details regarding our project and all the benefits our product provides for smokers.

What is Smoke Ghost?

Simply put, Smoke Ghost masks the odor of the smoke you exhale with aromatic fragrances. This essentially means that you can smoke anywhere in the world without leaving a trace. Here is a short summary of all the benefits and features the little Ghost provides:

  • Prevents second-hand smoke
  • Saves environment from polluting and carcinogenic toxins
  • Contains interchangeable scent cartridges
  • Masks odor of smoke completely, can be used indoors and in vehicles
  • Portable, under 3 inches long and under 2 inches thick

Now let's delve deeper into the Ghost's power.

Components/Specifications

You may have seen similar smoking filters that attempt to deal with the smell of smoke. Smoke Ghost is distinct in that it not only filters your smoke but it alters the scent of your smoke into essential oil fragrances. The oil fragrances not only smell delightful, they combat the smell of the burning end of the substance you're smoking in order to fully mask the smell.

The nozzle component of the Ghost contains a carbon filter that cleanses the smoke as you blow through. The nozzle is wide enough at the base (about 1.5 inches) to encapsulate your lips as the smoke leaves your mouth. This means that all of the smoke passes through the nozzle. Here's a pic of the nozzle.

The first component of the device is the nozzle, the second component is the scent cartridge, the magical part. The scent cartridge contains an essential oils compound that radically transforms the odor of your smoke. This stuff smells sweet. For our current prototype models, we have three scents; lavender, jasmine, and ocean waves. We plan to add three more scents to this collection for a total of 6 possible scents. Here's a pic of the current scent cartridge prototypes we have:

Interchangeable Scents

One of the most awesome features of these scent cartridges is that they're interchangeable. Every scent cartridge is compatible with the filter. Typically, a scent cartridge is 100% efficient in altering smoke odor for around 300 blow throughs (this is for our current prototype, we expect to increase this number once the first PO is placed). After this point, the cartridge gradually declines in efficacy.  So once one scent cartridge begins to decline in potency, you can simply replace it with another. This adds even more life to your Ghost.

Prevents Second-Hand Smoke

According to the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC), since 1964, approximately 2,500,000 nonsmokers have died from health problems caused by exposure to secondhand smoke. In children, secondhand smoke causes the following: ear infections, more frequent and severe asthma attacks, respiratory symptoms and infections (bronchitis and pneumonia), and a greater risk for sudden infant death syndrome (SIDS). Obviously smoking is associated with these types of risks. One of our goals is to mitigate such negative externalities with Smoke Ghost. Exhaling the smoke through the Ghost filters the toxins and carcinogens in the smoke so others you are smoking around do not feel its harmful effects.

Save the Trees!

In addition to saving people from the harmful effects of smoke, Smoke Ghost saves the environment from the harmful effects of smoke. According to WebMD, the smoke from "three cigarettes can cause more air pollution than a diesel car's exhaust" (Hitti, 2004). Environmental tobacco smoke is a major source of particulate matter pollution. This air pollution is associated with numerous respiratory problems and lung diseases.  A single cigarette smoked indoors causes toxin concentrations "that are often higher than the federal air quality standards designed to protect public health in ambient air outdoors" (exposurescience.org). With Smoke Ghost, however, you can smoke your cigarettes without polluting your home and community's air. The Ghost allows you to smoke in your home without producing these dangerously high toxin concentrations.

Smoke Discretely

As you've learned from the earlier portion of this description, when you use Smoke Ghost to smoke all the odors associated with the smoke vanish and return as savory scents. This allows you to smoke anywhere without the scent of the smoke disturbing others. The Ghost masks the smell of the smoke so well you wouldn't smell the smoke inside a car if you rolled up all the windows. Indeed, the filter and the essential oils work together to eliminate such odors.

Why We Need You

From this project, we hope to raise $30,000 to make our first placement order for Smoke Ghost and supply our donors with the new Ghosts and fulfill the perks. With your contribution, you will receive Smoke Ghosts in various quantities as described in the perk section. Our donors will be the first to receive the Ghosts!

If our goal is not entirely met, we will still be able to fulfill the perks promised to our contributors by making a smaller placement order. With your help, we can change the way people smoke.

Risks & Challenges

As with all manufactured products, there is a chance that there is an issue with the assembly of the Ghost in the manufacturing process. Since the design is more or less simplistic, however, we don't expect issues to arise. We have met and talked to several quality manufacturers and they have informed us that it is not much of a concern. We expect to deliver the rewards as early as November and as late as December. Either way, you would get it before the holidays and it would make a great Christmas gift!
If we do run into some issues with the manufacturing by some chance, we have contracts in place to ensure that orders will be fulfilled no matter the circumstance therefore a working order is always guaranteed.

As you've learned from the earlier portion of this description, when you use Smoke Ghost to smoke all the odors associated with the smoke vanish and return as savory scents. This allows you to smoke anywhere without the scent of the smoke disturbing others. The Ghost masks the smell of the smoke so well you wouldn't smell the smoke inside a car if you rolled up all the windows. Indeed, the filter and the essential oils work together to eliminate such odors.
Why We Need You
From this project, we hope to raise $30,000 to make our first placement order for Smoke Ghost and supply our donors with the new Ghosts and fulfill the perks. With your contribution, you will receive Smoke Ghosts in various quantities as described in the perk section. Our donors will be the first to receive the Ghosts!
If our goal is not entirely met, we will still be able to fulfill the perks promised to our contributors by making a smaller placement order. With your help, we can change the way people smoke.
  Risks & Challenges
As with all manufactured products, there is a chance that there is an issue with the assembly of the Ghost in the manufacturing process. Since the design is more or less simplistic, however, we don't expect issues to arise. We have met and talked to several quality manufacturers and they have informed us that it is not much of a concern. We expect to deliver the rewards as early as November and as late as December. Either way, you would get it before the holidays and it would make a great Christmas gift!

If we do run into some issues with the manufacturing by some chance, we have contracts in place to ensure that orders will be fulfilled no matter the circumstance therefore a working order is always guaranteed.

story:
Hi! My name is Tricia Montgomery and I won my battle with obesity. Not long ago, I was overweight, run down, and in dire need of change. One day, I took my dog, Louie, on a routine visit to the vet. Little did I know how much my life would change that day. My caring yet frank veterinarian told me that both Louie and I were grossly overweight, that our lives were in jeopardy, and that we needed to change - immediately. When I realized that I had passed my unhealthy habits on to my dear dog, I had an “A-ha” moment and vowed to turn both of our lives around.

For the first time in my life, I got serious about fitness. Louie and I started shaking our tails every day together and the pounds quickly began to melt away. I realized that something about having my furry friend by my side gave me the confidence and motivation to keep pushing forward even when the going got tough. Fast–forward 130 lbs. later for me, (and 4 lbs. for Louie), and we were both fit and healthy for the first time in a long time! My newfound confidence inspired my new life's mission: to share the joy of health with overweight dog owners and their pets.

I created K9 Fit Club – the first scientifically-based fitness, health and wellness program of its kind, designed for both owners and their pets! We have successfully licensed this idea in fitness facilities, doggy daycares and veterinary facilities across the US and Canada, and we are now poised to help even more people with our first brick and mortar store in St. Peters, MO.

Keep reading to learn about our plan, perks you get for donating, accolades we’ve received, how your donation will be used, and testimonials from folks who’ve benefit from our program!

Better You. Better Dog. Better Life.

Tricia with Zeus

People struggling with obesity often find traditional gyms to be uncomfortable and inhospitable. It’s time to start running with the right pack! K9 Fit Clubs offer a friendly alternative, providing a safe environment for new participants to lose weight in a fun, motivating way. Studies have shown that dog owners are more likely to reach their fitness goals than those without canine companions. Our dogs will hound us to stay active!

K9 Fit Club has enlisted the help of top veterinarians, dog behaviorists, dog trainers, fitness trainers and doctors in its quest for the perfect workout program.

K9 Fit Club offers a variety of programs for people at every level of fitness, from beginners to experts, men, women, seniors, veterans, even children, and we tailor each class to specific fitness goals all in a safe, enjoyable, encouraging environment.

Obesity is one of the single greatest health risks in the US for both humans and pets. Over 55% of all dogs are either overweight or obese. We've all heard the saying, "people look like their dogs," and in terms of obesity, this statistic is absolutely true. We pass our bad habits on to our pets. It's time we lead our dogs not only by the leash, but by example and help them get fit!

71% of adults age 20 years and over are overweight and more than one-third are obese. Additionally 17% of children aged 2-19 are obese; that's 16 million children considered overweight or obese in the US!

In Missouri, our flagship location, that translates to more than 28% of the state’s youth. The current adult obesity rate in Missouri is an alarming 31.7%. K9 Fit Club wants to reduce these shocking statistics and plans outreach programs to schools where children affected by poverty can learn lifelong exercise and wellness habits and have a great time while doing it.

With more than 25 licensed locations in N. America, the popularity of K9 Fit Club is nothing to bark at! We have licensed K9 Fit Clubs in:

For a full list of K9 Fit Club classes and contact information, visit our website: www.k9fitclub.com

Just look at our accolades below to see we’re not just chasing our tails!

  • K9 Fit Club is one of only five organizations to receive Purina’s “Pet Care Innovation Prize”
  • InnovateHer - The US Small Business Administration has recognized K9 Fit Club for having a measurable impact on the lives of women and families
  • K9 Fit Club is approved by Medicare via Healthways Silver Sneakers Fitness
  • K9 Fit Club will be available at Brookdale Senior Living facilities across the nation
  • K9 Fit Club is approved by ACE (American Council on Exercise)
  • K9 Fit Club is approved by IAABC (International Association of Animal Behavior Consultants).
  • K9 Fit Club has been named a “Preferred Facility” by the AFAA (Aerobics and Fitness Association of America)
  • K9 Fit Club has been named a “Preferred Facility” by the NASM (National Academy of Sports Medicine)
  • K9 Fit Club is approved by the CCPDT (Certification Council for Professional Dog Trainers)

Your generous donation will be used to finalize the build out of our flagship location, which includes:

  • Fun exercise equipment
  • Finalize facility renovations (lighting, paint, floor, signage, etc.)
  • Marketing materials
  • Staff and instructor training
  • On-the-go classes
  • Opening the store
  • Building the dream of K9 Fit Club!

Community outreach and engagement, including:

  • Bringing K9 Fit Club programs to children and schools in areas affected by poverty
  • Bringing K9 Fit Club programs to seniors living in retirement communities
  • Bringing K9 Fit Club programs to veteran facilities
  • Bringing K9 Fit Club programs to disabled individuals and their service dogs

As a thank you for your contribution, we are offering a wide variety of fun perks and introductory class packages, making you an official member of K9 Fit Club!

Our new space is coming along!

K9 Fit Club has had amazing success so far, yet it has been difficult for us to successfully compete with popular chain gyms without a brick and mortar flagship retail location. With your support, K9 Fit Club will be able to build out our fitness center, allowing us to deliver our programs to women, families, students and schools with limited access to fitness, veterans, and seniors.

Starting a business is hard for everyone, but finding funding to launch a great idea is doubly daunting for female entrepreneurs like myself. According to the Senate Small Business Committee, only 4% of all commercial loan dollars and only 2.7% of all venture capital funds go to women! And according to the National Women’s Business Council, women start their businesses with only half as much capital as men.

To put it simply, women are raising less money. Often, when I approached male angel investors with my idea, I was met with investment deals that would have resulted in a loss of majority ownership in my own company - leaving no real profit after all of my years of hard work. Adding insult to injury, I also had to fend off inappropriate advances and grabby hands while trying to professionally pitch my business!

In the wake of #MeToo, #Time'sUp and Women's History Month, the time is now for more women-owned businesses to help level the playing field.

And that is why I am asking for your help.

When you support K9 Fit Club, you also support our ability to continue to offer licensing opportunities and begin to offer franchising opportunities for women, like yourself, to run their very own fitness business, giving them the chance to take control of their own financial futures. Few other businesses offer women this unique combination of flexible scheduling, lucrative income potential, and job satisfaction. After all, who doesn't like playing with dogs all day?

"This program has not only created an additional stream of revenue, it has created a fun and upbeat environment that has our clients and even our staff excited and looking forward to getting healthy! " – Jan Flanagan President, K9 Tailshakers, Inc., K9 Fit Club licensee

No two people (or dogs) are the same, and our programs offer tailored fitness experiences for a wide variety of human and canine demographics. Our class offerings include:

  • Bark & Burn - Drills, strength training, power, and resistance moves that incorporating ab and core training techniques.
  • Begging for Beginners - An intro class for all levels.
  • Boomer Fitness - Designed to strengthen core balance and functional assessments.
  • Bow Wow Bootcamp - Strength, agility, and cardio in a high-intensity class that includes circuit training, station work, games, weight training, and core training.
  • Fungility - The fur will be flying with our unique and fun approach to agility, obstacle course work, games, hurdles, scale ramps, burst through tunnels, games of see- saw and pole weaves.
  • Just the Dog - Our Master K9 Fitness Trainers takes your dog’s fitness to the next level with cardio, practicing strength and agility exercises.
  • Loan & Leash - Don’t have a dog? We have a dog for you! Working with the local humane associations and rescue groups, K9 Fit Club’s Loan & Leash program promotes adoption and saving a life, and provides exercise for dogs without a home.
  • Mommy & Me - This program helps your child and pup stay active, seek out new adventures, and establishing independence.
  • Namasitstay - A form of yoga that combines massage as well as gentle stretching for dogs and their human partners.
  • PTSD - K9 Fit Club’s PTSD specialized program provides U.S. military veterans living with combat-related Post Traumatic Stress Disorder with a therapeutic program geared towards the intrinsic benefits of exercise alongside the dog’s healing role related to exercise and companionship.. This includes aerobic exercise, physical training, strenuous and non-strenuous activities in a controlled environment.
  • Pupilates - A pup Pilates class focusing on mental and physical well-being.
  • Rover Run Club - Run with the right pack with our running club for dogs and owners.
  • Sit, Stay & Get Fit - Specially designed for those who have special need and/or are new to exercise, including seniors, those struggling with morbid obesity, people with certain types of injuries and persons with disabilities.
  • Tai Chi Wa Wa - Tai Chi WaWa is based on the traditional form of Tai Chi.
  • Waggin’ Wheel Chair - A special needs program that includes exercises to help increase strength, flexibility, improve mobility and strengthen heart and lungs, including resistance work, strength training and weight control.
  • Young Pups - A high energy fun filled exercise class for children ages 7 – 12  in a fun, safe, positive and motivating environment with fitness games, partner activities, body weight exercises and more. Young Pups may use real dogs or stuffed animal dogs, and children will begin to learn about dogs and human-dog interaction.

K9 Fit Club is supported by a dynamic team of advisors.

Dr. Ernie Ward, DVM, CVFT

Dr. Ernie Ward has spent his career blending healthy lifestyles and medicine. He is internationally known for improving veterinary medical standards, creating a higher quality of life for animals, and promoting healthier habits for pets and people. Dr. Ward has been a leader in the areas of pet nutrition and weight loss, establishing diagnostic test protocols and evolving pet technologies, promoting senior pet care, and advancing veterinary practice standards and veterinary staff training.

"The best parallel weight loss program to date. I've been working with K9 Fit Club for many years and can confidently recommend our programs and support to anyone interested in improving the health and well-being of themselves or their pet either on a personal or professional level." – Dr. Ernie Ward  

Dr. David Levine, Physical Therapist (PT, PhD, DPT), and Professor at University of Tennessee

Dr. Levine is a Professor and the Walter M. Cline Chair of Excellence in Physical Therapy at the University of Tennessee at Chattanooga. He is an adjunct professor at the University of Tennessee College Of Veterinary Medicine and North Carolina State University College of Veterinary Medicine. Dr. Levine has been working and conducting research in animal physical rehabilitation since 1993 and is co-director of the University of Tennessee certificate program in canine rehabilitation. He has published over 50 papers in veterinary rehabilitation and is a co-editor of the books “Canine Rehabilitation and Physical Therapy” and “Essential Facts of Physiotherapy in Dogs and Cats”.  He continues to practice in canine rehabilitation and human physical therapy in addition to his University position.

"K9 Fit Club is an amazing concept that has transformed the lives of people and their dogs. Tricia's enthusiasm and energy permeate throughout everything this company does and she touches every person it involves. It brings a level of joy to exercise that was previously not available in any exercise class. The science behind it is sound and Tricia is making a mark in the fitness industry with her passion for this company." – Dr. David Levine

Manley Feinburg II

Manley is recognized as an award winning international keynote speaker, business leader, and author whose work has been featured on NBC, CBS, ABC, and Fox, and in The New York Daily News, Entrepreneur, American Express Open Forum and World News.  He served two terms as the President of the National Speakers Association, St. Louis chapter.

During Manley’s eleven years with Build-A-Bear Workshop, his leadership direction helped take the revolutionary retail concept from 40 stores to over 400 worldwide, realizing revenue growth from 55 million to over 474 million, and a successful IPO on the NYSE.  He built an award winning reputation for implementing business solutions and support that produced measurable results every day. Manley’s leadership influence contributed to a workplace culture that landed Build-A-Bear on the FORTUNE 100 Best Companies to Work For® List four years in a row.

"There are 3 reasons why I continue to be blown away by Tricia Montgomery and her brilliant business, K9 Fit Club.

1 - INFECTIOUS: Her personality immediately engages you, and gets you fired up to get behind her, and her vision of a world filled with healthier people and pets.

2 - AUTHENTIC: Her journey is remarkable and real. No BS, not trying to sell the latest start up idea. She stands behind what she offers people because it changed her life, and has changed so many. She is real, and the results their business has achieved are real; both on the financial side AND the true quality of life impact side.

3 - DRIVEN BY WHAT MATTERS: She's in business for all the right reasons. To solve a need that serves people, and that enables her business to grow its revenue so that they can reach more people. She proves you CAN do both, without compromising either." – Manley Feinberg II, Founder and CEO of VerticalLessons.com

“You have changed and transformed our entire family.” – Nancy Harvey

“I never had a place where I could feel safe until K9 Fit Club. There are no places where people with disabilities can work out, especially with Goldie and Rockie.” – Erin Harvey

“The look on his face is priceless. Brighton is never this active at home; we are both brighter at K9 Fit Club.” – Kathy Stone

“Through K9 Fit Club, Stephen has a new found confidence and Sally has a wagging tail. Our family could not make it through the week without K9 Fit Club.” – Christina Mulicuik

"I have had the pleasure and honor of personally working with Tricia Montgomery of K9 Fit Club. Because of her guidance and support in the last year I have totally changed my life. I work out 5-6 times per week and eat a clean diet. It has enabled me so far to shed 85 lbs. and feel great. I am 53 years old and have been obese all my life. I was 200 lbs. when I was 9, I have tried many diets in my life and was never able to stick with anything on a long term basis. What I had never truly learned was how to eat healthy, not feel deprived and not diet. I also had never learned to work out on a consistent basis without hurting myself. And now I love my workouts, how can you not when I am working out with my best furry friends, my dogs, they are my motivation. I am 2 weeks from my 54th birthday and know because of Tricia and K9 fit Club me and my dogs will be able to continue on our journey and live to ripe old ages. What Tricia and K9 Fit Club teach is not a diet! It is a way of life." – Mona Straub

"The first time I saw Tricia, she was pitching K9 Fit Club. She had broken the monotony of self-aggrandized, money-focused startups with her passionate stories of making a difference for so many people struggling with weight. I felt I wasn't in her target market as I don't struggle with my weight, and yet I was enraptured by this idea. Not only does K9 Fit Club remove the insecurities and lack of motivation of a solo workout program, it also invented a new way to work out with a dog. As an urbanite doggy mommy, I was stuck with either forcing myself to run - which I hate - with my dog, or I was standing still while my dog ran around a small dog park. It hit me that after centuries of hunting and surviving with our canine friends, in this modern life, the only physical activity we do without dogs is running. Now there's a new way to interact with our pups and develop a deeper connection. Now working out is not a chore, but an activity which leaves us both overjoyed and healthy." – Chereesca Bejasa

“As a Traumatic Brain Injury and PTSD Survivor, you find yourself asking the question, “Where is my place in the world, now?” daily. You go from having a life that defines your identity to watching that life slowly disappear. You begin to wonder, “How am I going to make it?”. For me, joining K9 Fit Club and becoming a Certified Master Trainer and Licensee has give me my life back. I have a purpose once again, a reason to get out of bed in the morning. Even though I have a disability, with K9 Fit Club, my life long dream of making a difference and owning my own business is coming true.” – Rachael Loucks, K9 Fit Club licensee

“The Human Animal Bond, as it pertains to health, healing, and wellness, is one of personal experience for me.  Although, it does not define who I am, I survived a serious closed head injury, while riding horses professionally. New things, for me, are learned slower and differently, than prior to the accident. Challenges can be both cognitive and sometimes physical. My love of animals (especially dogs and horses), exercise, and a wellness lifestyle are the things that have always defined me and influenced the fields I have worked in. When I discovered K9 Fit Club, I knew this was the direction my life and career choice, needed to take. When I contacted K9 Fit Club, their genuine desire to help people was very evident, and I knew immediately this was not any "bottom line" driven company. The founder and CEO, Tricia Montgomery, took the responsibility on herself to allow me to learn a bit slower and test differently (by phone calls) without changing any of K9 Fit Club's science based program. Both Tricia and some of her staff sacrificed personal time to help me prepare to certify. November 2015, I mainstreamed with the other awesome soon-to-be Master Trainers, I became a K9 Fit Club Certified Master Trainer and Licensee! Now it is a privilege to help others in my community teaching K9 Fit Club classes. Because human/canine exercise is becoming more mainstreamed and incorporated into rehab and nursing home facilities, I was invited to speak at a local university, to address 3rd year physical therapy students and their professor, introducing K9 Fit Club and the human animal bond. I am so proud to be part of the K9 Fit Club family, and appreciate their continued support to all their trainers and licensees, as we commit to K9 Fit Clubs standards of excellence, paying it forward in our own communities!" – Mary Erschen, K9 Fit Club Master Trainer, K9 Fit Club Licensee, Dubuque, Iowa

She is real, and the results their business has achieved are real; both on the financial side AND the true quality of life impact side. 3 - DRIVEN BY WHAT MATTERS: She's in business for all the right reasons. To solve a need that serves people, and that enables her business to grow its revenue so that they can reach more people. She proves you CAN do both, without compromising either." – Manley Feinberg II, Founder and CEO of VerticalLessons.com“You have changed and transformed our entire family.” – Nancy Harvey“I never had a place where I could feel safe until K9 Fit Club. There are no places where people with disabilities can work out, especially with Goldie and Rockie.” – Erin Harvey“The look on his face is priceless. Brighton is never this active at home; we are both brighter at K9 Fit Club.” – Kathy Stone“Through K9 Fit Club, Stephen has a new found confidence and Sally has a wagging tail. Our family could not make it through the week without K9 Fit Club.” – Christina Mulicuik"I have had the pleasure and honor of personally working with Tricia Montgomery of K9 Fit Club. Because of her guidance and support in the last year I have totally changed my life. I work out 5-6 times per week and eat a clean diet. It has enabled me so far to shed 85 lbs. and feel great. I am 53 years old and have been obese all my life. I was 200 lbs. when I was 9, I have tried many diets in my life and was never able to stick with anything on a long term basis. What I had never truly learned was how to eat healthy, not feel deprived and not diet. I also had never learned to work out on a consistent basis without hurting myself. And now I love my workouts, how can you not when I am working out with my best furry friends, my dogs, they are my motivation. I am 2 weeks from my 54th birthday and know because of Tricia and K9 fit Club me and my dogs will be able to continue on our journey and live to ripe old ages. What Tricia and K9 Fit Club teach is not a diet! It is a way of life." – Mona Straub"The first time I saw Tricia, she was pitching K9 Fit Club. She had broken the monotony of self-aggrandized, money-focused startups with her passionate stories of making a difference for so many people struggling with weight. I felt I wasn't in her target market as I don't struggle with my weight, and yet I was enraptured by this idea. Not only does K9 Fit Club remove the insecurities and lack of motivation of a solo workout program, it also invented a new way to work out with a dog. As an urbanite doggy mommy, I was stuck with either forcing myself to run - which I hate - with my dog, or I was standing still while my dog ran around a small dog park. It hit me that after centuries of hunting and surviving with our canine friends, in this modern life, the only physical activity we do without dogs is running. Now there's a new way to interact with our pups and develop a deeper connection. Now working out is not a chore, but an activity which leaves us both overjoyed and healthy." – Chereesca Bejasa“As a Traumatic Brain Injury and PTSD Survivor, you find yourself asking the question, “Where is my place in the world, now?” daily. You go from having a life that defines your identity to watching that life slowly disappear. You begin to wonder, “How am I going to make it?”. For me, joining K9 Fit Club and becoming a Certified Master Trainer and Licensee has give me my life back. I have a purpose once again, a reason to get out of bed in the morning. Even though I have a disability, with K9 Fit Club, my life long dream of making a difference and owning my own business is coming true.” – Rachael Loucks, K9 Fit Club licensee “The Human Animal Bond, as it pertains to health, healing, and wellness, is one of personal experience for me.  Although, it does not define who I am, I survived a serious closed head injury, while riding horses professionally. New things, for me, are learned slower and differently, than prior to the accident. Challenges can be both cognitive and sometimes physical. My love of animals (especially dogs and horses), exercise, and a wellness lifestyle are the things that have always defined me and influenced the fields I have worked in. When I discovered K9 Fit Club, I knew this was the direction my life and career choice, needed to take. When I contacted K9 Fit Club, their genuine desire to help people was very evident, and I knew immediately this was not any "bottom line" driven company. The founder and CEO, Tricia Montgomery, took the responsibility on herself to allow me to learn a bit slower and test differently (by phone calls) without changing any of K9 Fit Club's science based program. Both Tricia and some of her staff sacrificed personal time to help me prepare to certify. November 2015, I mainstreamed with the other awesome soon-to-be Master Trainers, I became a K9 Fit Club Certified Master Trainer and Licensee! Now it is a privilege to help others in my community teaching K9 Fit Club classes. Because human/canine exercise is becoming more mainstreamed and incorporated into rehab and nursing home facilities, I was invited to speak at a local university, to address 3rd year physical therapy students and their professor, introducing K9 Fit Club and the human animal bond. I am so proud to be part of the K9 Fit Club family, and appreciate their continued support to all their trainers and licensees, as we commit to K9 Fit Clubs standards of excellence, paying it forward in our own communities!" – Mary Erschen, K9 Fit Club Master Trainer, K9 Fit Club Licensee, Dubuque, Iowa

story:
Short Summary

The OptiML system allows all common smartphones to make a preliminary diagnosis for glaucoma and diabetic retinopathy without a medical professional. Globally, these retinal diseases are the leading causes of irreversible blindness with over 350 million individuals currently at risk.

The system consists of two parts: a low-cost, highly portable head-mount and a machine learning-based analysis system. The system works by using computer vision technology to capture high quality images on smartphones with the OptiML camera mount. These images can then be sent to an Amazon Web Services EC2 computing server and processed using OptiML’s algorithms to diagnose these diseases. After processing the images, the server can return disease diagnoses and recommendations to the phone.

The system is able to be used effectively by low-skilled workers, is highly cost-efficient, and portable. These unique features allow OptiML to be capable of screening significant numbers of patients for ocular diseases with high efficacy, cost-efficiency, and convenience.

OptiML will allow for Primary Care Physicians domestically to provide the at-risk population comprehensive eye diagnostic exams in their office or through a home-based monitoring procedure. Globally, OptiML could be very effective as a population screening tool for ocular diseases.

What We Need & What You Get

Our current prototype is promising, but in order to move forward we need your support. Specifically, we are requesting money in order to generate prototypes with higher quality materials and gain access to larger datasets in order to develop software with a higher accuracy. Combined these progressions will allow us to create a system with unprecedented portability at a fraction of the cost of the current gold standard. 

The Impact

Across the globe, nearly 350 million individuals, 20 million of whom are in the United States, are at risk of losing their vision due to glaucoma and diabetic retinopathy - both of which, if diagnosed early, are treatable conditions. These numbers increase annually due to, in part, a combination of (1) the inconvenience individuals face in visiting an eye care specialist annually and (2) the lack of readily available eyecare. The result is that patients are not receiving early diagnoses, and as a result, not receiving early interventions leading to millions of cases of irreversible blindness.

OptiML can fix this. OptiML has the potential to aid in the early diagnosis of diabetic retinopathy domestically by making retinal exams more convenient for those at risk––through self-examination or through quick exams in the offices of primary care physicians during standard checkups.  Globally, OptiML will allow medical humanitarian organizations that are already working at point-of-need locations to deliver retinal exams, which has the most potential where––in some locations––there is only one ophthalmologist for every 500,000 people.

story:
We've planted the seeds, now help us grow!

Wooden Spoon Herbs is seeking your help to build out a greenhouse into a new workspace that's ten times the size of our home studio:

  • My name is Lauren Haynes, the founder and herbalist behind Wooden Spoon Herbs. My journey with plants began in my early twenties while working at a health food store. I've spent the past six years deepening my relationship with so many plant friends, attending any and every herb conference and studying in a three-year program with Phyllis Light. Working with plants is definitely my passion, joy and calling.

​

 

  • Wooden Spoon Herbs began with a small handful of cash from waiting tables, and has grown over the past four years into a business bursting with life and vitality. We now have over 100 retailers worldwide, and can no longer be contained to our home studio. I am more than grateful for our growth, but it's time to upgrade to a bigger space to continue our work. With limited rental options in our rural community, we intend to build out an old commercial greenhouse structure into a 2,000 square foot workspace and office. 

 

  • This space will be a place for me to make my wares, expand my offerings and product line, host workshops and apprenticeships, see clients, grow my team and grow plants to feature in my products. With this space I will be able to keep up with the fast-paced growth that my business keeps experiencing year after year, and able to provide comfort and support to all the people seeking alternatives in their wellness journey.

 

What We Need & What You Get

Here's the breakdown:

  • We need $30,000 dollars to build out the structure, put on a new roof, make it water tight and furnish with a three-tub sink and stainless steel workbenches. We will also use any left over funds to purchase huge storage racks so that we can finally build up a sufficient backstock of products. We love the structure because it is yards from our cabin, has wonderful bones and is already outfitted with electricity and water.
  • The main room of the structure will house production, storage and distribution, while the side room will house an office and consultation space. This is where I will see clients for one-on-one wellness appointments. (This could be you if you claim such a perk!) The main space will also be where I host workshops, and will have plenty of space for ample hands-on education.
  • Did you see our amazing perks?! Limited edition potions, wellness consultations, a series of seasonal medicine videos and exclusive artwork by Spirit Speak?!?! Brb, gotta snag a perk...
  • In the offchance we don't reach our full goal, any funds raised will still be put towards the studio! Building this studio is a nonnegotiable. We are 100% founder funded, with no investors or outside help. This studio will not only change our business, but change our lives. And we appreciate every penny of your help. 

The Impact

Having a new workspace and growing our company will mean:

  • More education about herbal medicine for posterity
  • A wider distribution of our gentle herbal remedies made with high-potency botanicals
  • Continuing the sustainable, living wage supply chain that we've created

If my medicine has touched your life in any way, if I have touched your life in any way, please consider donating and supporting my vision and dream! Please know that I will appreciate your support so eternally and deeply! I cannot wait to see this next chapter of my journey unfold and am so thankful you all can share it with me.

Other Ways You Can Help

Can't take the plunge? No problem! We would still love your support in the following ways:

  • Share our campaign on social media! Anyone who sends us their share or repost gets a code for 20% off their next web shop purchase at woodenspoonherbs.com. There are buttons down below for easy sharing. Cool!
  • Sign up for our email list. 

And that's all there is to it. Thank you!!! We love you so much.

story:
We are Lutec racing, a small but dynamic company that organizes an incredible event: The Alpe Adria International Motorcycle Championship!

We have been involved with motoracing for many years as mechanics and as racers in the Championship.

Last year we got an opportunity to take the license for organizing Alpe Adria International Motorcycle Championship. The Championship is financed from racer's entry fees, but this amount does not cover all features and expenses.

We got many supporters but also an obligation to make the Championship better, memorable, rise its quality and involve more motorcycle fans!


We want to make Alpe Adria International Motorcycle Championship a gateway for the MOTO GP racing.

How are we going to do it ?

We will create and offer infrastructure and provide services for every Championship race that have so far been missing.

We will make races safer and more enjoyable for racers by providing them with a Premium Health Corner.

Physiotherapy, professional sports massage with designated surgeons and doctors in charge at the spot (in case of a crash, and smaller or more serious injuries).

We will improve hospitality areas so that families and friends can come and enjoy racing of their fathers, brothers, uncles, nephews....

Our goal is to raise 26.000 € to finance Premium Health Corner and hospitality area in six different races in Slovakia, Poland, Hungary, Croatia, Austria and Germany!

By contributing to the campaign you will get nice perks associated with motoracing and the chance to drive in a official Safety car at Red Bull Ring!

Also your contribution will make every racer feel as if they participate in the world Championship.
Let's make racing safer and more enjoyable.

If you are not able to contribute, please spread the word about our campaign, we will deeply appreciate it.

story:
Hi, we’re Ben and Felicity Watson

In one month we'll be opening the doors to the UK's first Totalfit Gym in Brighton! After a year of dreaming, designing and planning! 

You're invited to join us as we create a new training experience. Focused on holistic training for anyone who wants to journey optimal health and performance. We hope this new experience will become the first of many Totalfit gyms in the UK. 

 

What is special about this Totalfit gym?

It is hard to go alone, we can go further together. 

Our unique methodology will develop you holistically to become unbreakable for sports performance and life.

Body:  We will lead you - From training to nutrition 

  • Periodised workouts; enabling testing at the end of each cycle to show fitness improvements.
  • 6 members per class*; motivation from being in a team attention and tailoring as if you were personal training.
  •  Held accountable to nutritional habits 

Mind: We will support you - From Mental health to mental discipline

  • Your class is community
  • Life challenges set weekly
  • Healthy habits learnt monthly

Spirit: We will journey with you - From finding faith in yourself  and others to your reason why

  • We believe in sharing experiences to learn from each other, be inspired, challenged and encouraged.

(*with exeption of Totalfit in the park which may have up to 30 members)

The Gym Structure: 

Taking inspiration from Totalfit Gyms around the world, we have efficiently designed our small space to ensure professional athletes can develop maximal: strength, speed, power, agility, endurance and flexibility.

We have used our space as effectively as possible it will have 3 robust fold away squat racks, 6 barbells, strong man sand bags, dumbbells, kettle-bells and resistance bands.

Classes will run from 6;30am to 7:30pm Monday to Saturday.

 

Partnerships

Sussex Men's and Women's rugby: Have already teamed up with us to have all of their strength and conditioning sessions in the gym.

The Square: We have partnered with The Square, a boutique cafe next door.  A great place to hang out before and after workouts.

What You Get

We have a number of perks to help support our new start up, whether your in Brighton or not.

 

 

Meet the Team

Why is Totalfit so special to you?

‘It gives me the opportunity to make athletes the best version of themselves they can possibly be, to train them how I wish someone had trained me. That excites me’

- Ben Watson     

‘Many things stop us from living full and healthy lives. That may be a lack of motivation to get fit again, not having faith in your own abilities or the fear of failure. Totalfit builds community where people can overcome these challenges. As a coach I get to be part of those journeys!"

- Felicity Watson

Qualifications:      

-Totalfit Instructor and Level 2 Coach

-Fitness Instructor

-Level 4 Strength and Conditioning Coach

 

Where are we?

We are in an amazing location in the centre of Brighton, just off London Road,

47 New England St, Brighton BN1 4GQ, United Kingdom

 

If you can't support us financially please find a friend who would be interested in joining!

story:
What We Need & What You Get

Your support allows us to buy photo + video equipment needed to make the live yoga dictionary 1.0, contract our developer, and pay a few awesome yogis to collab on the project. 

By supporting this Indiegogo campaign, you get to play a key role in bringing the app to life and get to use the app before anyone else! You also get to buy yogagen memberships at the lowest cost that will ever be offered, and get to lock in a lifetime app membership of $8 a month for being an initial supporter. 

App Concept

Our goal is to provide you with information and inspiration to practice yoga anywhere, any time. We are compiling a live, updated yoga dictionary that is the source for our one-of-a-kind sequence generator. Our database includes traditional poses and tons of variations for those poses that you'd typically see in a studio class — including the many variations done with yoga props.

We are starting out with 500 different poses, and variations that show you how to use yoga blocks, a yoga strap, and a wall to delve deeper into your practice. Eventually out live yoga dictionary will have thousands of pose variations, so that you never run out of material for building your skills and strength. We know that your practice is always changing and understand the desire for unique sequences from simple to complex. You can easily pin/save your favorite sequences, poses, and music to access later and use time and time again. Intuitive and efficient, yogagen is suitable for beginners and seasoned yogis alike. It is also a great too for yoga instructors to plan and analyze classes with. 

 

 

Most of all we want to spread the joy of mindful movement and connection to the inner self with invigorated yoga practices and meditations tailored to you. We strive to keep yoga accessible for everyone when it comes to price and practice. We offer a limited free option that generates simple beginner, all body sequences. Our monthly membership which unlocks 40 + features is $10 a month, or $80 a year. There is also a $2.99 day pass option.

More features to love:
  • log session mood reviews and track pose progress 
  • see detailed analytics of your yoga practice over time
  • pin your favorite poses, sequences, and music to yoga boards you create 
  • adjust pose times (individually or batch edit)
  • select alternate pose variations 
  • pick specific poses to use props with (individually or batch select)
  • batch delete + edit order of poses in the sequence
  • choose type of instruction - moderate, in depth, or none
  • set reminders and plan future classes in app and sync with personal calendar
  • send anonymous notes of love, inspiration, encouragement, and support to your yogi friends

A Platform for the Yoga Community

The practice of yoga unites our community globally.  We seek to continuously honor and uphold the core values of yoga - joy, awareness, kindness, and love. 

To amplify this, yogagen allows you to send anonymous notes of encouragement to your fellow yogi friends in the community. Students will have the option of leaving anonymous feedback for their yoga instructors after taking their class and can also easily connect with them on the yogagen app. We promote accessible yoga for all, and will be sharing any free classes and meetups being hosted in your area. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Maybe just can't contribute $, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Share this campaign on your instagram/facebook story + feed
  • Tell a yoga studio or teacher about us, this technology id made for them too!

And that's all there is to it.

You can easily pin/save your favorite sequences, poses, and music to access later and use time and time again. Intuitive and efficient, yogagen is suitable for beginners and seasoned yogis alike. It is also a great too for yoga instructors to plan and analyze classes with. 


 

 
Most of all we want to spread the joy of mindful movement and connection to the inner self with invigorated yoga practices and meditations tailored to you. We strive to keep yoga accessible for everyone when it comes to price and practice. We offer a limited free option that generates simple beginner, all body sequences. Our monthly membership which unlocks 40 + features is $10 a month, or $80 a year. There is also a $2.99 day pass option.


More features to love:

log session mood reviews and track pose progress 
see detailed analytics of your yoga practice over time
pin your favorite poses, sequences, and music to yoga boards you create 
adjust pose times (individually or batch edit)
select alternate pose variations 
pick specific poses to use props with (individually or batch select)
batch delete + edit order of poses in the sequence
choose type of instruction - moderate, in depth, or none
set reminders and plan future classes in app and sync with personal calendar
send anonymous notes of love, inspiration, encouragement, and support to your yogi friends

A Platform for the Yoga Community
The practice of yoga unites our community globally.  We seek to continuously honor and uphold the core values of yoga - joy, awareness, kindness, and love. 
To amplify this, yogagen allows you to send anonymous notes of encouragement to your fellow yogi friends in the community. Students will have the option of leaving anonymous feedback for their yoga instructors after taking their class and can also easily connect with them on the yogagen app. We promote accessible yoga for all, and will be sharing any free classes and meetups being hosted in your area. 

Other Ways You Can Help
Maybe just can't contribute $, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

Share this campaign on your instagram/facebook story + feed
Tell a yoga studio or teacher about us, this technology id made for them too!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Welcome to Pretty Deadly Self Defense!

Pretty Deadly Self Defense is a self defense program designed for women of every age, every body type, every skill level. Based on real-life situations, realistic settings, and in the clothes people actually wear, we are focused on the basics of natural body movement, intuition and strategy, building simple exercises and effective techniques that anyone can do.

Pretty Deadly Self Defense was founded in 2009 by Susie Kahlich, a martial artist, storyteller, and a violent crime survivor. She developed Pretty Deadly Self Defense to make self defense more accessible and easy to learn (her very first class was for her 65-year old mom!), and to make learning self defense fun.  

  • Having fun is really at the core of what we do. To get a taste of what Pretty Deadly is like you can watch our most recent workshop on Periscope -- for Final Girls Film Fest, we took on the horror genre's most infamous bad guys in a special workshop in Berlin.  Be sure to stay for the end and a short Q&A and find out what it really means if you freeze.

At Pretty Deadly Self Defense, we strongly believe in your natural ability. Self defense isn’t just about fighting back – it’s about knowing your boundaries, trusting yourself, your own capabilities, bringing your power into the open and never having to hide who you are.  We believe in you too -- that's why we want to bring you Pretty Deadly wherever you are, via our mobile app for iOS and Android:

Features

  • 10 Basic techniques learned through video & audio guides, or audio only
  • Empowerment snapshots: short video instruction about situational awareness & strategic thinking
  • Daily cuppa:  daily reminders of how awesome you are!
  • Closed chat community:  to connect with other app users to share stories, tips and tricks
  • Rockin' soundtrack: original rock tracks by indie artist She Makes War (how cool is that?!)

 

What We Need & What You Get

We're ready to head into production immediately -- we've already got the content, functionality, flow and design mapped out. Reaching our goal helps us take our app from great idea to great product.

While a lot of time, expertise and enthusiasm has been generously donated to creating this app, we do want to actually pay our developers a fair wage.  We also want to ensure that we shoot very high quality videos to make the moves even more accessible and easy to learn.  And of course, our fantastic soundtrack is produced by an independent musician,

  • Developers:  we will be working with 2-4 full stack U/X developers to bring this app to market and offer full functionality from the get-go. 
  • Videos (production & post): Clear videos that help guide users through the moves are crucial to the app's functionality. We'll be working with a great team based here in Berlin to make sure every move is as clear and accessible as possible.
  • Legal: despite all the fun we have at Pretty Deadly Self Defense, we do train carefully and responsibly and we stress that message within the app itself. It's impossible for us to be with every app user and ensure safety though, so we need to be sure we are legally protected.
  • Marketing: in addition to traditional marketing channels (social media, print ads, etc), we will be promoting the app via a workshop tour in cities across the US in June -- that's right: Pretty Deadly Self Defense is coming to you! 
  •  Design: we want to make sure that the app design is easy to follow, and visually exciting so our users stay and grow with us . Our graphic designer has solid U/X design experience ... and happens to be a graduate of Pretty Deadly Self Defense, too (she also designed our website)!
  • Music: our user surveys overwhelmingly stressed the need for good music in apps!  So we reached out to Laura Kidd a/k/a She Makes War, a fully independent musician based in the UK.  She's toured all over the UK and Europe, and played with the likes of Ginger Wildheart, British Sea Power, Robin Ince, Juliana Hatfield, and Amanda Palmer, and we're thrilled to support independent artists like her.  We have a preliminary license deal in place for one track per technique to make sure users get moving and stay motivated.

Perks

We want to provide funders with perks that are as useful as they are fun, and we've got some amazingly wonderful stuff to offer you at every level!  From our "Cup of Coffee" mug (that's a signature Pretty Deadly self defense move, by the way), to your pick of any CD by She Makes War, to the incredibly useful field guide Creepology : Self Defense for Your Social life and all the way up to being a part of the app itself.  Our favorite is livestreaming a Pretty Deadly Self Defense workshop set up just for you -- we can't wait to meet you! 

And be sure to check in throughout our campaign for mid-term perks and last-minute surprises! We've got very cool stuff coming up! 

Where will the funds go?

Every cent we are able to raise goes towards building the app, even if it means we only advance two steps instead of ten. We believe this app can really help a lot of people and we're committed to making it happen. We are doing this!  

The Impact

In the ten years we've been teaching self defense, the question we most often get asked is why don't more women and girls learn self defense?! 

The reasons are both emotional and sometimes physical, too: self defense courses can be expensive, and often aren't accessible to people in remote regions or areas where they don't have full freedom of movement.  

The Pretty Deadly Self Defense app lets users learn basic self defense at their own pace, and in their space, and allows us to reach women and girls all over the world. Knowing basic self defense can help give access to education and economic opportunity that can be reinvested back into local communities.  

The Pretty Deadly Self Defense app is simply the technology extension of an already functional program that's been helping women and girls feel confident, safe and aware across 7 cities and 4 countries around the world.

  

We're keeping the cost of the app as affordable as possible so users of every socio-economic strata can access it.  And for every 10 annual subscriptions, we'll sponsor one annual subscription for an economically disadvantaged women or girl anywhere in the world.  We'll be reaching out to organizations like WriteGirlLA, Hello Future and Aaurat Raj to partner up.

Risks & Challenges

.Our biggest challenge is releasing the beta app in a little over two months after our campaign ends -- of the course more you give, the more developers we can hire and get the app out to you!

Our biggest risk is falling short of our goal and not bringing our beta version out by June 2019. But patience and perseverance are the key traits of Ninjutsu. We apply that to Pretty Deadly Self Defense, too, and we look for the opportunity in every setback.  Our funding priorities are structured for the fastest route to production, and if necessary we will compensate any shortfalls with alternative versions of the app.

SHARE OUR CAMPAIGN

We know that sometimes, as much as you want to help a good cause, you just can't spare anything at the moment (we've been there too!).  But if you can spare a little bit of your  time, we'd love it if you help us get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.

Pretty Deadly Self Defense has been featured on 

Like podcasts?  You can learn about Pretty Deadly Self Defense at the wonderful About Face podast, or on the totally awesome Women in Martial Arts pod, I Hit Hard. You can also learn more about Pretty Deadly at Global Citizen, Brigitte Woman and exBerliner Magazine!

story:
Thanks to everyone who contributed to our initiative  in Phase 1. Your contributions helped us donate 10,000 masks to healthcare proffesionals and essential workers, in addition to distributing 3,000 washable and reusable masks to all our amazing backers.


The supply shortage problem persists and therefore, lives will be jeopardized if we stop providing masks now. There are more lives to protect and save. As many states reopen or plan to reopen soon, we are launching our second campaign to reach more people. Our new goal is to raise $1 million and distribute more than 100,000 masks to front line heroes and provide 100,000 washable masks to individuals, corporations and communities. With your continued help, we can make an even larger impact and keep our heroes and loved ones safe. We included new packages in our perks to meet your needs (Back 2 Work, Back 2 Sports and Back 2 Campus)

 

 

 

Using our expertise and resources in the medical and textile industries, we aim to help flatten the viral curve by providing 200,000 face masks to the general public and our frontline workers for protection against the viral infection.

Due to the urgent need for masks, we will be running multiple short campaigns. This will facilitate faster production and distribution timelines and eliminate idle stock.  Your contribution will help us secure a needed shipment of KN95 Medical masks from an approved supplier as well as buy the raw materials for the fabric face masks. 

  • We should all do our part to flatten the curve by wearing a fabric mask.  We are selling each mask at cost so that the mask is accessible to as many people as possible. 
  • When you purchase your own mask, you will also be donating a KN95/ disposable surgical mask to one of our frontline heroes (Healthcare professionals and Essential workers).  You can recommend a hospital/ place in need in the indiegogo comments section.

 

Due to the severe lack of essential Personal Protective Equipment (PPE) in hospitals and the recent recommendation from the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) advising the general public to wear cloths masks in public, a group of our MIT Sloan Executive MBA classmates pooled our expertise and resources in order to help. 

The leader of the team, Dr. Ahmed Mady’s family, owns a textile manufacturing factory where they have dedicated two production lines to manufacture face masks at cost and have a production capacity of approximately 50,000 masks per week. They have also secured three suppliers who can provide more than 100,000 KN95 & Surgical disposable FDA approved, CDC certified masks for our frontline workers.   

 

 

The N95/ KN95 masks - and the materials they're made from - are in extremely short supply right now. So, it's critical that we reserve them for those who need them most, medical professionals. 

 

 

 

For the general public, we designed a stylish face mask that is manufactured from cotton blend/100% cotton fabric. The masks are comfortable, washable and reusable for many times. These masks will achieve more than 70% protection efficacy based on published data from University of Cambridge.

The fabric masks will come in different colors and patterns for adults and children.

 

 

 

A new scientific rationale has indicated that wearing a fabric facemask creates a barrier that blocks projectile droplets during coughing, which may substantially reduce the production rate R, to an extent that may be comparable to social distancing and washing hands. This would then double the effect of mitigation in “flattening the curve”.

 

 

  

  • Animation: Tyler Russo
  • Character Design: Goatboy
  • Graphic Design: Jen Liljegren 
  • Logo Design: Gregory Bass and Jen Liljegren
  • Narration: Bill Rogers

 

Danny Muehlschlegel, M.D., MBA (c) Vice Chair of Research, Brigham and Women's Hospital/ Associate Professor of Anesthesia at Harvard Medical School, Boston, MA

Oscar Benavidez, M.D., MBA (c) Chief of Pediatric Cardiology and the Medical Director of the Pediatric Cardiac Surgery and Catheterization program at Massachusetts General Hospital, Boston, MA

Mark Clemens, M.D., MBA (c) Associate Professor of Plastic Surgery, University of Texas, MD Anderson Cancer Center Houston, TX

Jagjit Dhaliwal, MBA (c) Deputy Chief Information Officer, County of Los Angeles Los Angeles, CA, United States 

Jay Johnson, JD, MBA (c) An attorney, with over 15 years of government and law firm experience leading investigations, counseling on regulatory compliance, and handling litigation in a first-chair capacity, Dallas, TX

Cleidy Liborio Fernandes, MBA (c) Chief Commercial Officer for the Latin America Region at CMA CGM, Miami, FL

Nhan Tran, MBA (c) Former Director, Operations (GE9X), Albany International/ Albany Engineered Composites Rochester, NH

Jesse Honigberg, MBA (c) SVP, Director of Innovation and Product Development, Cross River Bank Teaneck, NJ 

Marjorie Cass, MBA (c) President, Matterlab Digital, New York, NY

Trevor Barcelo, MBA (c) Marketing Director, Analog Devices, Wilmington, MA 

Manny Sabiiti, MBA (c) Head Trader & Partner, Boston Common Asset Management,Boston, MA 

 

Testing the Efficacy of Homemade Masks: Would They Protect in an Influenza?
Davies, A.; et al. Disaster Medicine and Public Health Preparedness 2013, 7 (4), 413–418. https://doi.org/10.1017/dmp.2013.43

“Persons who always wore masks had a 70% lower risk of being diagnosed with clinical SARS compared with those who never wore masks, and persons with intermittent mask use had a 60% lower risk.” https://wwwnc.cdc.gov/eid/article/10/2/03-0730_...

Professional and home-made face masks reduce exposure to respiratory infections among the general population. https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/18612429&nb... type of general mask use is likely to decrease viral exposure and infection risk on a population level.”

Simple Respiratory Mask (2006) https://wwwnc.cdc.gov/eid/article/12/6/05-1468_...

Influenza Virus Aerosols in Human Exhaled Breath: Particle Size, Culturability, and Effect of Surgical Masks https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC35...

Modeling the Effectiveness of Respiratory Protective Devices in Reducing Influenza Outbreak https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/30229968/

Effectiveness of Masks and Respirators Against Respiratory Infections in Healthcare Workers: A Systematic Review and Meta-Analysis https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/29140516/

 

  • Post a comment to connect us with a hospital in need 
  • Visit our website: Masks2Heroes.com
  • Share our campaign on social media
