story:
Introducing the Headstrong Headguard!

 

There are ever more head injuries in football – Headstrong offers targeted protection

Studies show that football, or soccer in the US, is actually among the sports where head injuries are most common. Headstrong is a protective Headband made specifically for footballers. It offers protection to the back and the side of the head where injuries are most likely – but the thin front panel allows for unimpeded heading. Headstrong is tight fitting, comfortable and stays in place - allowing for better header training and game performance.

The patented liquid core provides optimal impact reduction

The Headstrong head guard is padded at the sides and back with the patented Impact Absorption Liquid Technology (IMPALT). This ensures a more effective protection against blows to the head. Up to 80% of serious head injuries in football are caused by impact to these areas. Tests at the Virginia Tech Helmet Lab shows that the Headstrong technology offers best-in-class shock absorption.

Headstrong provides head protection

The Headstrong head guard is padded at the sides and back with our patented IMPALT silicone gel core. These are the most sensitive head areas – around 80% of serious head injuries in football are caused by impact here. The IMPALT core absorbs contact – and even hard impact.

 

Headstrong increases heading performance

While Headstrong is padded at the back and sides for protection, it’s thin at the front. What’s more, the front layer is optimized for heading, as it is coated with slip-resistant silicone.

 

Headstrong increases player confidence

Wearing Headstrong, you know you are well protected against head injuries. That’s one less major worry for a soccer player. Concentrate on your game – and rise to your aerial challenges with confidence.

 

Headstrong is designed for footballers

We know that a head guard is no use if it impedes your game. Headstrong is light, comfortable and made to be used in matches as well as training, and is already in use by top-flight footballer. Heading is part of football – let’s protect the footballers instead of diminishing the game.

 

Headstrong is backed by scientific research

A 2018 study by the University of Wisconsin proved that effective head protection reduces the risk of concussion by 50%. This sparked the idea of creating a head guard for footballers, using improved and innovative padding. Watch how it all came together – from the idea to the pitch: 

 

The IMPALT liquid core

Headstrong’s crucial function is the effective head protection it offers. The head guard is padded with cores of IMPALT (Impact Absorbing Liquid Technology), an innovative, patented silicone gel that absorbs and diverts the energy of impact at the sides and back of the head, significantly reducing the risk of head injury after knocks to your head’s most exposed and sensitive areas.

Two layers of Memory Foam

The liquid IMPALT core is encased in two layers of Memory Foam. The foam adds another two layers of protection and comfort in case of contact. Like the Headstrong itself, it is washable and long lasting.

Optimized for heading

While padding at the back and sides is essential for your protection, heading is still essential to your game. Headstrong not only has a thin fabric layer at the front, which frees you to head the ball – the front is also padded on the outside with a thin silicone layer, to avoid slippage and increase heading precision.

Seamless, soft and flexible

Headstrong is made for comfortably playing 90 minutes or more. It’s soft, it’s light, and it’s snug enough to stay in place, while never so tight it feels uncomfortable. It comes in three sizes, as individual head sizes are obviously different.

Inner silicone padding for better grip

A head guard has to stay in place, whether you’re dry or wet, and whether you have long, short or no hair. Headstrong stays in place – helped by an anti-slip silicone surface on the inside. It keeps your head guard from losing its position on your head when you’re running, challenging, sweating, or in other words: Being a footballer.

Endorsed by top players

As part of our journey to start a football revolution, Headstrong is already being tested in training and in games by multiple professional players in the Danish top league. The feedback has been overwhelmingly positive, and they all praise the headguard for its comfort and lightweight design. 

' I have used a number of different headbands and helmets over time. After having both trained and played games with it, Headstrong has become my favorite. It is comfortable, stays in place and is the only headband that is made for heading' - Rasmus Minor Petersen, Centre-back in the Danish Superliga.

 

Design.

Unlike most other headguards Headstrong is designed as a headband, meaning that you don’t have to worry about if you tightened the headguard properly or if the straps will come loose as you use it. We have designed our headband with an silicone coating on the inside, that ensures that the headband will stay in place even as you start to sweat and compete in aerial duels. All you have to worry about is playing your game.  

Headstrong gives you the confidence to rise to your aerial challenges. Knowing you’re well protected, you’re free to concentrate on improving your game.

 

Donate to help fund the most extensive survey of the perception of protective headgear and head injuries in football in Europe.

Support our effort to raise awareness of the ever-increasing problem of head injuries in football. We are planning the biggest analysis on headgear within football in Europe. We want to create a revolution in football on how we think about head injuries and we ask for your support by donating to our campaign - or by buying you first edition Headstrong Headband.

The current discussions in the media is focused on how we treat the injuries after they have happened. We want to focus on how we can help prevent them.

To start this conversation, we need to get a better understanding of how football players perceive the notion of protective headgear in training and games as well as the potential effects of head injuries. 

We want to conduct this analysis across several professional football clubs to get as large a sample size as possible and to get the survey as big as possible we need our help. A donation from you, big or small, will help us greatly with the scope of our survey, and in our greater effort the help spread awareness about a preventive approach to head injuries. So join the revolution and be a part of the change that will bring a preventive approach to the discussion of head injuries in the sport of football.

 

So … why use a headguard?

We love football. We want to play the game. Watch it. Be overjoyed by it. We want the same for our kids, and their kids as well. And we want the best for the game – as well as its players.

Heading is a central part of the game. Soccer needs heading. But soccer players need protection. In training as well as in matches. This is why we created Headstrong.

Some say that head guards go against the tradition of the beautiful game. We respectfully disagree. If there is a threat to the game, it’s rules against heading being introduced around the world.

A survey of 3,000 soccer players shows that 5% of players suffered a concussion within just two years of playing. And even if you never suffer a concussion, you are aware how much it hurts when your head gets hit playing soccer. The risk affects your game. Headstrong will help protect you – and help add to your confidence.

Knowing that your head is well protected will free your training and your match performance. When rising for the ball, your thoughts should be on winning it. Not the risk of injury.

Concussions, falls and knocks to the head can cause lasting, serious head damage. This is why some federations are banning heading for kids. Heading will, however, always be a central part of soccer. And using an effective head-guard will reduce the risk of concussion by 50% (according to a 2018 University of Wisconsin Study).

We would rather see a game that takes an preventive approach to head injuries and protects the footballers’ heads – than a game where headers are banned altogether.

 

Protecting the head is protecting the game

Tackling wasn’t banned when the game got rough. But shin guards were made compulsory. And while some were against it at the time, most would agree today that this was a very sensible idea.

We believe that using head protection is common sense. Just like shin guards. And what would you rather protect: Your shins – or your cranium? Our research backs this up. Head guards are an effective way to reduce the risk of head injury.

Let’s not spoil the game and our young footballers by taking away their ability to train a skill that’s central to football at elite and grassroots level. Let’s give them protection and free them to be the best and most confident footballers they can be.

 

The minds behind Headstrong

As stated at the top we are a small team of sports fanatics, based in Denmark, with a goal to develop, design and engineer protective gear for sports. To achieve this we have started Sportect and our first focus was football because it is very dear to us.  

 

The past few decades have seen a tremendous development in both professional and amateur sports. As predicted by the Olympian slogan – Citius - Altius - Fortius – athletes are becoming ever faster, go ever higher and grow ever stronger.

​

When athletes go faster, jump higher and grow stronger there are more risk of things going wrong – and that people get hurt. We see a huge possibility to take a preventive step in football when it comes to head injuries as we feel that the safety of today’s game could be improved. Look at a football/soccer game from 30 years ago. And compare it to a game from yesterday. You will see a completely different game. Players are fitter, run faster and enters p harder. Players clash in a completely different way than before. And injuries are more serious than ever before.

 

Our aim is to make sports safer for the participants. And with your help we believe that it can happen so join the revolution today.

 

What We Need & What You Get

We are looking for funding to help launch our product world-wide, and to develop further iterations of our product in the future. If this launch is successful, our next priority will be to start production of a kids model so the future of our sports are in great hands as well.

 

Our goal is to reach 5000 Euro as this will ensure the costs for our first batch of products, and furthermore help us take the next steps towards developing a kids model of the headguard with added protection at the front.

 

Our products will be produced in September and will be ready to ship from October.

 

Risks & Challenges

As we are a small team, value chain management is the biggest risk to our venture. We already have deals established with our production facilities, and they have already begun production of our first batch of headguards. The pandemic has created some delays in our production of our product samples, but we hope that pandemic will be under control from now and not cause any further delays from our manufacturers.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We would GREATLY appreciate any form of support that you can offer. Whether it be in terms of a contribution to our product or a shout-out on social media. If you would like to spread the word of the football revolution and make your friends, family and colleagues aware of our product and or vision we would really appreciate it. We need to spread the word and make the whole world know, that it is time to take a preventive approach to head injuries in football, not just a reactive approach and with your help we believe that it can happen.

So feel free to share our story on Facebook at @Headstrongheadgear, Instagram at @headstrongheadgear, Twitter at @headstrongEU_ and use the hashtag #Headstrongheadgear and we will give you a like and a repost!.

story:
By investing as little as $50 you’ll help make the Posture M8 a reality and will receive your very own Posture M8 once we reach our target.

The Posture M8 is just one step away from benefiting your health. It has been developed by a senior chiropractor who has invested time perfecting the Posture M8 and now, with international patents* and manufacturing and distribution ready, the product just needs your support.

If you suffer from back or neck pain, focusing on your posture could be the answer. The Posture M8 is a perfectly shaped inflatable cushion with multiple uses. Unlike other postural products, the Posture M8 is more versatile, more portable, attractive, lightweight, easy to use, and competitively priced.

The Posture M8 is the flagship product of Alive Posture. It is for a diverse range of people, who wish to reduce their pain through better posture, comfortable seating options or exercising their spine and nervous system to influence their overall health.

The Posture M8 Story

As a chiropractor, of almost 20 years, developer Alison Bennett realised the most common spinal issues influenced by either a practitioner or patient is the posture that the patient adopts and the movement of the spine itself.

“Chiropractic helps the movement, but the postural changes are very much largely the patient’s responsibility,” Alison explains. “Although it would be ideal to have perfect posture that we adopt all the time, sometimes we need a little help.”

Over the years Alison had seen many different back supports, but found they were often over priced, not portable, or, if they are a little portable, they were often less versatile.

In 2014, Alison took her initial idea for a portable, versatile product to a local canvas shop and her idea was brought to life. She took the prototype to an Australian design company, which tweaked the design and the Posture M8 was created.

“After engaging with a manufacturing company, we feel we have produced a superior product. And that is where we are at today, we have signed off on the final sample, and when we have raised adequate funds, we will be going into the production run. It’s so exciting to see it at this stage.”

What’s next?

This is where you come in. We need you to invest just $50 to guarantee our first shipment and the great thing is, once we’ve reached our target, we’ll send you your very own Posture M8 to say thank you. Let’s make good posture and good health a priority in a pouch! Click on the BACK IT button to be part of something special. Thank you!’

Visit our website for more information http://aliveposture.com/posture-m8/

The Alive Posture M8 has been designed from the ground up to overcome the previous products shortcomings and provide a size and shape to be super portable and competitively priced. The kidney shape allows it to be so versatile, that it can be used in about six different ways. And the small size allows it to be so portable. When it is packed away in it little pouch, it's about the size of a mans wallet. Perfect to put into a small handbag, clutch or even back pocket.

Our vision is to see the Posture M8 in health clinics, such as chiropractors, physiotherapists, occupational therapists, massage therapists. In travel agents, pharmacies, schools, airports, camping stores, sporting stores and stadium and theatres stores all over the world, so that we can support as many people as possible to better health.

*Important information

The Posture M8 from Alive Posture has 5 design patents from around the world.

Australia - Patent number 201716079

New Zealand - Patent number 424265

United States - Patent number 29/642,712

Europe - Patent number 005134640-0001

China - Patent number ZL2018301201789

We also have 3 trademarks pending on the logo, name and tag line.

story:
Short Summary

Co-founder Harvey Silverman is a 22-year veteran of the golf industry, working with various technologies to help golf course operators succeed in an increasingly difficult business. Mike Dickoff is a former Accenture partner who loves disrupting legacy technologies. Mike led the building and expansion of the Navitaire software-as-a-service business which has fueled the growth of low fare airlines around the world the past 25 years. 

We are avid golfers who studied our evolving lifestyles and culture and created Quick.golf as a way to help golfers play more golf.  With an initial investment from three golf course operators, we've successfully proven our concept that some golfers desire the ability to play less than a full 18-hole round, or even fewer than nine holes. Quick.golf makes golf more convenient, more affordable, more fun, and easier to fit into busy lifestyles. 

Now, we need your help expanding Quick.golf to more golf courses and from there, to more golfers.  Your contributions will give us the marketing muscle necessary to carry our message to more U.S. golf courses, and to New Zealand (we have a new partner there). And from there? Who knows? 

What We Need & What You Get

We need $25,000 to accomplish our goal of 500 Quick.golf courses by the end of 2019. About 20% of the funds will be used for a few small development improvements requested by our current course partners; the rest used for strategic marketing to golf course operators including public, municipal, resort, and management companies. If we don't quite reach our goal - we'll carry on with whatever generous contributions we receive. We have an incredibly low burn rate so we'll be able to apply a very high percentage of your funding to expansion.  

We hope and expect most contributors will be golfers or know golfers, including those who already have registered on our app and played a few holes. For all of you who choose to contribute, we happily reward you with one of the following:

  1. $25 - our eternal thanks and an invitation to play golf with us when we're in your area. We're not pros - just a couple of guys who love to play and have fun. There could be a free beer in your future too. 
  2. $50 – a $25 coupon for Golfballs.com, the world leader in golf customization, and our heartfelt thanks.
  3. $100 – 5 free Quick.golf holes at a course near you (subject to course restrictions), a $25 coupon for Golfballs.com, the world leader in golf customization, and our heartfelt thanks.
  4. $250 – 15 free Quick.golf holes at a course near you (subject to course restrictions), a $25 coupon for Golfballs.com, the world leader in golf customization, and our heartfelt thanks.  
  5. $500 – 30 free Quick.golf holes at a course near you (subject to course restrictions), a $25 coupon for Golfballs.com, the world leader in golf customization, and our heartfelt thanks.  

The Impact

Golf is the greatest game ever invented (okay, we're just a bit biased). Unfortunately, utilization of golf courses has been declining recently and you may have noticed, read, or heard about courses in your area disappearing and being replaced by housing projects or business parks - or just left to rot. 

Quite simply, Quick.golf is another way to get golfers onto a golf course. 

Quick.golf is a convenient, affordable and fun way for you and/or your golfing friends to play when your time is limited, or it's too late in the day to play a full round of golf.  Playing more is good for your health and well-being - and you'll help your local golf course operators maintain those beautiful green spaces in your area. 

Read what's been written about us:
https://www.golfdigest.com/story/quickgolf-a-novel-and-intriguing-pay-per-hole-concept
https://www.golfadvisor.com/articles/2016-golf-trends-16189.htm
https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/wall-street-journal-reports-quickgolf-harvey-silverman/
http://www.nxtbook.com/nxtbooks/pellucid/perspective_201809/index.php#/2

Risks & Challenges

There really is very little risk - we've already built the web app and proven it in the market. Quick.golf represents a change in golfer behavior. We've been trained that golf is played in 18-hole increments, or maybe 9-holes. Our culture and lifestyles are already changing behaviors in many other ways, and technology has much to do with this. The research we've done ourselves and has been shared by others convince us that an easy to use pay-by-hole app will appeal to a percentage, maybe a small one but significant nonetheless, of golfers who play the game but lack time to pursue it as avidly as they'd like. 

We need additional resources to get the message out about Quick.golf. Once golfers try it, they like it and come back for more. Our data proves that. 

Other Ways You Can Help

1. Vote with your feet. Play Quick.golf yourself at a course near you, or help us get your favorite course signed up.
2. Let all your golfing friends know about us. Use the Indiegogo share tools, forward our email - whatever you can do to increase awareness is greatly appreciated.

$25 - our eternal thanks and an invitation to play golf with us when we're in your area. We're not pros - just a couple of guys who love to play and have fun. There could be a free beer in your future too. 
$50 – a $25 coupon for Golfballs.com, the world leader in golf customization, and our heartfelt thanks.
$100 – 5 free Quick.golf holes at a course near you (subject to course restrictions), a $25 coupon for Golfballs.com, the world leader in golf customization, and our heartfelt thanks.
$250 – 15 free Quick.golf holes at a course near you (subject to course restrictions), a $25 coupon for Golfballs.com, the world leader in golf customization, and our heartfelt thanks.  
$500 – 30 free Quick.golf holes at a course near you (subject to course restrictions), a $25 coupon for Golfballs.com, the world leader in golf customization, and our heartfelt thanks.  


The Impact
Golf is the greatest game ever invented (okay, we're just a bit biased). Unfortunately, utilization of golf courses has been declining recently and you may have noticed, read, or heard about courses in your area disappearing and being replaced by housing projects or business parks - or just left to rot. 
Quite simply, Quick.golf is another way to get golfers onto a golf course. 
Quick.golf is a convenient, affordable and fun way for you and/or your golfing friends to play when your time is limited, or it's too late in the day to play a full round of golf.  Playing more is good for your health and well-being - and you'll help your local golf course operators maintain those beautiful green spaces in your area. 
Read what's been written about us:https://www.golfdigest.com/story/quickgolf-a-novel-and-intriguing-pay-per-hole-concepthttps://www.golfadvisor.com/articles/2016-golf-trends-16189.htmhttps://www.linkedin.com/pulse/wall-street-journal-reports-quickgolf-harvey-silverman/http://www.nxtbook.com/nxtbooks/pellucid/perspective_201809/index.php#/2

Risks & Challenges
There really is very little risk - we've already built the web app and proven it in the market. Quick.golf represents a change in golfer behavior. We've been trained that golf is played in 18-hole increments, or maybe 9-holes. Our culture and lifestyles are already changing behaviors in many other ways, and technology has much to do with this. The research we've done ourselves and has been shared by others convince us that an easy to use pay-by-hole app will appeal to a percentage, maybe a small one but significant nonetheless, of golfers who play the game but lack time to pursue it as avidly as they'd like. 
We need additional resources to get the message out about Quick.golf. Once golfers try it, they like it and come back for more. Our data proves that. 
Other Ways You Can Help1. Vote with your feet. Play Quick.golf yourself at a course near you, or help us get your favorite course signed up.2. Let all your golfing friends know about us. Use the Indiegogo share tools, forward our email - whatever you can do to increase awareness is greatly appreciated.

story:
Concerned about your pet? We can help.

We love our pets as much as you love yours, and we know how scary it is when you know somethings not quite right with your furry companion. With your help, EquiVet Care can become a platform that gives pet owners the answers they need about their pet health concerns when they need them, and connect with a veterinarian for quality health care.

www.EquiVetCare.com

About us

EquiVet Care was created from long hours of internet searching for medical information to find out whether or not a late-night trip to the Pet ER was necessary. During a public health crisis, especially, pet health care becomes exceedingly less accessible and affordable. These new challenges deeply affect the pet health care ecosystem, requiring new approaches and tools that empower concerned pet owners and veterinarians with the attainability of quality pet care. EquiVet Care is committed to providing a seamless end-to-end system that safely connects pet owners and veterinarians to better understand the medical issue a pet is experiencing, how severe it is, and lowers the minimum cost and time to recovery.

How we take care of you

Pet Owners

 

Veterinarians 

 

How It Works

We help you understand your pet health concerns for dogs, cats, and horses with our virtual examination so that you know if you need to schedule a virtual, or in-person, appointment with an accredited veterinarian. Once you decide you need to book an appointment, our platform offers affordable video chat or text sessions with one of our available veterinarians, or directly book an appointment with a veterinary clinic near you. Either option immediately sends your pet’s prior medical history and virtual examination information to the designated veterinarian, making sure they have the most accurate and up to date info to best take care of your pet. After you and your veterinarian complete the appointment, your veterinarian will provide medical feedback to you for your pet’s medical history records.

 

What We Need & What You Get

We need $150,000 to build a robust and reliable system for dogs, cats, and horses with:

  • Virtual examinations
  • Organized medical records that help guide present and future health care decision
  • Video chat and instant message appointments with veterinarians for fast and personalized care

Risks & Challenges

Our biggest challenge is gaining traction with veterinarians to have the ability to provide 24/7 accredited veterinary support, however, a strong social media following offers long term veterinary partnership opportunities.

We have built a team of innovative veterinarians, experienced technologists, and industry leaders that can expand the reach of accessible veterinary care to every person with an internet connection. We just need your support to advance EquiVet Care to a stage where it's ready to provide the help pet owners need. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Follow and share EquiVet Care on social media to spread the word!

Facebook | Instagram

Who We Are

Hanna Lannes is a CO-founder of EquiVet Care and a passionate innovator with the ambition to help both animals, and people. Her background is in equine athletics, having worked professionally in equestrian training and equine management, she has a deep understanding of the industry. 

After completing her education at the University of North Carolina at Charlotte in Management Information Systems, B.S.B.A., and Psychology, B.A., she started Paladin Vision LLC, a Woman-Owned Small Business. Motivated by her firsthand experience, her WOSB helps proactive and innovative school security projects acquire grant funding to develop technology fighting active shooter events throughout the country.

Hanna has always been an animal lover and caretaker, never going without dogs and horses in her life. The only drawback she experienced from animal companionship is what all pet owners are all too familiar with; observing them experience a health affliction, and having no idea what the cause is nor how to best take care of them. 

Dreaming of a better way, the idea for EquiVet Care was born.

story:
When we took our first glance at a Reflective Jacket, we were completely astonished to know about its multi usages in Nighttime activities like Jogging and Cycling as well as its use as general outdoor wear. This useful wearable is also being featured by some famous brands as a fashion icon.

 

However, the problem is that the high-end jackets costing more than $500 are either really expensive or often almost impractical during day time. On the other hand, products costing from $20 to $80 are mostly of cheap quality because of using the same fabric of raincoats that makes the jackets heavy, non-breathable, unattractive, and somewhat rigid. Meanwhile the reflective layer goes off easily. 

 

Reversible | Reflective | Waterproof | Wind-resistant | Breathable | Anti-UV | Lightweight | Packable | Waterproof Pockets | Stretchable | Rip Stop | Worldwide Free Shipping

 

Our Secret to Deliver both Comfort and Functionality

 

Coating of reflective material makes the fabric unbreathable and somewhat rigid. The DuoTek Ultra Performance Fabric or in short DTUP Fabric developed by the FULLFRAME DESIGN, that makes it the very first in industry to develop a unique tech fabric that is softly reflective, anti-UV, breathable and waterproof at the same time while still keeping it ultralight and comfortable.

 

2 sides = Daytime Performance + Nighttime Performance

 

Unlike other jackets, that are only wearable in a situation or time, the DuoTek provides you a multi-featured jacket either its day or night regardless of any season that makes it a two in one package deal.

 

Side A（GREY): Developed & designed to be reflective at night to keep you visible in dark.

 

Side B (BLACK): With an amazing anti-UV material, it is protecting you from Sun’s harmful ultraviolet radiations.

 

DuoTek Never Weighs You Down

 

Making a jacket super lightweight is just a simple task but making a Reversible Jacket with super-lightweight is on another level. Our DuoTek Jacket just weighs as much as an orange that makes it the lightest reversible jacket in the world. Isn’t this for an amazing fact!

 

 

Made to be packed easily and even much easier to carry in a daypack.

 

But Hey, It’s Still Really Useful

 

Bringing you a simplistic design to provide you with both performance and comfort in a single package.

 

YKK Waterproof Pockets x 5 

And Yes! Its YKK zippers provide you with not one, not two, but FIVE waterproof pockets onto this amazing DuoTek.

 

Moreover, its Rear pocket has Velcro design to store your phone safely and more conveniently when running. 

 

Hood with drawstrings to keep you covered so that you can easily rack up miles in the heavy rain. 

 

 Machine washable for easy care.

 

  • If you are unsure what size you are on, please simply follow your NIKE size. Also we do accept EXTRA SIZES customization.
  •  The sizing charts below are in US size.

MEN

 

 WOMEN

"DuoTek Cool" and "DuoTek Shield", both have the same features along with the same fabric technology and design. The only defining difference between these two products is that the "Cool" is thinner hence lighter than the Shield while on the other hand, the "Shield" is made for colder climates. 

The cool (250g/8.8oz) vs shield (350g/12.3oz),they look almost the same. The difference between two fabrics is less than 100g - the outermost layer (density) and the membrane which is the secret recipe we make DuoTek a performance Jacket. The Shield laminate, which is with our most advanced tech -waterproof(50,000mm)/breathability(80,000g/m2/24hrs), along with its reversibility and ultra-light, makes the Shield the professional version of DuoTek and even one of the best performance jackets on the market.

- Both DuoTek Cool and DuoTek Shield come with hood/collar options.

FULLFRAME DESIGN is a tech-based textile & garment design team made up of field experts, designers and sports enthusiasts. 

DuoTek is made from a completely new fabric developed by FULLFRAME DESIGN by using the latest technology to deliver performance, comfort, and functionality to you.

story:
***ORDERING ALERT** ALL ORDERS ARE NOW PROCESSED AT OptimalAmino.com***

*Be sure to check the UPDATES section ⬆️above⬆️ for fulfillment updates!*

**UPDATE: OptimalAmino™ ships to most countries in the world. If you do not see your country listed as an available destination for a perk, please send us an email at customerservice@optimallabs.net and we will add your country as a shipping option.**

 

 

Protein is essential for life and we must meet our daily protein intake requirements to live life to the fullest and avoid the negative effects on our bodies of too little protein. 

But, truth be known, we really do not even need protein. 

Wait, what did you say? 

That's right. You see, we consume protein from animal and/or plant sources because they are made out of amino acids but it is just the amino acids that we actually need. While our bodies are amazing machines that can create many amino acids on their own, there are 8 amino acids that our bodies cannot create or cannot create in sufficient quantities. It is just those 8 amino acids, known as "essential" amino acids (EAAs), that we consume animal and plant protein to get.

What I just told you is not new or controversial. It's just a fuller explanation than we usually hear.

Simply put, we eat protein-rich foods or take protein supplements to ultimately provide our bodies with essential amino acids (EAAs) that the body can then combine with other "non-essential" amino acids it produces to form new proteins for use in the body.

 

There's a Better Way than Whey...Or Food...

So if we really just need the essential amino acids (EAAs) from protein, could there be a more efficient way to get the amino acids that we need without the ones we don't need and all their calories (and possibly fat and carbs too)? 

The answer is YES, and we call it OptimalAmino™: a Keto and Vegan-friendly, protein replacement that is sugar-free, non-GMO, and made in the USA in a FDA registered and NSF & cGMP certified facility.

OptimalAmino™ is based on some really exciting clinical research from the 80s and 90s about a precise EAA formula that is 2-6x more usable in the human body for muscle repair and recovery than protein from plant and animal sources with - get this, only 4 calories per serving.

Leading Whey vs OptimalAmino™

This "optimal" EAA ratio that perfectly matches human EAA requirements was demonstrated to have a utilization rate of 99% with only 1% waste. This compares to average protein utilization rates of beef, poultry, and fish at 32%, soy at 17% and milk, casein, and whey averaging only 16%.** 

 

Plant proteins are all the rage these days, but...

While many have recently turned to plant-based proteins including soy, peas, beans, almonds, and others to meet their protein intake requirements, the EAA ratios in plants are even further away from optimal for humans than animal-sourced proteins. Certainly, some choose plant-based protein sources for ethical reasons but some choose nuts or other plant-based sources as a convenient, protein-rich snack. 

Almonds vs OptimalAmino™

But due to even lower usability, plant-based protein sources require even more intake and often come with unnecessary calories and fat content. While OptimalAmino™ has a utilization rate of 99%, the average protein utilization rates of plant-based proteins is only 14%.** This can lead to a significant surplus in calories and fat just to meet daily protein requirements.

 

 Why Should I care? 

(a crash course on body protein turnover and why this matters to all of us)

When many of us think of eating foods high in protein, we only think of protein as necessary as it relates to growing or strengthening our muscles. But that is a misunderstanding of how it all works.  Whether you are young or old, active or sedentary, your body is continuously "turning over" (meaning - building up and breaking down) proteins into amino acids for use in your organs and other tissues. And, amazingly, your muscles actually act as reservoirs to store amino acids (as muscle fibers) for later use.

 

Here's how it works:

Several hours after a meal, when there are no longer sufficient EAAs entering your blood from the digested protein, your body begins to break down muscle protein to supply the blood with enough amino acids to continue building protein for use in your organs and other tissues (this is a period called the "fasted" state).

After a meal containing protein or taking a supplement like OptimalAmino™ (this is called the "fed" state), your body utilizes the absorbed EAAs from the digested protein to produce new muscle protein and replenish what was lost in the fasted state. 

All this goes on throughout the day and night whether you care about it or not - which is pretty incredible. Just imagine for a moment if this protein "turnover" process didn't occur and after missing just a few meals, you lost a lot of skin (for example) in the absence of sufficient EAAs!***

Here's why you should care

Health

1 serving per day.

Q: I am not very active nor do I have a physically demanding job, so don't I get enough protein in my diet already? 

A: The answer is: probably not. Regardless of your activity level, protein turnover is taking place in your body at a rate of 300-400g per day! While your activity level may be low, your body must still maintain sufficient amino acid levels in your blood to support your organs and other tissues. As explained above, muscle acts as the reservoir for amino acid storage in the body and when blood amino acid levels drop, muscle will be broken down regardless of your activity level. Supplementing between meals and/or before sleep with a 99% utilized EAA supplement like OptimalAmino™ will increase blood amino acid levels and trigger the replenishment of muscle protein naturally lost throughout the day and night. As you can imagine, this becomes even more critical as we age.

For those who fit in this category, we've created a Health Perk here on Indiegogo.

 

Fitness

2 servings per day.

Q: I regularly exercise throughout the week and eat a healthy diet, so don't I get enough protein in my diet already?

A: The answer is: probably not. In addition to the standard protein turnover of 300-400g per day mentioned above, exercise stimulates both muscle protein breakdown and protein synthesis (creation). This turnover of muscle protein, replacing older and poorly functioning muscle fibers with newer and and better functioning muscle fibers, is how we grow stronger. However, since some of the EAAs released during protein breakdown are degraded (through oxidation) beyond reuse, they cannot be reused to build new muscle protein and will ultimately be excreted as waste. To even just correct the imbalance between muscle protein breakdown and synthesis caused by exercise, you must consume sufficient EAAs in your diet through food or a calorie-efficient supplement such as OptimalAmino™. 

Q: In addition to regular exercise I use time-restricted eating, so aren't I able to get enough protein in my eating window?

A: The answer is: probably not. There are many variations of time-restricted eating like intermittent fasting (in all it's flavors - 18/6, 20/4, etc), One Meal a Day (OMAD), etc and many have reported significant weight loss by following these protocols. However, the role of body protein turnover is often significantly underappreciated in these diets and while significant weight can be lost, this often comes at the expense of muscle as well. As mentioned above, standard protein turnover is continuing throughout the day but some of the EAAs broken down from muscle cannot be reused due to oxidation and must be replaced. The negative balance of EAAs in your blood triggers even further muscle breakdown to maintain balance and this can only be reversed through the ingestion of EAAs. While EAAs may be consumed through food or supplements during your eating window, there are limits to the stimulus EAA consumption can provide at one time. Without taking a calorie-efficient, 99% utilized, IF-friendly EAA supplement like OptimalAmino™ outside your eating window, there is a real risk of the undesirable loss of muscle as muscle protein breakdown begins to exceed muscle protein synthesis during time-restricted eating.

For those who fit in this category, we've created a Fitness Perk here on Indiegogo.

 

Elite

3 servings per day.

Q: I am a competitive athlete or have an intensive fitness regimen and I closely track my macros, so don't I get enough protein in my diet already?

A: The answer is: probably not. In addition to the standard protein turnover of ~300g-400g per day, intensive resistance training or endurance exercise increases the rate of muscle protein turnover. The muscle protein broken down as a response to exercise provides EAAs into the blood and allows the synthesis of newer, better functioning protein to replace older muscle fibers that are not as efficient in generating force when they contract. As mentioned above, not all of the EAAs supplied through turnover are able to be reused and intensive exercise actually leads to a net loss of muscle due to increased turnover. A calorie-efficient EAA supplement like OptimalAmino™, used in conjunction with intensive resistance training or endurance exercise, can reverse the net muscle loss without the excess calories of protein found in food. Not only can OptimalAmino™ be much more convenient than dietary protein for competitive athletes, it can also provide greater control in maintaining body composition. 

For those who fit in this category, we've created a Elite Perk here on Indiegogo.

 

Where do we go from here?

The patent has now expired on this incredibly effective EAA formula that is 2-6x more usable than protein from other sources and it is now available as a supplement from a few different companies. We have tried all these products, currently use some of them ourselves, and have been very happy with the results. Unfortunately, all of these products are priced similarly (see below) and they are just way too expensive. This simply puts this amazing EAA protein replacement formula out of reach for most people.   

So we have taken on the task of bringing OptimalAmino™ to market at the lowest possible price. We've hired the best contract manufacturer in the country to make this exact formula for us and, after numerous rounds of samples, we have chosen a delicious Berry Lemonade flavor. 

We have negotiated volume pricing to lower the production costs as much as possible and we have lined up a high-volume fulfillment partner to ensure we can get OptimalAmino™ in your hands quickly. Just last week we signed the contract, paid a large deposit to start our initial production run, and OptimalAmino™ will be ready to ship in late January or early February.

OptimalAmino™ vs Leading MAP-based EAA Supplements and a Leading Whey Protein Isolate. Pricing retrieved from manufacturers' websites on 11/1/2020 and subject to change.

While we want to bring OptimalAmino™ to market at the lowest possible price - more than 50% below similar products*- we refuse to compromise on quality, or use cheaper ingredients like artificial flavoring or sweeteners. But to make this incredible discount possible, we really do need your help.

 

How can you help?

If you have already discovered the incredible benefits of a supplement based on this optimal EAA ratio, you know how expensive they all are. If you are like us, you may be used to waiting for promotional sales and buying in bulk in order to lower the serving cost. WELL. NOT. ANYMORE. 

OptimalAmino™ will save you $540-$2100 per year over the leading brands. No discount codes, promo codes, referral links, or other "sales" necessary. 

But to ensure we can pass on these incredible savings, we do need your help.

 

Here's what you can do today:

1) Contribute as much as you can to our project here on Indiegogo and stock up on OptimalAmino™ now. This allows you to lock in the huge savings on OptimalAmino™ that we are realizing through our large initial production run and save on the cost of shipping future orders.

2) Tell everyone you know about OptimalAmino™ and get them to join us here on Indiegogo. Not only will you be helping them save a ton of money while improving their health but you'll be saving your future self a lot of money by guaranteeing the long term viability of our project. Marketing is usually one of the single largest costs that drives up the retail price of supplements, but if you spread the word, we can get OptimalAmino™ in the hands of tens of thousands of people at an affordable price. 

We can only succeed with your support.

 

Risks and challenges

The year 2020 has been anything but normal and supply chain disruptions are everywhere. But we plan to ship by January 2021 come hell or highwater and we have already placed a 50% deposit on our first production run. We have the premier contract-manufacturer on our team and we have a high-volume fulfillment contract in place to ensure timely delivery to our backers upon completion.

We are committed to bringing OptimalAmino™ to market by the beginning of 2021 but we will promptly communicate any unforeseen supply chain delays with our community. We are in this for the long haul and excited about supporting your nutritional needs for years to come.

 

More Questions?

Check out our FAQ section here on Indiegogo or send us a message through our contact form at OptimalAmino.com.

 

_______________________________________________________________

*Compare to MAP™, PerfectAmino®, Fortagen™, Kion Aminos.

**Lucà-Moretti M. A Comparative, Double-blind, Triple Crossover Net Nitrogen Utilization Study Confirms the Discovery of the Master Amino Acid Pattern. Annals of the Royal National Academy of Medicine of Spain, Madrid; Vol. CXV: 397-416, 1998.

***Wolfe, Robert. A Guide to Amino Acid and Protein Nutrition: Essential Amino Acid Solutions for Everyone (the EAASE Program). N.p., Independently Published, 2017.

_______________________________________________________________

_______________________________________________________________

story_txt: ***ORDERING ALERT** ALL ORDERS ARE NOW PROCESSED AT OptimalAmino.com****Be sure to check the UPDATES section ⬆️above⬆️ for fulfillment updates!***UPDATE: OptimalAmino™ ships to most countries in the world. If you do not see your country listed as an available destination for a perk, please send us an email at customerservice@optimallabs.net and we will add your country as a shipping option.**  Protein is essential for life and we must meet our daily protein intake requirements to live life to the fullest and avoid the negative effects on our bodies of too little protein. But, truth be known, we really do not even need protein. Wait, what did you say? That's right. You see, we consume protein from animal and/or plant sources because they are made out of amino acids but it is just the amino acids that we actually need. While our bodies are amazing machines that can create many amino acids on their own, there are 8 amino acids that our bodies cannot create or cannot create in sufficient quantities. It is just those 8 amino acids, known as "essential" amino acids (EAAs), that we consume animal and plant protein to get.What I just told you is not new or controversial. It's just a fuller explanation than we usually hear.Simply put, we eat protein-rich foods or take protein supplements to ultimately provide our bodies with essential amino acids (EAAs) that the body can then combine with other "non-essential" amino acids it produces to form new proteins for use in the body. There's a Better Way than Whey...Or Food...So if we really just need the essential amino acids (EAAs) from protein, could there be a more efficient way to get the amino acids that we need without the ones we don't need and all their calories (and possibly fat and carbs too)? The answer is YES, and we call it OptimalAmino™: a Keto and Vegan-friendly, protein replacement that is sugar-free, non-GMO, and made in the USA in a FDA registered and NSF & cGMP certified facility.OptimalAmino™ is based on some really exciting clinical research from the 80s and 90s about a precise EAA formula that is 2-6x more usable in the human body for muscle repair and recovery than protein from plant and animal sources with - get this, only 4 calories per serving.Leading Whey vs OptimalAmino™This "optimal" EAA ratio that perfectly matches human EAA requirements was demonstrated to have a utilization rate of 99% with only 1% waste. This compares to average protein utilization rates of beef, poultry, and fish at 32%, soy at 17% and milk, casein, and whey averaging only 16%.**  Plant proteins are all the rage these days, but...While many have recently turned to plant-based proteins including soy, peas, beans, almonds, and others to meet their protein intake requirements, the EAA ratios in plants are even further away from optimal for humans than animal-sourced proteins. Certainly, some choose plant-based protein sources for ethical reasons but some choose nuts or other plant-based sources as a convenient, protein-rich snack. Almonds vs OptimalAmino™But due to even lower usability, plant-based protein sources require even more intake and often come with unnecessary calories and fat content. While OptimalAmino™ has a utilization rate of 99%, the average protein utilization rates of plant-based proteins is only 14%.** This can lead to a significant surplus in calories and fat just to meet daily protein requirements.  Why Should I care? (a crash course on body protein turnover and why this matters to all of us)When many of us think of eating foods high in protein, we only think of protein as necessary as it relates to growing or strengthening our muscles. But that is a misunderstanding of how it all works.  Whether you are young or old, active or sedentary, your body is continuously "turning over" (meaning - building up and breaking down) proteins into amino acids for use in your organs and other tissues. And, amazingly, your muscles actually act as reservoirs to store amino acids (as muscle fibers) for later use. Here's how it works:Several hours after a meal, when there are no longer sufficient EAAs entering your blood from the digested protein, your body begins to break down muscle protein to supply the blood with enough amino acids to continue building protein for use in your organs and other tissues (this is a period called the "fasted" state).After a meal containing protein or taking a supplement like OptimalAmino™ (this is called the "fed" state), your body utilizes the absorbed EAAs from the digested protein to produce new muscle protein and replenish what was lost in the fasted state. All this goes on throughout the day and night whether you care about it or not - which is pretty incredible. Just imagine for a moment if this protein "turnover" process didn't occur and after missing just a few meals, you lost a lot of skin (for example) in the absence of sufficient EAAs!***Here's why you should careHealth1 serving per day.Q: I am not very active nor do I have a physically demanding job, so don't I get enough protein in my diet already? A: The answer is: probably not. Regardless of your activity level, protein turnover is taking place in your body at a rate of 300-400g per day! While your activity level may be low, your body must still maintain sufficient amino acid levels in your blood to support your organs and other tissues. As explained above, muscle acts as the reservoir for amino acid storage in the body and when blood amino acid levels drop, muscle will be broken down regardless of your activity level. Supplementing between meals and/or before sleep with a 99% utilized EAA supplement like OptimalAmino™ will increase blood amino acid levels and trigger the replenishment of muscle protein naturally lost throughout the day and night. As you can imagine, this becomes even more critical as we age.For those who fit in this category, we've created a Health Perk here on Indiegogo. Fitness2 servings per day.Q: I regularly exercise throughout the week and eat a healthy diet, so don't I get enough protein in my diet already?A: The answer is: probably not. In addition to the standard protein turnover of 300-400g per day mentioned above, exercise stimulates both muscle protein breakdown and protein synthesis (creation). This turnover of muscle protein, replacing older and poorly functioning muscle fibers with newer and and better functioning muscle fibers, is how we grow stronger. However, since some of the EAAs released during protein breakdown are degraded (through oxidation) beyond reuse, they cannot be reused to build new muscle protein and will ultimately be excreted as waste. To even just correct the imbalance between muscle protein breakdown and synthesis caused by exercise, you must consume sufficient EAAs in your diet through food or a calorie-efficient supplement such as OptimalAmino™. Q: In addition to regular exercise I use time-restricted eating, so aren't I able to get enough protein in my eating window?A: The answer is: probably not. There are many variations of time-restricted eating like intermittent fasting (in all it's flavors - 18/6, 20/4, etc), One Meal a Day (OMAD), etc and many have reported significant weight loss by following these protocols. However, the role of body protein turnover is often significantly underappreciated in these diets and while significant weight can be lost, this often comes at the expense of muscle as well. As mentioned above, standard protein turnover is continuing throughout the day but some of the EAAs broken down from muscle cannot be reused due to oxidation and must be replaced. The negative balance of EAAs in your blood triggers even further muscle breakdown to maintain balance and this can only be reversed through the ingestion of EAAs. While EAAs may be consumed through food or supplements during your eating window, there are limits to the stimulus EAA consumption can provide at one time. Without taking a calorie-efficient, 99% utilized, IF-friendly EAA supplement like OptimalAmino™ outside your eating window, there is a real risk of the undesirable loss of muscle as muscle protein breakdown begins to exceed muscle protein synthesis during time-restricted eating.For those who fit in this category, we've created a Fitness Perk here on Indiegogo. Elite3 servings per day.Q: I am a competitive athlete or have an intensive fitness regimen and I closely track my macros, so don't I get enough protein in my diet already?A: The answer is: probably not. In addition to the standard protein turnover of ~300g-400g per day, intensive resistance training or endurance exercise increases the rate of muscle protein turnover. The muscle protein broken down as a response to exercise provides EAAs into the blood and allows the synthesis of newer, better functioning protein to replace older muscle fibers that are not as efficient in generating force when they contract. As mentioned above, not all of the EAAs supplied through turnover are able to be reused and intensive exercise actually leads to a net loss of muscle due to increased turnover. A calorie-efficient EAA supplement like OptimalAmino™, used in conjunction with intensive resistance training or endurance exercise, can reverse the net muscle loss without the excess calories of protein found in food. Not only can OptimalAmino™ be much more convenient than dietary protein for competitive athletes, it can also provide greater control in maintaining body composition. For those who fit in this category, we've created a Elite Perk here on Indiegogo. Where do we go from here?The patent has now expired on this incredibly effective EAA formula that is 2-6x more usable than protein from other sources and it is now available as a supplement from a few different companies. We have tried all these products, currently use some of them ourselves, and have been very happy with the results. Unfortunately, all of these products are priced similarly (see below) and they are just way too expensive. This simply puts this amazing EAA protein replacement formula out of reach for most people.   So we have taken on the task of bringing OptimalAmino™ to market at the lowest possible price. We've hired the best contract manufacturer in the country to make this exact formula for us and, after numerous rounds of samples, we have chosen a delicious Berry Lemonade flavor. We have negotiated volume pricing to lower the production costs as much as possible and we have lined up a high-volume fulfillment partner to ensure we can get OptimalAmino™ in your hands quickly. Just last week we signed the contract, paid a large deposit to start our initial production run, and OptimalAmino™ will be ready to ship in late January or early February.OptimalAmino™ vs Leading MAP-based EAA Supplements and a Leading Whey Protein Isolate. Pricing retrieved from manufacturers' websites on 11/1/2020 and subject to change.While we want to bring OptimalAmino™ to market at the lowest possible price - more than 50% below similar products*- we refuse to compromise on quality, or use cheaper ingredients like artificial flavoring or sweeteners. But to make this incredible discount possible, we really do need your help. How can you help?If you have already discovered the incredible benefits of a supplement based on this optimal EAA ratio, you know how expensive they all are. If you are like us, you may be used to waiting for promotional sales and buying in bulk in order to lower the serving cost. WELL. NOT. ANYMORE. OptimalAmino™ will save you $540-$2100 per year over the leading brands. No discount codes, promo codes, referral links, or other "sales" necessary. But to ensure we can pass on these incredible savings, we do need your help. Here's what you can do today:1) Contribute as much as you can to our project here on Indiegogo and stock up on OptimalAmino™ now. This allows you to lock in the huge savings on OptimalAmino™ that we are realizing through our large initial production run and save on the cost of shipping future orders.2) Tell everyone you know about OptimalAmino™ and get them to join us here on Indiegogo. Not only will you be helping them save a ton of money while improving their health but you'll be saving your future self a lot of money by guaranteeing the long term viability of our project. Marketing is usually one of the single largest costs that drives up the retail price of supplements, but if you spread the word, we can get OptimalAmino™ in the hands of tens of thousands of people at an affordable price. We can only succeed with your support. Risks and challengesThe year 2020 has been anything but normal and supply chain disruptions are everywhere. But we plan to ship by January 2021 come hell or highwater and we have already placed a 50% deposit on our first production run. We have the premier contract-manufacturer on our team and we have a high-volume fulfillment contract in place to ensure timely delivery to our backers upon completion.We are committed to bringing OptimalAmino™ to market by the beginning of 2021 but we will promptly communicate any unforeseen supply chain delays with our community. We are in this for the long haul and excited about supporting your nutritional needs for years to come. More Questions?Check out our FAQ section here on Indiegogo or send us a message through our contact form at OptimalAmino.com. _______________________________________________________________*Compare to MAP™, PerfectAmino®, Fortagen™, Kion Aminos.**Lucà-Moretti M. A Comparative, Double-blind, Triple Crossover Net Nitrogen Utilization Study Confirms the Discovery of the Master Amino Acid Pattern. Annals of the Royal National Academy of Medicine of Spain, Madrid; Vol. CXV: 397-416, 1998.***Wolfe, Robert. A Guide to Amino Acid and Protein Nutrition: Essential Amino Acid Solutions for Everyone (the EAASE Program). N.p., Independently Published, 2017._______________________________________________________________All product names, logos, and brands are property of their respective owners. All company, product and service names used in this website are for identification purposes only. Use of these names, logos, and brands does not imply endorsement._______________________________________________________________The preceding statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. Always seek the advice of your physician or other qualified health care provider with any questions you may have regarding a medical condition.

story:
AUSTRALIAN DEAF RUGBY UNION

The Australian Deaf Rugby Union (ADRU) solely relies on funding from sponsors and fundraising.  They receive no funding from the Government or from the Australian Rugby Union.  Each player pays their own way on these tours.  To expand the growing ADRU we are heading to Samoa first stop to play Deaf Rugby Samoa in their first ever Deaf Rugby International.  This trip to Samoa will put the ADRU on the historical map being the first Australian National Rugby team to ever play in Samoa.   Next stop Christchurch to get the Cochlear Cup back from the Deaf Blacks in the annual Test match.   
To assist the team we desperately need your help!  We need to raise at least $15,000.00 to get them on their way.  This will cover the travelling expenses, jerseys and fees that are associated with getting these guys on their way and bring that Cup back to Australian soil.
This is a unique experience one which we hope that you will help us get there and be involved in.
Please share this with your family, friends and sponsors who just want to see the ADRU team achieve this historical milestone and pave the way for future players.

story:
Short Summary

Hi my name is Sunni and I have a dream to set up Retreats of Renewal and Healing in exotic parts of the world specifically for men and women who have reached a time in their life when either change has been forced upon them or they have this nagging feeling that they need to make a change, they have become stuck, lost their way and feeling depressed, lonely and isolated and they don't know where to turn, because every direction is filled with fear, doubt and judgement.

I have owned and run a number of businesses in the past, ALL of them without any funding and it's a lot for me to ask for funding in this way and have run businesses that are very corporate type of businesses. This last year I decided to get out of the 'rat race' and follow my passion.

Change can be forced upon us or a matter of choice:

  • Divorce or separation
  • Children leaving the nest
  • Redundancy or Loss of Business
  • Change in Direction
  • Values and Desires Change
  • Coming out of Addiction
  • Always striving to lose weight and never quite getting there
  • Feeling that you don't belong anymore
  • Depression, sadness and loneliness

Some of these changes happened to me and I found it quite tough to go through, especially because I became so isolated in my thoughts. Didn't want to share because people had a certain idea of who I was and realised very quickly that the only way through it was, in fact to share and to be vulnerable. 

What I also found is that to spend time away from everything I know, the business of life, the responsibilities and to be with people that their soul purpose in life was to share the gift of love, bliss and harmony. Helped me to love myself again and to come back to my true essence of childlike joy. 

So I became a Yoga & Meditation Teacher and an EFT Practitioner. I am now in a position of serving others who are going through big changes in their lives with love, support, nurturing and encouragement.  I basically ended up completely re-inventing myself and now live a full, loving, peaceful and authentic life.

You will discover:

  • How to love yourself
  • Re-connect with yourself
  • Come back to your joyful essence
  • Break old habits and create new
  • Create space for creation and re-invention

Your contribution will mean that you will help to give a foundation of support and nurturing for people that are going through this massive change in their lives. You may be one of those, feeling desperate, scared and becoming more reclusive. Your contribution will help save those people, even yourself from feeling worthless and unable to be part of society anymore.

What's Included at a Retreat of Renewal and Healing

  • Morning chanting and meditation
  • One hour gentle Hatha/Ashtanga/Vinyasa Yoga twice daily with restorative sessions
  • Healing Pranayama and chanting (various afternoons)
  • Yoga Nidra (for deep relaxation and healing)
  • Daily Guided Meditation for Soul Searching
  • Quality yoga equipment provided – mats, bolsters, blocks, straps and eye masks
  • Healthy Meals and Raw Juices provided by our staff
  • All meals included in your package so you do not have to worry about where to eat
  • Offerings to the Gods Ceremonies with local Balinese Priest
  • One Silent day for reflection and relaxation
  • Complimentary 1 hour relaxing Balinese massage
  • Raw Food Demonstrations (on some retreats)
  • Breathing Technique Workshops
  • Visit Local Temples (optional)
  • Double, Twin share and Single accommodation
  • Airport transfers to and from resort
  • Opening and closing orientation circles and readings
  • Endless purified spring water, coffee/teas
  • Daily housekeeping service, so you do not have to lift a finger while you relax, and recover
  • Complimentary broadband Wi-Fi internet access 
  • Complimentary 1 hour Healing EFT Will Set You Free Session
  • Surprise Gift pack
  • Complimentary SunniLove Yoga e-book.

What I Need the Funding For

I need $20,000 for the first phase of this project which will be spent on:

  • Securing a beautiful location with a deposit
  • Paying for social media, PR and off line marketing
  • Google Adwords Campaign
  • Refinements to the existing Website
  • Insurances that are required to support the retreats
  • Equipment needed during the retreat
I am offering the following perks for your donation which will also benefit you as an individual.
$10 - An offering will be made each day during the retreat and a special offering will be made in your name plus my E-book on Yoga & Meditation

$25 - Three Yoga Nidra Meditation Videos will be emailed to you.

$100 - One year membership to The SunniLove Life Members Only area - giving you first access to guest webinars, yoga and meditation videos

$500 - All of the above + one Emotional Freedom Technique Therapy Session and one Lifestyle Coaching Session with me each one up to 90 minute duration (this can be done on Skype, so no geographical constraints)

$2,000 - One reservation at an all inclusive retreat of your choice (must be taken within one year of investment and does not include flights)

$5,000 - You and two friends reservation at an all inclusive retreat of your choice (must be taken within one year of investment and does not include flights)

$10,000 - Attend five different retreats over a two year period or invite up to five friends on one retreat (must be taken within one year of investment and does not include flights)
If I do not reach my goal, I will still use what I have achieved so far, on marketing the retreats.

The Impact

By contributing you will be making a positive impact on either yourself, people you know, friends and family to help stop silent suffering. It's embarrassing to find that your world has turned upside down and you no longer are the person that people expect you to be. It will also make an impact on employment in your home country and worldwide because we will be utilising the services of local staff. 

Coming on one of these retreats will be a life changing experience for the person that attends, who will be able to go back into the outside world and continue to make a positive contribution to it's peace and spirituality bringing the world together in a loving and harmonious way.

I have run a successful training company in the UK for 15 years and for this particular project have set up a website (although it needs a professional to work on it now), sourced teachers, nutritional experts and successful trained as a yoga teacher myself. I have been successful in setting up one small retreat to test out the response.

Challenges

The greatest challenge I personally face is that I am a one woman band at the moment and I am trying to do everything myself, from setting up the website, setting up Google Adwords campaigns, setting up a shop to sell yoga clothing, social media marketing and PR with very limited income. So not only is the lack of funding stopping me from progressing further, but also the fact that I am trying to do too much and that doesn't particularly promote the life of balance.

  • I am resilient and can create the balance and have a lot of knowledge and experience of on-line marketing.
  • I already have a strong following in Facebook of potential investors and clients.
  • The Investment will assist in resolving the issues above, by enabling me to outsource some of the work to external resources.

Other Ways You Can Help

I really appreciate any contribution you can make whether it is $10 or $10,000, but I understand that this is not always possible.

  • If you cannot make a contribution would you at least LIKE and SHARE and send out EMAILS to your network of people to get the word out.
  • Indiegogo has share tools to make this easy for you.

I am so grateful for your contribution and feel that this is absolutely the bravest thing I have ever done in asking you for help and I really look forward to seeing some of  you on upcoming retreats.

I am currently updating the website so keep checking here for full details on retreat dates, what happens at the retreats, where they will be and how you can be there.

SunniLove Life By Design

Namaste & Divine Light

Sunni x

If you cannot make a contribution would you at least LIKE and SHARE and send out EMAILS to your network of people to get the word out. Indiegogo has share tools to make this easy for you.   I am so grateful for your contribution and feel that this is absolutely the bravest thing I have ever done in asking you for help and I really look forward to seeing some of  you on upcoming retreats.I am currently updating the website so keep checking here for full details on retreat dates, what happens at the retreats, where they will be and how you can be there.SunniLove Life By DesignNamaste & Divine LightSunni x

story:
Recently Tibet Women's Soccer made the bold decision to go independent, taking our future into our own hands and ensuring that our players will always have access to both the sport, and to the family that we've become.

First step - establish our new home base. We'll be setting up headquarters in the Tibetan settlement of Clementown outside the city of Dehradun. We've already got it scoped out, and we have our eyes set on a pristine gated compound with enough space for our administrative offices AND a permanent dormitory for our camps, which our players will also have the option to live in full-time when they are finished with their education, or during vacations an holidays.

Most of our players are essentially alone here in India, having left their families back in Tibet as young children to attend Tibetan boarding schools in India. During holidays and after graduation, many of them aren't sure where to go. TWS will be providing them a safe, nurturing home space so that they always have a place where they belong and can be part of a loving family on a daily basis.

The dormitory will also serve as the base for all our future training camps, for which we usually have to pay hefty fees to rent accommodation from various schools and guesthouses.

It's totally empty right now - we need to outfit it with 14 sets of bunk beds, 6 single beds, and all the mattresses and sheets and blankets. We need to build some basic wood furniture for storage and tables/chairs for dining. We need to get all the pots and pans and fixins for the kitchen, including a stove top, water filter and cooking gas. We need a computer for the new office, and desks and chairs. With a little luck, we'll also be able to get flower pots and plant a vegetable garden in the yard, and a few fans for these hot Indian summers.

The ongoing expenses include monthly rent ($241), electric, water and internet. We'd also like to hire a local woman to be responsible for upkeep and cleaning.

$10,000 should be enough to get the compound rented and outfitted. Every penny we raise over this amount will go towards additional expenses as they arise, including ongoing rent and utilities. The more we can raise, the stronger the promise for our future.
