old shortage of teachers. Enrolment at the school is up 15% over last year
and 15 students are heading to high school.
The Kasaka basic school has gone from the worst
ranked school in their district to the number one ranked school – in just two
years. 

                
What’s Next?
As nursing students, we brought a new element to the
One Seed project in rural Zambia. Throughout our first and second trip, we completed
a medical needs assessment of the clinic in the village of Kasaka. The
conditions were deplorable – no electricity, dirt floor, no running water. The
clinic was often out of basic medications and immunizations that are required
for babies and children under five. There were cockroaches and termites
crawling around the maternity ward and the women expressed their fear of
falling asleep and waking up in the morning with bites all over their bodies. The
HIV rate is approximately 40% of the population and growing, along with a high
percentage of infectious disease, deaths from diarrhea, malaria, and pregnancy
related deaths, such as hemorrhage. There are two nurses that manage the clinic
and one janitor, who’s primary role is as a pharmacist administering
medications. 

                 

                


In May of 2015, we took our third trip to Zambia, this time
exploring another village nearby called Gaali. Our plan was to complete a
similar needs assessment as we had done in Kasaka the year prior; however, this
clinic was different. It was a 6x10 room with a dirt floor and one small window.
That was it – an empty room with nothing. It was used as an outpost clinic,
meaning that one nurse traveled here once a month to provide prenatal health
care to pregnant women and an immunization clinic. The women, often with young
children or pregnant, would walk three hours with no water and  wait outside in either the scorching heat or
pouring rain for care once a month. At that moment, our goals shifted. It was
clear that there needed to be a medical clinic in Gaali. We met with the
community health officials to discuss what they wanted to see in Gaali in terms
of healthcare. They all asked for assistance in creating a clinic. We are now
planning to build from the ground up in Gaali, creating a medical facility as
well as staff housing.


        


We will also continue to help the Kasaka clinic and any
extra materials we receive in the process of building the clinic in Gaali, we
will provide to the Kasaka clinic. By contributing to this project, you will
not only help create a clinic in this area, but develop a sustainable long-term
future for the people in this community. Health education, prevention and
promotion will all be fundamental in the future of health care for rural
Zambia. 
  What We Need  Our initial goals with the One Seed project have
been met and the agricultural side of the project is now taking root in
multiple areas of Zambia now. Our new goal is to raise $50,000.00 through
crowdfunding to help kick start the complete build of a health clinic in Gaali,
Zambia. Every dollar raised goes 100% towards the project and after each trip
you can find pictures of us doing the actual work. One Seed is a project made
through Enactus Lambton College which is completely student led. As nursing
students, we pay our own way to Zambia, Africa with the help of family and
friends. Any money fundraised is used for the project with absolutely no
overhead costs as Lambton College is self-sustainable.     The Impact Once our goal is met, approximately 14,000 lives
will have access to adequate health care that otherwise meant walking over 16km
for the nearest care (three hours for a healthy adult). Currently, at eight months pregnant, women begin their walking journey to the
nearest hospital to stay there until they deliver their baby. Building a clinic
in Gaali would completely decrease the over capacitated hospital that is in
Monze and provide care to the surrounding area that once was only available by
one nurse, once a month. 



    Risks & Challenges  Multiple issues in the Zambian area are surrounded
by start-up costs that are virtually impossible for the community to afford.
Our project focus on the initial start-up costs values independent sustainability.
The One Seed project is well respected in the surrounding area of Monze and the
focus has previously been on agriculture and education. One Seed has been able
to build a rapport with the communities in Monze and in the villages of Kasaka
and Gaali. Schools have been built and refurbished and the government has been
able to support the changes by integrating more teachers for the education
system in Kasaka, Zambia. This is the same outcome we are optimistic for within
the medical aspect of the project. Although we have had great success with
support in the past, we are still in the midst of ensuring government support
is there prior to building the clinic. At present, it seems we are going to get
all of the necessary government support. The focus is now on fundraising for
the complete build in Gaali. However, if by chance the government provision is
unattainable, the money will be spent on refurbishing the medical clinic in
Kasaka. There are many areas the money can be spent within the medical world
for this community. In Kasaka, there is a clinic that is currently supported
from the government so it will benefit either way. This will include medical equipment, fumigating
the insects (cockroaches), building a well for clean uncontaminated water,
implementing infection control interventions, beds and ultrasound for antenatal women, medical
texts and health teaching for all staff.
      Other Ways You Can Help 

If you are a Lambton College student, you can become
a member of the team and do the labour with us! We have a variety of students
that bring all different qualities to the team from business to nursing to
computer programming students. The area in Zambia is in need of many things and
we are an educational institute, so teaching and learning is what we do! Another
goal of ours is to receive as many in kind donations (Medical equipment) as
possible. Part of our fundraising cost will eventually go towards shipping a
sea container filled with as much equipment as possible. Our number one goal is
to build the clinic in Gaali while simultaneously fixing up the clinic in
Kasaka. While the areas are both in a great need, Gaali has absolutely nothing
at this point and this is why we have chosen to focus here and have Kasaka
benefit from the residual effects of working in Gaali. We are looking for any
and all medical equipment. Supplies are great for the start-up, but our focus
is on the sustainability portion. This is why collaboration within different
sectors is important. We understand if you cannot help financially, but if you
can help spread the word about One Seed and our goals, we can get our name out
there and help out a wonderful community.

story:
Research and Science of the Test

After years of research and clinical trials Oral Fluid Testing Laboratory LLC, has developed a new PAIN-FREE screening test for lead and other heavy metals present in the body.

Dr. Robyn Hannigan Inventor 

Founding Dean, School for the Environment

University of Massachusetts, Boston.




A double blind clinical trial was conducted at Emory University Children’s Hospital in conjunction with the Georgia Department of Human Resources, Atlanta, GA and University of Massachusetts, Boston.  More than 500 children between the ages of 6 months to 6 years were tested.  The research results, soon to be published in The Journal of Clinical Toxicology, show that oral fluid is in all cases more reliable than any saliva test and in fact is as reliable as a venous blood test, because blood plasma is being collected in the oral fluid.

Dr. S Lynn Gardener, one of the authors of the study, presented our “Non-Invasive Lead Testing Technology” at the Center for Disease Control (CDC) National Conference in October 2009 and received much praise and support from the attendees.  The study demonstrated that by using OFT’s patented collection and testing procedures, the results comparing the non-invasive, painless oral swab procedure versus an invasive painful blood test were extremely accurate.

The new screening test kit “Toxyscreen”, a product of OFT Labs, is designed to make it easy for concerned parents to test their children. All information needed for proper collection and fast, easy test results is in the Oral Fluid Screening test kit delivered right to your door.

The blood plasma collected in the oral fluid can not only detect drugs but also heavy metals such as Lead, Mercury,  Cadmium, Aluminum, Arsenic, Zinc Copper and Chromium, poison, and almost anything else a standard blood test can find.  This includes recreational and prescription drugs, hormones, HGH, and maybe even different types of cancers--all with just an easy swab of the gum line.

                                                              TOXYSCREEN KIT

                                    

_____________________________________________________________________________

Oral Fluid Testing Laboratory, LLC. PATENT 

On November 9, 2010, the U.S. Patent Office issued OFT Labs Patent #7829340. This patent clearly indicates that the results of the oral fluid testing procedures are as accurate as venous blood samples.  Using OFT’s patented collection and testing procedures, the results comparing the non-invasive painless test versus an invasive painful blood test were 99.19% accurate.  Lead is measured in Ug/Dl, or micro-grams per deciliter [1 µg/dL = 5 ppm (parts per million)].  Simply put, the instrument is well within the capabilities of being able to produce an accuracy well over 1,000 times the current accuracy used, even accounting for sample dilution and instrument error.

After 10 years and exhausting all their resources including pensions, mortgages, and contacts and resources of close family and friends, their hard work and dedication to research and clinical trials has paid off.   Oral Fluid Testing Laboratory LLC, has developed a pain-free screening test for lead and other heavy metals present in the body.  The first of many products to come, Toxyscreen was designed to make it easy for concerned parents to check their children for lead and mercury poisoning, which cause learning disabilities and may be one of the leading causes of Autism.  All information needed for proper collection and fast, easy test results is in the Oral Fluid Screening test kit delivered right to your door.

____________________________________________________________________________

Why did OFT Labs decide to start with heavy metal testing ?

There is no way of escaping it; there is going to be a paradigm shift in medical testing, from blood to oral fluid for all screening and diagnostic testing for the future.  Gene and Ed are hoping to help usher in this change with heavy metal testing.  Why did they choose to start with lead testing?  Lead testing is a federally mandated test that children should receive annually.  Doctors and pediatricians are required to provide lead testing to Medicaid children under the Child Wellness Program.  The CDC’s Health Care Financing Administration policy requires that all children enrolled in Medicaid receive a screening blood lead test at age 12 and 24 months (for more information please review the CDC’s Eliminating Childhood Lead Poisoning:  A Federal Strategy Targeting Lead Paint Hazards).  


Dr. Anil Mangla Lead Scientist & designer of the study, presented our “Non-Invasive Lead Testing Technology” at the Center for Disease Control (CDC) National. 

Additionally, OSHA requires heavy metal testing for workers in fossil fuel power plants, oil refineries, trash-to-steam power plants, construction sites, and solid waste/recycling jobs.  Add to that the growing concern by the general public to ensure safety from environmental harm due to poor air, water, and food quality conditions.  Each of these parties are currently subjected to intravenous blood testing, which is painful and has to be conducted by a doctor’s office or laboratory.  This is a golden opportunity to provide an easier option.

Toxyscreen is a painless, dignified way to meet these needs.  New Jersey alone spends 28 billion dollars a year on health and education problems for residents affected by lead poisoning.  This is not just an inner-city problem but a suburban problem not yet realized. Millions could be saved if Toxyscreen was used for early detection and mapping problem areas.  Construction companies, schools, and businesses that test new employees or do random testing could also save money on collection fees and time saved in doing the test on site by a trained professional.  Doctors can conduct collection right in their office.  If a person does test positive, immediate treatment can begin.

This test is easy, economical, efficient, and environmentally friendly.  Oral fluid-based testing techniques can be implemented for all testing from heavy metals, abused drugs both illegal and prescribed, HGH growth hormones, and medical screening.

_____________________________________________________________________________

What do you Learn from TOXYScreen?

This enormous, patented discovery identified by sheer persistence to find an option for more dignified testing, would eliminate the need to draw blood to detect overexposure to lead and heavy metals.  Toxyscreen is a screening tool you can use now to test your family’s and pet’s levels of four toxic heavy metals: lead, arsenic, mercury and cadmium. Heavy metals are potentially deadly elements that can cause a host of health problems. Often heavy metal poisoning is misdiagnosed, and patients may not receive the correct treatment.  Lead tests in particular often go undone because the hazard of lead poisoning are unknown though fairly common, and parents don’t want the challenge and anxiety of a blood draw. 

The chart below summarizes common sources and effects of heavy metals that OFT Labs provide testing for.  These details were gathered by OFT from OSHA.

Who should be tested?

Anyone can participate, but Toxyscreen particularly benefits children; elderly patients who have a hard time getting out to a lab for a blood draw, struggle with clotting or finding a good vein for intravenous draws; and anyone who is fearful of a needle.

____________________________________________________________________________

Canine's are included!                                                                      

This testing is also for your four-legged friend/family member.  Lead poisoning is a common source of accidental poisoning in pets, mainly puppies. If you have a pet that is diagnosed with lead poisoning, chances are that you may have been exposed as well.  The potential sources of lead for domestic animals are numerous and widespread. Ingestion of lead-based paints is the most commonly identified source of lead in poisoned cats and dogs. Other lead sources are toys, improperly glazed ceramic water or food bowls, contaminated tap water, and children's chalk.  Prior to the introduction of oral fluid testing, diagnosis of lead toxicity always involved a traumatic blood test.

How does testing work?  We send you a kit, which includes detailed instructions and pictures regarding how to take the test. You take a sample (painless, easy, simple) and you mail it back. We send you the results by mail and/or email.

____________________________________________________________________________  

Benefits of TOXYScreen

Toxyscreen is a home kit to test lead and heavy metals screening test for you, your family, and even your pets.  The use of a needle is eliminated, creating a pain-free testing method.  The risk of infection, anemia, and thrombosis are eliminated.  The test is conducted by a quick swab of the gum line, compared to the time consuming and painful process of having a nurse squeeze your finger until a large enough blood specimen is obtained.  The test can be conducted in the safety of your home, eliminating the hassle of scheduling an appointment and visiting a doctor’s office or lab.  It is pain-free, fast, efficient, and accurate. 

With approval from Food and Drug Administration (FDA) and Clinical Laboratory Improvement Amendments (CLIA) (please see Use of Funds section below for details), this test can be commercially available for lead and heavy metal testing that can be conducted at your medical facility, school, sport facility, manufacturing/processing facility, power plant, construction site, day care, etc by your company safety director with exceptional benefits.

  • The testing is painless. No fear and anxiety of a blood draw.
  • The specimen is obtained quickly, unlike the blood draw, which requires the phlebotomist to squeeze the donors finger until a large enough specimen is collected.
  • A licensed phlebotomist is not needed because individuals or internal personnel, trained to collect samples, easily conduct the test without the risk of being exposed to blood borne hazard.
  • No risk of infection, anemia, or thrombosis for the donor.
  • Personnel can be tested by your company Safety Director with exceptional benefits and cost savings.
  • There is no medical waste.  Oral fluid is not considered a biohazard, thus disposal costs are substantially reduced. The test kit is environmentally friendly and its plastic container can easily be recycled.

  • Samples do not require special handling or preservatives. Once oral fluid is collected, it does not have to be refrigerated. This is an advantage if collecting in remote areas such as third world countries. Testing can be performed anywhere in the world.
  • The testing is inexpensive. The at-cost value of the test is equivalent to a blood test.  It would not be an additional financial burden to provide the test if it was covered by insurance companies.
  • Sizable direct savings result from reduced donor wait time. There is no need to coax children into subjecting themselves to a finger stick to collect a capillary blood specimen. There is no need to travel to a doctor or lab with an elderly relative or individual with disability.
  • Oral fluid specimen collection is quick and easy. An experienced, trained collector could collect up to 20 specimens per hour!
  • The testing is private.  All samples are sent to OFT Laboratories to be analyzed.  Results are confirmed via an ICP/MASS SPEC technology.
  • The test can be completed in your own home or at your place of business/work.
  • No equipment is required beyond the swab kit, making this test a viable option for providing testing in third world countries.
Your Privacy is very important to us: Your Privacy is protected by de-identifying the samples on receipt, sending you your unique bar-code, and performing all downstream data analyses only with that bar-code. All information is handled under HIPAA compliance program. We will not store your personally identifying information in any database or release it on the internet in any way, but we will take all reasonable precautions to avoid inadvertent identification of participants. Transfer of materials to other sites is covered by code access agreements. If you have any questions, please email us at  customerservice@toxyscreen.com 
_____________________________________________________________________________

Use of Funds

Ed and Gene believe in the technology they have discovered, and their mission and goal is the development of analytical techniques and instruments for identification and measurements of chemicals in biological and non-biological matrices.  By providing easy collection and accurate measurements of a wide range of organic and inorganic substances, OFT hopes to become the international standard and resource center for those industries requiring compliance testing, surveillance and monitoring testing.  This is why we need your support

Hopefully, you are inspired by the opportunities oral fluid testing has already proven to hold, and you will choose to be part of this paradigm shift in medical testing.  Your pledged funds will be used to integrate OFT’s heavy metals test into the current market and expand oral fluid testing beyond heavy metals.  OFT has hundreds of possible markets for expansion including medical offices, independent labs, schools, airlines, the hospitality industry, athlete testing, military personnel, MEDICAID recipients, and employers who drug test.  With further clinical trials, they hope to expand oral fluid metals testing to other heavy metals, steroid testing in sports, drug testing in fatal accidents, and examining its potential for identifying different types of cancers. 

Our highest priority, with your support, is to seek FDA and CLIA approval, which would allow doctors to offer the test to patients and would begin the process of obtaining approval for coverage by insurance companies.  The FDA approves laboratory tests for screening diseases or conditions, and Toxyscreen needs this approval in order to be accepted as a lead and heavy metal screening test beyond home screening.  CLIA provides certification and oversight of clinical laboratory testing, and will be required once OFT Labs begins providing testing beyond the studies conducted at University of Massachusetts, Boston.  OFT Labs is currently in the process of seeking FDA approval via their team of lawyers.

This requires research, time, paperwork, and promotion of the test. With enough funding, OFT Labs can license the oral fluid screening test to state, private, and hospital laboratories, providing onsite, or at minimal, regional testing facilities in order to increase efficiency of test to provide quicker results.  We will also have to address debt and expenses acquired from obtaining the patent, studies, and internal research.

__________________________________________________________________________

Your pledge funds will be used to:

  • manufacture the kits to collect your sample and analyze the results (which includes the purchasing reagents, ICP/MS equipment.
  • design and development the website.
  • hire key management and outstanding lab personnel.
  • conduct additional clinical trials.
  • research and develop capital for supplies, additional lab equipment, and training in order to expand into other states.
  • seek FDA and CLIA approval (costs include lawyer fees for communicating with FDA, travel, and promotion funds).
  • build and/or rent new testing facilities, in order to expand opportunities, increasing the efficiency of the test to provide quicker results.
  • settle previous debt acquired from obtaining the patent, printing and marketing Toxyscreen packaging, and initial work with University lab to conduct the study.
  • conduct studies in low income communities.

We are looking for contributors who believe in our product and can help us bring it to market.  By choosing to donate, you will be part of a fundamental change in the way testing is conducted.  The potential is clear - painless, accurate oral fluid testing for heavy metals is on the horizon, and you can be part of ushering in this change.  These funds will help families identify lead poisoning early, avoiding long term medical problems, and will allow companies to provide easy, safe, effective testing to their employees, ensuring their health and safety.  The benefits are boundless.  Thank you for your consideration.

____________________________________________________________________________

How You Can Join Us and What you Get

  1. You can contribute today AND get your test kit!  Your investment in this new, pain-free testing method will help change the way heavy metal screening is conducted, and could contribute to a greater change in testing methods beyond heavy metals.  Help take us from blood to oral fluids by making a donation today.  Most of our perk packages include an oral fluid screening test kit.  Please Note:  Our lab is currently located at the University of Massachusetts, Boston, MA (UMASS) and is a research laboratory, not a production lab.  Our fundraising campaign will enable us to raise the money to bring our own production lab to fruition. Kits are assembled and ready to mail! But can’t be sent out until we reach our funding mark or the campaign comes to an end in early September.
  2. Make some noise! Ask your family, friends, and co-workers to help spread the word about our Indiegogo crowdfunding campaign. Check out Indiegogo's easy to use share tools above on top left side of the page.
  3. Stay connected. Check back often as our campaign success unfolds and we talk more about the new initiatives that you are helping to fund. Connect with OFT Labs through our Website, Facebook, Twitter, YouTube (all found below), and/or Follow our Indiegogo page (top left side of page).

            FORGING THE WAY

_____________________________________________________________________________

OUR STORY

Meet Ed and Gene, the founders of OFT Labs and creators of a revolutionary testing method that will nullify the need for blood draws for heavy metal testing, replacing it with an oral fluid swab test.

These two South Jersey natives have been best friends since Kindergarten.  That’s right, they knew each other way back when stick-ball was the game to play and they remember the first person that had a TV on their block.  Marriages, children, career changes, life changes, and now grandchildren:  they have weathered them together through decades of friendship. Learn more about our story and roots!


_____________________________________________________________________________

Company History:  Where did this concept of testing with dignity come from?

Ed and Gene founded Oral Fluid Testing (OFT) Laboratories, LLC in 2007.  For ten years they ran a company that provided pulmonary testing and drug and alcohol screening for various companies.  The US Department of Transportation was one of their largest clients.  This niche market allowed them a gateway into building safer working environments.  Almost immediately, the team identified major challenges with the accuracy of the industry-standard urine test. First, the large number of options for tests to be tampered with, thus skewing the tests’ results, were well-known and widely used.  A rapidly developing market was flooding health food and vitamin stores; drinks, powders, and shakes designed to assist donors in beating a test, in addition to many well-known tricks from experienced test-takers, was making accurate testing more difficult.  Second, the undignified nature of providing urine collection is embarrassing and opens the door to accusations of sexual harassment and embarrassment.

Blood draws are the second most common type of diagnostic test. They are painful, create medical waste, risk potential infections, and are overall inconvenient and costly.  Eventually oral fluid testing was introduced, and Ed and Gene diligently set to work designing a procedure to collect oral fluid samples with DOT standard collection procedures in order to ensure accuracy and security of the sample and paper work.  This process identified major challenges with the collection process and demonstrated saliva test results were even easier to manipulate. While collaborating with several laboratories, Ed and Gene had scientists compare a lab-based urine test with some of the saliva tests on the market. A surprisingly high number of the saliva tests were coming back as false negatives; the saliva test was being beat as well.  Gene and Ed couldn’t help but imagine there were better, easier options.

_____________________________________________________________________________
We appreciate your support to help make this pain-free Oral Fluid Test the new standard for heavy metals screening!
Resources:

CDC Lead Education
OSHA Heavy Metal Information
American Lead Poisoning Help Association
South Jersey Magazine, August 2014, Forging the Way, A new way of doing medical testing opens up a world of possibilities
South Jersey Magazine, April 2015, A Big Test
TOXYScreen
OFT Labs, L.L.C.

Disclaimer:

"Delivery of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed." 
Please note; we are very confident that we will deliver to you all.
Thanks so much for all your amazing support and contributions,
Gene Elwell and Edward Eckert

You take a sample (painless, easy, simple) and you mail it back. We send you the results by mail and/or email.
____________________________________________________________________________  
Benefits of TOXYScreenToxyscreen is a home kit to test lead and heavy metals screening test for you, your family, and even your pets.  The use of a needle is eliminated, creating a pain-free testing method.  The risk of infection, anemia, and thrombosis are eliminated.  The test is conducted by a quick swab of the gum line, compared to the time consuming and painful process of having a nurse squeeze your finger until a large enough blood specimen is obtained.  The test can be conducted in the safety of your home, eliminating the hassle of scheduling an appointment and visiting a doctor’s office or lab.  It is pain-free, fast, efficient, and accurate. With approval from Food and Drug Administration (FDA) and Clinical Laboratory Improvement Amendments (CLIA) (please see Use of Funds section below for details), this test can be commercially available for lead and heavy metal testing that can be conducted at your medical facility, school, sport facility, manufacturing/processing facility, power plant, construction site, day care, etc by your company safety director with exceptional benefits.
The testing is painless. No fear and anxiety of a blood draw.
The specimen is obtained quickly, unlike the blood draw, which requires the phlebotomist to squeeze the donors finger until a large enough specimen is collected.
A licensed phlebotomist is not needed because individuals or internal personnel, trained to collect samples, easily conduct the test without the risk of being exposed to blood borne hazard.
No risk of infection, anemia, or thrombosis for the donor.
Personnel can be tested by your company Safety Director with exceptional benefits and cost savings.
There is no medical waste.  Oral fluid is not considered a biohazard, thus disposal costs are substantially reduced. The test kit is environmentally friendly and its plastic container can easily be recycled.






Samples do not require special handling or preservatives. Once oral fluid is collected, it does not have to be refrigerated. This is an advantage if collecting in remote areas such as third world countries. Testing can be performed anywhere in the world.

The testing is inexpensive. The at-cost value of the test is equivalent to a blood test.  It would not be an additional financial burden to provide the test if it was covered by insurance companies.
Sizable direct savings result from reduced donor wait time. There is no need to coax children into subjecting themselves to a finger stick to collect a capillary blood specimen. There is no need to travel to a doctor or lab with an elderly relative or individual with disability.
Oral fluid specimen collection is quick and easy. An experienced, trained collector could collect up to 20 specimens per hour!
The testing is private.  All samples are sent to OFT Laboratories to be analyzed.  Results are confirmed via an ICP/MASS SPEC technology.
The test can be completed in your own home or at your place of business/work.
No equipment is required beyond the swab kit, making this test a viable option for providing testing in third world countries.

Your Privacy is very important to us: Your Privacy is protected by de-identifying the samples on receipt, sending you your unique bar-code, and performing all downstream data analyses only with that bar-code. All information is handled under HIPAA compliance program. We will not store your personally identifying information in any database or release it on the internet in any way, but we will take all reasonable precautions to avoid inadvertent identification of participants. Transfer of materials to other sites is covered by code access agreements. If you have any questions, please email us at  customerservice@toxyscreen.com 
_____________________________________________________________________________Use of FundsEd and Gene believe in the technology they have discovered, and their mission and goal is the development of analytical techniques and instruments for identification and measurements of chemicals in biological and non-biological matrices.  By providing easy collection and accurate measurements of a wide range of organic and inorganic substances, OFT hopes to become the international standard and resource center for those industries requiring compliance testing, surveillance and monitoring testing.  This is why we need your supportHopefully, you are inspired by the opportunities oral fluid testing has already proven to hold, and you will choose to be part of this paradigm shift in medical testing.  Your pledged funds will be used to integrate OFT’s heavy metals test into the current market and expand oral fluid testing beyond heavy metals.  OFT has hundreds of possible markets for expansion including medical offices, independent labs, schools, airlines, the hospitality industry, athlete testing, military personnel, MEDICAID recipients, and employers who drug test.  With further clinical trials, they hope to expand oral fluid metals testing to other heavy metals, steroid testing in sports, drug testing in fatal accidents, and examining its potential for identifying different types of cancers. Our highest priority, with your support, is to seek FDA and CLIA approval, which would allow doctors to offer the test to patients and would begin the process of obtaining approval for coverage by insurance companies.  The FDA approves laboratory tests for screening diseases or conditions, and Toxyscreen needs this approval in order to be accepted as a lead and heavy metal screening test beyond home screening.  CLIA provides certification and oversight of clinical laboratory testing, and will be required once OFT Labs begins providing testing beyond the studies conducted at University of Massachusetts, Boston.  OFT Labs is currently in the process of seeking FDA approval via their team of lawyers.This requires research, time, paperwork, and promotion of the test. With enough funding, OFT Labs can license the oral fluid screening test to state, private, and hospital laboratories, providing onsite, or at minimal, regional testing facilities in order to increase efficiency of test to provide quicker results.  We will also have to address debt and expenses acquired from obtaining the patent, studies, and internal research.__________________________________________________________________________Your pledge funds will be used to:
manufacture the kits to collect your sample and analyze the results (which includes the purchasing reagents, ICP/MS equipment.
design and development the website.
hire key management and outstanding lab personnel.
conduct additional clinical trials.
research and develop capital for supplies, additional lab equipment, and training in order to expand into other states.
seek FDA and CLIA approval (costs include lawyer fees for communicating with FDA, travel, and promotion funds).
build and/or rent new testing facilities, in order to expand opportunities, increasing the efficiency of the test to provide quicker results.
settle previous debt acquired from obtaining the patent, printing and marketing Toxyscreen packaging, and initial work with University lab to conduct the study.
conduct studies in low income communities.
We are looking for contributors who believe in our product and can help us bring it to market.  By choosing to donate, you will be part of a fundamental change in the way testing is conducted.  The potential is clear - painless, accurate oral fluid testing for heavy metals is on the horizon, and you can be part of ushering in this change.  These funds will help families identify lead poisoning early, avoiding long term medical problems, and will allow companies to provide easy, safe, effective testing to their employees, ensuring their health and safety.  The benefits are boundless.  Thank you for your consideration.____________________________________________________________________________How You Can Join Us and What you Get
You can contribute today AND get your test kit!  Your investment in this new, pain-free testing method will help change the way heavy metal screening is conducted, and could contribute to a greater change in testing methods beyond heavy metals.  Help take us from blood to oral fluids by making a donation today.  Most of our perk packages include an oral fluid screening test kit.  Please Note:  Our lab is currently located at the University of Massachusetts, Boston, MA (UMASS) and is a research laboratory, not a production lab.  Our fundraising campaign will enable us to raise the money to bring our own production lab to fruition. Kits are assembled and ready to mail! But can’t be sent out until we reach our funding mark or the campaign comes to an end in early September.
Make some noise! Ask your family, friends, and co-workers to help spread the word about our Indiegogo crowdfunding campaign. Check out Indiegogo's easy to use share tools above on top left side of the page.
Stay connected. Check back often as our campaign success unfolds and we talk more about the new initiatives that you are helping to fund. Connect with OFT Labs through our Website, Facebook, Twitter, YouTube (all found below), and/or Follow our Indiegogo page (top left side of page).

            FORGING THE WAY
_____________________________________________________________________________

OUR STORY
Meet Ed and Gene, the founders of OFT Labs and creators of a revolutionary testing method that will nullify the need for blood draws for heavy metal testing, replacing it with an oral fluid swab test.

These two South Jersey natives have been best friends since Kindergarten.  That’s right, they knew each other way back when stick-ball was the game to play and they remember the first person that had a TV on their block.  Marriages, children, career changes, life changes, and now grandchildren:  they have weathered them together through decades of friendship. Learn more about our story and roots!


_____________________________________________________________________________Company History:  Where did this concept of testing with dignity come from?
Ed and Gene founded Oral Fluid Testing (OFT) Laboratories, LLC in 2007.  For ten years they ran a company that provided pulmonary testing and drug and alcohol screening for various companies.  The US Department of Transportation was one of their largest clients.  This niche market allowed them a gateway into building safer working environments.  Almost immediately, the team identified major challenges with the accuracy of the industry-standard urine test. First, the large number of options for tests to be tampered with, thus skewing the tests’ results, were well-known and widely used.  A rapidly developing market was flooding health food and vitamin stores; drinks, powders, and shakes designed to assist donors in beating a test, in addition to many well-known tricks from experienced test-takers, was making accurate testing more difficult.  Second, the undignified nature of providing urine collection is embarrassing and opens the door to accusations of sexual harassment and embarrassment.
Blood draws are the second most common type of diagnostic test. They are painful, create medical waste, risk potential infections, and are overall inconvenient and costly.  Eventually oral fluid testing was introduced, and Ed and Gene diligently set to work designing a procedure to collect oral fluid samples with DOT standard collection procedures in order to ensure accuracy and security of the sample and paper work.  This process identified major challenges with the collection process and demonstrated saliva test results were even easier to manipulate. While collaborating with several laboratories, Ed and Gene had scientists compare a lab-based urine test with some of the saliva tests on the market. A surprisingly high number of the saliva tests were coming back as false negatives; the saliva test was being beat as well.  Gene and Ed couldn’t help but imagine there were better, easier options._____________________________________________________________________________
We appreciate your support to help make this pain-free Oral Fluid Test the new standard for heavy metals screening!
Resources:CDC Lead EducationOSHA Heavy Metal InformationAmerican Lead Poisoning Help AssociationSouth Jersey Magazine, August 2014, Forging the Way, A new way of doing medical testing opens up a world of possibilitiesSouth Jersey Magazine, April 2015, A Big TestTOXYScreenOFT Labs, L.L.C.Disclaimer:
"Delivery of
rewards/perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed." Please note; we are
very confident that we will deliver to you all.Thanks so much for all
your amazing support and contributions,Gene Elwell and Edward
Eckert

story:
DESIGNED BY DOCTORS FOR DOCTORS...

Finally - A single medical record

How many times have your filled out your medical history? Almost every single visit to your doctor, right? How about the fact that your doctor does not have the most up-to-date information? Our system provides:

  • A LIVE Electronic Healthcare Record that all physicians, nurses and medical personnel can securely access from anywhere and whenever they are authorized access.
  • Did you move? Did your phone number change? Securely complete and update your medical history in the convenience of your own home. Your medical record will immediately be updated with the latest information.
  • Anytime your medical record is accessed, you receive notification.
  • Doctor B has access to the same information as doctors A and C. No need to write things down for the next doctor to see or to transfer data, which is costly and time consuming.


Saving Lives & Setting Standards

Paper medical records are hard and costly to share between physicians, and even the current electronic records in place today are problematic.  Proprietary or closed systems and information is often incompatible between systems. Many systems currently in place today were built using 1966 technology (MUMPS) with the only update being in 1995, two years before the first smartphone was introduced.

It was disclosed in a Senate hearing on July 17 2014  that:

  • In the United States over 400,000 people die every year due to medical mistakes
  • That equates to 1096 people life lost EVERY SINGLE DAY
  • Preventable medical errors persist as the No. 3 killer in the U.S. - third only to heart disease and cancer
  • There is minimal standards in place for electronic medical records

Medical Fraud

Healthcare fraud costs the country tens of billions of dollars every year. This is one of the reasons why our healthcare insurance premiums increase every year. It’s a rising threat, with national healthcare expenditure estimates exceeding $3.6 trillion in 2014, with spending continuing to outpace inflation. US health spending growth is projected to average 5.8% annually through 2022.
  • In 2014 the FBI estimated that Medicare (our tax dollars ) paid over $98 Billion in fraudulent claims.
  • The FBI also estimates that private insurers (Blue Cross, Aetna, Athena, etc.) paid well over $600 Billion last year. These numbers continue to increase.
It is estimated that using our Electronic Healthcare Records Management System can provide at least 35% savings. This is due to built-in security and fraud prevention - smartcard and biometrics. We can help prevent fraud on the front-end at the patient/doctor visit before it occurs.


Create a Cohesive Environment

We are creating a united and uniform platform that allows the insurer, the physician and the patient to work together in a single environment for the betterment of the patient. Allowing communication in real-time – Imagine that!

Meet the Executive Team

We have a strong management team at World Inter-Med. We are lucky to have experienced business leaders, doctors, surgeons, dentists, wall-street financial analysts and excellent developers and programmers.  Learn more about our Executive Team.

Saves Time

In a typical week a physician works between 120-130 hours. On average, a physician spends 30 hours a week seeing patients. Most of their time is actually spent doing other tasks, like reviewing lab results, test, x-rays, etc.

Our system is simple to use and information easily found. With our built-in voice recognition software, the physician can still enter data into your medical record hands-free while examining the patient. As well our system is simple and easy to use. No more complicated systems to figure out with long training durations.


Our Partners

World Inter-Med is committed to building strategic partnerships and relationships. Below is our core partnerships:

Dell Computers – Founders50 / Dell has identified the group as the 50 startups and founders to watch and is putting its power behind them to help them reach their objectives. Dell will provide the companies – all on the verge of becoming leaders in their industries – access to an exclusive marketing effort and associated resources designed to grow their businesses.

Microsoft – BizSpark / BizSpark is a global program that gives tech startups cloud hosting, free software, support and visibility to help them succeed. Over 100,000 startups from 165+ countries have joined BizSpark.

Physicians Desk Reference / – the trusted authority on drug information – provides industry-leading services that benefit providers, EHR/ePrescribing partners, bio/pharmaceutical manufacturers, and other industry stakeholders. PDR’s innovative offerings deliver drug information and patient support services that enhance the end-user experience.

Nuance – 360 Developer Platform /  Global, enterprise-class development ecosystem that allows independent software vendors (ISVs) and internal development teams at provider and payer organizations to embed secure clinical speech recognition and clinical language understanding (CLU) functionality into their healthcare solutions.

Thank you for your time and consideration - we look forward to sharing our journey with you...

story:
Description of the project in Polish - click on this link

Few years ago we wondered why so many talented kids sports is not noticed. Often so many years of work, effort, and - what is also important - financing by the parents. At some point, a young man doesn't want to fulfill himself / herself in sport anymore.

After many conversations with representatives of various social groups, analyzing many cases we have come to the conclusion that one of the main reasons of this situation is being unnoticed and unappreciated properly by people from the sports industry, or even by peers.

We decided to develop a system that will help all the kids, especially those from poorer backgrounds, in building their sporting career, making dreams come true and above all in improving themselves.

With given time we began to understand that this platform will be useful not only for kids, but actually for all people interested in sport and we worked out the right tools for each group to do it.

And that's the DBXSport project.

It is a service for all people associated with sport, especially young athletes (age from 5 to 17) and trainers. It also has a wide offer for:

  • Fans
  • Sttendants of young Athletes
  • Sport Staff
  • Journalists
  • Scouts
  • Sports Clubs
  • Judges
  • Other groups interested in sport (Producers, Organizations, etc.)

It helps to develop children and young people by giving them a lot of tools to improve their skills. It provides access to the best coaches and trainers from all over the world. It allows you to compete on many levels, from the courtyard and the district until even the whole world.

It makes coaches and clubs easy to find and train talented players. They can track the progress of individual users and sign contracts with them. It also gives coaches the tools for daily work in sport (i.e. how to do a training, develop sets of exercises, communication with the players, the club and other people who are in the database - the club staff, sports doctors, parents of young players) and gives real opportunities to make money by performing the daily sports activities.

The hopes and plans related to sports are universal for every young person in the world.

Basic things that he / she struggle with are: learning how to play, joining a group, having the opportunity to compete and dialogue, and BEING NOTICED by professional sport world.

The high sports skills transfer in high salaries and great social ennoblement. That's why young people and their parents particularly in poorer regions try to accomplish this, in their opinion - simple life career path.

And DBXSport service makes this goal easier.

DBXSport feeds an universal, global need of being noticed, especially among people who are not rich.

Our project has an effective and tried mechanism to gain a large number of active users. It gives a real opportunity for training in the chosen field of sport.

The main target groups for DBXSport are:

YOUNG ATHLETES (mostly amateurs) in the age of 5-17 years and trainers.

  • Ability to participate in the group, regional and world rankings, statistics,
  • Which encourages and facilitates the competition and makes easier being noticed by the people involved in professional sport,
  • A real opportunity to earn,
  • Mechanisms to find a sponsor,
  • Ability to take part in competitions and other service events,
  • Possibility to organize events and invite other users,
  • Allows education (not just sport),
  • Functional tools for daily work, such as calendar, statistics, communications system integrated with social networking sites,
  • Enables parents to track children's sports work, communicate with the coach and club,
  • A lot of other attractive features, including cheap shopping in a new and innovative system.

YOUTH ACTIVE PLAYERS (age 5-17 years) - the main group of recipients.

In the EU and North America's population of this basic group of recipients - approx. 130 million people in the age group of 5-17. The number of active players in this range for the EU and the US is approx. 40% of 130mln so it's 52 million customers.

87% of young people in this age group use the Internet.

So, the basic group of recipients for the site is approx. 45mln adolescents (5-17 years - EU and US).

The service has also an offer for other groups related to the target group: parents, coaches, players, sports clubs, sport staff, fans. Each group receives profiled account.

PARENTS

For one woman falls 1.5 children. With 45 million children and youth a target group is approx. 30 million of attendants. Approx. 60% of adults use the Internet. Group of parents interested in this service makes at least 18 millions in the EU and the USA.

ATHLETES

Service gives even mature athletes an interesting offer to improve their skills, earn and participate in the service events.

The world's most popular sport is football. In a football tournament were involved 265 million athletes, and 5 million referees in 2006.

The service is directed not only to football. At the beginning it foresees at least 2-4 fields for team sports - football, American football, basketball, baseball and badminton.

In total, a group of sportsmen interested in the offer of DBXSport is more than 200 million.

SPORT STAFF

The service also integrates people who works as a sport staff.

A sport staff (physiotherapist, masseur, psychologist, dietitian, lawyer, etc) gets useful tools for their daily work:

  • Interactive timeline connected with players, coaches, clubs,
  • The ability to "sell" their services within the service,
  • Job searching / changing tools etc.

Market of the sport staff is more than 25 millions of people in Europe and the USA.

TRAINERS

Coaches as crucial group for the service will receive a fully free functional account with tools for work, but also to earn. As a result, they will appreciate the service offer and invite their players to it.

  • Sports Clubs
  • Media
  • Companies from the sports industry
  • Sports and social organizations
  • Fans

Competition - The basic problem and the need for the athlete is his / her VISIBILITY, whose components are competition, the need of success, education and scouting.

A child with sports talent often has no incentive to continuous development. After some time he / she experiences discouragement, and as a result he / she wasted his / her talent.

Parents try to solve the problem through continuous involvement of their attention, motivation to further work (including video recording and posting them on YouTube, contests, competitions which are often held in bigger cities). But often, after some time comes the tiredness and they give up sport.

The need of success - One of the main reasons for giving up sport by young players is the limited ability to compare their achievements with others, compete, or the opportunity doesn't bring spectacular effects (it is not noticed by somebody more than the local environment). Currently the competition in many environments has limited range of influence.

Social organizations, youth, and parents organize local competitions. Winning teams rarely bring novice athletes something more than the satisfaction and a plastic cup. It also affects discouragement and resignation of their sporting career after some times.

Education - The problem of young athletes is an access to professional trainer staff. Often, despite investing in sports development and education of their children, the parents give up without seeing opportunities for further development of the child with the help of experienced trainers and other specialists.

Scouting - Headhunters try to find talented young athletes. Then they sign a contract, or monitor their progress. The problem is the selectivity of observation. Seekers cannot constantly keep track of all young athletes, so they often overlook a potential talent.

Also parents and attendants in order to help their own child's sports career try to get in touch with them. Taking the time and attention also significantly affects the cost of raising a young athlete pursuing a career.

These are the main problems faced by young athletes and their parents.

The problems have been identified based on a series of public consultations - interviews with different groups - parents, young people (age 5-15 years), coaches and athletes (soccer, badminton, basketball), managing small sports clubs.

As part of the research project we done interviews with coaches i.e. from Legia Warszawa - Poland, Leeds United - GB, with badminton, basketball coaches and players, lawyers working for basketball first league clubs in Poland and psychologists, sports workers, parents of children involved in sport.

Scouting - DBXSport gives clubs and coaches free database searching tools. They can thanks to them constantly monitor the environment of young athletes as well as a tracking software shares on the financial markets.

On the other hand, athletes are sure that their achievements can be spotted by scouts, they have an incentive to work and actively participate in the service. If they aren't well off this service gives them the opportunity to search for sponsors.

Success - DBXSport will create sport events, and give the opportunity to train with the best through participation in sports camps sponsored by DBXSport.

Participation in the rankings and statistics will mobilize young people to work hard and build their willingness to pursue in this area.

Education - the tools offered on this website will allow young athletes to hone their skills. They give an easy access to professional and even famous coaches and trainers around the world.

Competition - DBXSport gives unlimited possibilities to compete. The global nature of the service will allow you to compare the skills of the users from different countries, at different levels, from the courtyard to the whole world.

Paweł Miśkiewicz - Sports journalist, former football and handball player. Sales representative.

Paweł Wilk - Sociologist, founder of "Booster" marketing agency (booster.pl). Supporting local sports communities for many years.

Paweł Leszczyński - Chemistry and company management student. The former footballer. Sales representative in the direct sales companies (presentations and sale of assisting device).

Joined up:

  • Paweł Orzechowski & Marcin Kozów - Programmers and entrepreneurs for years associated with the Internet industry. Currently they run their own business providing professional web development services (effectivity.pl).
  • Krzysztof Kowalski - F.H.U BAKO, Gadu-Gadu S.A., Randstad Sp. z o.o.
  • Marcin Lipiński - lawyer
  • Maciej Kubica - stuntman, athlete, actively working in the advertising industry
  • Cezary Olbrycht - long time sport journalist in Canal+

A lot of other attractive features, including cheap shopping in a new and innovative system.






YOUTH ACTIVE PLAYERS (age 5-17 years) - the main group of recipients.


In the EU and North America's population of this basic group of recipients - approx. 130 million people in the age group of 5-17. The number of active players in this range for the EU and the US is approx. 40% of 130mln so it's 52 million customers.


87% of young people in this age group use the Internet.


So, the basic group of recipients for the site is approx. 45mln adolescents (5-17 years - EU and US).


The service has also an offer for other groups related to the target group: parents, coaches, players, sports clubs, sport staff, fans. Each group receives profiled account.




PARENTS


For one woman falls 1.5 children. With 45 million children and youth a target group is approx. 30 million of attendants. Approx. 60% of adults use the Internet. Group of parents interested in this service makes at least 18 millions in the EU and the USA.




ATHLETES


Service gives even mature athletes an interesting offer to improve their skills, earn and participate in the service events.


The world's most popular sport is football. In a football tournament were involved 265 million athletes, and 5 million referees in 2006.


The service is directed not only to football. At the beginning it foresees at least 2-4 fields for team sports - football, American football, basketball, baseball and badminton.


In total, a group of sportsmen interested in the offer of DBXSport is more than 200 million.




SPORT STAFF


The service also integrates people who works as a sport staff.


A sport staff (physiotherapist, masseur, psychologist, dietitian, lawyer, etc) gets useful tools for their daily work:


Interactive timeline connected with players, coaches, clubs,
The ability to "sell" their services within the service,
Job searching / changing tools etc.


Market of the sport staff is more than 25 millions of people in Europe and the USA.




TRAINERS


Coaches as crucial group for the service will receive a fully free functional account with tools for work, but also to earn. As a result, they will appreciate the service offer and invite their players to it.






Sports Clubs
Media
Companies from the sports industry
Sports and social organizations
Fans




Competition - The basic problem and the need for the athlete is his / her VISIBILITY, whose components are competition, the need of success, education and scouting.


A child with sports talent often has no incentive to continuous development. After some time he / she experiences discouragement, and as a result he / she wasted his / her talent.


Parents try to solve the problem through continuous involvement of their attention, motivation to further work (including video recording and posting them on YouTube, contests, competitions which are often held in bigger cities). But often, after some time comes the tiredness and they give up sport.


The need of success - One of the main reasons for giving up sport by young players is the limited ability to compare their achievements with others, compete, or the opportunity doesn't bring spectacular effects (it is not noticed by somebody more than the local environment). Currently the competition in many environments has limited range of influence.


Social organizations, youth, and parents organize local competitions. Winning teams rarely bring novice athletes something more than the satisfaction and a plastic cup. It also affects discouragement and resignation of their sporting career after some times.




Education - The problem of young athletes is an access to professional trainer staff. Often, despite investing in sports development and education of their children, the parents give up without seeing opportunities for further development of the child with the help of experienced trainers and other specialists.




Scouting - Headhunters try to find talented young athletes. Then they sign a contract, or monitor their progress. The problem is the selectivity of observation. Seekers cannot constantly keep track of all young athletes, so they often overlook a potential talent.


Also parents and attendants in order to help their own child's sports career try to get in touch with them. Taking the time and attention also significantly affects the cost of raising a young athlete pursuing a career.


These are the main problems faced by young athletes and their parents.


The problems have been identified based on a series of public consultations - interviews with different groups - parents, young people (age 5-15 years), coaches and athletes (soccer, badminton, basketball), managing small sports clubs.


As part of the research project we done interviews with coaches i.e. from Legia Warszawa - Poland, Leeds United - GB, with badminton, basketball coaches and
players, lawyers working for basketball first league clubs in Poland and psychologists, sports workers, parents of children involved in sport.






Scouting - DBXSport gives clubs and coaches free database searching tools. They can thanks to them constantly monitor the environment of young athletes as well as a tracking software shares on the financial markets.


On the other hand, athletes are sure that their achievements can be spotted by scouts, they have an incentive to work and actively participate in the service. If they aren't well off this service gives them the opportunity to search for sponsors.



Success - DBXSport will create sport events, and give the opportunity to train with the best through participation in sports camps sponsored by DBXSport.


Participation in the rankings and statistics will mobilize young people to work hard and build their willingness to pursue in this area.



Education - the tools offered on this website will allow young athletes to hone their skills. They give an easy access to professional and even famous coaches and trainers around the world.



Competition - DBXSport gives unlimited possibilities to compete. The global nature of the service will allow you to compare the skills of the users from different countries, at different levels, from the courtyard to the whole world.








Paweł Miśkiewicz - Sports journalist, former football and handball player. Sales representative.


Paweł Wilk - Sociologist, founder of "Booster" marketing agency (booster.pl). Supporting local sports communities for many years.


Paweł Leszczyński - Chemistry and company management student. The former footballer. Sales representative in the direct sales companies (presentations and sale of assisting device).



Joined up:



Paweł Orzechowski & Marcin Kozów - Programmers and entrepreneurs for years associated with the Internet industry. Currently they run their own business providing professional web development services (effectivity.pl).

Krzysztof Kowalski - F.H.U BAKO, Gadu-Gadu S.A., Randstad Sp. z o.o.

Marcin Lipiński - lawyer


Maciej Kubica - stuntman, athlete, actively working in the advertising industry

Cezary Olbrycht - long time sport journalist in Canal+

story:
* * * * * Braced back or neck ? * * * * *

We have the Solution !

                                                The Triomag Magnetsystem.


The Triomag is a new innovative magnetic product. It owns the strongest commercially available magnets. 

In more than 3 years of development and many tests it has been proven that the Triomag is very successfully in using for the most common muscle tension. This resulted in today's triangular shape.

The Triomag convince not only because of its small size and weight, but also through its strong and deep effect on magnetic field. So, it was measured conventionally to a magnetic peak of approximately 12 cm


The Triomag is designed in such a manner,  that it fits to almost all body shapes.

Initial success occurs after approximately 2 - 3 hours of use. The Triomag is also very helpful to unblock muscle tensions in the regions of lumbar, neck, shoulders, etc. For exampel in case of a neck tension it is recommended to place the Triomag both on the left and the right side to have the best results, because muscles always work together.

Two pieces of Triomag can be placed both-sided of the garment, so no other utilities (such as adhesive tape) are necessary. The manufacturer Trionis recommends a unit of 8 pieces Triomags.

The Triomag is a quality product made in Germany and is manufactured there to 100%.

The Triomag is made of very robust plastic from food-safe and therefore especially skin-friendly and can hardly be destroyed, i.e. by force.

The Triomag is produced by a complex milling of manual work.

The Triomag is designed for muscle tension, in doubt please contact a doctor (specialist).

Touch the bracing area by gently pressing for example from the thumb. Place the center of the Triomags (preferably the white side of the North Pole) on the center in the field of tension.

Now, add a second or third Triomag, so that they can develop their magnetic properties in the in the border area. Please alternate the white (north) and black (South Pole) colours.

The Triomag is a magnetic product with very strong magnetic fields (1.29 to 1.32 Tesla). This product has been tested over 3 years, there were no negative effects observed.

However, negative impacts can never be completely excluded. The safety instructions for handling with strong magnets are included.

In doubt, please always contact a doctor (specialist).

The Triomag was developed by the company Trionis and is a wellness product.

The Triomag is not a medical product!

There will also be given no promise of healing.

GERMAN


* * * * * Rücken oder Nacken verspannt ? * * * * *

Wir haben die Lösung gefunden !

Das Triomag Magnetsystem.


Der Triomag ist ein neues innovatives Magnetprodukt. Er verfügt über die stärksten marktüblichen Magnete. In mehr als 3 Jahren Entwicklungszeit und vielen Tests wurde er erfolgreich gegen die üblichsten Muskelverspannungen getestet. Hierbei ergab sich die heutige Dreieck Form.

Der Triomag überzeugt nicht nur wegen seiner geringen Baugröße und Gewicht, sondern auch durch sein starkes und tiefgehendes Magnetfeld.
So wurde bei ihm mit herkömmlichen Messinstrumenten
eine Magnetspitze von ca. 12 cm gemessen.


Der Triomag ist so konzipiert, dass er sich fast allen Körperformen anpassen kann.

Erste Erfolge bei der Anwendung treten ca. nach 2 – 3 Stunden auf.

Der Triomag vermag auch sehr starke Muskelverspannungen z.B. in der Lenden Gegend, Nacken, Schultern zu lösen. Bei der Anwendung z.B. gegen Nackenverspannungen hat sich gezeigt, dass ein beidseitiges auflegen linker und rechter Seite zu besseren Ergebnissen führt, da Muskeln  immer im Verbund miteinander arbeiten.


Der Triomag kann ab 2 Stück durch das Kleidungsstück gehalten eingesetzt werden und bedarf dadurch keiner weitern Hilfsmittel wie z.B. hautfreundliches Klebeband.

Wir die Hersteller Firma Trionis empfehlen jedoch ein Packet von min. 8 Stück.

Der Triomag ist ein Qualitätsprodukt made in Germany und wird auch dort zu 100% gefertigt.

Der Triomag ist aus sehr robusten Lebensmittelechten Kunststoff und daher besonders hautfreundlich gefertigt und ist praktisch nur unter Gewaltanwendung zerstörbar.

Der Triomag wird durch ein aufwendiges Fräsverfahren in Handarbeit hergestellt.

Der Triomag ist für Muskelverspannungen konzipiert, im Zweifelsfall kontaktieren sie bitte immer einen Arzt (Fachmann).

Tasten sie den Verspannungsbereich durch sanftes Drücken z.B. mit dem Daumen ab. Legen sie den Mittelpunkt des Triomags (vorzugsweise die weiße Seite den Nordpol) auf das Zentrum des Verspannungsbereiches.

Legen sie nun einen zweiten bzw. dritten Triomag hinzu, so dass sich diese im Randbereich anziehen. Die Farben weiß (Nordpol) und schwarz (Südpol) wechseln sich ab!

Es handelt sich hier um ein Magnetprodukt mit sehr starken Magnetfeldern (1,29 - 1,32 Tesla). Dieses Produkt wurde über 3 Jahre getestet, dabei wurden keinerlei negative Auswirkungen festgestellt.

Negative Auswirkungen können wir jedoch nie ganz ausgeschlossen werden. Die Sicherheitshinweise im Umgang mit starken Magneten liegen dem Produkt bei.

Im Zweifelsfall kontaktieren sie bitte immer einen Arzt (Fachmann).

Der Triomag wurde von der Firma Trionis entwickelt und ist ein Wellness Produkt.

Der Triomag ist kein medizinisches Produkt!

Es werden auch keine Heilversprechen gegeben.

story:
Safe effective natural remedies in delicious soothing frosty pops

Common medications for children who are ill or teething can be unpleasant, messy, and even risky. And the child’s reluctance to take the medicine in turn stresses parents. Fortunately, when Rachel Wilson’s daughter Julia was teething she was inspired to develop a better way. 




She dissolved safe effective natural medicine in ice pops tubes and then froze them. 

Encouraged by the great feedback from friends who tried the teething remedy, she manufactured a trial run of Teething Ice. 


Certified Clinical Nutritionist Martie Whittekin helped Rachel market that product and became excited about using the method to solve other health problems. Her radio show company, Healthy by Nature, became a partner to form a new entity, Remedy Ice. Now we need you to be a member of the team.

We are passionate about making Remedy Ice pops available to parents nationwide. Children love them and besides the benefit of the medicine, the cooling of the ice itself is especially soothing for problems like fever, cough/sore throat and teething. 

So very close…

We’ve assembled a great team, including a partner with extensive experience in all levels of the natural foods distribution channel. We’ve finalized formulas, designed boxes, sourced the manufacturing and planned the marketing. Just one thing…the type of machinery to make these second generation pops requires very large runs. So, we need additional funds for the manufacturing phase of the national launch. Our goal of $120,000 will take care of that and provide funds to set up the distribution system.

Remedy Ice is covering its minimal overhead and is very frugal. Therefore, all of the donations will be used to make product available. Should we do a happy dance because we exceeded our goal, the additional contributed funds will go toward preparing other products for launch and some will be used to donate finished products to the needy.

Your Help Might Make All the Difference

This is a unique opportunity to play a very important role in improving the way children get relief from the symptoms of common health problems and ease parents through what would ordinarily be a stressful time. (A recent scientific study showed that being generous is good for our health!)  Spreading the word is also extremely important to the success of this campaign and to the ultimate availability of these products.


Picture yourself on our page of heroes!

Please spread the excitement about this campaign by contacting friends in person or by email. It is very easy to share on social media sites by using the Indiegogo share tools!


More About Our Precious Perks

  • Although we are offering a wide variety of perks that we believe are valuable, it is not necessary to go that route. Straight up donations of any amount are greatly appreciated. Donations of up to $5 will receive a virtual high-five. Amounts higher than that can expect an excited thank you email and updates on the progress of the project. You can even let us know if you think of a perk we didn’t list that would suit you better.
  • Several perks are pre-orders of product in various quantities with increasing amounts of savings and coupons for future use. When Remedy Ice becomes common everywhere, our pioneering contributors will have bragging rights that they were the first to try Remedy Ice! (Remember that these remedies can be used by adults and as gifts.)
  • We are eager to tell the world about the folks who helped us launch. Our website will have permanent pages honoring our contributors.
  • At $60, you not only receive 1 box of each product and the other perks of the previous level, but also a high quality attractive T-shirt with the message: “Remedy Ice is So Cool”.
  • The e-book offered at $100 and above will contain science-based information about improving the health of children with foods and supplements. Martie will also include advice from a holistic pediatrician about home remedies and when to call the doctor for common childhood health issues. The book will retail for $9.95.
  • We invite contributors at the $500 level to become more permanent parts of the team. We will consult them if they like about important issues such as which new products to launch next. Make your voice heard.
  • At the $1,000 level, partner Martie Whittekin, a Certified Clinical Nutritionist and best-selling author with 30 years’ experience, is offering an in-depth 1-hour consultation on the donor’s personal health and nutrition. She will send a detailed history form and discuss health issues either by phone or in person the Dallas, TX area. After allowing a few weeks for recommendations to take effect, a 30-minute follow-up consultation will be schedules. The value of this perk is either $400 or priceless depending on what improvements result. Martie’s clients have been amazed at how complete a picture can be created by asking the right questions.
  • The most unusual, creative and fun perk is the option to have us put the photo of someone you love as the featured face on a case (12 boxes) of a product. Of course there are many other thank you perks at this $5,000 level.
  • Your generosity means the world to us. What would mean the most to you? A memorial section in the heroes page  of our website for someone? A special charitable program named in your honor? Your photo as a founding member on the wall of our offices? A whole bunch of product?  Name it. For $10K, If it is in our power to make it happen we will!


Remedy Ice Pops are So Cool!

  • Kids actually look forward to taking their medicine because it is a treat and yet Remedy Ice is so safe there is no danger from overdose.
  • No artificial colors or scary chemicals
  • Natural berry flavor chosen by a panel of children
  • Sweetened with natural low-calorie xylitol that helps prevent tooth decay
  • Shipped and stored at room temperature. Freeze as needed.
  • Use is not restricted to children. For example, have adult braces? Try the teething pops! And who wouldn’t want a soothing frosty treat when they have a fever or a sore throat?
  • Active ingredients are time-tested homeopathic remedies that support natural processes and gently signal the body to calm symptoms. That is in sharp contrast to harsh pharmaceutical drugs that typically force the body to shut down certain systems and may actually slow healing.
  • See additional information about the mode of action in the description of the individual products in Perks. Our initial product launch will include Fever, Cough/Sore throat, and Teething.
