story:
NOTA IMPORTANTE: Hemos explicado la campaña a Español e Ingles, pero por falta de espacio, la traducción en Holandés no la hemos podido añadir. Para aquellos que quieran leer la traducción en Holandés, os dejamos el enlace a nuestra página de Facebook: FleurAngel Yurta Camp, donde adjuntamos la traducción en Holandés. Gracias!
IMPORTANT NOTE: We made this campaign in Spanish and English, because unfortunately there was no space anymore for Dutch. For those who want to read the translation in Dutch, we leave the link to our Facebook page: FleurAngel Yurta Camp. Thank You!
BELANGRIJKE MEDEDELING: We hebben deze campagne in het Spaans en Engels gemaakt omdat er helaas geen plaats meer was voor Nederlands. Voor degene die de nederlandse vertalng willen lezen, dit is mogelijk via onze facebookpagina: FleurAngel Yurta Camp. Dankjewel!

Dos personas, dos culturas, dos vidas 

Two people, two cultures, two lives

un alma, un sueño!

a soul, a dream!


¿Cómo empezó todo?-How did it all?: “CAMINOFUNDING”
¡Hola!. Somos Fleur, Holandesa, y Ángel, Español. Nos conocimos a finales de noviembre de 2014 en el Camino de Santiago. Ángel era hospitalero voluntario en un bonito albergue cerca de León  (Albergue Verde) y Fleur una peregrina buscando su nuevo camino. Fue amor a primera vista, como si nos conociéramos de toda la vida. Ese momento cambió nuestras vidas por completo. Poco después, en febrero de 2015, Ángel decidió correr el riesgo, dejar toda su vida en Burgos, donde vivía entonces trabajando como profesor de Universidad, para empezar una nueva vida con Fleur en Holanda. Después de unos meses juntos en Holanda, es Fleur la que deja todo, y corre el riesgo, volviendo junto a Ángel a España a hacer realidad el sueño que juntos tuvieron en Holanda, el mismo día, por separado. UNA VISION: Crear un hogar-albergue para ofrecer nuestras capacidades a los que las necesiten, siendo pioneros en ello.

Hello!. We are Fleur, Dutch, and Angel, Spanish. We met in November 2014 in the Albergue near Leon (Albergue Verde) and Fleur a pilgrim seeking his new way. We are in love in the first moment, as if we knew of a lifetime. That moment changed our lives completely. Shortly afterwards, in February 2015, Angel decided to take a risk, leaving his entire life in Burgos, where he lived working as a university professor, to start a new life with Fleur in the Netherlands. After a few months together in the Netherlands, which leaves everything is Fleur, and take the risk, returning to Spain with Angel to realize the dream that together they had in the Netherlands the same day separately. A VISION: Create a home-Albergue to offer our skills to those who need them, being pioneers in this.

Después de tomar esta decisión, Ángel tuvo un sueño en el que hacían juntos el Camino de Santiago, consiguiendo el dinero necesario para crear el albergue, haciendo un “CAMINOFUNDING”. Ahora estamos en esa aventura. Haciendo el Camino de Santiago, el “Camino Francés”, como auténticos peregrinos, con una tienda de campaña y sin dinero, confiando en la generosidad de la gente, y procurando conseguir la confianza de los peregrinos y amigos que encontremos para que nos ayuden en este proyecto. Todo el dinero que podamos recaudar durante la aventura, será para financiar el proyecto. A su vez, queremos lanzar esta iniciativa a todo el mundo, no solo a los peregrinos y amigos que nos encuentren en persona. Para ello lanzamos esta campaña en   INDIEGOGO: “ALBERGUE DE YURTAS: FLEURANGEL YURTA CAMP”.

After making this decision, Angel had a dream that did together the Camino de Santiago, getting the money needed to build the dream, making a "CAMINOFUNDING". We are now in this adventure. Doing the “Camino de Santiago”, the "French Way" as genuine pilgrims, with a tent and without money, relying on the generosity of people, and trying to get the trust of pilgrims and find friends to assist us in this project. All the money that we raise for the adventure, is to finance the Albergue. In turn, we want to launch this initiative to everybody, not only to pilgrims and friends meet us in person. To do this we launched this INDIEGOGO campaign: “ALBERGUE DE YURTAS: FLEURANGEL YURTA CAMP”. 


     ¿Cual es vuestro sueño?-What is your dream?:  “FleurAngel Yurta Camp”

Ocho meses después de conocernos, hemos decidido vivir nuestro sueño:

Eight months after we met, we decided to live our dream:

Ofrecer un hogar-albergue en el Camino de Santiago. 

Offering a home-Albergue in the Camino de Santiago.

SU NOMBRE- THE NAME: FleurAngel Yurta Camp

Un albergue diferente, formado por acogedoras y sencillas tiendas Yurta Mongolas alrededor de un huerto ecológico. Un lugar especial en el que Fleur y Angel quieren transmitir su mensaje de amor a través de su estilo de vida.

A different hostel, with cozy and simple Mongoilan Yurt tents around an organic garden. A special place where we want to give our message of love through our lifestyle.

                                    

Un lugar que cualquiera puede visitar (peregrino o no), cuando quiera, y convivir así con Fleur y Angel el tiempo que sea preciso.

A place that all people can visit (pilgrim or not), at any time, and so live with Fleur and Angel as long as necessary.

El equipo que forman Fleur y Angel trabaja “desde dentro” y “desde fuera” en encontrar soluciones para las personas que necesitan un cambio de estilo de vida, tanto mental como nutricional, tanto de creencias y costumbres como de conocimientos de alimentación y hormonales. “Desde dentro” a través de la especialidad de Fleur (Especialista en Nutrición y equilibrio hormonal), y “desde fuera” a través de la especialidad de Ángel (inteligente, sensible y espiritual. Una combinación de coaching, empatía, experiencia personal, inteligencia, sensibilidad, honestidad, escucha profunda y comprensión de las circunstancias personales de cada uno, y su facilidad de encontrar conexiones que facilitan las soluciones necesarias). Fleur y Angel se compenetran perfectamente en este equipo ya que Fleur a su vez tiene una gran sensibilidad y aporta su ayuda desde el exterior, y Angel posee una experiencia nutricional y espiritual personal desde la que aporta ayuda desde el interior.

The team are working FleurAngel "from the inside" and "outside" to find solutions for people who need a change of lifestyle, both mental and nutritional, beliefs and customs of both knowledge as power and hormonal. "From within" through specialty Fleur (Nutrition Specialist and hormonal balance) and "outside" through specialty Angel (Intelligent, sensible and spiritual, a combination of coaching, empathy, personal experience, intelligence, sensitivity, honesty, listening and deep understanding of the personal circumstances of each, and ease of finding connections that provide the necessary solutions). FleurAngel works perfectly together in this team and Fleur in turn has a high sensitivity and provides support from the outside, and Angel has a personal nutritional and spiritual experience from which provides and help from the inside.

Durante ese período de convivencia en FleurAngel Yurta Camp, compartirán trabajos, y cada instante, cada día, cada momento, escucharán y entenderán todas las circunstancias personales. Con paciencia y confianza, se irá cocinando la respuesta o respuestas que cada persona está esperando de FleurAngel, la solución que está buscando. Cuando llegue ese momento, transmitimos la solución, y mientras llega, contagiamos alegría, descanso, confianza, fuerza y valor para afrontar los miedos y disfrutar los cambios, enseñamos a tomar riesgos, y mostramos nuestro estilo de vida, sobre alimentación y salud interior y exterior.

During that period of coexistence in FleurAngel Yurta Camp, share work, and every moment, every day, hear and understand all personal circumstances. With patience and trust, will go cooking the answer or answers that everyone is waiting from FleurAngel, the solution you are looking for. When that time comes, we transmit the solution, and while arrives, infect joy, rest, confidence, strength and courage to face fears and enjoy the changes, taught to take risks and show our way of life, power and inner health and outside.

Lo más importante: PACIENCIA. No existe el tiempo. Tanto Tú como FleurAngel necesitamos tiempo para dejar que se cocine la solución, Por tanto, no hay límite de tiempo de convivencia con FleurAngel, no hacemos terapia por horas ni sesiones preparadas ni utilizamos métodos tradicionales. Dejamos que el contacto personal haga su trabajo y por tanto el valor de nuestra ayuda no está condicionado por el tiempo que cada persona conviva en FleurAngel Yurta Camp. Dependerá del valor que cada persona dé a nuestro trabajo. Solo hay un compromiso, el de a ayudar a cubrir los gastos de consumo y cama en FleurAngel Yurta Camp durante su estancia.

Most importantly, PATIENCE. There is no time. You and FleurAngel need time to let, therefore no solution time limit coexistence with FleurAngel cook, we don´t do therapy sessions for hours and prepared or used traditional methods. The value of our help is not conditioned by the time each person living side by side in FleurAngel Yurta Camp. It depends on the value that each person gives to our help. There is only one commitment, to help cover the costs of consumption and FleurAngel Yurta Camp. bed during your stay.

NO hay Internet, no hay televisión o radio, no se puede fumar, no hay alcohol (ni dentro ni fuera de FleurAngel Yurta Camp), no hay azúcar, sin gluten, sin productos químicos, y SÍ productos ecológicos. Usaremos, en la medida de lo posible, agua no clorada y baños secos, y procuraremos siempre ser autosuficientes.

No internet, no TV or radio, you can not smoke, no alcohol (either inside or outside FleurAngel Yurta Camp), no sugar, no gluten, no cow milk, no chemical products, and, yes!, organic products. We will use, as far as possible, non-chlorinated water and dry toilets, and always try to be self-sufficient.

Después de un largo proceso de cambio en nuestras vidas, y de trabajo de conocimiento personal, sabemos que ESTA ES NUESTRA MISIÓN. Todas las señales apuntan a que además ES EL MOMENTO DE COMENZAR. Es muy importante para nosotros el apoyo, pero más lo es para las personas que están esperando nuestro FleurAngel Yurta Camp.

Sabemos que muchísima gente desconoce la necesidad de conocer qué come y cómo lo come y cuales son las consecuencias de una mala alimentación y un mal hábito alimenticio. A su vez, es importante para todo el mundo saber como influye un desequilibrio hormonal. Y todo esto está íntimamente relacionado con el estado emocional, los traumas, miedos, carencias emocionales, y caminos de vida alejados de lo que realmente quiere cada corazón.

After a long process of change in our lives, work and personal knowledge, we know that this is OUR MISSION. All signs tell us THIS IS THE TIME TO START. Is very important for us your help, but this help is more important for people who are waiting for our FleurAngel Yurt Camp.

We know that many people need to know what and how they eat and what are the consequences of a poor diet and poor eating habits. At the same time, it is important for everyone to know how to influence hormonal imbalance. And this is closely related to the emotional state, affraid, fears, emotional needs, and ways of life away separated from what really want every heart.


                        ¿Qué necesitais?-What do you need?:  “10.000 €”

Tenemos una estimación general de inversión total de cerca de 30.000 euros para concluir el montaje proyectado de FleurAngel Yurta Camp.

We estimate an overall investment of nearly 30,000 euros to complete the installation projected FleurAngel Yurta Camp.

Partimos con un capital inicial de aproximadamente 10.000 euros, y sabemos que podemos obtener el dinero restante en nuestro CROWDFUNDING de INDIEGOGO y en nuestro “CAMINOFUNDING”. Utilizaremos todo nuestro potencial, nuestra imaginación y creatividad para lograr muchísima ayuda en nuestro “CAMINOFUNDING”, (y os aseguramos que somos especialistas en encontrar la mejor solución para todo, somos dos Leos!!!). Todo el dinero recaudado tanto en “CAMINOFUNDING” como en  INDIEGOGO, se invertirá en poner en marcha FleurAngel Yurta Camp. 

We start with an initial capital of about 10,000 euros, and we know we can get the remaining money in our CROWDFUNDING INDIEGOGO and our "CAMINOFUNDING". We will use all our potential, our imagination and creativity to achieve tremendous help in our "CAMINOFUNDING" (and we assure you that we specialize in finding the best solution for all, we are two Leos !!!). All money raised both "CAMINOFUNDING" and  INDIEGOGO, will be invested in implementing FleurAngel Yurta Camp.

Estimación de inversión

                                                         Investment estimation

No obstante, para poner en marcha FleurAngel Yurta Camp NO es preciso comenzar con la inversión total.

However, to implement FleurAngel Yurta Camp is NOT necessary to start with the total investment.

En una primera fase estimamos una inversión de aproximadamente 20.000 euros, lo necesario para instalar dos yurtas como habitaciones, una yurta para el salón cocina comedor, cocina, mesas, sillas, camas, mantas, menaje y otra yurta para los baños, a la vez que empezamos a cultivar en el huerto.

In the first phase we estimate an investment of around 20.000 euros. We need this to install two yurts as rooms, a yurt for the kitchen, tables, chairs, beds, blankets, utensils and other living yurt for baths, while we begin to grow in the garden.

En una segunda fase se ampliará el campamento con otra yurta habitación, la urbanización, el vallado, iluminación natural de la urbanización, gallinero, zonas de descanso, camas, sábanas, mantas,  mesas, sillas, y lo necesario para la ampliación con 8 camas más, lo que estimamos en algo menos de 10.000 euros.

In a second phase with another yurt as room, the urbanization, fencing, natural lighting urbanization, roost, rest areas, beds, sheets, blankets, tables, chairs, and we want to expand the place with another 8 beds more, which we estimate at just under 10.000 euros.

Por tanto, EL CAPITAL que con el que lanzamos la campaña de CROWDFUNDING en  INDIEGOGO (y paralelamente con “CAMINOFUNDING”) es de 10.000 euros, lo suficiente para cubrir los 20.000 euros de la primera fase.

Therefore, THE CAPITAL that the campaign we launched in   INDIEGOGO CROWDFUNDING (and in parallel with "CAMINOFUNDING") is 10,000 euros, enough to cover 20,000 euros for the first phase.

Sabemos que lograremos el 100% del objetivo inicial con CROWDFUNING y “CAMINOFUNDING”. Aun así, a principios de octubre, comenzaremos el proyecto FleurAngel Yurta Camp con todo el capital que tengamos, aunque sea menor de 20.000 euros. Por tanto, sea cual sea el resultado de la campaña de CROWDFUNDING en  INDIEGOGO y “CAMINOFUNDING”, está garantizada la creación del proyecto.

We know that we will achieve 100% with CROWDFUNING and "CAMINOFUNDING". Still, in early October, we will start the project FleurAngel Yurta Camp  with all the capital we have, even if it is less than 20,000 euros. Therefore, whatever the outcome of the campaign CROWDFUNDING in  INDIEGOGO and "CAMINOFUNDING" is guaranteed the creation of the project.


¿Dónde va a estar FleurAngel Yurta Camp?-Where will it be?: “Camino de Santiago”.

¿Dónde va a estar FleurAngel Yurta Camp ?. En el Camino de Santiago. Esa es una condición o premisa. En un terreno fértil para el huerto bio-ecológico, esa es otra de las premisas. Un terreno de al menos 1.000 metros cuadrados, para albergar cómodamente todas las instalaciones Probablemente en los alrededores de Burgos capital. Tenemos varias opciones de alquiler. ¿Por qué cerca de Burgos? Sencillamente por que en Burgos viven los dos hijos de Ángel, Andrés, de 11 años, y Miguel, de 9 años, y queremos que sean una parte importante del proyecto.

Where will be FleurAngel Yurta Camp?. In the “Camino de Santiago”. That is a condition or premise. In a fertile ground for bio-organic garden, that is another of the conditions. A field with at least 1.000 square meters, probably around Burgos capital. We have several rental options. Why near Burgos? Simply because in Burgos live the sons of Angel, Andres, 11 years old, and Miguel, 9 years old, and we want to be a significant part of the project.

Y tenemos una ventaja: Al ser una instalación no inmueble, tenemos total libertad a la hora de modificar la situación del campamento cuando lo consideremos necesario. El emplazamiento no ha de tener más condicionantes que la cercanía al Camino de Santiago, una tierra fértil, y una superficie de al menos 1.000 metros cuadrados para albergar todas las instalaciones. Si la parcela es urbana, tendremos acceso a electricidad, y no necesitamos más acometidas, a lo sumo abastecimiento de agua.

And we have an big advantage: We don’t want to be the owners of the place we build the FleurAngel Yurta Camp, so we have complete freedom to change the situation of the Yurta Camp when we need. If the place is urban, we have access to electricity, and we don’t need more connections, may be water.

El terreno que utilizaremos será preferiblemente donado para su uso o alquilado. El alquiler de la parcela no será mayor de 200 euros/mes y se cubrirá con los beneficios de la actividad.

The land use will preferably be donated for use or rented. F we need to rent, the rent for the place shall not exceed 200 euros/ month and covered with the benefits of the activity.


¿Creéis que podéis encontrar desafíos durante el comienzo?-Do you think you can find challenges during the start?:  

“Nos gustan los desafíos. Y nos gusta tomar Riesgos. Son oportunidades de conseguir algo maravilloso, que ni podemos imaginar”-"We like challenges. And we like to take risks. They are opportunities to get something nice, we can’t even imagine".

Para nosotros son oportunidades. Siempre ganamos tomando riesgos, y siempre aprendemos de las situaciones que aparentemente son difíciles, y disfrutamos. Esto es uno de los mensajes de nuestro estilo de vida.

Al mismo tiempo, nosotros pensamos que cualquier situación, por complicada que parezca, siempre es lo mejor que puede pasar por el bien del proyecto, y viene con la solución incorporada, solo necesitamos confianza y paciencia, y seguir nuestra intuición.

Are opportunities for us. Taking risks always win, and always learn from situations that are seemingly difficult and enjoyed. This is one of the messages of our lifestyle.

At the same time, we think that any situation, however complicated it may seem, is always the best thing to happen for the sake of the project, and comes with built-in solution, only need confidence and patience, and follow our intuition.

Nuestro proyecto cuenta con muchísimas ventajas:

Our project has more advantages:

Terreno: El emplazamiento de FleurAngel Yurta Camp es flexible. Podemos mover el campamento en cuestion de una o dos semanas. Esa es una de las premisas de este proyecto, la libertad a la hora de movernos. No es nuestra intención movernos continuamente, pero si que sentimos que es algo muy especial poder mover el albergue a lo largo del Camino de Santiago.

Place: The location of FleurAngel Yurta Camp is flexible. We can move the camp in one or two weeks. That's one of the premises of this project, freedom when moving. We do not intend to move continuously, but we feel is something very special we can move the place if we need along the “Camino de Santiago”.

Alquiler del terreno: La ventaja que tenemos ahora es que los terrenos están parados, no tienen explotación, nadie los usa, por lo que es mejor tenerlos alquilados por bajo alquiler (200 euros/mes es nuestro tope) que por alquiler cero. Y además ofrecemos la posibilidad al propietario de disponer de la parcela cuando quiera, ya que nosotros, siempre con un tiempo prudencial, podemos movernos a otro emplazamiento en cuestión de semanas.

Rental area: The advantage we have now is that the land they stand, no exploitation, nobody uses, so it's better to have them rented by low rent (200 euros/month is our stop) or may be donated rental. And also we can offer the possibility to have the owner of the place whenever, because we always with a reasonable time, can move to another site in a matter of weeks.

Licencias: Las tiendas Yurta Mongolas no son un bien inmueble, por lo que podemos instalarnos donde queramos, siempre previa consulta al Ayuntamiento implicado. No es preciso cumplir normativa de edificación.

Licenses: Mongolian Yurt stores are not a property, so that we can settle where we want, always after consultation with the Goberment Technic. You need not comply with building regulations.

En cuanto a la normativa de alojamientos en Castilla y León, dependiendo de la opción por la que nos decantemos a la hora de gestionar el albergue, tendremos la opción de cumplir o no cumplir dicha normativa. Todo dependerá de si nos decantamos por solicitar ayudas a la Junta de Castilla y León. En estos momentos no es nuestra intención. Por lo que la gestión del FleurAngel Yurta Camp será diferente a la de la normativa de alojamientos de la Junta de Castilla y León.

About the rules of lodging in Castilla y León, depending on the option that we decant it comes to managing the hostel, we have the option to comply or not comply with those rules. For now it is not our intention. So FleurAngel Yurta Camp management is different from the rules of accommodation of the Castilla and Leon.

Agua, luz y calefacción: Esta claro que una parcela urbana cuenta con todos los servicios, abastecimiento de agua, luz, gas, telefono e internet, pero en este caso nuestro proyecto solo precisa de electricidad (procuraremos ser autosuficientes también en este aspecto), y a lo sumo, abastecimiento de agua (a la que trataremos para evitar el cloro). Si optamos por una parcela rústica, no tendremos abastecimiento en la parcela, pero incorporaremos generadores de electricidad si fuera preciso el uso de electricidad, y utilizaremos depósitos de agua que reutilizaremos y potabilizaremos.

Water, electricity and heating: It is clear that an urban place has all services, water, electricity, gas, telephone and internet, but in this case our project only needs electricity (also we want to be self-sufficient in this regard) and at most, water (whithout chlorate). If we choose a rustic plot, we have no supply in the place, but incorporate generators if is necessary the use of electricity and use water tanks without chlorate.

Construir yurtas, aseos, etc.: El montaje de las Yurtas es algo muy sencillo, se requiere una pequeña instalación para el aseo o la cocina, una base de madera, sobre la que se monta la tienda, en aproximadamente dos dias. Lo mismo para el desmontaje.

Build yurts, toilets, etc.: The work to build this yurts is very easy. An small tubes for toilet or kitchen, a wooden base on which the structure is mounted, in about two days is finish. Same for dismantling.

En definitiva, somos expertos en encontrar soluciones sencillas y eficientes en todas las situaciones que se nos presentan, por tanto no tememos encontrar nuevos retos en este proyecto.

In short, we are experts at finding simple and efficient solutions in every situation we find, so we are not afraid to find new challenges in this project.


                      ¿Recompensas por la ayuda?-¿Rewards for help?: "Una llave para nuestro/su nuevo hogar y muchas sorpresas”-"A key to our/their new home and many surprises."

 A todos aquellos que nos ayuden en nuestro proyecto queremos ofrecerles, independientemente de las recompensas que ofrezcamos en cada momento, una llavecita, como símbolo que representa la solución de todos los problemas, que podéis utilizar como queráis (pedirnos ayuda cuando la necesitéis, regalársela a otra persona,etc. es vuestra!), y como símbolo de dueños que sois de esta casa, como co-propietarios de FleurAngel Yurta Camp. Esta es desde ese momento vuestra casa. Tenéis una casa para ir de vacaciones cuando queráis!!!. 

To all those who help us in our project we want to offer, regardless of the rewards they offer at all times, a small key, a symbol representing the solution of all problem, and a symbol for co-owners of FleurAngel Yurta Camp. This is from this time your house. You have a home to go on holidays when you want!!!.


 ¿Cómo podemos seguiros y ayudaros?-How can we follow you and help you?:  “Página en Facebook: FleurAngel Yurta Camp”.

Si quieres conocer más sobre nuestro proyecto, ayudarnos y estar actualizad@ con nuestras noticias, síguenos en Facebook: FleurAngel Yurta Camp, donde no solo podréis seguir nuestras noticias, conocer a las personas que nos ayudan en nuestra aventura “CAMINOFUNDING” y saber todo aquello que nos ocurre en esta bonita experiencia, sino que también podréis aprovechar nuestras recompensas, ya que ofreceremos diferentes, exclusivas y atractivas recompensas para las ayudas que recibamos en un día concreto o durante un período de tiempo determinado. Os prometemos ser creativos y sorprenderos!. Estad atentos!!.

If you want to know more about our project, help and know our news, follow us on Facebook: FleurAngel Yurta Camp, where you can meet the people who help us in our adventure "CAMINOFUNDING" and know everything that happens to us in this beautiful experience, but also to know when we activate our rewards, and we will offer different, exclusive and attractive rewards for all help we receive in a day or over a period of time. We promise to be creative and surprise you!. Stay tuned!!.


                          ¿Sólo necesitáis dinero?-Just you need money?:  “Donaciones de muebles, terreno, difundir proyecto”.-"Donations of furniture, land, disseminate project."

Os agradecemos vuestra ayuda. Tanto si es apoyo económico, como si es donando muebles, enseres para la huerta o para el albergue, como si es la difusión del proyecto entre vuestros amigos y familiares. Os rogamos que utilicéis INDIEGOGO  y FACEBOOK para compartir la campaña. Muchísimas gracias por vuestro apoyo!.

We appreciate your help. This help can be financial support, or donating furniture, furnishings for the garden or for the Albergue, or if you share the project with your friends and family. We implore you to use   INDIEGOGO and FACEBOOK to share the campaign. Thank you for your support!.


¡Muchas gracias!: “Os lo agradecemos de corazón” Thank you!.

¡Nos vemos en el camino! See you in ”El Camino”!

¡Amor, paz y felicidad!

¡El estilo de vida saludable!

                               Love, peace and happiness! The healthy lifestyle!

                                                    

                                      

Fleur & Angel                                 -FleurAngel Yurta Camp-

Dos personas, dos culturas, dos vidas 


Two people, two cultures, two lives
un alma, un sueño!




a soul, a dream!

¿Cómo empezó todo?-How did it all?: “CAMINOFUNDING”

¡Hola!. Somos Fleur, Holandesa,
y Ángel, Español. Nos conocimos a
finales de noviembre de 2014 en el Camino de Santiago. Ángel era hospitalero voluntario
en un bonito albergue cerca de León 
(Albergue Verde) y Fleur una peregrina buscando su nuevo camino. Fue
amor a primera vista, como si nos conociéramos de toda la vida. Ese momento
cambió nuestras vidas por completo. Poco después, en febrero de 2015, Ángel decidió correr el riesgo, dejar toda su vida en Burgos, donde vivía entonces trabajando como profesor de Universidad, para empezar una nueva vida con Fleur
en Holanda. Después de unos meses juntos en Holanda, es Fleur la que deja todo,
y corre el riesgo, volviendo junto a Ángel a España a hacer realidad el sueño que juntos tuvieron en Holanda, el mismo día, por separado. UNA VISION: Crear un hogar-albergue para ofrecer nuestras capacidades a los que las
necesiten, siendo pioneros en ello.


Hello!. We are Fleur, Dutch, and Angel,
Spanish. We met in November 2014 in the Albergue near Leon (Albergue Verde) and
Fleur a pilgrim seeking his new way. We are in love in the first moment, as if
we knew of a lifetime. That moment changed our lives completely. Shortly
afterwards, in February 2015, Angel decided to take a risk, leaving his entire
life in Burgos, where he lived working as a university professor, to start a
new life with Fleur in the Netherlands. After a few months together in the
Netherlands, which leaves everything is Fleur, and take the risk, returning to
Spain with Angel to realize the dream that together they had in the Netherlands
the same day separately. A VISION:
Create a home-Albergue to offer our skills to those who need them, being
pioneers in this.

Después de tomar esta
decisión, Ángel tuvo un sueño en el que hacían juntos el Camino de Santiago,
consiguiendo el dinero necesario para crear el albergue, haciendo un “CAMINOFUNDING”. Ahora estamos en esa
aventura. Haciendo el Camino de Santiago, el “Camino Francés”, como auténticos peregrinos,
con una tienda de campaña y sin dinero, confiando
en la generosidad de la gente, y procurando conseguir la confianza de los
peregrinos y amigos que encontremos para que nos ayuden en este proyecto. Todo
el dinero que podamos recaudar durante la aventura, será para financiar el
proyecto. A su vez, queremos lanzar esta iniciativa a todo el mundo, no solo a
los peregrinos y amigos que nos encuentren en persona. Para ello lanzamos esta
campaña en   INDIEGOGO: “ALBERGUE DE YURTAS: FLEURANGEL YURTA CAMP”.
After making this decision, Angel had a
dream that did together the Camino de Santiago, getting the money needed to
build the dream, making a "CAMINOFUNDING". We are now in this
adventure. Doing the “Camino de Santiago”, the "French Way" as
genuine pilgrims, with a tent and without money, relying
on the generosity of people, and trying to get the trust of pilgrims and find
friends to assist us in this project. All the money that we raise for the
adventure, is to finance the Albergue. In turn, we want to launch this
initiative to everybody, not only to pilgrims and friends meet us in person. To
do this we launched this INDIEGOGO campaign: “ALBERGUE DE YURTAS: FLEURANGEL YURTA CAMP”.

Eight months after we met, we decided to live our dream:

¿Dónde va a estar FleurAngel Yurta Camp?-Where will it be?: “Camino de
Santiago”.
¿Dónde va a estar FleurAngel Yurta Camp ?. En el Camino
de Santiago. Esa es una condición o premisa. En un terreno fértil para el
huerto bio-ecológico, esa es otra de las premisas. Un terreno de al menos 1.000
metros cuadrados, para albergar cómodamente todas las instalaciones Probablemente en los alrededores de Burgos
capital. Tenemos varias opciones de alquiler. ¿Por qué cerca de Burgos?
Sencillamente por que en Burgos viven los dos hijos de Ángel, Andrés, de 11 años, y Miguel, de 9 años, y queremos
que sean una parte importante del proyecto.
Where will be FleurAngel Yurta Camp?. In
the “Camino de Santiago”. That is a condition or premise. In a fertile ground
for bio-organic garden, that is another of the conditions. A field with at
least 1.000 square meters, probably around Burgos capital. We have several
rental options. Why near Burgos? Simply because in Burgos live the sons of
Angel, Andres, 11 years old, and Miguel, 9 years old, and we want to be a
significant part of the project.
Y tenemos una ventaja: Al ser una instalación no inmueble, tenemos total libertad a la hora de
modificar la situación del campamento cuando lo consideremos necesario. El
emplazamiento no ha de tener más condicionantes que la cercanía al Camino de
Santiago, una tierra fértil, y una superficie de al menos 1.000 metros
cuadrados para albergar todas las instalaciones. Si la parcela es urbana,
tendremos acceso a electricidad, y no necesitamos más acometidas, a lo sumo
abastecimiento de agua.
And we have an big advantage: We don’t
want to be the owners of the place we build the FleurAngel Yurta Camp, so we
have complete freedom to change the situation of the Yurta Camp when we need. If
the place is urban, we have access to electricity, and we don’t need more
connections, may be water.
El terreno que utilizaremos será preferiblemente donado para su uso o
alquilado. El alquiler de la parcela no
será mayor de 200 euros/mes y se cubrirá con los beneficios de la
actividad.
The land use will preferably be donated
for use or rented. F we need to rent, the rent for the place shall not exceed
200 euros/ month and covered with the benefits of the activity.


¿Creéis que podéis encontrar desafíos durante el comienzo?-Do you think you can find challenges during the start?:  
“Nos gustan los
desafíos. Y nos gusta tomar Riesgos. Son oportunidades de conseguir algo

to get something nice, we can’t even imagine".
Para nosotros son oportunidades.
Siempre ganamos tomando riesgos, y siempre aprendemos de las situaciones que
aparentemente son difíciles, y disfrutamos. Esto es uno de los mensajes de
nuestro estilo de vida.

Al mismo tiempo, nosotros pensamos que cualquier situación, por
complicada que parezca, siempre es lo mejor que puede pasar por el bien del
proyecto, y viene con la solución incorporada, solo necesitamos confianza y
paciencia, y seguir nuestra intuición.

Are opportunities for us. Taking risks
always win, and always learn from situations that are seemingly difficult and
enjoyed. This is one of the messages of our lifestyle.
At the same time, we think that any
situation, however complicated it may seem, is always the best thing to happen
for the sake of the project, and comes with built-in solution, only need
confidence and patience, and follow our intuition.
Nuestro proyecto cuenta con muchísimas ventajas:
Our project has more advantages:

Terreno: El emplazamiento de FleurAngel Yurta Camp es flexible. Podemos mover el campamento en
cuestion de una o dos semanas. Esa es una de las premisas de este proyecto, la
libertad a la hora de movernos. No es nuestra intención movernos continuamente,
pero si que sentimos que es algo muy especial poder mover el albergue a lo
largo del Camino de Santiago.
Place: The location of FleurAngel Yurta Camp is flexible. We can move the camp in one or two weeks. That's one of the
premises of this project, freedom when moving. We do not intend to move
continuously, but we feel is something very special we can move the place if we
need along the “Camino de Santiago”.
Alquiler del terreno: La ventaja que tenemos ahora es que los
terrenos están parados, no tienen explotación, nadie los usa, por lo que es
mejor tenerlos alquilados por bajo alquiler (200 euros/mes es nuestro tope) que
por alquiler cero. Y además ofrecemos la posibilidad al propietario de disponer
de la parcela cuando quiera, ya que nosotros, siempre con un tiempo prudencial,
podemos movernos a otro emplazamiento en cuestión de semanas.
Rental area: The advantage we have now
is that the land they stand, no exploitation, nobody uses, so it's better to
have them rented by low rent (200 euros/month is our stop) or may be donated
rental. And also we can offer the possibility to have the owner of the place
whenever, because we always with a reasonable time, can move to another site in
a matter of weeks.
Licencias: Las tiendas Yurta Mongolas no son un bien inmueble, por lo que podemos
instalarnos donde queramos, siempre previa consulta al Ayuntamiento implicado.
No es preciso cumplir normativa de edificación.
Licenses: Mongolian Yurt stores are not
a property, so that we can settle where we want, always after consultation with
the Goberment Technic. You need not comply with building regulations.
En cuanto a la normativa de alojamientos en Castilla y León, dependiendo
de la opción por la que nos decantemos a la hora de gestionar el albergue,
tendremos la opción de cumplir o no cumplir dicha normativa. Todo dependerá de
si nos decantamos por solicitar ayudas a la Junta de Castilla y León. En estos
momentos no es nuestra intención. Por lo que la gestión del FleurAngel Yurta Camp será diferente a la de la normativa de
alojamientos de la Junta de Castilla y León.

About the rules of lodging in Castilla y
León, depending on the option that we decant it comes to managing the hostel,
we have the option to comply or not comply with those rules. For now it is not
our intention. So FleurAngel Yurta Camp management is different from the rules
of accommodation of the Castilla and Leon.

Agua, luz y calefacción: Esta claro que una parcela urbana cuenta con
todos los servicios, abastecimiento de agua, luz, gas, telefono e internet,
pero en este caso nuestro proyecto solo precisa de electricidad (procuraremos
ser autosuficientes también en este aspecto), y a lo sumo, abastecimiento de
agua (a la que trataremos para evitar el cloro). Si optamos por una parcela
rústica, no tendremos abastecimiento en la parcela, pero incorporaremos
generadores de electricidad si fuera preciso el uso de electricidad, y
utilizaremos depósitos de agua que reutilizaremos y potabilizaremos.
Water, electricity and heating: It is
clear that an urban place has all services, water, electricity, gas, telephone
and internet, but in this case our project only needs electricity (also we want
to be self-sufficient in this regard) and at most, water (whithout chlorate).
If we choose a rustic plot, we have no supply in the place, but incorporate
generators if is necessary the use of electricity and use water tanks without
chlorate.
Construir yurtas, aseos, etc.: El montaje de las Yurtas es algo muy sencillo,
se requiere una pequeña instalación para el aseo o la cocina, una base de
madera, sobre la que se monta la tienda, en aproximadamente dos dias. Lo mismo
para el desmontaje.
Build yurts, toilets, etc.: The work to
build this yurts is very easy. An small tubes for toilet or kitchen, a wooden
base on which the structure is mounted, in about two days is finish. Same for
dismantling.
En definitiva, somos expertos en encontrar soluciones sencillas y
eficientes en todas las situaciones que se nos presentan, por tanto no tememos
encontrar nuevos retos en este proyecto.
In short, we are experts at finding
simple and efficient solutions in every situation we find, so we are not afraid
to find new challenges in this project.

story:
My name is Neil Hatherall. I am the founder of Goatmeal Breakfast Cereal. Please! Have a seat! I'd like to tell you a little bit about how Goatmeal came to be.

About 15 years ago I began suffering from health issues that gradually worsened as I got older. These issues included allergic reactions, food sensitivities, digestive disorders, stomach pains and cramps, heart palpitations, anxiety, and even depression.

I believed at the time that these were all symptoms of a serious underlying health problem. So being young, naive, and scared, I thought I was dying . . .

After many unsuccessful trips to the doctor, I took matters into my own hands and eventually started putting two and two together. 

“My body does not like something I’m eating!”

Fast-forward to the present day - I’ve spent the last 6 years researching health and nutrition while using my own body as a test subject. And I'm extremely happy to say that I’ve finally figured out the major cause of all of these unexplained symptoms . . .


Since predominantly cutting these three things out of my diet, I now rarely experience any of the health issues I used to! 

Now I feel amazing!

So why the tear jerking story? 

Well, I’m an entrepreneur at heart. And earlier this year I decided that I wanted to create a food product that essentially encompassed my journey through health and nutrition.

And so Goatmeal began . . .

Goatmeal Superfood Breakfast Cereal is best described as a grain-free porridge. Unlike regular porridge (oatmeal), Goatmeal does not need to be cooked; It can be prepared quickly and easily by simply adding hot or cold milk or water then left to rest for as little as 3 minutes. That's right! You can eat it hot, or cold!

Although Goatmeal is a breakfast cereal, it is very versatile. It can also be added to other cereals, smoothies, yogurt, baking recipes, sprinkled on top of food such as salads and ice-cream, and it can even be eaten raw out of the package as a healthy snack.

Goatmeal is formulated to help the amazing human body function as it should!

 It's also perfectly suited for the following common diets:

  • Gluten-Free — For celiacs, those who are sensitive to gluten, or people that simply want to cut it out for other reasons.
  • Grain-Free — For people who believe eating grains is actually putting us at a higher risk of disease.
  • Organic — A diet free of synthetic additives like pesticides, chemical fertilizers, and dyes, and foods not processed using industrial solvents, irradiation, or genetic engineering.
  • Non-GMO — GMO stands for Genetically Modified Organism. This diet is for those who do not eat genetically modified foods.
  • Paleo — A diet based on types of food presumed to have been eaten by early humans including meat, vegetables and fruit, excluding dairy, grains, and processed foods.
  • Low-Carb / Low Sugar — For those following the Atkins diet and other low-carbohydrate diets. There is no added sugar or sweetener in Goatmeal.
  • Diabetic — For those with type 1 and type 2 diabetes.
  • Vegan / Vegetarian — For animal-friendly eaters. Goatmeal does not contain any animal bi-products (not even goats).
  • Lactose-Intolerant — For those with an intolerance to dairy products. Goatmeal is lactose-free.
  • Low Sodium — For people trying to decrease their salt intake for medical reasons such as high blood pressure. There is no added salt in Goatmeal.

So why Goatmeal and not other cereals?

Most cereals on the market today are made of grains (wheat, oats, corn, rice, etc..), making them very processed, high in carbohydrates and sugar, and low in most of everything else. (To learn more about the negative effects of grains on your health, be sure to check chapter #7 on this page)f

Goatmeal is a different approach to breakfast cereal. It is:

  • Grain-free
  • Much lower in carbohydrates
  • Higher in healthy fats and protein
  • Full of naturally occurring vitamins and minerals



What IS in Goatmeal? 

Goatmeal is made of 100% organic ingredients! We have experimented with countless recipes to find the most nutritious and best tasting base-mixture of some of the following super-foods:


We've been demonstrating and selling Goatmeal for almost 4 months at local farmer's markets. 

Faster than we had ever expected, we've received a great community response, built a solid customer base, established amazing business connections, and realized we really do have something special here. 

We now have the opportunity to work with a distribution company and get our products on many grocery store shelves. 

Nows our chance to turn Goatmeal into a legitimate food manufacturing company. 

That means we need to:

  1. Abide by packaging and labeling laws and regulations
  2. Rent bigger, more functional commercial kitchen space and storage
  3. Manufacture large amounts of inventory to fill store orders
  4. Purchase better equipment to manufacture our product faster
  5. Buy new shoes (optional)

We believe crowdfunding is a revolutionary way to raise money. Here's why:

  1. It is a great way to build a network of like minded people that can all easily contribute smaller amounts to together make something big happen.
  2. It makes bringing a creative idea to life easier for anyone to do - rather than traditional financing options such as:
  • High-interest bank loans — which aren't easy for everyone to be approved for nor are they easy to pay back. Plus you're just helping banks, which already have boatloads of money, make more money.
  • Investors — which you need to give up a percentage of equity in exchange for the funds. 
  • Government grants — which are very difficult to get, they take a long time to actually receive funds, and not everyone is eligible.
We are extremely grateful to live in a time where crowdfunding is an option.

This money will be put towards:

ORGANIC CERTIFICATION

If you are unfamiliar with the packaging laws - in a nutshell - foods labelled as being "Organic" must be "Certified Organic". This process to be certified is lengthy, and expensive. Although all our ingredients are certified organic, we need the certify our product as a whole to legally label it as organic.

Annoying Legal Fees

  • Business License and registration
  • Trademark
  • Liability Insurance

Product Development

We are designing a new and improved brand and package for our product. It will be mind blowing needless-to-say.

We will also be experimenting and releasing a new unique flavour to add more variety.

Inventory

We have found a supplier that has a very large minimum order size for all of our ingredients. This means we will be able to get our ingredients much cheaper and that will impact the overall price of our products. This also means we need a lot more money to invest. (Hint: the minimum order lbs weight is in the triple digits)

We also are going to need a lot more inventory to fill our first orders.

Manufacturing Costs

To start manufacturing large quantities we need to make our process as fast and efficient as possible. This will require:

  • Better Equipment
  • Commercial kitchen and storage space rentals

    • Promotion

    It takes a lot of work promoting a new food product - Especially since there is so many food products out there to compete with. Although our product is quite unique and has a great brand, it will still take some funds to put towards things such as:

    • Advertising
    • Trade shows
    • Brand Ambassadors

    We need your support! Join us and contribute!

    Help us spread the word too! here's how:

    Look to the left! Share this page on any network you are a part of!
    Also, Share these pages!

    http://www.goatmeal.ca

    http://www.facebook.com/GoatmealCereal

    http://www.twitter.com/GoatmealCereal

    Perks are essentially rewards or gifts given to you in return for your contributions. Have a look below to check out which perk fits you the best. Then pick one! Or all of them . . . Your choice.
    TO MAKE A CONTRIBUTION CHECK THE RIGHT SIDE OF THE SCREEN! THANKS!

    Be the first to get THREE brand new packages of Goatmeal delivered right to your door. In appreciation for our early supporters, we are practically giving these away. As a matter of fact, we will probably lose money here.

    Be the first to get SIX brand new packages of Goatmeal for by far the lowest price we have ever offered it for. We are already kicking ourselves for it.

    With just $5 you will receive a subscription to our newsletter that will keep you "In-the-Loop" on everything Goatmeal.  We will also list your name on our website as a contributor essential to our success.

    With just $10 you will get a ginormous Goatmeal bumper sticker that you can stick on just about anything. This includes your vehicle's bumper, your refrigerator, and your forehead. You'll also get all the perks in the In-the-Loop Perk Pack!

    Get an official Goatmeal T-Shirt in your size. Need we say more? No one will doubt your fashion sense with this undeniably-hip, trend-setting Goat-shirt.

    Get the most stylish and delicious perk of them all - for a great price too! For $25, you'll recieve ONE package of Goatmeal AND your very own Goat-shirt

    Not only will you get to admire the exterior of our new packages with this contribution, but you can eat the Goatmeal inside too! You pick the flavours.

    With this contribution you will get SIX packages of Goatmeal - 2 packages delivered per month for 3 months! Now you can sleep well knowing your Goatmeal will be nice and fresh in the morning.

    Here you can get an entire case of Goatmeal if your planning a goat party. We suggest a petting zoo for the kids!

    Whether you know lots of people who like this kind of stuff, or you're planning on becoming a Goatmeal addict, this might be the option for you. Sometimes, more is more. Save 25% off the suggested retail value!

    We will send you 24 packages of Goatmeal! That's 2 per month for an entire year! Weren't you just talking about how badly you wanted this?

    Feeling generous? Choose this option and we will donate 50 packages of Goatmeal to a local food bank! Seriously. There are lots of hungry tummies out there.

    We're making a Goatmeal commercial that is destined to go viral (Trust me, it will be that good). Here's your chance to be featured in it! (Going viral not guaranteed)

    Ever wondered why there are no breakfast cereals named after you? Well wonder no more! Work with us to construct a brand new flavour of your choice that we will sell on our website for a year!

    We have touched on some health and nutrition topics that we strongly suggest you learn more about, if you're not already familiar. Below we've provided many links to some great sources of information:

    Grains

    How Grains are Killing You Slowly — http://wellnessmama.com/575/how-grains-are-killing-you-slowly/

    The Truth About Eating Grains —  http://articles.mercola.com/sites/articles/archive/2008/01/02/truth-about-eating-grains.aspx

    Grains Causing Leaky Gut —  http://articles.mercola.com/sites/articles/archive/2012/01/21/grains-causing-gut-leaks.aspx

    Low Grain and Low Carb Diet Treat Nearly All Chronic Illnesses  —  http://www.mercola.com/article/carbohydrates/scientific_evidence_low_grains.htm

    Sugar

    The Bitter Truth About Sugar  —  http://articles.mercola.com/sites/articles/archive/2014/12/31/bitter-truth-sugar.aspx

    Harmful Effects of Sugar —  http://wellnessmama.com/15/harmful-effects-of-sugars/

    Sugar and Cancer  —  http://articles.mercola.com/sites/articles/archive/2000/10/08/sugar-cancer-part-one.aspx

    10 Disturbing Reasons Why Sugar is Bad for You  —  http://authoritynutrition.com/10-disturbing-reasons-why-sugar-is-bad/

    Fat

    Fat Doesn't Make You Fat —  http://drhyman.com/blog/2013/11/26/fat-make-fat/

    7 Reasons to Eat More Saturated Fats  —  http://articles.mercola.com/sites/articles/archive/2009/09/22/7-reasons-to-eat-more-saturated-fat.aspx

    Don't Fear the Fats  —  http://www.npr.org/sections/thesalt/2014/03/17/290846811/dont-fear-the-fat-experts-question-saturated-fat-guidelines

    Dairy

    The Dangers of Dairy — http://www.mindbodygreen.com/0-8646/the-dangers-of-dairy.html

    Dairy: 6 Reasons You Should Avoid It At All Costs  —  http://drhyman.com/blog/2010/06/24/dairy-6-reasons-you-should-avoid-it-at-all-costs-2/

    If you have a question about Goatmeal or anything Goatmeal related, please read these frequently asked questions first. If you are still left with questions, contact us through Indiegogo and we will try our best to answer!

    Q) SO WHY DO YOU CALL IT GOATMEAL?

    A) The name "Goatmeal" originates from the idea that our breakfast cereal is like a grain-free version of oatmeal. We literally took the word "Oatmeal" and stuck a "G" in front of it - The "G" stands for "Grainless" or "Grain-free".

    Aside from that, the name has no meaning what-so-ever; except to be memorable.

    Q) IS THERE GROUND UP GOATS IN GOATMEAL?

    A) There are no goats, or any kind of goat related ingredients in Goatmeal. "Goatmeal" is entirely just a funny name.

    Q) IS GOATMEAL HIGH IN CALORIES?

    A) Although the number of calories per serving of Goatmeal may appear high, the source of these calories has a far greater impact on your weight and health than the overall number. 

    For example, Fructose is isocaloric, but not isometabolic. This means you can have the same amount of calories from fructose as glucose, fructose and protein, or fructose and fat, but themetabolic effect will be entirely different despite the identical calorie count.

    It's really important to understand that all calories CANNOT be treated the same—especially if you're struggling with excess weight and/or health issues!

    All ingredients in Goatmeal are extremely high quality, packed full of vitamins and minerals, and are 100% certified organic.

    It's far more important to look at the source of the calories than counting them.

    More Q and A coming soon!

    In conclusion, we hope you've enjoyed everything you've watched, seen, read, heard and smelled about Goatmeal.

    Obviously, we've have taken a different approach to healthy eating by being playful and adding humour. But in all seriousness, we are extremely grateful for every accomplishment we've made and every single person whom has helped us get there.

    This business has gone farther, faster than we ever thought it could. It is so heart warming to have experienced such a strong level of local support within our community. It would be a dream come true to have anything close to this much support from our audience as we continue to grow.

    From the bottom of our hearts,

    THANK YOU!!!

    - Neil and team
story_txt:
My name is Neil Hatherall. I am the founder of Goatmeal Breakfast Cereal. Please! Have a seat! I'd like to tell you a little bit about how Goatmeal came to be.
About 15 years ago I began suffering from health issues that gradually worsened as I got older. These issues included allergic reactions, food sensitivities, digestive disorders, stomach pains and cramps, heart palpitations, anxiety, and even depression.
I believed at the time that these were all symptoms of a serious underlying health problem. So being young, naive, and scared, I thought I was dying . . .


After many unsuccessful trips to the doctor, I took matters into my own hands and eventually started putting two and two together. 



“My body does not like something I’m eating!”

Fast-forward to the present day - I’ve spent the last 6 years researching health and nutrition while using my own body as a test subject. And I'm extremely happy to say that I’ve finally figured out the major cause of all of these unexplained symptoms . . .







Since predominantly cutting these three things out of my diet, I now rarely experience any of the health issues I used to! 

Now I feel amazing!

So why the tear jerking story? 


Well, I’m an entrepreneur at heart. And earlier this year I decided that I wanted to create a food product that essentially encompassed my journey through health and nutrition.




And so Goatmeal began . . .

story:
Polypill and Oak Aged Licorice works a treat for pain and gout 

A world without pain? Every medical discovery has the potential to affect us all, to save or improve our own lives, or those of people we love.

300 million people suffer from daily pain. There is a need for safe, natural treatments with pharmaceutical potency.

Over the last 14 years, Dr Red scientists have developed antioxidant-rich foods that impact on aging-related conditions. This current medical breakthrough centers on a patent (pending) oak extract that outperformed aspirin and ibuprofen in arthritis trials. An absolute world first!



The aged oak extract formulations, Polypill Joint Capsules and the Oak Aged Licorice deliver pain relief in  1 – 4 days and gout results overnight.

My name is Greg Jardine, an Australian Biochemist who has patented a process for the oak aged foods and supplements, resulting in better absorption in our bodies and allowing them to reach their full potential. 

Professor Lindsay Brown (University of Southern Queensland) was astounded when oak aged foods outperformed aspirin and ibuprofen in arthritis trials. The uric acid reduction results associated with gout were equally impressive.

Polypill in TV media



Polypill in the print media


Oak Aged Licorice in the media



Oak Aged Licorice in the print media


How does it work?



Our Technology

This natural medicine technology platform is based upon the Modified Polyphenol Technology patent (pending - PCT/WO 2014055463 A1). The Modified Polyphenol patent (pending) describes aged oak technology as its impacts on ageing related conditions.

Oak is used traditionally for the symptomatic relief and management of arthritis, rheumatism and osteoarthritic pain. This is due to a polyphenol group called ellagitannins and are found in the oak timber (heartwood). As with other polyphenol rich foods (e.g. tea, coffee and wine), these generally have small effects on the body as these molecules find it difficult to move from the intestines to the cells.

Dr Red extract and age these oak ellagitannins and make them more available to the cells, profoundly increasing their effectiveness.


Polypill Joint Capsules - TGA Listed Medicine


Dr Red Oak Aged Licorice - Product description

Dr Red Oak Aged Licorice is based on a polyphenol rich licorice that is fortified with the patent (pending) Aged French Oak Extract.

It's the combination that works!

Licorice is a food that is high in polyphenols, most notably from the licorice root, aniseed and molasses.



What we're funding

This campaign aims to sell the Polypill Joint Capsules and the new Oak Aged Licorice to international customers.

The proceeds of these sales (up to USD15,300) will be used to provide matching funds (50:50) for an Australian Government Food Innovation grant awarded to Dr Red to develop licorice and natural medicine products that target pain and urinary tract infections.

The Impact

We are an aging population, not just Australia but globally. As we age, we are confronted with a range of health issues that are associated with uncontrolled inflammation in our bodies. The most obvious is pain.

One in five (52.5 million) adults in the United States report having doctor-diagnosed arthritis. In Australia the number is about 4 million people.

Dr Red Oak Aged Licorice has just hit the shelves of Australian Pharmacies and Health Food stores.

THIS CAMPAIGN offers this licorice up to a global audience in need of rapid pain relief. Proceeds  from existing  product sales is used to launch a pill – Polypill Tasmanian Pepper capsules and Aged Oak Licorice - Tasmanian Pepper. 

Both new products are designed to target pain and urinary tract infections (UTI's).

Risks & Challenges

Greg and Katrina Jardine are very proud of the technology they have developed with the main antioxidants in our diet - polyphenols.

It has been a tough 15 years with this Modified Polyphenol Technology project, but now we can claim that foods are not a distant second to pharmaceuticals in the area of treatment of aging related conditions.

The research project we are now commencing whereby we combine our aged oak extract, Tasmanian pepper and aniseed - up against the bacteria that triggers Rheumatoid Arthritis is a very difficult task for natural products. We may not succeed in this endeavour. 

But if it was easy, everyone would be doing it! Right.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute to this program, please tell your friends and family who suffer from aches and pains that there is a natural remedy now available to assist them.

Polypill and the Oak Aged Licorice are available for sale in Australia through pharmacy, health food stores and mail order. This campaign offers up these potent natural products up to countries beyond Australia's shores.

Please give consideration to the BULK BUY option whereby  these products can be added to your existing business as a new revenue stream (e.g. Retail) or start a new health product distribution business and supply to your own network. Additional income is always welcome and you also can help people who suffer from daily pain. 

300 million people suffer from daily pain. This is a big global market and this new anti-inflammatory technology can make a big difference to people you know and those in your community. 

Shipping + Production Time.

Both Polypill Joint Capsules and the Oak Aged Licorice are in sufficient stock to supply the 3 EARLY BIRD / LIMITED OFFERS, namely:

(1) 2 Polypill bottles shipped now (100 perks only)

(2) Oak Aged Licorice – 6 packs (60 perks only)

(3) 2 Polypill bottles, 6 licorice (40 perks only)

The other perks on offer are a pre-order campaign, with funds applied from the perks to finalise the production of the Polypill and the Oak Aged Licorice.

If there is considerable response to this campaign, an additional Polypill batch of 10,000 bottles is currently awaiting testing, encapsulation and bottling. This could be useful if there is strong demand for people who are taking up the opportunity to distribute these products in their country.

Please note: for shipments destined outside of Australia, Dr Red Nutraceuticals Pty Ltd is not responsible for any brokerage fees and/or duties and taxes.

DISCLAIMER:

These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. Dr Red Nutraceuticals Pty Ltd does not intend for any statements to take the place of advice given by your medical professional. It is intended for informational purposes only. Always consult your medical professional before taking any supplement or beginning a new regimen. These products should not be used by those who are pregnant or nursing. If you have a pre-existing condition or are on prescription medication, always consult with your physician first. These products are not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent disease.
story_txt:
Polypill and Oak Aged Licorice works
a treat for pain and gout 


A
world without pain? Every medical
discovery has the potential to affect us all, to save or improve our own lives,
or those of people we love.
300 million people suffer from daily pain. There is a need for safe,
natural treatments with pharmaceutical potency.
Over the last 14 years, Dr Red scientists have developed antioxidant-rich foods that impact on aging-related conditions. This current medical breakthrough centers on a patent (pending) oak extract that outperformed aspirin and ibuprofen in arthritis trials. An absolute world first!




The aged oak extract formulations, Polypill Joint Capsules and the Oak Aged Licorice deliver pain relief in  1 – 4 days and gout results overnight.
My name is Greg Jardine, an Australian Biochemist who has patented a process for the oak aged foods and supplements, resulting in better absorption in our bodies and allowing them to reach their full potential. 
Professor Lindsay Brown (University of Southern Queensland) was astounded when oak aged foods outperformed aspirin and ibuprofen in arthritis trials. The uric acid reduction results associated with gout were equally impressive.
Polypill in TV media
   


Polypill in the print media





Oak Aged Licorice in the media






Oak Aged Licorice in the print media




How does it work?






Our Technology


This natural medicine technology
platform is based upon the Modified Polyphenol Technology patent (pending -
PCT/WO 2014055463 A1). The Modified Polyphenol patent (pending) describes aged
oak technology as its impacts on ageing related conditions.
Oak is used traditionally
for the symptomatic relief and management of arthritis, rheumatism and osteoarthritic pain. This
is due to a polyphenol group called ellagitannins and are found in the oak
timber (heartwood). As with other polyphenol rich foods (e.g. tea, coffee and
wine), these generally have small effects on the body as these molecules find
it difficult to move from the intestines to the cells.
Dr Red extract and age these
oak ellagitannins and make them more available to the cells, profoundly
increasing their effectiveness.

Polypill Joint Capsules - TGA Listed Medicine






Dr Red Oak Aged Licorice - Product description
Dr Red Oak Aged Licorice is based on a polyphenol rich licorice
that is fortified with the patent (pending) Aged French Oak Extract.
It's the combination that works!
Licorice is a food that is high in polyphenols, most notably
from the licorice root, aniseed and molasses.




What we're funding

This campaign aims to sell the Polypill Joint Capsules and the new Oak Aged Licorice to international customers.
The proceeds of these sales (up to USD15,300) will be used to provide matching funds (50:50) for an Australian Government Food Innovation grant awarded to Dr Red to develop licorice and natural medicine products that target pain and urinary tract infections.


The Impact

 

We are an aging population, not just Australia but globally. As we age, we are confronted with a range of health issues that are associated with uncontrolled inflammation in our bodies. The most obvious is pain.
One
in five (52.5 million) adults in the United States report having
doctor-diagnosed arthritis. In Australia the number is
about 4 million people.
Dr Red Oak Aged Licorice has just hit the shelves of Australian
Pharmacies and Health Food stores.

story:
Hello, 

I'm Miss Comfort Oyayi Daniel.

You never really know the value of health till you are sick. I am a woman with a dream to become a journalist and this led me to pursue a degree in mass communication. My zeal and passion for the things I do attracted admirations from people around me who were greatly encouraged.

I kept setting goals and doing my best to build a future not just for myself but also for a better society. Things seemed to be working out well till when I was diagnosed of Breast Cancer (invasive ductal CA of the left breast, ER/PR negative, HER 2 neu positive: Stage 2) at Asokoro Hospital Abuja. I was told it was a malignant tumor, hence life threatening. Since June 2015 when I left the hospital after mastectomy (removal of left breast), I have not been able to go back for thechemotherapy(TCH Taxane, Carboplatin, Herceptin) regimen because I don’t have$35,966.

I struggled all through 2015 to raise the money to no avail. This is 2016 and still nothing. I don’t want it to advance to incurable cancer. I am 34 year old. I have a lot of dreams, aspirations, lives that depend on me and lives to touch. Breast Cancer cannot take all of that from me. I don’t want it to. It has taken enough. My boss fired me immediately after my diagnosis and breast removal (mastectomy). Breast Cancer took my job away from me, it has chased suitors away, it has stagnated my dreams, I may never know the joy of a mother at this rate. Breast cancer has taken my left breast; I don’t want it to take my life. My confidence and life is threatened.

…but I believe there is still hope. I am broken but I haven’t given up yet. Where there is life, there is hope. Help me to save my LIFE. It’s a lot of money but your $1 can make a difference. Help me get my life back. Help me achieve my dreams. Help me!

I am Miss Comfort Oyayi Daniel, I do not want to die without living an impact on the world. I do not want to be “the lady that died of breast cancer”, I want to be a woman of impact in Africa.

Cancer affects us all directly or indirectly. Join the fight against cancer and save a beautiful soul today. It could have been any of us! No one chooses to have a MEDICAL condition that is beyond his/her control. 

Let’s wipe the tears in my eyes!

Only you can help me prevent the cancer from spreading to other vital organs of my body! Please, Save Oyayi; Contribute to my Chemotherapy. #SaveOyayi

story:
Short Summary

MySesame snacks are black sesame snacks that contain more than just black sesame seeds. We have added other ingredients that are grounded into powder, so our customers only taste the bold flavor of the black sesame seeds! We use these little tiny black seeds as our main ingredient, simply because they are extremely healthy for our bodies. MySesame Snacks are sweet, chewy, healthy, and yummy!

MySesame Snacks are

  • All natural
  • Contains no preservatives
  • Vegan
  • Yummy!

Original MySesame ingredients

NON-GMO Corn Syrup (NO HFCS), Black Sesame Seeds, Fo-ti powder, goji berry powder, oats, Flaxseeds, green tea powder



Black sesame seeds have essential nutrients such as copper, manganese, calcium, magnesium, iron, phosphorus, vitamin B1, zinc, fiber, and even contains omega 3 and 6 fatty acids! 

Black sesame seeds are known to fight cholesterol, strengthen our bones, hair, great for our skin, lower blood pressure, relief constipation and indigestion, and more. These seeds may be tiny, but they are packed with essential nutrients that can help us in many ways. 

No one would usually eat a tablespoon full of black sesame seeds, so we made it into sweet chewy snacks that anyone can enjoy. Instead of eating snacks that does not have too much nutrients, replace it with MySesame Snacks! 

MySesame with walnuts and cranberries 

The ingredients are the same, with walnuts and cranberries added.

Each snack will be individually packaged to keep its freshness. 

Storage for MySesame Snacks is 3 months. We recommend to finish the snacks as soon as possible to taste the freshness of the black sesame seeds. 

Indiegogo Promotion!

FREE SHIPPING to anyone that resides in the USA. Rest of the world is $25. After we launch on our website, there will be a shipping fee for any location. Price on Indiegogo is also a promotional price! 

What We Need

The funds will help MySesame purchase sufficient ingredients, packaging materials, labeling materials, and equipment.

What You Get
Unique, healthy and delicious snacks!

The Team & the Impact
I'm Crystal, and my husband, Josh and I are the owners of MySesame Snacks. Our parents have been selling these snacks in Taiwan for over a decade, and we decided to start the business here in the United States. Their ingredients are slightly different, but the way it's made is the same. We believe this company has great potential, and we need your help to make it happen. You guys would make a HUGE impact if we are able to reach our goal. We would be able to start as soon as possible, and share MySesame snacks with everyone. 

The big picture of MySesame Snacks

Our goal isn't just to make profit, but to help others in need. I picture MySesame Snacks as a gateway for us to assist the hungry kids and adults. I have always felt the happiness inside every time I bought meals for the homeless man near the market I go to, and I plan to use some of our profits to do the same for more people.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you are not able to contribute, you can always help by sharing MySesame's Indiegogo page through social media. 

Thank you all so much for reading, contributing and sharing. We really appreciate any support, it means a whole lot to us. MySesame can't wait to share the snacks with everyone!

story:
We have bought the plants! Now we need to buy the weed matting, staples, rebar, and fertilizer!

Over the past three years, we at Dover Vineyards have produced some of North Carolina's Best Wine. Currently, we have 4 acres of grapes- Chambourcin and Villard blanc. These wines are selling so well that we are ready to expand! We have purchased enough Cabernet Franc, Petit Verdot and Villard blanc to plant 3 more acres and will begin doing so next week. Now we need to raise the money to purchase fertilizer, rebar to support the plants and weed matting and staples to protect the plants from weeds.

The reason we are doing an IndieGoGo campaign is that it takes 4 years to start getting a return on our investment from a new vineyard. First, you have to let the grapes grow for three years! Then, on the third year, you pick the grapes, and make the wine. Approximately a year after picking, you have a product ready for sale.

Your contribution to our campaign will help make this expensive process much less painful. Every dollar counts!!  Every dollar helps buy a piece of rebar, an extra foot of weed matting or staples to hold the matting down.

In order to plant a vineyard, we need
- 3000 grapvines- already purchased!!
- 12,000 feet of landscape fabric and 6,000 staples to hold the fabric down
- fertilizer
-3000 pieces of rebar

Why we are doing this
We know that we are blessed to have 4 acres of grapes that produce high quality North Carolina wine. However, right now, we are not operating at full capacity. If we are able to plant more acres of vines, we will be able to operate more efficiently. We will then be able to support hiring a person to manage the sales and marketing of the wine, as well as a person to manage the vineyard.

Also, we would like to improve our market mix. Growing Cabernet Franc and Petit Verdot will allow us to produce even better wine than we do now. We will be able to blend in a few grapes with the Chambourcin to make it more complex. Depending on how the grapes turn out, we might make a Cab Franc blend, with the Petit Verdot, or make two new stand-along wines. With the new Villard blanc planting, we hope to do a late harvest wine, something similar to a Sauternes.

Risks and Challenges

As with anything in agriculture, the weather, pests, and other acts of God can easily wipe out a crop or a planting. Nevertheless, we have researched these varieties extensively and after working with them at other vineyards, we are confident that we can produce some great Cabernet Franc, Petit Verdot, and Villard blanc.

Other ways you can help
Planting this vineyard is not simply about raising the money! We will also need help putting the vines in the ground! If you're interested in joining us for planting, the vines will begin to arrive April 6th and we will need all the help we can get. Email me at thefarmatdovervineyards@gmail.com to sign up! Use the IndieGoGo share tool to get the word out. We honestly can't do this without you!
