story:
Statistics show that 90% of people over the age of 30 have some form of dental disease. Everyone hates to have a dental procedure done but we all want to have nice white teeth, and sweet smelling breath.  In order to have these things we need to have a healthy mouth, and unfortunately, with many dental products are proving to be somewhat ineffective.  That tells us that even with brushing twice daily, flossing regularly and visiting the dentist twice a year we have a big problem! 

The problem is that the products that we are using are not doing what we expect them to do.   If they did work effectively, our teeth and gums would be in great shape and we would eliminate things like root canals, gum disease, cavities and bad breath.

We've created a 100% natural, botanical solution that is a toothpaste replacement called bodyFood Dental.  bodyFood is a one drop solution of botanical oils that is specifically formulated to kill germs, that cause plaque build up, gingivitis, cavities and bad breath, and to detoxify the mouth and bring it into a state that is balanced and harmonious to your whole body.  We now know that our oral health is directly linked to heart health, osteoarthritis, dementia and all sorts of other health issues.

It is so effective that one drop is all you need to harmonize your dental health. You will be amazed that something in such a small package can be so powerful. Size doesn't matter with bodyFood Dental, because a little bit goes a long way. This makes it an ideal solution for those who want to clean their teeth on the go. Just one small drop on your toothbrush will do the trick, with none of the foamy mess that comes along with regular toothpaste. 

Using bodyFood Dental one drop solution cleans your mouth so effectively that it is hard to believe.  Every day you will feel like you've visited your dental hygienist for a cleaning.  Your teeth are smooth and clean, your breath is fresh and the whole experience is quite incredible.  In fact, we believe that the majority of people really have no idea what it feels like to have super clean teeth on a daily basis because traditional products simply do not clean your teeth like bodyFood Dental.  Dental hygienists are making note and commenting on the change in the state of oral health in thier clients that are using bodyFood Dental products.

The product is made from specifically chosen essential oils in a neem oil base and is available with or without peppermint.  We have also formulated a dental gel, which consists of our special formula in a coconut oil base, and a 100% natural mouthwash, that helps to remove stains from teeth and keeps your breath oh so sweet smelling!

It's all about getting rid of the bad germs in a way that is healthy and safe to the body.  You can brush your teeth as often as you want as there are no side effects, providing you are not allergic to any of the ingredients in the product which are, neem oil, cinnamon, clove, cardamon, cayenne, sage, spearmint and peppermint.  Since this is a totally natural product, your body absorbs and digests the solution with no side affects.

We have everything in place, and the product is registered with Health Canada as a cosmetic but we want to go further and make claims that we know are true such as, bodyFood dental reduces gum inflammation, reduces gingivitis, prevents cavities, stops gum bleeding, promotes fresh breath and produces more saliva.  In order to accomplish this we need to do extensive lab testing which we have already started and we need funds for marketing so that we have a voice and can be the change in the dental world for the benefit of all.   bodyFood Dental has been sold for almost a year now and many of our clients have cut their dental cleanings in half and have saved a lot of money on dental procedures.  Some people have even reported that their receding gums are coming back down.  This is possible because its the plaque at the gum line that makes your gums recede and if you don't have plaque then this won't happen.

We guarantee that you will never go back to using toothpaste once you have experienced, replacing toothpaste with our bodyFood Dental product. We appreciate your support in helping us to shake up the world of dental hygiene and to eliminate dental issues naturally and safely by replacing toothpaste with pure oils that have been used historically to prevent dental disease, gingivitis, bleeding gums and tooth decay.
story_txt: Statistics show that 90% of people over the age of 30 have some form of dental disease. Everyone hates to have a dental procedure done but we all want to have nice white teeth, and sweet smelling breath.  In order to have these things we need to have a healthy mouth, and unfortunately, with many dental products are proving to be somewhat ineffective.  That tells us that even with brushing twice daily, flossing regularly and visiting the dentist twice a year we have a big problem!  The problem is that the products that we are using are not doing what we expect them to do.   If they did work effectively, our teeth and gums would be in great shape and we would eliminate things like root canals, gum disease, cavities and bad breath.We've created a 100% natural, botanical solution that is a toothpaste replacement called bodyFood Dental.  bodyFood is a one drop solution of botanical oils that is specifically formulated to kill germs, that cause plaque build up, gingivitis, cavities and bad breath, and to detoxify the mouth and bring it into a state that is balanced and harmonious to your whole body.  We now know that our oral health is directly linked to heart health, osteoarthritis, dementia and all sorts of other health issues.It is so effective that one drop is all you need to harmonize your dental health. You will be amazed that something in such a small package can be so powerful. Size doesn't matter with bodyFood Dental, because a little bit goes a long way. This makes it an ideal solution for those who want to clean their teeth on the go. Just one small drop on your toothbrush will do the trick, with none of the foamy mess that comes along with regular toothpaste. Using bodyFood Dental one drop solution cleans your mouth so effectively that it is hard to believe.  Every day you will feel like you've visited your dental hygienist for a cleaning.  Your teeth are smooth and clean, your breath is fresh and the whole experience is quite incredible.  In fact, we believe that the majority of people really have no idea what it feels like to have super clean teeth on a daily basis because traditional products simply do not clean your teeth like bodyFood Dental.  Dental hygienists are making note and commenting on the change in the state of oral health in thier clients that are using bodyFood Dental products.The product is made from specifically chosen essential oils in a neem oil base and is available with or without peppermint.  We have also formulated a dental gel, which consists of our special formula in a coconut oil base, and a 100% natural mouthwash, that helps to remove stains from teeth and keeps your breath oh so sweet smelling! It's all about getting rid of the bad germs in a way that is healthy and safe to the body.  You can brush your teeth as often as you want as there are no side effects, providing you are not allergic to any of the ingredients in the product which are, neem oil, cinnamon, clove, cardamon, cayenne, sage, spearmint and peppermint.  Since this is a totally natural product, your body absorbs and digests the solution with no side affects.We have everything in place, and the product is registered with Health Canada as a cosmetic but we want to go further and make claims that we know are true such as, bodyFood dental reduces gum inflammation, reduces gingivitis, prevents cavities, stops gum bleeding, promotes fresh breath and produces more saliva.  In order to accomplish this we need to do extensive lab testing which we have already started and we need funds for marketing so that we have a voice and can be the change in the dental world for the benefit of all.   bodyFood Dental has been sold for almost a year now and many of our clients have cut their dental cleanings in half and have saved a lot of money on dental procedures.  Some people have even reported that their receding gums are coming back down.  This is possible because its the plaque at the gum line that makes your gums recede and if you don't have plaque then this won't happen.We guarantee that you will never go back to using toothpaste once you have experienced, replacing toothpaste with our bodyFood Dental product. We appreciate your support in helping us to shake up the world of dental hygiene and to eliminate dental issues naturally and safely by replacing toothpaste with pure oils that have been used historically to prevent dental disease, gingivitis, bleeding gums and tooth decay.

story:
Why Did We Develop HawQ-i?

We developed HawQ-i to help drivers be able to see pedestrians, motorcyclists & bicyclists out on the road.  With the increasing number of people using alternate methods for commuting, the roads are more crowded than ever.  We knew that there was a need to reduce the number of collisions, deaths, and injuries by providing additional information to drivers to make them aware before an accident occurs.

Our founders are road cyclists who had friends who were seriously hurt in collisions that might have been avoided if HawQ-i were available. The increase in the number of deaths and Ghost Bikes along our typical biking routes didn't help ease our fears.

As our CEO was out biking on a beautiful sunny California day, he had a thought...what if you could utilize readily available electronic sensors within products like a cell phone or fitness tracker,  for example, to alert a driver that a pedestrian, motorcycle, or a bicyclist was near so that you could prevent a collision...and save a life?  


That bike ride was the genesis of HawQ-i a Sense and Avoid technology innovation for assisting drivers in detecting people in the vicinity (biking, walking, running, etc).

An Advanced Warning Device

We realized that the major issue for drivers is the inability to "see" bicyclists, motorcyclists, and pedestrians and that most accidents are avoidable if the driver has advanced notice.  We believed that if we could improve the ability for drivers to react that we could provide a viable solution.  So HawQ-i aids the driver by alerting them to the presence of people who might be in their path.


Why is HawQ-i important to us?


Because safer roads impact us all!  We are seeking to reduce the number of deaths and injuries keep rising from vehicle collisions with people in the road.  Just take a look at that the numbers....the US in 2013 there were:

  • Every year 10,000 People are killed in collisions with vehicles-10X more killed by vehicles than guns!
  • 31% of all vehicle-related fatalities are other than the vehicle driver or occupants
  • 200,000 injuries occur as a result of accidents between bicyclists, motorcyclist and pedestrians
  • $4 Billion is lost in property and life due to vehicle-related collisions with bicycles
We desperately need a solution to reduce accidents that don't have to happen. 


That's why we developed HawQ-i and that's why we need your support! HawQ-i is more than just a cool tech product...it's a life-saver! 

Join us in supporting our HawQ-i product and building a community that protects people commuting, working out, going to school and makes the roads a safer place for all! For just a small funding amount you can help to improve lives for millions of people who commute and share roads with vehicles.


HawQ-i Sense & Avoid Technology

 
What makes this technology unique?  Today there are no products that are able to do what HawQ-i Sense can.  There are camera-based solutions in vehicles today that are extremely effective for backing-up or when people are directly in front of the vehicle. 

However HawQ-i Sense operates for situations not covered by camera-only solutions.  Instead, our technology can augment camera systems and is able to detect sensors within 360 degree radius of the device.  The majority of technology focus is on safety solutions that automate decision-making.  

Instead HawQ-i alerts drivers to the presence of people in or near the road before an accident occurs via detection of available low power sensors that are in many of today’s fitness products (ANT+/BLE) and today's Smartphones (BLE).  HawQ-i Sense & Avoid provides drivers with alerts or reminders allowing the driver and road conditions to dictate appropriate action or actions.

HawQ-i Sense does not automate driving, rather it provides additional information so that a driver can take the appropriate action.



How HawQ-i System Works


1.  HawQ-i Sense Device:

Sense is a portable, low-power device (2.25"X2.25"X.50") that easily attaches to your vehicle's visor.  Sense continuously scans for ANT+ and/or Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) sensors.        

2.Sensors

Sense rapidly processes the received sensor signals  (faster than the blink of an eye) and provides the driver with both a visual and audio alert. 

HawQ-i Sense contains all of the electronic circuitry including the antenna and is housed in an attractive injection-molded case (shown here in gun-metal gray, but also available in royal blue and burgundy). All sensors contain communication protocol that can be detected by devices (receivers) that understand that protocol. 

3. Action

Once detected, Sense alerts the driver to the presence of bicyclists, motorcyclists and pedestrians via HawQ-i's alerts.

4. Outcome 

The driver is able to make necessary adjustments, an accident is

avoided and a LIFE SAVED!


Products

We have developed the HawQ-i product family of low power IoT devices that enable collision avoidance for personal and business use.

This family includes three products:  HawQ-i Sense, HawQ-i Pulse and our Beacon Smartphone App.


HawQ-i Sense

HawQ-i Sense & Avoid is the only product available today that detects multiple signals (not just BLE) and alerts the driver or operator! 

For less than the cost of your insurance deductible Sense can assist you in avoiding collisions and making the roads safer!

A comprehensive solution detecting BLE, ANT+ & Pulse Sensors.  Environmentally-friendly low-power and rechargeable devices. Always available 2.4Ghz network that does not need cellular coverage.  Works with over 250 Million ANT+ & 1 Billion BLE products sold. 


HawQ-i Pulse


HawQ-i Pulse is our companion product that can be detected by HawQ-i Sense. It is a personal sensor solution containing detectable sensors.  It is a great solution for business/pleasure, for commuting, and can be utilized for bicyclists, motorcyclists, and people, children, pets, and the elderly.

  • Pulse (when paired with a GPS-enabled Smartphone or GPS-enabled Pulse) can transmit distance to the driver; helping the driver better to avoid people near or in the road. 
  • Additionally Pulse can be used as a theft deterrent as the device can alert the owner to movement (attached to person, bicycle, backpack, purse, stroller, wheelchair, etc.)
  • Rechargeable Low Energy Device with USB connector for recharging


Detectable Sensors

HawQ-i Sense is able to simultaneously detect ANT+ and Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) sensors/phones*.

These sensors include the following:
  • ANT+ Fitness Sensors (Garmin VivoSmartHR, Edge, etc.)
  • Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) sensors in Fitness Sensors (BLE 4.0=Fitbit, Jawbone, Garmin Activity Trackers
  • Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE)-enabled Android and iPhones

*These products are detectable in Broadcast Mode (Please check your device manual for steps to ensure the device supports broadcast mode for BLE/ANT+).  For BLE solutions, any BLE, Bluetooth Low Energy, Bluetooth 4.0 or Bluetooth Smart products are compatible.

For more information on ANT+ devices go to: http://www.thisisant.com/directory/ 


HawQ-i is:

  • Ideal for locations with poor visibility (heavy traffic, low light, etc.)
  • Perfect for detection even at moving at high speeds
  • Uses sensors already available today in fitness equipment & activity trackers (ANT+, Bluetooth Low Energy & Custom Sensors)! Yeah!
  • Great for vehicle & equipment operators

Features & Benefits




Turning an idea into a real product!


However just having an idea isn't enough...you need to have expertise.  Fortunately, our team at Quantum Dimension, Inc. specializes in embedded low-power devices.  Our team's expertise led us to the development of HawQ-i Sense, a vehicle-based receiver and HawQ-i Pulse a small sensor which can be detected by HawQ-i Sense.


Why Are We Seeking Funding?

We have done a significant amount of work already...literally thousands of hours!  We have worked on the design, board layout, component selection, PCB manufacture and assembly, testing, software development, case design and develop manufacturing partners and vendors for completion of the product, case, and packaging. 

We really need your help in funding us so that we can get HawQ-i in all cars & trucks!

We are not Venture Capital backed and would like to get a major vehicle manufacturer to adopt our technology. 

The more sales we have the better chance we have a getting this into all vehicles!  So PLEASE SUPPORT US!  It's socially responsible and everyone will benefit from your contribution.

 We only have 5% of the work to complete!  Help us get it done! We have fully working Sense prototype and we need the requested funding to finalize HawQ-i Sense, HawQ-i Pulse and the HawQ-i Beacon app:
  • To complete final development & manufacturing
  • To complete FCC testing and certifications
  • To perform Quality Control, Warranty, support, etc.
  • To develop marketing channels & the associated fees

Thus, our focus is specifically on innovations that can enhance communication solutions.  This project is low-risk with the majority of the work completed already. 


Timeline


We are ahead of schedule since our initial launch! 

Support Levels


We cannot achieve our campaign goals without your vital support! 

First of all by backing our campaign, you are helping to improve road safety! 

Take a Peek and Pick A Perk!Thanks for supporting our project!



Ways You Can Help

We really need your help to launch HawQ-i Sense & Avoid to reduce accidents and deaths~please select a perk or donate even a small amount to help move this technology forward.  

Our top pick is the $10 Lifesaver-the cost of a movie or a lunch can make a huge difference in helping us get HawQ-i into vehicles near you!


Supporting HawQ-i Sense & Avoid through direct sponsorship is the best way to help move this technology forward.

  • Grab a perk for a friend or family member!
  • Tell your family and friends about the great things we are doing!
  • Share our campaign with your friends, family and co-workers!        
    • Let's Go!  It's time to help save a life!




Meet Our Team

Quantum Dimension develops embedded Internet of Things (IoT) solutions to assist government, companies and consumers in leveraging wireless communication technologies for work and leisure.  Some of our customers/partners include US Air Force, US Army, US Navy, General Dynamics Mission Systems, and Rockwell Collins.

Our team's communication expertise and interest in improving road safety led us to the development of HawQ-i Sense and HawQ-i Pulse.





  More Product Specifications



Frequently Asked Questions

Q: I've seen cars that are equipped with a camera or radar to detect the presence of people in the road.  Does HawQ-i use these technologies?

A:  No, the sensor system we have developed doesn't use radar or cameras.  HawQ-i uses sensors that emit a signal and can be detected by our hardware/software.  The advantage of HawQ-i is that it can be effectively used outside the range of cameras and radar where there is low visibility. 

Q: What if my vehicle already has a back-up camera.  Would HawQ-i Sense be valuable? 

A: Even if you have a backup camera in your vehicle, HawQ-i Sense provides additional support.  Back-up cameras can see directly behind the vehicle, whereas HawQ-i Sense can detect people out of visual range.   In fact the strength of HawQ-i is the ability to help you "see" beyond the field of view. 

Q: What is the warranty period for HawQ-i? 

A:  The warranty is a full one year warranty.  The first 30 days is a full replacement for defective units. 

Q: How long can HawQ-i last before it needs to be recharge?

A:  The 3.3v battery is fully rechargeable with a typical battery life of over 8 hours of driving time. 

Q: How can I be detected by HawQ-i Sense?  What devices have sensors that can be detected?

A: Any ANT+ device can be detected by HawQ-i Sense.  There are over 800 products that contain ANT+ sensors and these include:  fitness trackers, bike cadence/speed sensors, bike lights, cameras, heart rate monitors, etc.  For ANT+ products, click on the link www.thisisant.com/directory.  
There are numerous Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) products available in the market but the most prevalent are in Smart phones.   We recommend utilizing our HawQ-i Alert app for use with a Smartphone.   We have included several types of BLE devices that are detectable by HawQ-i.  There are numerous manufacturers of BLE beacons that can be utilized in place of HawQ-i Pulse. 
One of the values of this ecosystem is that numerous products are available that can be detected making it faster for adoption and growth.

Q:  Do I need to purchase HawQ-i Pulse to be detected?

A:  No you would not need purchase HawQ-i Pulse if  you already have ANT+ or BLE products which are detectable.   HawQ-i Pulse will include functionality not available in other ANT+ and BLE solutions.   We plan to expand the functionality beyond the level of detection and provide alerts for the wearer/user of Pulse (stretch goal or newer version). 

Q:  If I already have a camera in my car, do I need HawQ-i Sense?

A:  Yes!  Having a camera in your vehicle helps for situations like backing up or for those directly in front of the vehicle.  However,  HawQ-i Sense helps to expand upon visual detection, since people may be present, but they may not be visible.  The two products working together would enhance safety!

Q:  Do you have affiliation with any of the companies products you show: Garmin, Jawbone, and Fitbit?

A: No, we do not have an affiliation with any of these companies, nor do we endorse any of their products.  Part of our certification process will be to certify our solution with ANT+ which is a specific protocol. The products shown on this site and in our video are examples of products which have these sensors.  No warranty of fitness is expressed or implied.  For utilization with an existing product, check the user manual for specific directions on utilizing your product in broadcast mode.

Q:  I noticed that the Perk for the Leather Tech Bag is made by The Gwen Marie Collection.  What is The Gwen Marie Collection?

A:  Yes!  The Gwen Marie Collection is a company that sells quality products and has designed this case for us.  Get one while they are still available!  https://www.facebook.com/gwenmariecollection

Q:  I originally saw a longer version of the video.  Can I still see that?

A:  Yes!  Here is the link for the full version.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZfASSstpmxQ

 Yes!  The Gwen Marie Collection is a company that sells quality products and has designed this case for us.  Get one while they are still available!  https://www.facebook.com/gwenmariecollectionQ:  I originally saw a longer version of the video.  Can I still see that?A: 
 Yes!  Here is the link for the full version.https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZfASSstpmxQ

story:
Short Summary

     Did you know that 75% of all healthcare costs go to manage chronic diseases? Yes, that's right. Yet today, we have no way to manage chronic diseases where people live their everyday lives.

     Ateko, the healthcare vertical of opusomni, is designed to help you manage chronic diseases where you live your everyday life through your mobile device. Ateko picks up where healthcare leaves off to help you manage your health and well-being in your community where you live your everyday life.

     Healthcare is utterly broken. Our current healthcare system is utterly failing to provide the kind of care people need where they need it to make their lives better.

     Take Alzheimer's for example, the Alzheimer's Association says treating dementia in 2014 cost the U.S. $226 billion, of which $153 billion was the cost to Medicare and Medicaid alone. Additionally, in 2014, the 15.7 million unpaid caregivers of people with Alzheimer's and other dementias provided an estimated 17.9 bilion hours of unpaid care, a contribution to the nation valued at $217.7 billion.

     Your contribution of $7,500 will put your corporate or not-for-profit Ad in the hands of ateko users. Your brand will be part of the Inaugural Contributor advertising set. Highlighted at app launch, you will be spotlighted for your help in building the ateko app and lauded for your role in adding to the Collective Wisdom. Your advertisement will be in rotation on http://ateko.co/ over the next year after the campaign ends, an estimated discount of well over 75% off our introductory ad pricing. The number of Ad Perks will be limited so contribute early or miss out.

     Our healthcare system is utterly failing to provide these caregivers with meaningful information, resources, and connectivity to make their lives and their loved ones lives' better.

     We have the power to fix this. We have the power to make life better for caregivers and their loved ones who suffer from Alzheimer's. We also have the power to make life better for people who suffer from other chronic diseases like diabetes, heart disease, obesity, falls, autism, PTSD, cancer, arthritis, and others.

     We need your help. You have the power to help make life better for people who struggle with chronic diseases. You have the power to help reinvent healthcare delivery. Your generous donations, your participation in our social network, and your shared wisdom and insights through our ateko app will help build the future for how healthcare should be delivered. It's ours to shape.

     My name is Beth Wright. I am the Founder & CEO of Translational Education LLC, inventor of the opusomni ecosystem, and product visionary about how we reinvent healthcare. This is my life's work.

     I am an occupational therapist who has practiced for 24 years and treated patients across the continuum of care including acute care, acute rehab, skilled nursing rehab, long term care, home health, hospice, outpatient rehab, independent living, assisted living, acute psychiatric care, psychiatric day treatment, pediatric school system, and pediatric outpatient rehab.

     I understand what's broken. I want to fix it. I need your help.

     Let's run through a couple of other examples, quickly now.

     Did you know, what's the number one reason for leg amputations in America? Diabetes. Foot inspections and good diabetic foot care can reduce the risk of people losing a leg. Yet, today, across the continuum of care, from acute care through rehab to home health, I rarely see an occupational therapist, a physical therapist, a doctor, or a nurse teach a person the daily life habits they need to know to prevent them from losing their leg. We have the power to fix this. We have the power to connect to people with Diabetes through their mobile devices to teach them daily habits to reduce their risk of losing a leg. We have the power to connect them to other people struggling with Diabetes to help them stay motivated and share what works for them. We have the power to create collective wisdom.

     Now, shifting gears quickly. Did you know, what's the number one reason people 65 and older go to the emergency room? Falls. That's right. Yet again, today, across the continuum of care, from acute care through rehab to home health, I rarely see an occupational therapist, a physical therapist, a doctor, or a nurse teach a person the daily habits they need to know to prevent them from falling. The CDC (Centers for Disease Control and Prevention) and the NIH (National Institutes of Health) have lots of data to show that falls are largely preventable, with the right strategies. But, these strategies rarely reach people who need them today. We have the power to connect to people who are at risk for falls through their mobile devices to teach them daily habits and ways to modify their homes and tasks to reduce their risk of falling. We have the power to connect them with other people who are at risk of falling to help them stay motivated and share what works for them. We have the power to create collective wisdom.

     A contribution of $5 will ensure that you receive a priority invitation to use and share ateko for a condition that affects you or your loved one, so you can join the Collective Wisdom. So, whether you or a loved one struggles with obesity, diabetes, autism, PTSD, cancer-aftercare or other challenges, you will be notified as soon as they release and offered a priority invitation as a Select Member of our Alpha Team. You will be the person that your friends remember for giving them the introduction to the ateko system. Alpha Team Member perks will be capped at 1,000 team members per condition so act now!


     We need your help. We need your generous donations. We need you to participate in our social network at http://ateko.co/. We need you to share your wisdom and insights as we grow our community of ateko apps to manage all the different chronic diseases. Together, we will build the future of how healthcare should be delivered.


What We Need

Our Donation Goals:

$200,000 accelerates development time and builds a consumer App for Alzheimer's Dementia Management for Caregivers to help compile and disseminate the shared progress and results for the Alzheimer’s dementia community.

$500,000 will get the team out of Beth’s living room and into an office. We might even get a coffeemaker. Collaborating in the same space, day in and day out, will rapidly accelerate our development time.

$1,000,000 puts us squarely in the middle of the fight against Alzheimer’s as we develop multimedia features and robust reporting to help aid in defining best practices derived from the collective wisdom of the community.

$1,200,000 allows us to establish a research platform to study and measure the efficacy of community-endorsed methods to cope with Alzheimer’s and chart new paths forward for the ateko family members now and into the future.

The Impact

     Have you ever met anyone who went to school and acquired a bunch of book knowledge, and then went out and tried to apply what they had learned in the real world?

     This is the problem opusomni is designed to solve.

     Opusomni translates book knowledge into lived experience so people perform education, work, and health management tasks better.

     Opusomni is an evidence-based approach, rooted in a broad body of evidence in the life sciences and propounded in my meta-theory, Translational Education, about what factors drive performance achievement in authentic environments.

     Opusomni is easy to use. Opusomni takes this broad body of evidence, that is difficult to understand and perhaps more difficult to apply, and turns it into a Heuristic...something that is so easy to do; a daily life habit--to drive performance achievement and make life better. Learners do three simple things every week and life gets better! Learners set, save, and share.

     Opusomni is a patented system, U.S. 8,628,331, with 98 claims, under twelve (12) U.S. Classifications. A U.S. Continuation Application, U.S. 2014/0106318, the "first child" of the issued U.S. "parent patent" U.S. 8,628,331, is currently being prosecuted. The International Patent Application has been filed and published. This is the first step in protecting the U.S. issued patent rights internationally. The core technology of "Set, Save, Share" is patented.

     Opusomni is built upon a massive, elegantly designed structured data set, amenable to sophisticated quantitative, qualitative, and mixed method scientific, outcomes-based, and quasi-ethnographic research. The data set creates opportunities for best-in-class large scale studies for improving our management of chronic diseases where people live their everyday lives.

     Ateko's First Annual Collective Wisdom Conference will bring together the forward-thinking leaders of healthcare to share success stories and innovations from your brand's perspective. This Conference will help define the evolution of modern healthcare. A contribution of $15,000 will place your narrative in the spotlight and give you the opportunity to keynote, speak, or host breakout sessions. The number of Conference Sponsorship Perks will be limited so contribute early.

      Opusomni’s core technology of “Set, Save, Share” is scalable across all major life roles across the lifespan. Whether you are seven or one hundred and seven, learning second grade math, managing your diabetes, learning to use a new piece of diagnostic equipment in your surgical specialty, perfecting your lacrosse game, preventing a fall, learning to breastfeed your infant and childproof your home, or caregiving for a loved one with Alzheimer’s, opusomni makes life better.

     A contribution of $5 will ensure that you receive a priority invitation to use and share ateko for a condition that affects you or your loved one, so you can join the Collective Wisdom. So, whether you or a loved one struggles with obesity, diabetes, autism, PTSD, cancer-aftercare or other challenges, you will be notified as soon as they release and offered a priority invitation as a Select Member of our Alpha Team. You will be the person that your friends remember for giving them the introduction to the ateko system. Alpha Team Member perks will be capped at 1,000 team members per condition so act now!


Risks & Challenges

     Did you know that only 3% of all female Founders in America ever receive Venture Capital to fund their ideas? That's right. And so, I must become a member of "The 3% Club!" Read on.recode.net/1IMvsJz

     Additionally, we are moving into some of the most heavily regulated areas in our economy:  healthcare, education, and research. We are deeply committed to being good stewards of what we are creating. We will do our very best to comply with a sea of federal, state, and even international laws and regulations. This is expensive.

     Innovation always out-paces the law. We will find ourselves at the bleeding edge of privacy rights, self-regulation of the professions, and consumer autonomy. We will do our very best to engage in meaningful conversations with all of our stakeholders and participate in forging "NextGen" healthcare, education, and research.

     Given all this, we still face seemingly insurmountable barriers. Huge companies with billions of dollars have set their sights on fixing healthcare, education, and research. We see them in our rearview mirror. I say this because they want very much to fix it, but they don't have a viable solution that scales across healthcare, education, and research . . . that scales across all major life roles, across the lifespan, to make life better in communities where people live their everyday lives. We do.

     We need YOU.


Other Ways You Can Help

     No donation is too small. Can you spare one dollar? Even one dollar will help. Even one dollar means "casting your vote" that you believe in what we are doing. We will hear you. We will be grateful for your support.

     Please tell everyone you know about what we are trying to do to make life better.

     YOU know what to do. Help share what we are trying to do during the hours of your everyday lives with family and friends, and during your connected lives on your favorite social networks. We will be so grateful if you do.

story:
My Story

        I'm a Syrian farmer from a small village at the North corner of Israel- Syria borders, exactly the Golan Heights . My Village"Boqatha" is well-known of its fruit and Apples farms.  Although my beautiful village has affected by a bad political situations in Israel and Syria .I'm –like other civil farmers–struggling to keep our lives peaceful and healthy as much as we can .I passionately continue what I was inherited by fathers , an ancient craft which is making healthy food and organic products from apple .I used to make Apple cider vinegar from 100% organic trees , without any chemicals , no artificial substances  and even without any electrical machines . so I provide an exceptional  product which helps people preventing  their bodies healthy  so they enjoy their lives and defends tens of dangerous  diseases  .

      I have started my Apple Vinegar project since 1999 AD. Making and selling my products, today customers can buy Organic Apple Cider Vinegar  from a variety
number of  market places in Israel , West Bank . and sometimes outside the
country . Eventually according to the demand rate, no doubt ,we've succeeded to gain the satisfaction of our customers .
    

 Background    

    After all these years I've established a project and here are what I've and what I need to continue :

  • -  appropriate healthy place belong to the project owner : offered
  • -  Stream suppliers of Apple corps : offered
  • -  Cost of Apple corps : offered
  • -  Annual Salaries of the team ( 5 workers) : offered 
  • -  A van : 12000$ offered
  • -  Primary Tools (huge glass & wood barrels , work uniform ): offered
  • -  Primary Equipment's and machines  :offered
  • -  Glass Bottles  with Labels : offered
  • -  Taxes & bills : offered 
  • -  Solar system for electricity power : offered 2 pieces
  • -  Security and Fire extinguishers : offered 

On the other hand I still in need for many essentials , the fund will cover the following budget : 

  • -  Developing  the  factory place  :  7500$
  • -  Specific Machines ( choppers – washing containers .. etc.)  : 32000 $
  • -  Specific Tools (huge glass & wood barrels ): 3000$
  • -  Online Marketing  (  Google AdWords- PPC sites – E-shopping ) : 1800$ .
  • -  Local Marketing (banners and posters  ,magazines , radio ads ) : 900$.
  • -  A Van : 9000$
  • -  Improving Solar system for electricity power : 1200$

The Impact

 In this campaign I'm looking for getting fun to establish a specific factory that contains specific machines made by stones, wood , metals , natural cotton covers , huge glass barrels , in the other hand , also maintaining new global and local marketing channels like online sites . so I could improve  this ancient craft , and expanding my production ability , promoting  such a valuable products to all people around the world . emphasizing the trust of our current customers .
  • Finally : we would like to warmly  thank all the partners , workers in my project  and each contributor. Actually we appreciate your help . but be sure that's your trust is in the great priority of us . so kindly accept  our invitation to give us your hand and to try our Organic Apple Vinegar  .

Risks & Challenges

  • -  More permissions and insurances required from the officials for the next five years which need more  money .
  • -  Promoting products inside the country using one car caused a slow delivering .
  • -  Solar systems for operating machines is healthy but expensive .
  • -  Selling products online require a professional knowledge . and working with an outside contractor .
  • -  There's a competencies but keep our products quality the highest and the only natural 100%.

Other Ways You Can Help

if you trust my campaign , and would like to help .

story:
With your help we will be able to launch our company while continuing our research and development of new prescription and non-prescription products in a cost effective and efficient manner. Visit our evolving website at tdtherapeutics.com for more information. At the end of the campaign we will also be able to develop an eCommerce site where you will be able to order additional Natural Patches as well as new patches as they become available.  We thank you in advance for your help.

Our first priority is our commitment to patients, doctors, nurses, and medical practitioners. Our primary goal is to develop new therapies that make a significant difference in the lives of patients and their families. We will merge medicine with the power of cutting-edge technology to develop cost effective efficient therapeutic options through a collaborative mentality to attain this goal. 

​Our Focus and Vision
TD Therapeutics is focused on developing innovative therapies that merge medicine with technology and have the potential to address the way we treat acute and life-threatening diseases in specific patient populations.  While our therapeutic applications have the potential to apply to a broad range of diseases, our initial focus is cardiovascular disease, inflammatory joint disease, infectious disease and over-the-counter vitamins, minerals and natural formulations that would be therapeutically beneficial. Many such therapeutic areas exist including cardiovascular and metabolic, autoimmune, respiratory, joint and muscular disease.

Our vision is to transform how the world approaches the treatment of acute and life-threatening diseases by unlocking the potential of transdermal drug delivery applications. Recognizing the complexity of our vision, we are focused on revolutionizing the standard of care for patients by developing and commercializing the next generation of transdermal therapeutic options. 

Most drugs are taken orally and dosage intervals may be inconvenient.  Some drugs are partly destroyed or neutralized in the stomach, intestine or liver before reaching the bloodstream.  Accordingly a significantly higher dose is needed to ensure efficacy, which in turn may increase the risk of side effects.

Doctors around the world are calling transdermal patches "the delivery system of the future" because it has been discovered that a high absorption rate of many medicines and supplements can be achieved when delivered through the skin.  The reason for this is when medicine or supplements are delivered transdermally; they are absorbed directly into the blood stream initially bypassing the liver, stomach and intestine.

Conversely, studies have shown when some substances are taken orally as little as 5% makes it to the cells where they needed.  It is therefore not appropriate to compare a dosage taken orally with that in a transdermal patch.


What We Do

Transdermal Drug Delivery Systems

Transdermal patches provide a safe effective way to get your medicines while reducing or nearly eliminating the chance of side effects and provide a steady dose of medication over the period of time you wear the patch.

--A Simple, Convenient Way to Get the Remedy You Need –


While tablets and injections have been the traditional way to take remedies and medications, new options are becoming increasingly popular.One highly successful alternative delivery method is the transdermal or "through the skin" patch. Patches can offer several benefits, including more consistent symptom control, enhanced convenience, increased tolerability and the potential for fewer side effects.

Transdermal Delivery System Advantages;

  • Enhancing bioavailability through bypassing first pass metabolism 
  • Minimizing pharmaco-kinetic peaks and troughs
  • Improving tolerability and dosng
  • Reduced side effects
  • Smaller doses of medication
  • Increasing patient compliance
  • Continuous delivery

Factors that can affect bioavailability: the size and type of pill/capsule, the type of inert ingredients included in the preparation, and the crystalline properties and rates of dissolution of the drug itself.

While most dietary supplement pills, capsules, or powder formulas may be very good, they simply cannot get most of their formula nutrients into your bloodstream, which is where they must go to deliver the benefits and results you want.

With today’s advanced time-release transdermal patches, virtually 100% of the formula’s dosages levels are delivered directly into your bloodstream, with no degrading stops along the way. (Stomach Acids & Liver) Better yet, with time-release patches, one’s system can metabolize the formula nutrients more efficiently.

There are many medicines, vitamins and minerals, over-the-counter medicines and prescriptions written by your doctor that the body has trouble processing which increases the chances of side effects.

Our Product Line

TD Therapeutics is a U.S. based pharmaceutical company with an impressive platform to develop drugs to treat diseases in multiple areas of medicine. We are focused on enhancing lives through the development, research and marketing of these innovative therapeutic solutions and drug delivery systems. 

Our primary focus is to deliver medicines through the skin using cutting-edge transdermal drug delivery technology. We are currently in the research and development phases with multiple prescription and non-prescription transdermal patches that will deliver medicine through the skin over a 24 hour, 3 1/2 day and 7 day periods.

We are ready to launch our first over-the-counter product line, "Natural Patches." You will have the opportunity to try them through this campaign and find out why doctors are calling transdermal drug delivery or patches the drug delivery system of the future.  


Made In The USA
Over-the-Counter Products   
  1. Gluco-Patch
  2. Slim Patch
  3. Menopause Patch
  4. Insect Repellent Patch
  5. Her Sensual Patch
  6. His Sensual Patch
  7. Clear Thought Patch
  8. Serenity Patch

Natural Patches are manufactured in the United States in accordance with the F.D.A.'s GMP manufacturing guidelines.

Directions - Apply one patch daily to clean, dry, smooth skin, after 24 hours replace with a new patch in a slightly different position. Results can take up to a few days – depending upon the chemistry of the individual.  We would recommend starting the course 3 to 4 days prior to expectancy or to use the course continually.

GlucoPatch 30 Day Supply:

GlucoPatch is the new revolutionary way to take Glucosamine and Chondroitin. The GlucoPatch is a small, discrete transdermal patch that is placed on any hair free part of the body. The GlucoPatch delivers a constant dose of Glucosamine and Chondroitin over a 24 hour period. Scientists have shown that Glucosamine has greater benefits when taken over the course of the day, rather than in one dose. That  is why the GlucoPatch offers a better, more convenient way of taking Glucosamine.

Glucosamine and Chondroitin are important in the function of our joints. Chondroitin helps to form, nourish and replace Collagen, which helps make up our Cartilage.  Glucosamine works alongside Chondroitin to help stimulate the production and maintenance of Collagen. Together the two play an important role in cartilage metabolism, maintenance and regulation. Adequate amounts of these two nutrients can be crucial for our joints. Glucosamine stimulates the manufacture of substances necessary for proper joint function and is also responsible for joint repair.  Chondroitin helps create a rejuvenating effect on cells and tissue and assists in joint mobility and range of motion.

Ingredients - Glucosamine Hydrochloride, Chondroitin and Cetyl Myristoleate.

Directions - Simply place one Glucosamine patch on a relatively hairless part of the body (the inner arm is perfect). After 24 hours remove and replace with a new patch in a slightly different position, to allow the skin to breathe (if there is any residue of adhesive left on the skin, wash off with warm soapy water)

Slim Patch 30 Day Supply:

The SlimPatch works by gradually releasing a blend of natural appetite suppressants, via a patch which is placed on the body, containing ingredients which remain effective for 24 hours. The patch can be replaced daily for an indefinite period of time and has been proven to be extremely effective in aiding weight loss without some of the harmful side-effects often associated with dieting drugs. Effective, simple to use and completely natural, SlimPatch contains additional nutrients to further supplement a calorie-controlled diet, providing the body with minerals that can often be lost through dieting. 

Each SlimPatch works for a full 24 hours, giving the benefit of working while you are asleep.

  •   Continual Appetite Suppressant
  •   No FAD Diets
  •   All Natural Ingredients
  •   Proven to be Effective
  •   No Harmful Side-Effects
  •   Nothing to Lose, only weight

Ingredients - Each patch contains a powerful proprietary blend of highly-effective herbs: Fucus Vesiculosus: Burns fat and has been widely researched and accepted by the UK Medicines Control Agency (MCA) as a suitable active ingredient for oral administration in herbal medicines, with a medical claim for the treatment of obesity.  Other ingredients are: 5-HTP, Guarana, Zinc Pryuvate, Yerba Mate, Flaxseed Oil, Zinc Citrate, Lecithin, L-Carnitine.

Menopause Patch 30 Day Supply:  

The Menopause Patch is a new drug free product which contains plant extracts rich in phytoestrogens – natural plant-estrogens, as opposed to hormone supplements.

By applying the patch to the skin, symptoms such as mood swings, hot flushes, night sweats, anxiety, depression and loss of libido can all be elevated, providing a wonderful sense of normality. Menopause patch is totally natural. It is not a medicine, but a carefully formulated holistic application which causes no harmful side effects and can be used as frequently as required. Many of the natural ingredients used in Menopause Patch, such as black cohosh and ginger, have been long associated with helping to relieve symptoms of the menopause. The patch also contains gotu kola which helps stimulate cell growth and oat seed for nourishing the nervous system.

Safe and simple to use, each patch is effective for up to 24 hours, offering a natural solution to help better manage symptoms of the menopause. 

Ingredients - Gotu Kola (Hydrocotyle Asiatica), Damiana (Turnera Aphrodisiaca), Black Cohoch (Cimicifuga Racemosa), Valerian (Valeriana Officinalis), Skullcap (Scutellaria Lateriflora), Oat Seed (Avena Sativa), Ginger (Zingiber Officinale).

Directions - Place one Menopause Patch on a relatively hair free part of the body (inner arm, tummy or bottom). After 24 hours remove and replace with a new patch in a slightly different position to allow the skin to breathe (if there is any residue of adhesive left on the skin, wash off with warm soapy water).

Insect Repellent Patch 10 Day Supply:

Each Insect Repellent Patch contains 75mg of Thiamine, a natural vitamin, this works with the body’s own chemistry to create an invisible barrier that shields from biting insects. The Insect Repellent Patch is ideal for holidays, fishing, gardening, BBQ's, Picnics and all outdoor activities. We recommend use on children over the age of 12 months. Thiamine is very hard to obtain through a balanced diet as the cooking process destroys most of the vitamin. The body typically needs less than 2mg of Thiamine per day for a healthy diet; excess Thiamine is passed through the urine, breath and skin, the latter being important. The Insect patch is a 36 hour patch.

  •  Effective, Easy to Apply, Safe
  •  Protection for Children And Adults from mosquitoes other biting insects
  •  All over body protection for 36 hours without reapplying
  •  Contains NO DEET or other harmful chemicals
  •  No Sprays or Cream
  •  No loss of effectiveness whilst showering or swimming
  •  Odourless, Non Greasy and undetectable when worn beneath clothing
  •   Applied & removed in seconds
  •  Prolonged protection from a lightweight small patch

Please note:  As with ALL Insect Repellents on the market, it is still possible to get bitten!  An Insect Repellent will reduce the amount of bites but NO Insect Repellent can guarantee no bites.

Her Sensual Patch 30 Day Supply:

Her Passion Patches capture the essential ingredients used for hundreds of years to increase sexual libido in women and puts them into a transdermal patch for you to wear on a daily basis.

Everyday stresses and problems can have a direct effect on your sex life and worrying about it, usually just makes it worse. This revolutionary new patch has been developed using natural vitamins, herbs and minerals and work as potent sexual stimulants to supplement sexual desire and natural libido.  Containing herbs including ginseng and guarana, the patch ingredients include plant extracts which have all been long associated with encouraging sexual arousal, enhancing the ability to perform and helping to create a more satisfying and rewarding sexual experience. Providing either a solution to concerns over sexual performance, or just a fun way to enhance existing pleasure, these safe and effective patches can be the ultimate bedroom accessory. Ingredients - Gotu Kola (Hydrocotyle Asiatica), Damiana (Turnera Aphrodisiaca), Valerian (Valeriana Officinails), Skullcap (Scutellaria Lateriflora), Oat Seed (Avena Sativa), Ginger (Zingiber Officinale).

For maximum benefit complete the course.

His Sensual Patch 30 Day Supply:

Everyday stresses and problems can have a direct effect on your sex life and worrying about it, usually just makes it worse.

His Passion Patches can help.  The patches offer a safe, chemical free alternative to the range of drugs currently available on the market. His Passion Patches capture the essential ingredients used for hundreds of years to increase sexual libido in men and puts them into a transdermal patch for you to wear on a daily basis. They contain herbs which have all been long associated with encouraging sexual arousal, enhancing the ability to perform and helping to create a more satisfying and rewarding sexual experience. Providing either a solution to concerns over sexual performance, or just a fun way to enhance existing pleasure, these safe and effective patches can be the ultimate bedroom accessory.   Ingredients - Ginseng, Muira Puama, Saw Palmetto, Gotu Kola, Damiana, Fo-ti, Guarana, Fragrance.

For maximum benefit complete the course.

ClearThought Patch 30 Day Supply:

A patch for optimal mental agility and focus

Clearthought is a course of daily patches worn on the body, which releases natural extracts over 24 hours. Each patch features a coloured indicator that dissipates as it is slowly released into the skin. Each patch contains a careful blend of herbs, minerals and other natural substances which may promote and help those seeking better cognitive function. Ingredients – proprietary blend including Ginkgo Biloba, Acettyl-L-Carnitine, Bacopa Monnieri, Magnesium L Threonate, Camellia sinensis.

Serenity Patch 30 Day Supply:

A patch to help alleviate stress levels, naturally.

This revolutionary patch has been developed exclusively to help with the relief of stressful living using traditional herbal ingredients associated with promoting relaxation. Ingredients – proprietary blend including Valeriana Officinalis, Humulus Lupulus, Passiflora Incarnata.

*As with all natural, vitamins, minerals and various over-the-counter products, these Statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration.  These products are not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease. Please consult your physician before stopping or starting any new medications.

With your help we will be developing our eCommerce website where you will be able to order these products and the new over-the-counter products as they become available.  We are working on making the Natural Patches product line available in many retail stores. We are focused on developing prescription and non-prescription transdermal patches in a cost effective manner that will make a difference in lives of patients and their families.

story:
About the Author of "Cook Better A!#HOLE"

I'm Aaron Lunsford.  I'm an author, drummer, and possibly an expert level home cook.  I'm not sure how to verify that.  People say "MMMMM THAT'S GOOD" when they eat my food. 

I'm bad at communicating in person (verbally) about cooking.  Or about anything for that matter.  That's why I'm not doing a pitch video.  One time my sister asked me how  to brown mushrooms and I made her cry.  I didn't mean too.  I don't mean to be an asshole.  My wife may tell you differently. 

If you know anything about me before you came here, it's probably that I was in a semi successful band called, As Cities Burn.  Music was my job for a long time.  But sometimes when I wasn't on tour, playing drums for small amounts of money, I would work in kitchens.  Mostly in Baton Rouge, LA.  I walked in one day to a downtown bar/grill and lied about my experience.  Since that day in 2008, I have grown to love cooking more than I ever loved music. 

Most of my development as a cook has come since leaving restaurant work (although I did learn all my foundations for cooking in restaurants.) Reading cookbooks, learning new techniques by watching videos, and cooking at home almost every day.  You see, I have curated a really nice set of resources for myself to pull from that advance my skills in the kitchen.  Whether that be magazines, TV shows, food writers, or chefs...I know what I like and I know where to find it. 

It seems to me that 99% of people I know aren't pulling from what I would call the "right" resources.  I want to change that.

You guys that know me - friends, family, crossover fans of my band that like my food pics on instagram - are always asking for "recipes".  What an awful word.  I don't have "recipes".  I have just learned to cook.  I reference "recipes".  But rarely do I follow one. 

Technique.  Instinct.  Patience.  Attention to detail.  Good ingredients.  Proper resources.  That's what this book is going to give you.  Oh and yes...recipes (much to my dismay, but hell I want somebody to buy this thing.)

I want you to not suck at cooking.  And I want you to stop asking me how to not suck.  I'm not a "chef" (biggest pet peeve when people talk about my cooking).  I'm not a "foodie" (don't get me started).  I just care about eating well and I believe cooking is fun.  I'm here to point you in the right direction.  I want you to move on to BETTER resources than dumb ass Aaron Lunsford. 

What I Need & What You Get

  • $10K Goal - Sounds like a lot huh? It is.  But a cookbook ain't cheap.  It's not just the printing (which is anywhere between $15 - $20 a copy).  It's testing recipes, photography, book design and layout...and time.  Lot's of time.  I've looked at everything in detail, and I just don't think I get a quality product for less than $10K.  I would rather not do it than put out something sub par. 
  • Perks - Well...a cookbook for one.  Also cool packages where you can come to my house a dinner party, hit the town with me in Nashville and see where I like to eat, and even have me come to you and cook you a private dinner for you and your lady or man or whatever. 
  • What's in the cookbook? - Alllll my favorite things to cook.  I'm thinking between 30 - 40 "recipes" with tons of commentary and insight, tips on technique and my favorite kitchen tools to go along with it. 
  • Where do the funds go? - The vast majority will be spent on printing and recipe testing.  After artwork and all that, if there is any left over I'll probably buy a bunch of new kitchen toys :-).

Why?

Yes...why another cookbook.  Seriously, I kind of don't WANT to do this.  I feel like an ass thinking anybody would WANT me to do it.  There are soooo many great books out there by people more qualified than me.  But, I have had a ton of people ask for this.  So if you WANT it, you are going to have to make it happen.  Otherwise I don't think this is something I would ever do on my own.  It's much cheaper and profitable for me to write band memoirs :-).

    Risks & Challenges

    The biggest risk, other than burning a bunch of shit and having to start over when recipe testing, is not reaching my goal.  If I don't reach the goal, I'm not certain I'll be able to put together a quality product for you guys.  We will have to reassess and see if we can make it happen.  Otherwise, I will just return everyone's money. 

    Oh also, I guess I could die before I finish.  Hopefully my wife can pick it up and finish the rest?

    The biggest challenge?  Time.  This going to take time.  I think I could be looking at a fall/early winter 2016 release. 

    Other Ways You Can Help

    Can't contribute?  No big deal.  But maybe tell your friends for me?
story_txt:
About the Author of "Cook Better A!#HOLE"
I'm Aaron Lunsford.  I'm an author, drummer, and possibly an expert level home cook.  I'm not sure how to verify that.  People say "MMMMM THAT'S GOOD" when they eat my food.  I'm bad at communicating in person (verbally) about cooking.  Or about anything for that matter.  That's why I'm not doing a pitch video.  One time my sister asked me how  to brown mushrooms and I made her cry.  I didn't mean too.  I don't mean to be an asshole.  My wife may tell you differently.  If you know anything about me before you came here, it's probably that I was in a semi successful band called, As Cities Burn.  Music was my job for a long time.  But sometimes when I wasn't on tour, playing drums for small amounts of money, I would work in kitchens.  Mostly in Baton Rouge, LA.  I walked in one day to a downtown bar/grill and lied about my experience.  Since that day in 2008, I have grown to love cooking more than I ever loved music.  Most of my development as a cook has come since leaving restaurant work (although I did learn all my foundations for cooking in restaurants.) Reading cookbooks, learning new techniques by watching videos, and cooking at home almost every day.  You see, I have curated a really nice set of resources for myself to pull from that advance my skills in the kitchen.  Whether that be magazines, TV shows, food writers, or chefs...I know what I like and I know where to find it.  It seems to me that 99% of people I know aren't pulling from what I would call the "right" resources.  I want to change that.You guys that know me - friends, family, crossover fans of my band that like my food pics on instagram - are always asking for "recipes".  What an awful word.  I don't have "recipes".  I have just learned to cook.  I reference "recipes".  But rarely do I follow one.  Technique.  Instinct.  Patience.  Attention to detail.  Good ingredients.  Proper resources.  That's what this book is going to give you.  Oh and yes...recipes (much to my dismay, but hell I want somebody to buy this thing.)I want you to not suck at cooking.  And I want you to stop asking me how to not suck.  I'm not a "chef" (biggest pet peeve when people talk about my cooking).  I'm not a "foodie" (don't get me started).  I just care about eating well and I believe cooking is fun.  I'm here to point you in the right direction.  I want you to move on to BETTER resources than dumb ass Aaron Lunsford.  
  What I Need & What You Get  $10K Goal - Sounds like a lot huh? What's in the cookbook? - Alllll my favorite things to cook.  I'm thinking between 30 - 40 "recipes" with tons of commentary and insight, tips on technique and my favorite kitchen tools to go along with it.  
 Where do the funds go? - The vast majority will be spent on printing and recipe testing.  After artwork and all that, if there is any left over I'll probably buy a bunch of new kitchen toys :-). 
    Why?
Yes...why another cookbook.  Seriously, I kind of don't WANT to do this.  I feel like an ass thinking anybody would WANT me to do it.  There are soooo many great books out there by people more qualified than me.  But, I have had a ton of people ask for this.  So if you WANT it, you are going to have to make it happen.  Otherwise I don't think this is something I would ever do on my own.  It's much cheaper and profitable for me to write band memoirs :-). The biggest risk, other than burning a bunch of shit and having to start over when recipe testing, is not reaching my goal.  If I don't reach the goal, I'm not certain I'll be able to put together a quality product for you guys.  We will have to reassess and see if we can make it happen.  Otherwise, I will just return everyone's money.  
Oh also, I guess I could die before I finish.  Hopefully my wife can pick it up and finish the rest?
The biggest challenge?  Time.  This going to take time.  I think I could be looking at a fall/early winter 2016 release.     Other Ways You Can Help Can't contribute?  No big deal.  But maybe tell your friends for me?

story:
Human Health Watch Indiegogo Story 

Health Care needs its Uber, Facebook and Bitcoin 

The IT revolution made possible self-regulation of many areas of our lives that don’t require external controls any longer. Uber doesn’t need any external input while contacting drivers and passengers. Facebook easily will find people with the same interests all over the world. Even the financing sector, the most regulated part of the economy, has Bitcoins which provides people with an alternative way of paying for goods and services without involving a government and a central bank. These and many other information technology services provide opportunity to satisfy the needs of people using modern IT-tools. 

Probably the only part of our life, which doesn’t have a self-regulated IT tool, is Health Care. For specific reasons: any decision in this field might have crucial consequences for peoples’ health, and even their lives. Patients prefer to get medical advice from doctors and pharmacists who have highly specialized educations and are licensed by the government to give medical advice and provide treatment. 


Only you are fully interested in your health care 

We don’t want to question the how doctors and pharmacists decide about treatments for their patients. At the same time we really don’t know what the specific motivations of any medical professional may be for prescribing you a certain medicine. 

The majority of Health Care personnel are driven by good intentions to help patients, yet other motives are also possible. Pharmacists want to sell modern, but more expensive medicals. There may be no motivation for them to offer older and cheaper pills which could also be effective and help? It may also be a case where there is no need in pills at all and herbs could provide the same relief? True motives of other people are unknown to other – this is a reality. The only party truly interested in the health care of a person for 100% is that person him/herself. 

Each patient should have an alternative expert source of information – not just a doctor’s or pharmacists’ opinion. Which source? We believe it should be the Health Care Statistics from other people. 

How did we come up with the idea? 

In Bill Gates book, Business @ the Speed of Thought, we noticed the success story of two people who managed to win their battles against prostate cancer. Hamilton Jordan, President Carter’s chief of staff, “used the Internet to become an expert on his illness and took an active role in treating it”. The Chairman of Intel, Andy Grove, was also forced to become an expert. “After going online to see what information was available about the various medical approaches, he quickly realized that there were no valid comparative studies. Ever the scientist, he wrote his own comparative study from raw data!” 

Later Bill Gates summarized: “Jordan, with a family history of prostate cancer, chose surgery. Grove, with a different history and circumstance, chose a combination of general and ‘smart bomb’ radiation therapy. The important thing is that with good medical advice and their own research, both men made informed decision by themselves”. 

Unfortunately, not all people are able to make their own research! 

What is Human Health Watch? 

We are designing an IT-tool (a web-service and an App) which will provide users with medical statistics – special customized research on topic regarding how other people did overcome a similar illness. Human Health Watch is a universal medical tracker with the elements of a social network. Patients (or doctors upon request of patients) will put all their illness symptoms, test results and other details into special forms. Users will have their health histories, which will allow them to see trends and provide children with full medical map of their parents. 

At the later stages, when these forms have been filled-in by many people, users will have an overall picture of people’s health, personalized life expectancy, trends in the Health Care and a relative view of the health of mankind. Our fund raising company’s objective is to collect the money needed for the design of Human Health Watch, a revolutionary new IT-tool. 


Our mission 

To provide people with the very specialized capability of having and maintaining a healthy life through the careful tracking of health records based on the combined statistics of people from the individual up to the global levels. 

Why do you need Human Health Watch? 

  • Ability to always be able to get any details about their health history (no need to request any medical institution for data) 
  • Provide doctors with all information about health history in case of emergency, accidents, etc 
  • Use you medical tracker while travelling – the multilingual interface will be clear for all doctors in any part of the world 
  • To have a full set of records related to your previous diseases, treatments and all medical test results. You won’t forget what medication helped you the most! 
  • Ability to build and keep a track record of your family/region health history map 
  • To have the option of getting statistical records of treatment of similar/alternative treatments from other users 
  • Get a personal life expectancy estimate based on your health tracking/life style details 

Why mankind does need Human Health Watch? 

  • To be more healthy, strong and competitive as a biological kind 
  • To analyze modern trends in people’s health 
  • To decrease health care expenditures (because of more precise treatment) 
  • To establish a fair competition in pharmacy and health care industries 


Our Team 

The project idea was designed by two Ukrainians – both are alumni of Kyiv-Mohyla Business School. 

Viktor Sinenko, who is responsible within the team for Project Management, gained significant experience in IT projects working as a Project Manager and CEO of IT-companies. 

Leonid Zyabrev, who acts as an Inspiration Manager, is responsible for promotion and business development. He is an expert in the field of communication with 21 years’ experience in different international and domestic companies. 

The idea to a large extend was inspired by the innovative and positive changes in the field of self-regulation which happened in our country recently. To get more ideas about our home country and its potential please watch the video below: 

Amazing Perks 

We are offering very specific perks for donators to this project: one year plus of life expectancy for each donation of US$20 (no more than 5 years for US$100). The nature of this perk is based on the assumption that only responsible people who are taking care of their own health and the health of their family members psychologically motivated to donate money for this project. 

The Life Expectancy calculation on Human Health Watch initially will be based on two factors: 

  • Statistics on Life Expectancy according to the Year of Birth/Country/Gender 
  • Answers to the Questionnaire regarding Life Style of a user

We are sure that your donation to Human Health Watch statistically might be considered as a feature of people with a healthier life style. There is only one way to check this assumption: to design the Human Health Watch, attract users, and then look at the statistics.

story:
Layover for Truck Drivers




Shower Wipes That are in Production








OUR TEAM

MSG Landa Alfred (US Army RET  Aug 30 2015)  Take care of soldier Co Owner

Louis Rubio (Owner Artisian Dentistry) Donated Warehouse space

Matthew Rehkemper (Consultant)

Jesse Henderson (Marine/Army Vet) RET  Manager

Dustin Bates (Consultant)

Dennis Alfred


Short Summary

Welcome to LAE. We started our wipe company to support our military personnel who were deployed outside of the wire. With that goal in mind we began to look at the needs of the military. Would our female service members benefit from our product? Should we make it larger and thicker for the males? Scented or unscented. Hmmm..Decisions Decisions.

Then we ran into a brick wall. Along the way a few hunters and truck drivers were given our sample wipes to test for field environments. It was love at first use. "Can I get a few more for my next trip?" "I usually don't shower for a week while hunting and those worked really well.. Do you only make these for the military; because these work really really well."

Well, LAE changed forever; so we went back to the drawing board. After many changes and designs were made, we noticed that in many cases there was nothing available for homeless vets, natural disaster victims, home care patients, refugees and many other in need.

Now here we are ready to give our wipes to the world. But funds are low for ordering product. We need you Indiegogoers. Please help us in acquiring the products we need. We have enlisted 2 manufactures to help with on time shipments.

Any amount pledged brings us one step closer to our goal. Help us spread the word by sharing our page.
Hopefully we can achieve our dream of helping cleaning the world one wipe at a time.

For you

Sponsors should be praised and made known to the world. We ask that you stand tall with your Proud Military Sponsor shirt or give some of the purchased packages to a homeless vet or homeless shelter. Maybe pick a cause that will help others and send a care package containing Shower wipes.

The Impact That You Make

 The difference your contribution will make:

  • Service members regain their dignity when water is not available for showers
  • Military members have a way of keeping clean.
  • Make life better for our military men and women.

Risks and challenges

Our team is comprised of seasoned military veterans, consultants, and a supply chain of experts with more than 30 years of experience in retail and distribution of products and services. The shower pack exceeds expectations in durability, cleanliness and time management. We have perfected a wipe that saves time and leaves customers feeling fresh for any occasion. However, faced with few obstacles, we look to Indiegogoers as a means to assist with overcoming the challenges of production and shipment costs. Currently, LAE has manufacturers identified who will ensure that customers receive their products within 10 weeks of successful project funding.


MANUFACTURING:
Funds from Indiegogoers will afford LAE the opportunity to manufacture, ship and store products on site decreasing monthly expenditures significantly. Therefore, having our own facility is a vehicle for us to control measures that are beyond our reach; a localized facility will ensure timely response to customers.


STRENGTH MANAGEMENT:
"Team work makes the dream work." Our team is small but powerful with each Lead excelling within their role at LAE, we will continue to expand the company. Any amount pledged brings us one step closer to our goal. Sharing our page will help the average consumer save time, money and resources one wipe at a time; we strive to please our customers.
