story:
The Rise of Bootie Camp Yoga®

Hi, my name is Michelle Trabelsi and I am the creator of Bootie Camp Yoga®, a power yoga based fitness program that sculpts the derriere!  I created Bootie Camp Yoga® 4 years ago because my booty needed a little more than my "Power, Flow & Balance" Yoga practice had to offer.  I wanted to create a challenging work out that was safe for those with injuries, like myself, that was completely kick-butt, and that also offered deep stretching!

This FUN hobby of mine has blossomed into a popular & nationally accredited fitness program that Las Vegas people call "Vegas's BEST Kept Secret".  Bootie Camp Yoga® is in over 15 gyms in Southern California, 4 in Las Vegas, with certified instructors in 5 other states, two of which were certified virtually!  To date, I have  certified over 50 Bootie Camp Yoga® instructors & trainees, 30 of which are actively teaching in both small & well known fitness centers such as, Gold's Gym, YMCA & now piloting in 24 Hour Fitness! 

Bootie Camp Yoga® has grown organically in a small area, and in a relatively short amount of time.  I am at a place where instructors in other areas on the planet are not only SUPER interested in teaching this format, but also becoming master instructors in their area. THIS is EXCITING!  The fact that I can certify instructor's virtually is even more exciting!

Bootie Camp Yoga® was voted BEST Recreational & Sporting Activity on Inland Empires 2014 HOT List, as well as we had our first feature story in a national publication: American Fitness Magazine, July/August 2015 issue.

As the creator, It's an AMAZING feeling to hear people in the community and instructors SO excited about Bootie Camp Yoga®!  I take pride in following the personal growth of each instructor as I see how they have evolved in their teaching & how it has changed their lives.  THIS makes me HAPPY & I want to share this BCY® feeling with instructors all over the planet!

I Need Your Help...

In order for Bootie Camp Yoga® to rise to it's maximum potential (& the possibilities are endless), I need to have the following in place...

-If reach my goal of $25,000, It would allow me to open my BCY® studio with proper  equipment that I need for the virtual certifications & virtual classes, I could market BCY® in the local area and build the BCY® brand over time. It would also enable me to secure my booth location & presenter slots at two of the early 2016 Fitness Trade Shows in Los Angeles.

-if I raise $50,000, it will allow me to attend national fitness conferences in late 2016 & 2017, expand my marketing in the Southwest US though heavy advertising & Fitness Conventions, and create a HUGE buzz among all yoga & fitness instructors in California, Nevada & Arizona.

-If I reach $100,000, I will be able to carry this company on my own, without an investor. It would enable me to expand my marketing throughout the US & Canada, and as more international BCY® Instructors are certified, I can support them as well, growing the BCY® brand world wide!  


A Breakdown...

-Studio:  this studio will be used for filming virtual classes for the BCY® video channel & Resoltz® phone app), facilitating virtual & in-house instructor certifications. We will also offer in-house Yoga & BCY® classes, instructor mentoring, BCY®Master Instructor  & YTT Certifications, with a  space for a small space left over for retail, and a space for me to paint!

-Start up costs: this would be for the typical new-studio expenses, including new flooring, insurance, legal, etc.

-Video & Computer Equipment: this is necessary to film virtual certifications & 60 min classes for the subscription site & phone app.

-National Fitness Expos: Being a featured Presenter at 3 of the largest Fitness Expos in the country allows me to teach in front of hundreds of instructors that travel from different areas of the country & world, looking for something  unique to bring back to their gyms back home. Strategically placing my booth in a prime location & having on-stage presence is extremely important, and it's imperative to secure these slots ASAP to ensure the most exposure possible!

-Web Master:  re-design website & re-create instructor tab, set up virtual site & subscription channel.

-Professional Videos & Promotional Trailers: I need to film two professionally edited videos for marketing on the BCY® website & most importantly to continuously loop during the Fitness Expos, on my booth display.

-Administrative Assistant: I NEED HELP!

-Re-Design & Publish Level I-II & Intensive Instructors Manual:

-Launch Master Instructor Program: Create program & manual for Master Instructor Program.


What YOU Get 4 Helping...

As appreciation for your contribution, I am offered some AmAzInG rewards in  exchange  for  your  hard  earned  contributions. Check out the PeRkS on the right side of this page...

NOT into BCY® or Yoga & still want to HELP?

-You can donate cuz you LOVE Me & BELIEVE in My Mission!
-You can sponsor a struggling Yogi, by purchasing a class pass.
-You can purchase a gift for a loved one, or provide a scholarship for a RAD human
  being that wants to teach BCY®/Yoga
-You can take advantage of our Bronze, Silver, Gold & Platinum Sponsorship
  opportunities!  ...Thank you in advance for your support!

I have a HUGE place in my heart for giving back. Three charities that I am passionate about using my yoga platform to raise awareness for are Project Touch, City of Hope & Hearts for ALS.  Please visit my Special Events page for event dates.  Your Name or Company Logo will be displayed on ALL Community, Charity & National Events hosted by Michelle Trabelsi & Bootie Camp Yoga® for ALL Bronze, Silver, Gold & Platinum sponsorship's!

Other Ways YOU Can Help...

Buy a TEAM Bootie Camp Yoga® tank, tee, baseball cap or yoga mat & wear it with pride OR "give BCY a shout out" and share what we’re up to with your community. Word of mouth is endlessly powerful! The more chatter, the better. If you’re strapped for cash, no worries! Follow me on Social media to learn about community classes & events hosted by  Bootie Camp Yoga®. 


Follow & SHARE this Campaign!

Thanks for reading and supporting Bootie Camp Yoga®. We look forward to seeing you "get your sweat on" very soon! Sharing  my campaign on your favorite flavor of social media, Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, YouTube, etc. helps me out as well! 





CREATING MORE POSSIBILITIES ...COMING SOON!
story_txt:
The Rise of Bootie Camp Yoga®

Hi, my name is Michelle Trabelsi and I am the creator of Bootie Camp Yoga®, a power yoga based fitness program that sculpts the derriere!  I created Bootie Camp Yoga® 4 years ago
because my booty needed a little more than my "Power, Flow & Balance" Yoga
practice had to offer.  I wanted to create a challenging work out that was
safe for those with injuries, like myself, that was completely kick-butt, and
that also offered deep stretching!
This FUN hobby of mine has blossomed into a popular
& nationally accredited fitness program that Las Vegas people call
"Vegas's BEST Kept Secret".  Bootie Camp Yoga® is in over 15 gyms in
Southern California, 4 in Las Vegas, with certified instructors in 5 other states, two of which were certified virtually!  To date, I have  certified over 50 Bootie Camp Yoga® instructors & trainees, 30 of which are actively teaching in both small & well known fitness centers such as, Gold's Gym, YMCA & now piloting in 24 Hour Fitness!  


Bootie Camp Yoga® has grown organically in a small area, and in a relatively short amount of time.  I am at a place where instructors in other areas on the planet are not only SUPER interested in teaching this format, but also becoming master instructors in their area. THIS is EXCITING!  The fact that I can certify instructor's virtually is even more exciting!




Bootie Camp Yoga® was voted BEST Recreational & Sporting Activity on Inland Empires 2014 HOT List, as well as we had our first feature story in a national publication: American Fitness Magazine, July/August 2015 issue.


As the creator, It's an AMAZING feeling to hear people in the community and instructors SO excited about Bootie Camp Yoga®!  I take pride in following the personal growth of each instructor as I see how they have evolved in their teaching & how it has changed their lives.  THIS makes me HAPPY & I want to share this BCY® feeling with instructors all over the planet!

 I Need Your Help...

In order for Bootie Camp Yoga® to rise to it's
maximum potential (& the possibilities are endless), I need to have the
following in place... 
-If reach my goal of $25,000, It would allow me to open my BCY® studio with proper  equipment that I need for the virtual certifications & 
virtual classes, I could market BCY® in the local area and build the 
BCY® brand
over time. It would also enable me to
secure my booth location & presenter slots at two of the early 2016 Fitness Trade Shows in Los Angeles. 
-if I raise $50,000, it will allow
me to attend national fitness conferences in late 2016 & 2017, expand my marketing in
the Southwest US though heavy advertising & Fitness Conventions, and create a HUGE buzz among all yoga & fitness
instructors in California, Nevada & Arizona.
-If I reach $100,000, I will be able to carry this company on my own, without an investor. It would enable me to expand
my marketing throughout the US & Canada, and as more international BCY®
Instructors are certified, I can support them as well, growing the BCY® brand
world wide!  


A Breakdown...


-Studio:  this studio will be used for filming virtual classes for the BCY® video channel & Resoltz® phone app), facilitating virtual & in-house instructor certifications. We will also offer in-house Yoga & BCY® classes, instructor mentoring, BCY®Master Instructor  & YTT Certifications, with a  space for a small space left over for retail, and a space for me to paint!
-Start up costs: this would be for the typical new-studio expenses, including new flooring, insurance, legal, etc.
-Video & Computer Equipment: this is necessary to film virtual certifications & 60 min classes for the subscription site & phone app.
-National Fitness Expos: Being a featured Presenter at 3 of the largest Fitness Expos in the 
country allows me to teach in front of hundreds of instructors that 
travel from different areas of the country & world, looking for 
something  unique to bring back to their gyms back home. Strategically 
placing my booth in a prime location & having on-stage presence is 
extremely important, and it's imperative to secure these slots ASAP to 
ensure the most 
exposure possible!
-Web Master:  re-design website & re-create instructor tab, set up virtual site & subscription channel.
-Professional Videos & Promotional Trailers: I need to film two professionally edited videos for marketing on the BCY® website & most importantly to continuously loop during the Fitness Expos, on my booth display.
-Administrative Assistant: I NEED HELP!
-Re-Design & Publish Level I-II & Intensive Instructors Manual: 
-Launch Master Instructor Program: Create program & manual for Master Instructor Program. 


What YOU Get 4 Helping...
As appreciation for your
contribution, I am offered some AmAzInG rewards in  exchange  for 
your  hard  earned  contributions. Check out the PeRkS on the right side of this page...



NOT into BCY® or Yoga & still want to HELP?-You can donate cuz you LOVE Me & BELIEVE in My Mission!-You can sponsor a struggling Yogi, by purchasing a class pass.-You can purchase a gift for a
 loved one, or provide a scholarship for a RAD human   being that wants to 
teach BCY®/Yoga-You can take advantage of our Bronze, Silver, Gold & Platinum Sponsorship   opportunities!  ...Thank you in advance for your 
support!I have a HUGE place in my heart for giving back. Three charities that I am passionate about using my yoga platform to raise
awareness for are Project Touch, City of Hope & Hearts for ALS.  Please visit my Special Events page for event dates.  Your Name or Company Logo will be displayed on ALL Community, Charity & National
Events hosted by Michelle Trabelsi & Bootie Camp Yoga® for ALL Bronze, Silver, Gold & Platinum sponsorship's!



Other Ways YOU Can Help...
Buy a TEAM Bootie Camp Yoga® tank, tee, baseball cap or yoga mat & wear it with pride OR "give BCY a shout out" and share what
we’re up to with your community. Word of mouth is endlessly powerful! The more
chatter, the better. If you’re strapped for cash, no worries! Follow me
on Social media to learn about community classes & events hosted by  Bootie Camp Yoga®.  

Follow & SHARE this Campaign!

Thanks for reading and supporting Bootie Camp
Yoga®. We look forward to seeing you "get your sweat on" very
soon! Sharing  my campaign on your favorite flavor of social media, Facebook,
Twitter, Instagram, YouTube, etc. helps me out as well!

story:
What is ProFlex

ProFlex is the first of many products offered by the company FortiFlex.  ProFlex is meant to be added into your existing protein in order to change the flavor.  If you have a tub of protein and are tired of the same chocolate, vanilla or flavor you already purchase, then ProFlex offers the solution you have been looking for.  We have conducted extensive taste tests to ensure you get the best tasting product, and are also backed by a team of food scientists.  It really works!  ProFlex takes advantage of whatever sweetener is already contained in your existing protein, therefore it is sugar free.


Current Flavors

Nutritional Facts

ProFlex contains no sugar and no artificial sweeteners.


The FortiFlex Story

While preparing for his first NPC physique competition, Chris came to the realization that the actual training was easy compared to the diet. After his competition, Chris mentioned to his brother Jack that he couldn’t drink his protein anymore, because drinking the same flavor over and over was making him gag. Jack then confessed that his protein powder had been sitting in his cabinet untouched for months. Like so many others, they were bored and tired with their protein flavor. They looked for ways to change their flavors on the internet and found very few solutions, many of  which required using the products' specific flavorless protein powder. This was not convenient.  They liked their favorite protein powders; they just wanted it to taste different without having to buy another huge tub of protein.

 With the basic idea of changing the flavor of one's protein in mind, they started working with a local but reputable food processing company that focused on powders. They were able to develop some amazing flavors that not only changed the way their protein tasted, but made it more convenient by offering them in stick packs. That was when their company was born, and thus came Proflex, the first of many products to be offered by Fortiflex. Proflex offers a convenient way to keep your protein and change your flavors, while staying SUGAR FREE!

The Mission of FortiFlex

Our mission is to help you overcome the monotony of flavors that plagues your diet and get you back on track to hitting your fitness goals! We currently have 4 flavors but we need YOUR help to develop more flavors! This will give you more options to choose EXACTLY which flavors YOU want to drink and not just the flavor of protein you are stuck buying. Why should your fitness diet suffer when the solution is simple? Change your flavors and get back to work.

It works in 3 easy steps!

ProFlex mixes simultaneously with your protein powder in a shaker bottle. See instructions below:

What we need and what you get

If our goal of raising $50,000.00 is met, we will use the money to do the following:

· Develop 4-6 new flavors (Orange, Mixed Berry, Peach, Peanut Butter, Cinnamon Roll, & Mint)                           
· Packaging and distribution of product                                                                                
· Marketing and brand recognition

If our goal is not met, we will develop as many flavors and packages as we can with the money we raise.

The Impact

We hope ProFlex will have an impact in the fitness world by helping people maintain their fitness diets with ease. Many people quit drinking protein due to the monotonous flavors. This can be discouraging, especially for people trying to build muscle or lean up. Whatever the reason, ProFlex can help you overcome the monotony of flavors and aid you in your fitness journey.



Stretch Goal 1: $75k

Our goal is to launch as many flavors as possible for protein powders with our original $50k goal. If we are able to reach a $75k goal we will launch a secondary product for pre-workout flavors

Stretch Goal 2: $100k


Our goal is to make a large array of options for protein and pre-workout drinks. If we are able to reach $100k we will produce our supplement products which will continue to add ease and convenience to your diets and help you acheive your fitness goals.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We hope that this idea is exciting enough to make you want to tell your friends about it. The more people who know, the more money we can raise and create flavors for you. Please don’t hesitate to share this with your personal network! It’s easy; just use the Indiegogo share tools.

Our Families

Jack Moyle Family: 
Jack and his wife Erin have been married eight years and have recently had their fourth child (another baby girl).  While married they have moved over twelve times and are now settled in a small town in southern Utah.  Jack graduated from the University of Utah in the Business Information Systems program and brings years of IT related knowledge to the team along with great business skills.  Jack and his wife both have a passion for fitness, activity and outdoors, and are extremely excited to launch FortiFlex!
Chris Huddleston Family:
Chris and Kristie are a blended family with 4 kids. They have been married for 3 years and are a great team! They live in Salt Lake City, Utah where they are both nurses. Kristie specializes in endoscopy while Chris specializes in wound care, but has been a Clinical Liaison for the past 2 years. Chris brings his knowledge and passion for fitness along with his ability to market and network with various people. Chris and his wife love being active and take any opportunity they can with their kids to get out and have fun. They are excited to start this next chapter in their lives with Fortiflex!!

Mike Schmutz Family:

Mike and Heidi are the proud parents of 3 crazy girls and one boy on the way. They have been married for 7 years and live in a town close to Salt Lake City, Utah. Mike works for one of the largest advertising agencies in the world in digital marketing, and Heidi works as a Home Health and Hospice nurse. Mike has been training for Strongman competitions and is a fitness enthusiast with a love for nutrient rich products. They are enthusiastic about Fortiflex and can't wait to see the impact it has on the fitness world.

story:
Quick Facts: 

  • Over 153 million people around the world suffer from earwax impaction 
  • Over 18 million of those affected are Americans 
  • The US healthcare system spends about $600 million US dollars each year to extract impacted earwax
  • Consumers spend approximately $63 million US dollars each year on over-the-counter earwax removal products
  • Current over-the-counter earwax removal products have been proven no more effective than water for removing earwax 

The Value  of Earwax MD

Although not required by the FDA, we conducted a human clinical trial of Earwax MD, in order to prove out the efficacy of our product. We wanted to ensure that what we were seeing in the test tube, was also true for the human ear canal. We were beyond thrilled with the results, with 86% of patients experiencing a complete clearing of earwax in one treatment of 15-30 minutes.

We also ran an in-vitro head-to-head study with the current market leader, Debrox earwax removal system. As you can see in the video below, Earwax MD completely dissolves the wax, while the wax treated with Debrox experiences little to no change. 

We have also partnered with healthcare professionals who treat patients with this issue every single day. We wanted to understand the perspective of healthcare providers, as well as gain their insights on current available products and what they are looking for in a new solution. The video below shows Dr. Soham Roy, ENT and Chief of Pediatric Otolaryngology at the University of Texas in Houston talking about Earwax MD. 

We are dedicated to our social mission of developing healthcare products to address unmet medical needs. We believe Earwax MD can change the lives of millions of people who suffer from earwax impaction. For every contribution made to our campaign, we will donate product to elderly individuals in need, with a strong focus on those suffering from hearing loss.

We cannot thank you enough for your support and belief in our company, and Earwax MD!

story:
What's a "Farm Vital"?

Farm Vitals is an AgTech tool for family farmers to help them reduce costs and increase yields through university-patented technology.

Cool, where did it come from?

FV was created at Harvard Business School, and it placed in the top 5 out of 180 new ventures as voted on by ~50 venture capitalists.

Ok, but do VCs know farming?  What do farmers think?

So far they like it, too.  During our "academic" work we secured 4 letters of intent form Boston-area farmers.  That's about $1,500 per year before we even had a product to show them.

Interesting.  What's it got to do with me?

Well, put bluntly, we need cash.  Not a ton, only about $10,000 or so to help us out over the summer.  After that we plan to be closing on a larger investment.


Alright, you've got my attention, I'm still reading...


Background

For the 1.8 million family farms in the US, the largest non-labor inputs are water and fertilizer.  Based on our research, a 200-acre farm will spend ~$50,000 per year in fertilizer.  An estimated 30% or $15,000 is wasted through over-fertilization due to an inability to confidently assess the health of the plant.  Unfortunately, the current methods for assessing the Nitrogen content of a plant are either too expensive, inconvenient, or inaccurate. The FarmVitals solution is an easy-to-use mobile and web application allowing farmers to upload pictures of the crops in question and receive an analysis of the plant’s Nitrogen content for $500 per year. With FarmVitals technology, the farmer will save $5,000 to $15,000 on unnecessary fertilizer expenses.

Ok, but what's the real story?

Farm Vitals started as a student project at Harvard Business School.  We discovered over the course of a semester that small family farmers have no timely and reliable way to determine the nitrogen levels of their plants, a key data point when determining how much fertilizer to apply.  As several of our team members have roots in family farming, this seemed like a worthy problem to tackle.

Our technology uses image analysis to determine plant nutrient content and the result is that what used to require 7-10 days and mailing samples to a lab can now be done overnight from a smart phone.  We believe this technology has the power to dramatically reduce the amount of money farmers spend on fertilizer, making them more competitive.  This has inspired to continue trying to learn about the problem.

Plus, at the end of the semester we were recognized as one of the five most promising companies (out of 180) and want to spend our summer continuing to make life easier for the family farmers in this country.  We have received considerable interest from the venture investing community, but this funding takes time.  That's where you come in.

What We Need

We are seeking to raise a "bridge" round of $10,000 to:

  • Cover costs to serve current customers
  • Refine technology through experimentation
  • Test new marketing channels
  • General corporate purposes

Our objective over the summer is to learn, and with your support we will be able to approach a larger funding round with data critical to understanding how the business can grow over time to serve more farmers.

    Traction so Far

    We’ve received encouraging feedback from customers and investors. We have signed 4 Letters Of Intent based on our initial sales efforts and were voted one of the Top 5 new business venture at Harvard Business School (out of 180) by the 50 VCs in attendance.

    Goals and Objective

    In the near-term our goal is to understand with more confidence if this technology truly helps farmers save money through reduced fertilizer usage while simultaneously gathering data on key pieces of our business plan.

    As several of us on the team have ties to the agricultural community, our long-term goal is nothing short of making life easier for the 1.8 M family farmers in this country.  And we believe Nitrogen content is just the beginning.  Once we are established as a trusted partner for the agricultural community, we plan to evaluate additional opportunities such as pest notification and management, weather, and soil conditions.

    The Farm Vitals Mission

    To develop and market the most cost-effective technology tools for professional family farmers to manage their crops by combining deep customer insights with bleeding-edge scientific discovery.

story:
Our Goal: Build a Better Bear Canister. 

Meet Hunny.

25 ounces, 11 Liter capacity, built-in mess kit, with scent capturing technology. Only $39. 

There's even a snack door.

We're proud to introduce the Hunny.

Hunny is a bear resistant canister engineered with ultra-light, extremely strong aircraft composites. 

Ultem resin is a versatile, and cost-effective compound, and is the only resin that is certified food safe. You'll find this material in everything from surgery rooms to military aircraft. 

At just 1.27 grams per cubic centimeter, the resin has an incredibly high compression strength of 19,500 PSI. For comparison:

  • Bear Bite: 850 PSI
  • Bear Stomp: 2,000 PSI
  • Hunny Canister: 19,500 PSI

Because of this incredibly high compressive strength ratio, we are able to create a bear can that is light, voluminous, and a fun experience to use.

Check out this video of a hollow fixture that weighs less than 1 ounce holding the weight of 600 kg. 

 

 
Hunny canisters are the lightest and strongest canisters on the market.
 

We are offering three types of Hunny Cans:

  • The Hunny Canister: Limited Edition that includes resin lids and the alloy mess kit. 25 ounces, $39.

  • The Hunny Canister: Bear Necessities Edition with just resin lids and no snack door,  13.4 ounces, $25.

  • The Hunny Ursa Minor, the lightest bear can ever. Only 8 ounces, $19. (limited quantity)

(Check back for updates on the HunnyPots accessory!)

Hunny weighs less than the lightest bear can on the market (the Bare Boxer Contender), but can hold more food than the Garcia model!

    

 

Built-In Scent-Capturing Technology.

Each Hunny has an inner layer permeated with activated carbon, which captures scents before they escape the bear can!

Hunny cans are also multifunctional. The lids double as a stove-safe mess kit...

(NOTE: Every Hunny also ships with 2 Resin Lids, if you are all about the ounces. Some areas have restrictions on open bear canisters while preparing food- check the rules for your area before you start cookin'!)

 A double sided design means you will never have to repack your can to get food at the bottom again!

HUNNY CANISTERS are the 21st century solution for carrying food in the backcountry. We need your help to get it approved.

These canisters are not yet approved for federal and state agency park use.

Our fundraising campaign is geared towards creating a product that is approved for NPS use by next summer. 

$1.00 from the sale of each canister will go towards better management of human-bear interactions.

The canisters need to pass a 3-4 month series of tests before it can gain conditional approval by the Sierra Interagency Black Bear Group (SIBBG), and we are raising funds to iterate our materials testing and product development to get a canister to market before next summer.

 

Cost Breakdown (September 2016 estimates, Hunny Ltd. Ed.)

  • 10.5 ounces ULTEM resin, $5.56
  • Total weight of Titanium-Aluminum Alloy not including scrap costs (May ’16 Alibaba Market Billet Prices), $5.59
  • Daily manufacturing cost for 40 canister/day production line (labor costs amortized at scale), CreatorBot 3D Pro Series (3 machines, $8355 total), $22.89
  • Donation to park agencies for wildlife management, $1.00
  • Labor and operational costs, $4.00
  • TOTAL ESTIMATED COST $39.04

For every can we sell, we will donate $1.00 to park agencies that manage better human-bear interactions. Help us help humans and bears alike, and get a Hunny today! It's the only bear can you'll ever need.

    WWW.HUNNYCANISTERS.COM

     

    Update September 16, 2016: Announcing the Hunny Referral Contest! Refer a friend and get some awesome rewards!

    To count as a referrer, you must promote your campaign with Indiegogo’s share tools while logged into your Indiegogo account. This is important because otherwise, your unique ID won’t be attached to any resulting contributions or visits.​
story_txt:
Our Goal: Build a Better Bear Canister. Meet Hunny.25 ounces, 11 Liter capacity, built-in mess kit, with scent capturing technology. Only $39. There's even a snack door.We're proud to introduce the Hunny.Hunny is a bear resistant canister engineered with ultra-light, extremely strong aircraft composites. Ultem resin is a versatile, and cost-effective compound, and is the only resin that is certified food safe. You'll find this material in everything from surgery rooms to military aircraft. At just 1.27 grams per cubic centimeter, the resin has an incredibly high compression strength of 19,500 PSI. For comparison:
Bear Bite: 850 PSI
Bear Stomp: 2,000 PSI
Hunny Canister: 19,500 PSI
Because of this incredibly high compressive strength ratio, we are able to create a bear can that is light, voluminous, and a fun experience to use.Check out this video of a hollow fixture that weighs less than 1 ounce holding the weight of 600 kg. 

 
 Hunny canisters are the lightest and strongest canisters on the market. We are offering three types of Hunny Cans: 
The Hunny Canister: Limited Edition that includes resin lids and the alloy mess kit. 25 ounces, $39.
The Hunny Canister: Bear Necessities Edition with just resin lids and no snack door,  13.4 ounces, $25.
The Hunny Ursa Minor, the lightest bear can ever. Only 8 ounces, $19. (limited quantity)
(Check back for updates on the HunnyPots accessory!)Hunny weighs less than the lightest bear can on the market (the Bare Boxer Contender), but can hold more food than the Garcia model!     Built-In Scent-Capturing Technology.Each Hunny has an inner layer permeated with activated carbon, which captures scents before they escape the bear can!Hunny cans are also multifunctional. The lids double as a stove-safe mess kit...(NOTE: Every Hunny also ships with 2 Resin Lids, if you are all about the ounces. Some areas have restrictions on open bear canisters while preparing food- check the rules for your area before you start cookin'!) A double sided design means you will never have to repack your can to get food at the bottom again!HUNNY CANISTERS are the 21st century solution for carrying food in the backcountry. We need your help to get it approved.These canisters are not yet approved for federal and state agency park use. story:
Please allow me to introduce myself.  My name is Hollie Krantz.  I am the Founder of Zen Gym, the first Drop-In Meditation studio in Dallas.

I found Mindfulness and Meditation in 2012.  Having barely survived the housing market crash and economic meltdown I then learned of my husband’s infidelity.  Suffering from chronic stress, severe depression and panic attacks I turned to mindfulness, meditation and yoga.  And quite literally the practice saved my life 

Clinical research confirms that a regular mindfulness practice, through meditation, is an effective treatment for stress, anxiety, lack of focus, addictions, depression, chronic pain and a host of other ailments. Meditation improves our physical health, including lowering blood pressure, boosting the immune system, and increasing our ability to cope with stress.  It leads to peace of mind and well-being, greater focus and creativity and better relationships. Mindful awareness practices also include yoga and tai chi. Studies confirm that with repetition, mindful awareness produces long-term changes in brain function and structure in ways that lead to reduced levels of anxiety and depression, improved attention and concentration, better self-control, and greater overall psychological well-being..

Every “body” of any age can reap the benefits of meditation.  For example, fifth-grade girls who did a ten-week program of yoga and other mindfulness practices were more satisfied with their bodies and less preoccupied with weight.  Additionally eight weeks of Mindfulness Based Stress Reduction (MBSR) resulted in an improvement in the immune profiles of women with breast cancer, which corresponded with decreased depressive symptoms.

Despite its Buddhist roots, meditation is a secular application of mindfulness, which is a practice of carefully focusing attention, not a form of religion. Zen Gym will demystify and mainstream meditation.  There are no special clothes, props or equipment needed to meditate.  Which means you can drop-in on your way to work, at lunch or at the end of the day. 

Why “Zen Gym”?

Zen: a Japanese school of mahayana buddhism emphasizing the value of meditation and intuition from the Chinese word meaning “quietude”. Complete and absolute peace

Gym: a large room with equipment for exercising and increasing strength

Zen Gym: a place to strengthen inner peace

Having assembled an amazing team of instructors (mostly women!) Zen Gym will offer up to 40 classes per week. 

Our team has grown organically.  Some of the most amazing souls have come into this space.  What once was my “Phoenix rising” story has become a force larger than I could have ever imagined. Our team is not only diverse but each of us has found meditation through deep personal journeys.  Derived from our unique perspectives we all have diverse populations with whom we want to share this practice.  Law enforcement, students, kids and senior citizens to name a few.  

The interest in Zen Gym’s offerings is stunning.  And our social media campaign has produced better than we could have hoped.  We are truly blessed!

To date Zen Gym has been funded solely by me.  We seek to raise $50,000 to promote our first studio set to open in August 2016, open our second location in February 2017 and prepare for future institutional funding.

And that's where you come in.  With your support, we can create a space for everyone to reap the benefits of meditation. A place where anyone can Drop-In and Zen.

With a deep bow of respect and gratitude, hk

story:
Why Detroit?

Detroit is an area that has a need for recreational outlets for families, children, and adults. The resurgence of Detroit is ever present. There are many opportunities within Detroit to abolish blight and transform unused space into a sport facility. Living here almost my entire life and seeing people leave this great city inspired me to want to be a part of the resurgence of Detroit. That is where the idea of the Detroit Soccer District was born. Customers will feel a sense of achievement and pride when this business comes to fruition having contributed to a local Detroit business. *Our projected launch time is in Summer 2018*

The levels of value created by Detroit Soccer District include: economic, health, and social development. Our presence in an urban setting contributes to the economic progress of Detroit. In addition, Detroit Soccer District will be directly attributing to decreasing the obesity epidemic as it promotes healthy living in an urban area. Lastly, our social impact will positively affect the community by offering a gathering place for groups, encouraging health and wellness, and re-instilling a sense of pride and cohesion in Detroit.

From the age of 10 I was filled with passion for the sport of soccer. Ultimately, I started to question if easy accessibility was the case in the area that I grew up. The answer was NO. The city of Detroit has been neglected. Growing up in the Detroit Area and seeing people leave this great city inspired me to want to be a part of the resurgence of Detroit. That is where the idea of the Detroit Soccer District was born.

Detroit Soccer District is a Motor City Match Awardee www.motorcitymatch.com . The City of Detroit, the Detroit Economic Growth Corporation (DEGC), the Economic Development Corporation of the City of Detroit (EDC) and the U.S. Department of Housing and Urban Development (HUD has recognized our project as viable for the city's growth and development. 

What’s in it for you?

Our Indiegogo campaign goal of $20,000 will cover all of the projected costs of land acquisition, construction, and startup expenses. Our pricing structure when we start operating is similar to any gym membership; whereas a sign-up cost and monthly rate. However, we offer a “Royale Membership” with more perks. 

The Royale Membership includes unlimited access to leagues/classes, free t-shirt, unlimited guest passes and priority of open field times and discounts on field rentals/tournaments/special events. For the purchase of our perk you are granted a discounted Royale Membership before opening day!

I trust that our supporters desire to see this come to full fruition. With that being said all that is donated will go into the never ceasing effort to make this project come to life!

Our Commitment to Action

Our business performance is directly influenced by our impact within the community, customers, and employees. We strive to manage initiatives that meet the needs of those three key groups. In addition, we aspire to maintain the best ethical and moral standards that promote stakeholder well-being.  Our actions are designed towards enrichment of local communities, youth, and leadership.

story:
Une course de vélo sur glace...

Ou: Parc Maisonneuve, Montréal (Québec)

Quand: Le 12 Février 2017

Quoi: 2 courses, un tirage au sort, un stand d'information sur le vélo et le vélo l'hiver, un camion de rue, un stand de réparations de vélo et un Dj!

 

Une idée derrière la tête:

Il y a quelques années, j'ai vu la photo d'une course de vélo avec une fourche munie d'une lame de patin à glace.

Depuis on rêvait d'organiser une course dans ce genre.

L'hiver dernier nous avons créé un premier prototype avec un patin à glace fixé sur une fourche rallongée.

A notre grande surprise le vélo tenait aussi bien la route que sur l'asphalte!

Nous avons alors conçu un prototype nous permettant d'adapter notre fourche à patin sur n'importe quel vélo (roue de 700) pour aller rouler sur la glace.


Nos premiers essais avec le prototype:

 

 

 
 

Les courses:

Des courses de vélos sur la glace existent déjà, mais nous avons voulu aller un peu plus loin.

Premièrement notre événement proposera deux catégories:

  • Course des Givrés:  Vous participez avec votre vélo et vos pneus à clous
  • Course Honesca:  Vous participez avec votre vélo et pneus à clous mais nous remplaçons votre roue avant par notre système de fourche à patin (adaptable sur des roues de 700)

Deuxièmement nous voulons que cette course soit l'occasion d'informer et de sensibiliser le public à la pratique du vélo 4 saisons. Un kiosque avec nos bénévoles seront à la disposition du public tout au long de la journée.

Troisièmement, nous sommes en 2017 et il nous est apparu évident que tous nos partenaires devaient être locaux ou engagés dans le développement durable. Ainsi c'est le Schnitzel Truck qui a été sélectionné pour proposer de la nourriture pendant l'événement. Leurs ingrédients sont issus de producteurs locaux, leurs emballages recyclables et leurs ustensiles sont fait d'amidon de patates!

 

De quoi avons nous besoins?

Nous avons besoins d'au moins 3000$

Cela couvrirait les assurances, nos dépenses en communication (affiches), la présence du camion de rue, le Dj et son système de son, les dépenses matérielles (tente, fournitures pour la course) et surtout la production de fourches à patins indispensables à la course Honesca...

Avec déjà plus de 600 intéressés et plus de 100 participants annoncés si chacun nous offre 5$ nous pourrions atteindre notre objectif en quelques clics!

Qu'avez vous à gagner?

Avant tout vous gagnerez notre éternelle reconnaissance!

Vous participez au projet le plus givré de l'hiver 2017 à Montréal et courrez la chance de gagner des casques Urge lors de notre grand Tirage au sort!

Cette campagne est aussi l'occasion de réserver votre tee-shirt officiel de l'événement à prix réduit.

Les tee-shirts seront en coton bio équitable imprimé par la coop de production Coup d'griffe! Et c'est l'artiste Mathieu Chartrand qui se charge de l'illustration!

 

Les vainqueurs de cette première édition repartiront, entre autre, avec une plaque gravé au laser par le Fablab du PEC sur lequel sera inscrit le nom de tous les participants et personnes nous ayants aidé à réaliser cette course!

Si toutefois vous ne pouvez pas nous donner votre soutien financier vous pouvez quand même nous aider à atteindre notre objectif:

-Parler de notre campagne de financement partout autour de vous

-utilisez les outils du site Indiegogo pour partager cette campagne sur les réseaux sociaux!

 

Nos partenaires:

Urge Bike Products

Burton

DeNolin

Vélo espresso

Uka Protéines

Arrondissement Rosemont-La-Petite-Patrie

Environnement Jeunesse

Equiterre

-Parler de notre campagne de financement partout autour de vous
-utilisez les outils du site Indiegogo pour partager cette campagne sur les réseaux sociaux!
 
Nos partenaires:
Urge Bike Products
Burton
DeNolin
Vélo espresso
Uka Protéines
Arrondissement Rosemont-La-Petite-Patrie
Environnement Jeunesse
Equiterre

story:
Natural herbal remedy for Dengue emerges from the food forests of Bali

As TripAdvisor announces that Bali is the Number 1 Tourist Destination in the World, a traditional medicinal plant emerges to fight Dengue, the most feared downside to this island paradise.

Dengue Fever affects more than 390 million people every year, and the World Health Organisation advises that 40% of the world population is at risk of infection with this debillitating and sometimes fatal disease.

Dengue occurs year-round in Indonesia, reaching peak transmission in the rainy season with outbreaks infecting hundreds of thousands.

Many hundreds of people die every year of Dengue, particularly the severe hemorrhagic form, and every year the tourist hospitals in Bali fill to the brim with holiday makers and expats who have fallen ill to this mosquito borne disease.

 

We live in an age where tropical diseases like Dengue and Zika are spreading…

 

According to the World Health Organization, rising temperatures and higher rainfall caused by climate change will see the number of mosquitoes increasing in cooler areas where there is little resistance or knowledge of the diseases they carry.

Authorities in every country affected by mosquito borne flaviviruses are working to stop the spread of this debilitating and sometimes fatal disease, including through mosquito fogging.

 

There is an even bigger concern that Zika could arrive in areas already struggling to control the mosquito-borne diseases Dengue and Chikungunya. Billions of dollars are being invested by governments and pharmaceutical companies around the world to rapidly develop vaccines, mosquito limiting mechanisms including GMO mosquitos, and synthetic drugs to fight Dengue and the new threat of Zika.

“We must look to nature to solve modern day epidemics” said retired Australian Microbiologist Rhonda Sorensen, who has long been an advocate for sustainable farming and rural communities. “The same rainforests where dengue probably originated can provide solutions in the form of the traditional herbal knowledge of this region.”

Indonesians have an ancient culture of herbal medicine called Jamu, a tradition steeped in healing that is just now becoming known to the western world. Some of this traditional knowledge now has peer-reviewed scientific back-up from independent University studies.

 

Temu kunchi, is a rare medicinal ginger that has been used for centuries throughout Asia as a food spice, a medicinal plant and for spiritual purposes.   Under the botanical name Boesenbergia rotunda (previously Kaempferia pandurata), it has now been studied and researched extensively, and identified as an important anti-dengue herbal plant.  

The increasing spread and severity of the dengue and Zika viruses, the lack of any treatment medicines, emphasizes the importance of drug discovery strategies to identify antiviral drug leads. Components of Boesenbergia rotunda (Kunchi) are currently being investigated for their ability to block the flavivirus replication NS2B/NS3 protease pathways for possible development into potent synthetic drugs.

A group of entrepreneurial farmers in the Petang region in the geographic center of Bali, well off the tourist trails are growing this ginger called Temu kunchi, with the common names of Chinese Keys or Fingerroot. They have surveyed and found high quality areas of this ginger in the food forests surrounding the sacred mountain Pucak Tedung, and have spent a year planting and quietly waiting for it to grow.

Gede Yasa and his team at Kunchi Bali have started harvesting and now bottling the raw juice in shot size bottles on the farm. They have called these shots of the raw juice “Kunchi, Key to Life”, and the product has been making introductory appearances at the local organic farmers’ markets in Ubud, the must visit spiritual and cultural tourist center of Bali.

Customers are really surprised to find that there is a natural ginger that fights Dengue, as little has been written about it.  Temu kunci is a part of the ginger family and very similar to Turmeric. It is a true superfood with a broad range of bioactive flavonoids and chalcones that have anti-cancer, anti-photoaging, anti-obesity, anti-bacterial and anti-inflammatory effects, in addition to the anti-viral.

“Kunchi is good for your body, and tastes good too. I drink two everyday” says Kunchi founder Gede Yasa.

Yasa says that more farmers are needed to organically grow Temu kunci and the Kunchi Bali team are offering a fair price to famers to encourage them to grow high quality organic produce. Kunchi Bali hopes to educate the farmers on how to grow the Temu kunci as part of the organic permaculture food forest systems that are traditional in this area. They have already had one Organic Farmers Field Day in January, where 26 local farmers signed up to participate in growing this medicinal rhizome.

Agung Weda from Organikulture, and the Junior Chamber International Young Farmers Club was the guest speaker at the field day, held at the Kunchi Bali Farm. “The Petang area will be known as the centre of organic Temu kunci production in Bali” says Weda.

Kunchi Bali is launching a crowdfunding campaign through Indiegogo this week to continue developing this natural herbal product. The crowdfunding will enable Kunchi Bali to scale up production and teach the farmers to keep it organic. Kunchi product development to export standards will make it available to help improve the health of all the people. The crowd funding will also go towards specific research on whether this medicinal plant will effect Zika, which is a very close relative of Dengue.

If you want to help make this happen, then please support this Kunchi Bali Indiegogo campaign and help us get this natural herbal Jamu out to the world.

 

Hippocrates. the Father of modern medicine, said almost 2500 years ago “Leave your drugs in the chemist's pot if you can heal the patient with food."
story_txt: Natural herbal remedy for Dengue emerges from the food forests of BaliAs TripAdvisor announces that Bali is the Number 1 Tourist Destination in the World, a traditional medicinal plant emerges to fight Dengue, the most feared downside to this island paradise.Dengue Fever affects more than 390 million people every year, and the World Health Organisation advises that 40% of the world population is at risk of infection with this debillitating and sometimes fatal disease.Dengue occurs year-round in Indonesia, reaching peak transmission in the rainy season with outbreaks infecting hundreds of thousands.Many hundreds of people die every year of Dengue, particularly the severe hemorrhagic form, and every year the tourist hospitals in Bali fill to the brim with holiday makers and expats who have fallen ill to this mosquito borne disease. We live in an age where tropical diseases like Dengue and Zika are spreading… According to the World Health Organization, rising temperatures and higher rainfall caused by climate change will see the number of mosquitoes increasing in cooler areas where there is little resistance or knowledge of the diseases they carry.Authorities in every country affected by mosquito borne flaviviruses are working to stop the spread of this debilitating and sometimes fatal disease, including through mosquito fogging. There is an even bigger concern that Zika could arrive in areas already struggling to control the mosquito-borne diseases Dengue and Chikungunya. Billions of dollars are being invested by governments and pharmaceutical companies around the world to rapidly develop vaccines, mosquito limiting mechanisms including GMO mosquitos, and synthetic drugs to fight Dengue and the new threat of Zika.“We must look to nature to solve modern day epidemics” said retired Australian Microbiologist Rhonda Sorensen, who has long been an advocate for sustainable farming and rural communities. “The same rainforests where dengue probably originated can provide solutions in the form of the traditional herbal knowledge of this region.”Indonesians have an ancient culture of herbal medicine called Jamu, a tradition steeped in healing that is just now becoming known to the western world. Some of this traditional knowledge now has peer-reviewed scientific back-up from independent University studies. Temu kunchi, is a rare medicinal ginger that has been used for centuries throughout Asia as a food spice, a medicinal plant and for spiritual purposes.   Under the botanical name Boesenbergia rotunda (previously Kaempferia pandurata), it has now been studied and researched extensively, and identified as an important anti-dengue herbal plant.  The increasing spread and severity of the dengue and Zika viruses, the lack of any treatment medicines, emphasizes the importance of drug discovery strategies to identify antiviral drug leads. Components of Boesenbergia rotunda (Kunchi) are currently being investigated for their ability to block the flavivirus replication NS2B/NS3 protease pathways for possible development into potent synthetic drugs.A group of entrepreneurial farmers in the Petang region in the geographic center of Bali, well off the tourist trails are growing this ginger called Temu kunchi, with the common names of Chinese Keys or Fingerroot. They have surveyed and found high quality areas of this ginger in the food forests surrounding the sacred mountain Pucak Tedung, and have spent a year planting and quietly waiting for it to grow.Gede Yasa and his team at Kunchi Bali have started harvesting and now bottling the raw juice in shot size bottles on the farm. They have called these shots of the raw juice “Kunchi, Key to Life”, and the product has been making introductory appearances at the local organic farmers’ markets in Ubud, the must visit spiritual and cultural tourist center of Bali.Customers are really surprised to find that there is a natural ginger that fights Dengue, as little has been written about it.  Temu kunci is a part of the ginger family and very similar to Turmeric. It is a true superfood with a broad range of bioactive flavonoids and chalcones that have anti-cancer, anti-photoaging, anti-obesity, anti-bacterial and anti-inflammatory effects, in addition to the anti-viral.“Kunchi is good for your body, and tastes good too. I drink two everyday” says Kunchi founder Gede Yasa.Yasa says that more farmers are needed to organically grow Temu kunci and the Kunchi Bali team are offering a fair price to famers to encourage them to grow high quality organic produce. Kunchi Bali hopes to educate the farmers on how to grow the Temu kunci as part of the organic permaculture food forest systems that are traditional in this area. They have already had one Organic Farmers Field Day in January, where 26 local farmers signed up to participate in growing this medicinal rhizome.Agung Weda from Organikulture, and the Junior Chamber International Young Farmers Club was the guest speaker at the field day, held at the Kunchi Bali Farm. “The Petang area will be known as the centre of organic Temu kunci production in Bali” says Weda.Kunchi Bali is launching a crowdfunding campaign through Indiegogo this week to continue developing this natural herbal product. The crowdfunding will enable Kunchi Bali to scale up production and teach the farmers to keep it organic. Kunchi product development to export standards will make it available to help improve the health of all the people. The crowd funding will also go towards specific research on whether this medicinal plant will effect Zika, which is a very close relative of Dengue.If you want to help make this happen, then please support this Kunchi Bali Indiegogo campaign and help us get this natural herbal Jamu out to the world. Hippocrates. the Father of modern medicine, said almost 2500 years ago “Leave your drugs in the chemist's pot if you can heal the patient with food."

story:
Our physical and mental health 
are our most valuable assets

Hello, I am Jim, the CEO and founder of Xrcise Fuel.  Most energy, sports and soft drinks have limited or zero nutritional value and are high in sugar, caffeine and other stimulants. In 2014 we set out to develop a smarter, healthier alternative.

We started in our kitchen, developing, testing and refining our drink.

         

After investing over $400,000 of our own capital and the last 3 years of our life and over 190 attempts, we have finally succeeded in producing an amazing beverage, that is full of the good stuff and none of the bad.

 

Unique, Premium Sparkling Protein and Vitamin drink that has a
refreshing taste and is available in 3 tropical flavours.

                         LIME                         MANGO                  PINEAPPLE

What's in Xrcise Fuel?

Zero Caffeine 

Zero Aspartame 

Zero Stimulants 

99% Sugar Free

  Premium Whey Protein Isolate (15 grams)

Vitamins B1, B2, B3, B5, B6, B7, B9, B12

Complex Carbohydrates 

Magnesium 

Sparkling Filtered Water

Natural Colour Natural Flavour 

Natural Sweetener 

117 Calories (488kJ) per 500mL (16.9 fl oz)

 

Xrcise Fuel's scientifically based formula provides all the micro nutrients to...
Refresh, Refuel and Repair your Body and Mind.

Benefits of     

Reduces Anxiety
Provides Clean Energy
Improves your Mood
Builds Lean Muscle
Improves Mental Function and Health
Eases Muscle Soreness
Promotes Heart Health

Rave Reviews

Why the World Needs  

We live in a busy and constantly changing world. The need to stay connected, have the time for our families and friends, while educating our selves, building careers and developing our lifestyles. As the pressure increases to do it all, so does;

Stress, Anxiety, Depression, Addiction, Obesity, Diabetes.

The personal, financial and social loss of human potential is staggering . We are facing a world-wide health epidemic and we need to change that...NOW

The only way to thrive in this environment is to be fit and healthy in body and mind.

This allows us to reach our full potential, stay connected and enjoy our chosen lifestyle.

The powerful benefits of physical activity and good nutrition are well documented. Everything
we do, everything we eat, affects our physical and mental health.

 

 

Making smarter, informed lifestyle choices will have a far reaching, positive impact on our lives and those around us.

 

              

OR

                   

 

                              Choose Well.... because

  Our success depends on what we do today. NEVER on what we intend to do tomorrow.

Join us in...

 

The Xrcise Project is about getting people to question their beliefs about "exercise" and to maximise, the amazing benefits that regular exercise has on the body and mind.

Take the example of a busy mum, running around all day, taking care of her family, she may also be working full or part time. The amount of energy used during the day is huge, she is "exercising" without  going to the gym! The body needs a balanced combined of macro and micro nutrients that must include protein, vitamins, complex carbohydrates and minerals all delivered at the same time, to refresh, refuel and repair the body.

Without the correct nutrition and rest, the body can not fully recover, ready for another busy day of "exercise" and we start to get run down, physically and mentally

Exercise comes in many different forms, you don't have to become a gym junkie to enjoy the benefits of exercise. Find a form of exercise that appeals to you  and just start!...TODAY!

Become inspiring, then help us to inspire others, to realise their full potential through exercising their body and mind, then combine it with intelligent nutrition. (See your Doctor or Physician before exercising)

Help us provide the resources to build an inter-active, dedicated site on www.xrcisefuel.com to share our stories of success and our set backs. Tell us what worked for you and what didn't. Help us design new and different exercise programs. Give us your nutritional tips. Ask questions, answer other peoples questions. By working together, lets build a data base to inspire and support people to make some positive changes in their lives and maybe in our own  

Your Contribution Does Matter!!

The ripple effect of simply supporting another person, who in turn helps another... is incredibly powerful and can have a profoundly positive impact on the community and the world.

While your contribution may only appear to be small, the effect collectively can be enormous.

 Perks

Why We Need Your Help

We need $20,000 to help us with some of the costs to buy and blend the raw ingredients, bottles, labels, caps and cartons to manufacture our drinks. We also want to finalise regulatory compliance with the FDA. We can then start to distribute our drinks to enough people to help encourage other contributors, investors and other entrepreneurs to join us in making Xrcise Fuel available World-Wide. Together we will establish The Xrcise Project, and build an ongoing social community network, to promote and improve our physical and mental health, designed to help us reach our full potential.

    The Xrcise Fuel Timeline...

    Stretch Goals

    We have set our goal to raise $20,000, however we are prepared, if we raise more. We will work to implement the following;

    Stretch Goal 1 ($50,000);

    • With your help we will trial another flavour or two 
    • Speed up our production capacity
    • Extend the Xrcise Project Data Library

    Stretch Goal 2 ($100,000);

    • Introducing different size bottle based on your feed-back and requests
    • Design new size bottle labels (with your feed-back)
    • Design Xrcise Project exercise programs and build our nutrition library

    Stretch Goal 3 ($150,000)

    • Introduce new formulas, based on your feed-back (tell us what you want)
    • Increase production capacity (larger mixing tank & heat exchanger)
    • Review and redesign Labels

    Stretch Goal 4 ($300,000)

    • Add another two flavours
    • Variations to our existing formula to suit the needs of our customers (that's you)
    • Develop new products
    • Develop Clothing and Sports Accessories

    Stretch Goal 5 ($500,000)

    • Look to set up a partnership in the US, to produce our drinks for the North Americian Market
    • Roll out Xrcise Fuel events in Australia and North America to promote exercise as a healthy and fun experience.
    • Start our world-wide drive to help people reach their full potential.

    Risks & Challenges

     

    We are like a needle in a hay stack, no one knows about our product or where we are.

     Multinationals

    They control most of the distribution channels, making it difficult to get our drinks into people hands. They have HUGE advertising budgets.

     

    We plan to use people power and social media to get our message out
    and pressure retailers to stock our drinks.

    Other Ways You Can Help

    Jump in and join us on our adventure, help to spread the word, make some noise and tell everyone about our great drinks and support our mission of making Xrcise Fuel available to everyone.

    No Time To Waste

    Like us on Facebook and follow us on Instagram and Twitter!

    We would love to hear your stories, thoughts and suggestions

    Thank you for your support and we hope you can back us today

    Questions & Answers

    Q, Why do we need protein?

    A. Proteins are the building blocks of life and our bodies can't produce it or store it

    Q. What type of protein is in Xrcise Fuel

    A. We use only the highest quality whey protein isolate

    Q. Are there any other flavours?

    A. We are looking at introducing more flavour later, let us know what flavour you would like.

    Q. What sweetener do you use in Xrcise Fuel?

    A. We use the natural sweetener, Stevia

    Q. Why put Protein, Vitamins, Minerals and Complex Carbohydrates in one drink?

    A. Extensive scientific research shows that in order for our body to get the best results and recovery from exercise, we must consume all these ingredients at the same time. If we don't our body can't assimilate and use the protein to repair the muscles, it will use the protein as energy, thereby placing our body in a state of "catabolism"

    Q, What exactly does "catabolism" mean?

    A. Simple - all that hard work, effort and time you put into your exercise and health won't give you the maximum return on your investment (YOU!), because you are not fuelling it correctly.

    Q. How many bottles can I have a day?

    A. Recommended amount is one a day, we believe Xrcise Fuel should be used, together with a healthy, balanced nutrition plan.

    Q. Can I buy it in different size bottles?

    A. We only have the 500ml/16.9 fl oz bottles at this stage, however we will be looking at other sizes as we grow. Please let us know what is your preferred size.

    Q. Where can I buy it?

    A. You can buy on line via our website www.xrcisefuel.com go to XF Shop. We are currently working with retailers to stock our drinks and will continually keep you updated as to where you can buy. Where would you like to be able to buy it?...let us know. We will also look at a second manufacturing plant for our drink in the US.

    Q. Will you ship it anywhere?

    A. We will try, test us out. We will come back to you with the costs and time frame depending on where you live.

    Q. Can I buy multiple perks?

    A. Yes, if you'd like multiple perks, please make a new contribution for each perk.

    Q. Why does exercise help our mood?

    A. Exercise boosts serotine levels in our brain that releases a good dose of endorphins into our bod. Regular exercise is one of the most effective prevention and treatment strategies for depression

    Q. Will exercise have the same affect if I am feeling anxious or stressed

    A. Absolutely, exercise is the cheapest and healthiest form of therapy on the planet!

    Q. Do I have to become a gym junkie?

    A. Absolutely NOT!, any form of moderate, regular exercise (walking, golfing, hiking, tennis, cycling, swimming, skiing, weights, boxing, skipping, and the list goes on forever) combined with good nutrition and adequate rest will make a huge difference.

    Q. Will it help cure addictions?

    A.  We ALL have addictions, to varying degrees. It is what we choose, to be addicted to that matters. Choose exercise and great nutrition and you will be amazed at the benefits, without the down side of other addictive habits. While not a cure, it is a brilliant management tool.

    Contact fuelxrcise@gmail.com for more information or questions.

story:
I'm a professional high board diving coach, FINA Olympic judge, master trainer, business management fitness consultant and an inventor. Working with individuals for over than 20 years to solve the common problem of back pain almost everybody suffers from, which I do myself suffer from Foraminal Stenosis:

And Spondylolisthesis combined with degenerative disc disease as the diagnosis in my scheduled back surgery documents says:

I am so terrified of going under the knife for back surgery or any other surgery to be honest. I had to find an alternative non invasive way to relive my 24/7 back pain. As it is proven fact that, the success rate to relieve the back pain by surgery is very slim.

Seeing the huge amount of people suffering from back pain, the high costs to get rid of the pain and the effort made by the patients to experience back pain relief it came clear to me as I am attending an international back pain management convention, and listening to the same question again and again from the participants to the medical experts, the question was, how can one experience some pain relieve even for few minutes a week?! The answer was there is no magic pill for this! Either go for the surgery or take medication. DeCOMPRESSit® is the ultimate treatment because there is not a single treatment, which could actually cater to all body types, overweight, obese and elderly people as well as people with special conditions, patients with heart-problem or high blood pressure, patients and pregnant women to serve or to cater to the back-pain issues they have. It was not found a single treatment, done from the upright natural position without machines, weights, human assistance, or without creating unnecessary issues or done frequently, from home or office, with as low cost as possible.

By backing DeCOMPRESSit® we will be able not only to bring back pain relieve to almost anybody in their own comfort zone and homes, we are also reaching out to less fortunate people to help them with their back pain. Basically, we are a treatment for the good of humanity. 

In the matter of one year to the date, from the day the idea reached the patent office until it became an international movement we had exhausted and dried all our financial savings but we had increased our manpower and we managed to increase the amount of participants and audience nationally and internationally. We are asking for $ 37,000.00 to allow us to bring our treatment to the international market as we will take place in the ISPO Munich trade show in January 2018. That is the main reason we are asking for backing in this short time. 

Our unique DeCOMPRESSit® belt signed by the inventor will be provided to our backers to use for themselves or their loved ones. Our backers will be part of our good of humanity back pain relief movement. 

We will use any funds to keep educating more people on our simple, easy treatment.

As the American Chiropractic Association studies shows, a growing list of research studies and reviews demonstrate that, the evidence supports the natural, whole-body, drug-free approach is growing. As our movement been approved and backed by highly respected medical back specialists. DeCOMPRESSit® is the alternative non-invasive treatment in all natural ways and drug-free. 

It is worth it to mention that, for so many years I have been treating people with back issues each has his own individual diagnosis and back pain level, manage tremendously relieve the level of pain, increase the level of mobility  and helping patients to live very healthy lifestyle. The great success is what led me to bring DeCOMPRESSit® to life.  

The main challenge we see is, how difficult it is to bring a new brand or franchise exposure in the market. The risk is if a project lacks on one of the following, financial endurance, manpower and the knowhow, will not advance properly.

The way we overcome these challenges and risks is first to grow generically by reaching out to professionals to get them familiar with the brand and have a clear strategy as we widening the base of our professionals and equip them with the knowledge and the knowhow. All that will encourage our professionals to go out there and reach out to cooperation’s, organizations to spread the unique and gentle DeCOMPRESSit®-treatment.

Now, left only the financial endurance and that’s why we are reaching out for your backers to back us up to continue our vision.

Our idea became to a movement as we see it, because of the engagement of every individual had came across our brand and start spreading the word around to others. So, please if you are or you know somebody, sick and tire of having back pain and cannot find an easy way to deal with his or hers back issues let them know about DeCOMPRESSit® and share our brand by going through any of our social media or by sharing through Indiegogo.

Thank you in advance.

By backing DeCOMPRESSit® we will be able not only to bring back pain relieve to almost anybody in their own comfort zone and homes, we are also reaching out to less fortunate people to help them with their back pain. Basically, we are a treatment for the good of humanity. 
In the matter of one year to the date, from the day the idea reached the patent office until it became an international movement we had exhausted and dried all our financial savings but we had increased our manpower and we managed to increase the amount of participants and audience nationally and internationally. We are asking for $ 37,000.00 to allow us to bring our treatment to the international market as we will take place in the ISPO Munich trade show in January 2018. That is the main reason we are asking for backing in this short time. 

Our unique DeCOMPRESSit® belt signed by the inventor will be provided to our backers to use for themselves or their loved ones. Our backers will be part of our good of humanity back pain relief movement. 
We will use any funds to keep educating more people on our simple, easy treatment.
As the American Chiropractic Association studies shows, a growing list of research studies and reviews demonstrate that, the evidence supports the natural, whole-body, drug-free approach is growing. As our movement been approved and backed by highly respected medical back specialists. DeCOMPRESSit® is the alternative non-invasive treatment in all natural ways and drug-free. 
It is worth it to mention that, for so many years I have been treating people with back issues each has his own individual diagnosis and back pain level, manage tremendously relieve the level of pain, increase the level of mobility  and helping patients to live very healthy lifestyle. The great success is what led me to bring DeCOMPRESSit® to life.  
The main challenge we see is, how difficult it is to bring a new brand or franchise exposure in the market. The risk is if a project lacks on one of the following, financial endurance, manpower and the knowhow, will not advance properly.
The way we overcome these challenges and risks is first to grow generically by reaching out to professionals to get them familiar with the brand and have a clear strategy as we widening the base of our professionals and equip them with the knowledge and the knowhow. All that will encourage our professionals to go out there and reach out to cooperation’s, organizations to spread the unique and gentle DeCOMPRESSit®-treatment.
Now, left only the financial endurance and that’s why we are reaching out for your backers to back us up to continue our vision.

Our idea became to a movement as we see it, because of the engagement of every individual had came across our brand and start spreading the word around to others. So, please if you are or you know somebody, sick and tire of having back pain and cannot find an easy way to deal with his or hers back issues let them know about DeCOMPRESSit® and share our brand by going through any of our social media or by sharing through Indiegogo.
Thank you in advance.

story:
Winning grants just became easier! We've built a new system that combines an extensive database of grant-makers with a highly customized online project management tool. 

Imagine an easier, more organized way to win funding for your cause.


What if you had an online system that helped you easily keep track of your grant-seeking efforts, and never missed a beat when you were faced with staff turnover?

Imagine being able to search a database of over 1,200 grant maker records related to your nonprofit mission. With the click of a button, you could easily build your own interactive calendar for grant proposals and reports. Envision using that same system to save and organize key documents in one place, so that you never had to waste time searching for old emails, lost documents or worrying about version control. Think how great it would be if you could quickly and easily view and share graphic reports on the status of your grant applications, so that you knew exactly how much funding was pending, awarded and declined for the year. Finally, imagine having the educational tools and resources you need at your finger tips. These include sample grant proposals and budgets, podcasts with funders who offer valuable insight into what they're looking for in your proposal, and relationship building tips from experienced writers who've raised over $11M in grants.

Make this dream your reality!

All of this and more has become a reality with our new, one-of-a-kind grants management tool. Over the past five years, we've built this robust workspace as we've worked closely with more than 30 nonprofits, helping them raise over $11M.
Now, we want to share this tool with organizations from around the world to help them raise more money and do more good.

We need your help

Our goal is to raise $25,000 to launch and test My Grants Manager. We need your help to continue to test and improve this tool, and to bring our five years worth of valuable, extensive donor research to the masses.

How this tool helps 

There are over 1.5 million nonprofit organizations registered in the US. Many of these organizations rely on grants to help fund the amazing work that they do. The majority of these organizations subscribe to one grants database or another to help them find funders who interested in supporting their cause. But that's where most current databases stop.
My Grants Manager goes way beyond what a typical funder database has to offer, to include a thorough project management tool to help on profits stay organized, save time, and ultimately be more successful in winning grant dollars. 


As an early user, you'll have the opportunity to test drive our original tool for grants management. Find new funders for your cause with our searchable database of grant-makers and learn more about grant writing with educational tools and resources.

Other perks we have to offer include:

Cause specific Grants-Guides with detailed funder records for: 1) environmental organizations; 2) organizations serving people with disabilities; 3) education; 4) health care, and 5) international children's organizations. If you work with one of these causes, you won't want to miss these! Each of our 5 Grants-Guides contain 30 cause-specific funder records.

                

        

            

Sample Funder Record: Each of our 5 Grants-Guides contain 30 cause-specific funder records. Funders are organized alphabetically and by due date. Preview a sample funder record below.

Educational Tools: The educational tools we've created present our lessons learned and some key insights into why some organizations don't succeed at grant writing and others do. With My Grants Manager, we've created an application that will allow so many more people to read, listen to, watch and learn from our expertise.

We can help passionate people like you raise more money.

Amanda Johnston Consulting is a based in Denver, Colorado. Here's what some of our clients have to say about us:
"The RDS Foundation is a small but longstanding organization that helps fund a clinic that diagnoses and treats bipolar indigent patients. We were very happy to have AJC’s knowledgeable and experienced support. They have, what we consider to be a powerful database that perhaps no other consulting firm can match."

-Rachel Cruz, Robert D. Sutherland Memorial Foundation

“Amanda Johnston Consulting has tapped into a new and better way of applying for and managing grants. They have helped us embed that understanding into our grant applications with great success. I highly recommend their services.”

-Jeff Grossberg, Director of Development, Ignite Adaptive Sports 

Other Ways You Can Help
  • We're looking for a book publisher to publish and market our educational tools and research.  If you are an interested publisher, please contact us. Transcripts are ready to go!
  • You can also help by sharing this campaign with a nonprofit or cause you care about. Our tools and research were designed to help people learn, grow and get one step closer to reaching their fund raising goals.

Thank you for helping us share our work!

Amanda Johnston

Thanks to Keith's Coffee Bar for sponsoring our campaign kick off party on May 1st at the Mile High United Way!  Stop by Keith's Coffee at 2450 S. Downing in Denver.
