story:
Do you have back pain? You aren’t alone. Right now, more than 31 million Americans suffer from back pain. It’s the leading cause of disability worldwide and also the most common reason for missed work. Health experts say that as much as 80% of the population will have some kind of back problem in their lives.

The solution is simple: The TruPosture smart shirt. We designed it to help you maintain a healthy back posture and help reduce back pain. TruPosture is a nano-sensor enabled, comfort-fit smart shirt that’s packed with technology and features. TruPosture trains your back, resulting in improved posture that sticks.



With your support, TruPosture can help millions of people who suffer with back pain. We can tell the world about our smart shirt that features patented, nano-sensor technology and can track the alignment of the entire spine. You can help TruPosture help millions of people live without back pain, including yourself!

"TruPosture’s best asset is its software. The shirt pairs with an app to show users actual diagrams of their spine." - WearableTech

"The Lumo Lift has only one sensor that is worn on a shirt lapel. The TruPosture shirt promises to be much more accurate and specific about the spine shape." - I4U News

"What's nice is that if you can't sync the device to your smartphone, it will prompt you independently by sending vibration feedback if your back is in a crooked position. If you want to pair it with your favorite fitness/health tracker you can do that as well." - Softpedia

"TruPosture is among several new products taking aim at the growing concerns about sedentary lifestyles." - The Chicago Tribune

"Very soon we will be able to monitor in real time our spine to detect and correct posture problems. No, not science fiction, but yet another brilliant idea from the pages of Indiegogo." - Tom's Hardware

"As someone whose spine is slowly beginning to morph into a banana, I need all the help I can get." - Gadgette


Yes it can. When wearing TruPosture it’s always monitoring how you’re standing, sitting, or exercising. And then it helps you correct it. How? Since the shirt fits like a compression shirt it doesn’t slide or flop around. That means it can sense the slightest movements in your spine – from your neck all of the way down to your pelvis. It can detect a ½ degree change in your posture. No other product can come close to this accuracy!

But your TruPosture shirt does more than measure the movement in your spine. It can help you correct it in real-time. As you wear the shirt, it can give you pinpoint vibration feedback in the exact area of your spine that’s not in the ideal posture. You’ll receive one pulse if you’re slouching too far forward, two pulses if you’re leaning too far back.

 
It’s an easy-to-use system that can have you standing, sitting and even exercising with perfect posture in no time. And that can eliminate your back pain.


You’ve never seen or worn a shirt like this. Just put it on and it’ll begin measuring your reference and correct your posture immediately. The sensors are so precise that they’re able to detect even slight changes in posture. Also, there are multiple modes for TruPosture – sitting, standing, stretch and custom. Each of these is designed to help give you perfect postures no matter what you’re doing. Also, as you wear it more and more throughout the day, you can increase the training difficulty level from beginner to intermediate to advanced.

The shirt itself is made of breathable, stretch material and designed to feel like a second skin. It’s also entirely machine-washable, so there’s no worry of damaging sensitive electronics.

TruPosture is also Bluetooth enabled, helping you visualize your posture and measure your progress via the free TruPosture app for Android, iPhone and Windows.

Precise analytics will let you know where you're having the greatest posture issues and how to be mindful of them.



 


The story of TruPosture starts with real back pain. Company founder Dan Ikoyan, an avid runner and mountain biker, found himself complaining of spinal pain. After several visits to the doctor and physical therapist, he was surprised to hear that the pain was simply due to bad posture. The challenge was to remember the "good posture" his physical therapist was recommending after he’d left the clinic. The experience lead him to the idea of a simple device that measures the curvature of the spine and helps maintain a good posture through feedback. Hence, the TruPosture smart shirt was born!

Dan set about receiving a patent on the technology and formed a team of like-minded entrepreneurial and creative spirits that would apply the technology and refine it to create the TruPosture shirt that is ready for the consumer. Dan and co-founder George Winston along with the rest of the team are now set on deploying the TruPosture shirt to help alleviate back pain for people around the world and to make good posture a habit for everyone.


For starters, by contributing to our project, your support could get you a first-of-its-kind wearable technology that could improve your posture and reduce your back pain. But no matter how much you contribute, you’ll help make TruPosture available and affordable so everyone can benefit.


Think about that. By supporting TruPosture, you’re helping us help so many more people. Your support could also help us expand our production facilities, roll out more features sooner, and eventually expand this innovation into other applications that are equally beneficial. You’re helping us accelerate bringing TruPosture, and other products like it, to market.

Here are some specific things your contribution will be used for:

  • Rolling out and refining our production processes

  • Updating the printed circuit boards

  • Designing and completing the packaging

  • Updating the apps and running QA testing on all features

Without your help, we’d be years from hitting the market with this product. But, with your help, we could be just months away. Thanks for learning more about TruPosture, and we look forward to your support.


Question:  How can wearing the shirt regularly lead to reduced back pain?

Answer:  TruPosture helps by reminding you to correct your posture whenever your posture deviates from your pre-set ideal.  By engaging your core and dorsal muscles to correct your posture, you will strengthen them, as well as develop a good posture habit. Having a strong core and dorsal muscles takes the stress off your spine, the source of your pain.  We recommend routinely using the shirt for several weeks until the muscles strengthen, and healthy posture becomes a habit. After that we suggest you periodically use the shirt to reinforce the habit. In the long term, maintaining a good posture will keep those muscles strong, and keep the stress off your spine. TruPosture works by utilizing nano sensors embedded in the soft lycra shirt to track your spine alignment. Once you’ve set an optimal posture goal the sensors will keep track of when you deviate from your goal, reminding you with gentle vibrations and app alerts to improve your posture again.


Question:  How does it compare to sitting on an exercise ball?

Answer:  An exercise ball is effective but will not tell you if your posture is correct (the two curves of the spine). The first thing you notice when you sit at your desk with the TruPosture shirt on is that to maintain a correct posture you now have to adjust the environment around you to accommodate your healthy posture (chair, monitor, etc), whereas before you were sacrificing your posture to accommodate the “bad” environment around you.


Question:  How can I select my size and shirt type?

Answer:  After the campaign is over we will contact you to ask for your preferred size and shirt type.

story:
The Project

For you, having immediate access to clean water isn't a big deal, right? For the communities of Puerto Cabezas and Bethania, R.A.A.N, Nicaragua, it is a big deal.

As of now, members in the community have to carry buckets of water from the well to their homes (as pictured below- two young girls carry water in a 5 gallon bucket to their home in Bethania, Nicaragua, photographed during the assessment trip in January 2015). Thanks to the dedicated students and faculty of Engineers for International Development (EfID) at George Mason University, Puerto Cabezas will be getting some help to get immediate and direct access to clean water. 

Some Facts:

  • 900,000 people in Nicaragua don't have access to safe water.

  • Over 2.8 million people don't have access to adequate sanitation in Nicaragua, which is nearly half of the population.

  • About 300 children in Nicaragua die each year from diarrhea caused by unsafe water and poor sanitation.

Project Details:

The project focuses on the overall master plan to supply and distribute water to each home in the community. The funds raised from this campaign will be used to help support the efforts for Phase 1.

  • Phase 1: September 2014 - May 2015

    • Assessment trip: January 2015

      • Collected data points and survey information about the region

      • Mapped out suppliers for project equipment, i.e. solar panels + well pumps

      • Identified numerous potential projects at three main areas of focus: Verbos School + Orphanage, Verbos Feeding Center, & Bethania community

    • Implementation trip: May-June 2015


What We Need & What You Can Get

With your help from the funds we raise, we can complete Phase 1.  We need minimum $3,000 to be able to implement and complete Phase 1. We will use the funds to purchase materials for the systems, which will include PVC pipes, pipe connections (joints, elbows, etc.), valves, storage tanks, solar panels, batteries, etc, to be purchased in Nicaragua.  For every donation of a certain amount made, a perk will be available to express our gratitude for your donation!


The Impact

Your donations will help the people of the community of Bethania, Nicaragua receive water directly to their homes - something that was not available to them before!

  • Your donation will help families in the community gain direct access to a basic need and improve their standard of living.

  • Your donation will benefit the women and children who do not have to carry buckets of water back and forth, every single day after Phase 1 is completed.

  • Your donation impacts not only the community, but also the students in EfID who are involved in the project and gain practical engineering experience.

  • You will also receive perks for your donations!

  • Each project implemented by EfID thus far has been successful and we hope to continue this record!

EfID students and the community work together to install part of the water distribution system of a previous project for the Sabana Grande community (Phase 1, August 2013).

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot contribute monetarily, we ask that you help us out by sharing this campaign with your friends, neighbors, family members, coworkers, school mates, etc.

  • Get the word out and make some noise about our campaign!
  • Indiegogo has some great share tools that can be utilized to get the word out!

About EfID

Engineers for International Development (EfID) is a student organization at George Mason University that focuses on using the technical skills we learned in school and applying them to communities in need around the world. EfID has been active for the last three years and has already successfully implemented international projects in Peru, Honduras, and Nicaragua. We have been involved in local projects in the U.S. as well.  You can read more about us here: https://sites.google.com/site/eidmason/.

Your donation will benefit the women and children who do not have to carry buckets of water back and forth, every single day after Phase 1 is completed.
Your donation impacts not only the community, but also the students in EfID who are involved in the project and gain practical engineering experience.
You will also receive perks for your donations!
Each project implemented by EfID thus far has been successful and we hope to continue this record!
EfID students and the community work together to install part of the water distribution system of a previous project for the Sabana Grande community (Phase 1, August 2013).Other Ways You Can HelpIf you cannot contribute monetarily, we ask that you help us out by sharing this campaign with your friends, neighbors, family members, coworkers, school mates, etc.
Get the word out and make some noise about our campaign!
Indiegogo has some great share tools that can be utilized to get the word out!
About EfIDEngineers for International Development (EfID) is a student organization at George Mason University that focuses on using the technical skills we learned in school and applying them to communities in need around the world. EfID has been active for the last three years and has already successfully implemented international projects in Peru, Honduras, and Nicaragua. We have been involved in local projects in the U.S. as well.  You can read more about us here: https://sites.google.com/site/eidmason/.

story:
Tennis Activity Tracker will change your tennis game forever. Tennis Activity Tracker will be a suit of 10 tennis apps which you can access using smart watch and smart phone/tablets. It will features like stroke and swing tracking, direct connection with coaching, sending and receiving tips and videos from coaches, social network of the tennis players and much more(see below for entire list). It is like having a tennis coach and fitness trainer with you on the go at all times. The Tennis Activity Tracker is geared towards becoming one stop for all next generation tennis needs using apps on Apple watch or any Android watch from LG, Samsung, etc.


  • Performance Tracking: You will be able to accurately track your arm movement while playing tennis. The data collected can be seen on an interactive Dash-board on your smart phone/tablet/laptop. Our subscription will let you store your data on cloud and access from anywhere. You can use this data to get feedback, figure out the areas you need to improve at, track performance overtime, see how your strokes stack against some great players or coaches and much more.
  • Tennis Social network and Tournaments: Our TAT social network website will allow you to create a tournament among your tennis friends from your school, university or clubs and continually track your standing in the tournament. The real time score tracking feature will let you see who is progressing in the tournament in real time.
  • Let's Play Tennis: You can easily find tennis players in your area to play match or practice with. You will store your past game results and share it over social media to gain authentic boasting rights.
  • Connect with Coach: You will have access to renowned Tennis coaches all over the globe. You can send you game performance , statistics and videos with your coach and get their feedback to improve their game. Coaches can send you audio and video feedback to help your game. See list below to see our initial coaches who have partnered with us in making of our current app. We are continually partnering with more coaches and increasing choices.
  • Live Score Tracking: Our app will be able to track your tennis match score in real-time. You don't have to worry about losing track of the score.
  • Workout and Nutrition Tracking: Tennis Activity Tracker also allows you list all your workout and then log your workout as you complete them. It will have repository of workouts suggested by your coach to improve your game. Also, you could plan your meals and track your nutrition data for the week.
  • Tennis Rules and Guides:  The app will have list of all the tennis rules and guides.


TENNIS ACTIVITY TRACKER APPS




DEVELOPMENT TIMELINE


AVAILABLE ON iOS & ANDROID

The apps will be developed for Android, as well as iOS on Mac's upcoming Apple Watch. Each perk will come with a free subscription, giving you exclusive access to materials and coach analysis.


HARDWARE


We will be using LG's G Watch hardware for the Tennis Activity Tracker, giving you all the additional features that come with this incredible device, such as:

PERFORMANCE FEEDBACK



MEET THE COACHES

Improve your game by learning the fundamentals, workouts, and tennis strategy from our  successful coaches and players. They will help you take your game to the next level. More personnel will be added!

MEET THE TEAM

Off-Season Sports wants to devise champions. Not only do we want our customers to receive awards for their stellar performance, but we also want them to feel a sense of self-confidence and self-satisfaction. Regardless of whether or not customers of Off-Season Sports compete in competitive events, we intend to promote self-improvement and great health to all users of our products.


WHY WE NEED YOU

We are looking to improve the ability of our customer's “on-the-court” performance during competition, in addition to tracking fitness results. The Tennis Activity Tracker will allow users to reinvent their skill set, by providing data that will help them learn and readjust different techniques within their tennis regimen. Without your help, we won't be able to complete the development for our apps. Please, help us bring our vision into fruition by contributing to our campaign! We want the popularity of tennis to grow and also improve the skill set of athletes and allow them to reach the peak of their ability!

 WHERE THE MONEY WILL GO

Your support will go towards purchasing the LG G Watch frame, developing the software, and to coaches all across the nation to support users and create training videos. Some percent will go toward Indiegogo fees and to shipping costs.


CHALLENGES

Our biggest challenge in making the Tennis Activity Tracker a reality is obtaining the support and funding we need from fans like you! We've already overcome several big challenges, like figuring out a perfect patentable arm swing tracking algorithm, becoming a reseller for LG's G Watch and working out the user interface for our apps. We've already completed the beta versions of several of our apps, and just need the funds to pay our programmers to do the rest. The success of our program also depends on building a network of players and coaches, so we need to spread the word about our apps to as many people as possible!



FAQ

1.  Who is Off-Season Sports? Off-Season Sports strives to help athletes and health conscious people practice and work out more efficiently and effectively.

2.  What is the Tennis Activity Tracker? The Tennis Activity Tracker is a suite of apps, created to help users improve physically and mentally in the sport of tennis.

3.  What problems do your apps solve? We will help our customers solve the problem of insufficient practices and provide users with endless possibilities to flourish into becoming the best athlete of their ability.

4.  How does the Tennis Activity Tracker work? Once you receive the LG G watch, all backers will be able to download the apps onto their mobile device and onto the smartwatch. You will receive free months subscription, based on the perk that you've selected.

5.  Why do I need this product? You need the Tennis Activity Tracker to help you build the skill and confidence to either become a better tennis player for future competitive events or for your personal satisfaction.

6.  Where will the apps be developed? The apps will be developed in San Francisco, California.

7.  How will this tennis product make me a better player? The tennis coaches and players that we are working with have been there and done that. All of our coaches have competed in the sport of tennis on all levels. Whichever level you intend to compete in, we can help you get there through the personal experience of our team!

8.  How will this tennis product improve my health? All workouts that we provide will help improve muscular and cardiovascular endurance.

9.  Where can I obtain a LG G watch? You can obtain the LG G watch from our crowdfunding campaign by selecting a perk.

10.  How will I receive my apps once the development is finished? The apps will be available to all backers from our website or the Google Play and Apple store. We will confirm this once development is complete.

11.  Does Off-Season Sports provide Apple watches as well? No, we only provide the LG G watch hardware.

12.  Can the Apple Watch and LG G watch connect with Bluetooth, when using the Versus App? No, the LG G watch and Apple watch CANNOT interact with each other. Either 2-4 G watches can connect or 2-4 Apple watches.

13.  What happens after my free subscription trial is over? You will have to subscribe to a monthly plan or pay for the entire year.

14.  When can subscribers expect new tennis data? We will provide new data to our users on a monthly basis.

15.  What type of phone do I need? Any Android phone with an Android version of 4.3 of higher.

16.  Can the LG G watch work with an iPhone? No, the LG G watch can only work with an Android device with a version of 4.3 or higher.

17.  Can I submit ideas that will actually come true? Yes, please send all ideas that you have to us and we will evaluate them. If there are any tennis players or coaches that you would like to learn from, please send us an e-mail and let us know!

18.  How often will backers be updated about the app development? We aim to update you every week on our app development. If not, every 2 weeks at the latest.

19.  When will I get a response for my questions or concerns?  All backers will receive a response within 24-48 hours.

E-mail us at offseasonsports@outlook.com

Contact us on Instagram: @tennisactivitytracker

Leave us a comment or question on our Facebook Page:Tennis Activity Tracker

Contact us through our website: www.tennisactivitytracker.com

story:
Short Summary

Arya Earth, Inc. is a Non-profit 501 (c) 3 tax exempt organization , Our mission is to educate Patients, Physicians and community members the truth and science behind cannabis, and the natural link found within the human body.

First and foremost, getting the truth to the people regarding exactly what cannabis is and the science behind the endocannabinoid system is our Mission.

 I am a recovered alcoholic/PTSD whom nearly took my own life due to my untreated condition. I tried every available product, medicine, AA support  and self help CD's for ten years to try to combat my disease, unsuccessfully.
  Since I began using cannabis I have flourished on a path of recovery for over the last five and a half years.
 22 veterans take their own lives every day, this is going to continue until the Federal Gov. allows clinical research involving cannabis to treat PTSD.
 We have started this campaign because we know and understand exactly why cannabis works for PTSD and so many other things.

Until the people learn the truth, 22 Fathers, sons, daughters, brothers, sisters, mothers will continue to take their own lives on a daily basis.

  Cannabis is a neurological protectant. Cannabinoids bond and protect our neurons like no other compound on earth, like a plug in a socket.  The recent discovery of the Endocannabiniod System can be accredited to a Israel Organic Chemist, Dr. Raphael Mechoulam.

 Dr. Mechoulam began isolating Cannabinoids in 1964. Since that time they have isolated and profiled more cannabinoids than any other known lab. The sad truth is, Israel has technically violated, and continues to violate, a treaty with the U.S. by allowing Dr. Mechoulam to conduct studies using a Schedule 1 controlled substance. 

  Time to get the truth to the people. Cannabis has been locked away and condemned to the point it is hard to believe that it has all these amazing therapeutic values.  

The fact is, our most essential therapeutic medicine has been taken away, demonized and placed in a violent elicit market without ever being studied.

In other words, when legislators made cannabis a schedule one controlled substance, they did not have any science behind what the plant was or is.

Most people assume (including myself years ago) that if cannabis had all these great healing properties that science would know it. The truth is, science has not been able to get a legally approved clinical study involving cannabis for over fifty years.  PLEASE Watch the 1.15hr documentary in this campaign gallery!!

The foremost action that needs to be taken is educating the American people on exactly what cannabis is and means to our bodies. This would diminish much of the public fear surrounding cannabis, as well as improve the health and quality of life for millions of sick and suffering people. Education is the key to correcting this horrendous legislative blunder. 

Educate the People and the Politicians will Follow!!



What We Need & What You Get

 

Arya Earth Must raise 250,000  dollars for startup funding to quickly become self-sufficient and get our message out to the world.

   This funding will allow Arya Earth to hire a full time grant writer in 2015.

 It will enable us to get the necessary educational info up on our website and further develop Arya Earth's online community.

 It will enable Arya to contract and utilize a media communication team to boost our message across TV, radio and internet networks.

It will also allow us to reserve booth space at medical expos and physician related events to get valuble face time with medical professionals

When  the people learn the truth  about what cannabis is and means to the human body, it will change the way we veiw medicine.

 When the people learn the truth. The peoples become the voice of power!!        

This funding will also allow us to immediately begin helping and educating veterans and other suffering people on how to grow their own legal cannabis plants in Washington D.C.  Thanks to the "Legalization of Possession of Minimal Amounts of Marijuana Personal Use Act of 2014"--D.C. Code 48-904.01-- 1


 

The Impact

Knowledge is the most powerful gift you can give another person. Arya Earth’s mission doesn’t stop with cannabis. It is our sacred duty to educate individuals that a healthy complete nutritious protien/ garden diet is the key to vitality and feeling ones best.

Our cities and towns are flooded with toxic drugs, foods and beverages. High fructose corn syrup kills thousands of people every year. People can’t take care of themselves much less their families because people do not have available the essential components of a healthy diet in order to flourish.

The antidotal evidence that exists regarding the different treatment possibilities for cannabis is endless. Cannabinoids treats a broad spectrum of physical and mental aliments including cancer, disease, epilepsy, PTSD, alcohol & drug dependence, chronic pain and many neuropathic disorders.
Arya Earth truly believes that cannabis is the missing link, not having it regulated and safely available is comprising the mental health of people everywhere. Cannabis is destine to play a major role in healing our addicted, toxic streets and making the world a safer place.

Risks & Challenges

 

Many Organizations Including the American Medical Association and The Epilepsy Foundation have approached the FDA, NIDA and DEA to ask for allowing approved clinical studies. In every case they have been denied. Our goal is to educate the people. When the people know the Truth, The people become the Voice!!!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please Follow Arya Earth on social media and share our message with your friends.

We currently post on Twitter, Facebook, Tumblr and just joined Instagram.

Thank You!!

story:
M-brace was founded by two former Temple University engineering graduates. My name is Michael Carey and I received a B.S in Bioengineering with a concentration in Bio-mechanics. My co-founder is Nija White, who received a B.S in Bioengineering with a concentration in Neuroengineering.

As a former student-athletes, both Nija and I excelled on the field until an injury forced us to end our athletic careers. We spent a lot of time on the sidelines wondering how we could get back into the game quicker and contribute to our team's success. Now, with our playing days behind us, we are looking to turn our passion into possibilities. We believe that our brace will not only prevent A.C.L. injuries but also help those athletes whose career was sidelined by injury get back to playing sooner rather than later. 

By contributing to our campaign, you will help us get closer to achieving not only our dreams but also to helping athletes avoid such devastating injuries in the first place.

Your contribution will help us get to develop our next generation prototype. 

Our goal is to raise $25,000.

The funds will be used to produce prototypes to further testing in clinical trials so that we can expedite the production process and get into the market faster to help athletes sooner. Any contribution amount will help, but if you donate $50 dollars or more you will receive one our new company t-shirts, available in sizes from adult small to 2X!

If you are unable to donate at this time, we would really appreciate you sharing this post and getting the word out!

Our device will help athletes at all playing levels. However, it is widely known that many professional athletes suffer devastating injuries like an A.C.L. tear, and are never able to return to their initial playing ability. Many will miss out on signing that big contract, potentially losing out on millions of dollars! By using our first knee device, we can help prevent A.C.L. tears and help save the career of professional athletes as well as those in high-school and college.

Those players using our device will likely prevent a major knee injury or rehabilitate the injured knee faster as the amount of physical therapy sessions needed will be drastically lowered - saving the athlete from enduring the often rigorous and painful therapy exercises.

During this entire production process, there will, no doubt, be obstacles along the way. Commercial success will not happen overnight and the clinical trials can take up to a year to complete. Nija and I have put in a lot of design and development work already. We have a patent application pending. We are completely committed to this process and our designs. We are determined to do whatever it takes in order to achieve our dream and will continue to work every day to prepare for the challenges ahead. The future at M-brace is very, very bright.  We plan to create devices that will drastically impact the sports medicine world and change it for the better. Thank you in advance for your consideration, support, and contribution. Thank you for helping us to make a difference!

As a former student-athletes, both Nija and I excelled on the field until an injury forced us to end our athletic careers. We spent a lot of time on the sidelines wondering how we could get back into the game quicker and contribute to our team's success. Now, with our playing days behind us, we are looking to turn our passion into possibilities. We believe that our brace will not only prevent A.C.L. injuries but also help those athletes whose career was sidelined by injury get back to playing sooner rather than later. 
By contributing to our campaign, you will help us get closer to achieving not only our dreams but also to helping athletes avoid such devastating injuries in the first place.
Your contribution will help us get to develop our next generation prototype. 
Our goal is to raise $25,000.
The funds will be used to produce prototypes to further testing in clinical trials so that we can expedite the production process and get into the market faster to help athletes sooner. Any contribution amount will help, but if you donate $50 dollars or more you will receive one our new company t-shirts, available in sizes from adult small to 2X!
If you are unable to donate at this time, we would really appreciate you sharing this post and getting the word out!
Our device will help athletes at all playing levels. However, it is widely known that many professional athletes suffer devastating injuries like an A.C.L. tear, and are never able to return to their initial playing ability. Many will miss out on signing that big contract, potentially losing out on millions of dollars! By using our first knee device, we can help prevent A.C.L. tears and help save the career of professional athletes as well as those in high-school and college.
Those players using our device will likely prevent a major knee injury or rehabilitate the injured knee faster as the amount of physical therapy sessions needed will be drastically lowered - saving the athlete from enduring the often rigorous and painful therapy exercises.
During this entire production process, there will, no doubt, be obstacles along the way. Commercial success will not happen overnight and the clinical trials can take up to a year to complete. Nija and I have put in a lot of design and development work already. We have a patent application pending. We are completely committed to this process and our designs. We are determined to do whatever it takes in order to achieve our dream and will continue to work every day to prepare for the challenges ahead. The future at M-brace is very, very bright.  We plan to create devices that will drastically impact the sports medicine world and change it for the better. Thank you in advance for your consideration, support, and contribution. Thank you for helping us to make a difference!

story:
Our goal is to provide a reusable and long-lasting ear-cleaning product. For that, we designed a medical silicone material efficient and secure. We developed a prototype and then started to market.

This first step permits us to reinforce our research and development team. Therefore, we conducted a medical evaluation. This allowed us to optimize the product and enhance the user experience, always respecting the safety of the ear. We now have a patented product ready for sale. We propose this project to give us the means to accelerate our marketing.

Our basis idea was to answer to an everyday life problem that affects everyone. By doing our research, we came across these overwhelming numbers ...

The ecological impact ! 

The ecological impact of our project took place. This reinforced us in the idea that we were on the right way. 

Cotton swab realizes a great pollution due to the plastic, especially in the oceans. That's why France had already forbidden its sell from 2020 (https://www.service-public.fr/particuliers/actu...). And England prepare the same (https://www.theguardian.com/environment/2018/ap...).

Moreover, the cotton industry is one of the most polluting in the agricultural sector.

That's why we purpose this sustainable solution: cleaner, greener !

 

Our solution :  EEEARS !

EEEARS is the first reusable ear cleaner made of medical grade silicone

 The shape and mechanism of this outer ear cleaning device prevent pushing dirt deeper into the ear canal. Its spiral grooved head was designed to clear out excess of earwax and impurities only,  leaving a necessary protective layer of cerumen in the canal.

Our technology : 

The Eeears device is  designed to clean the outer cartilaginous portion of the ear canal that secretes cerumen, hence preventing clogged ears.

Its spiral grooved head was designed to clear out excess of earwax and impurities only,  leaving a necessary protective layer of cerumen in the canal.

Made in medical grade silicone that ensures soft and nontraumatic use. It is designed to conform to the anatomical shape of the ear canal.

Its form ensures safe removal of deep build-up without going too far into the bony part of the canal. ​

 

 

Our Products are available in 3 colors and made in France  

 

 

Production

We already have a mold

The product is ready for production, but we need your help to make the product visible in the market.  Advertising and distributors are welcome ! 

 

Official website 

https://www.eeearsofficial.com

 

​

story:
Short Summary

If you are looking for improving your marks and avoid injuries in your sports practice or you just want to get fit and feel better training force it is a must. Besides it is a training you can do in just a few minutes or in sessions of 1 hour.

SUIFF is the first mobile device that allows you to train anywhere at any time, it tracks your performance and guides your exercise to ensure an efficient and safe practice. SUIFF is your personal trainer.

 

 

 

 
 

 

 

WHAT MAKES SUIFF UNIQUE?

  • Tracks your activity in real time, check your performance and improve in every exercicie.
  • Tutorial videos made by professional athletes especially for SUIFF.
  • Light and comfortable: easy to carry and easy to use everywhere. 
  • Personalized: create your own training or choose it from the designed ones.

 

 

SUIFF APP FOR FREE!

Available on Android, IOS coming soon.

 

 

​SUIFF is your best sport partner if...

...You are an athlete in need for improving marks and avoid injuries. By complementing your activity with SUIFF you will strengthen your muscles, gain power and protect yourself from injuries. Create your own training program and beat your records!

...You want to get fit, feel healthy but time is gold due to your crazy daily agenda. SUIFF allows you to practise a professional training wherever and whenever is best for you. Plus you can carry it everywhere due to it's light weight and comfortable shape. Choose among the different training plans and train safe and efficiently with the video tutorials. 

 

 

 

 

TECHNICAL SPECS:

  • Dimensions: 136x78x31 mm / 5x3x1 in
  • Weight: 112grs / 0.2Ib

SENSOR

  • Maximum load: 100 kg
  • Technology Patented.
  • Maximal Supply Voltage 5V
  • Accuracy: <0.2Kg (200g)
  • Power Supply via micro USB charging plug.

BATTERY

  • Battery life: 20+ hours of battery life
  • micro USB charging plug

WIRELESS

  • Bluetooth Low Energy 4.0

COMPATIBILITY

  • Android 4.3 devices and up
  • IOS COMING SOON!

 

SUIFF Universe

 

 

 

 

 

What We Need & What You Get

After 3 years of development SUIFF has become a reality, already been tested for professional athletes and proved to be a complete and solid product, overcoming tester’s expectations. 

From the beginning we have been focused on how to bring professional training to you and now that it is time to launch SUIFF to the market we want to cross the finish line with you, to make you be a part of the project from the very beginning!

By collaborating on our project you will get a SUIFF Kit consisting on.

- A Kit sensor (Golden or Silver)

- Resistant bands (Choose the kit that suits you better)

- Handlers and anklers

- Multifunctional accessories to train wherever you want, outdoor and indoors with no limitations.

 

 

Break it down for folks in more detail:

Your collaboration is asked to be part of the final stage of the project : distribution, communication and sales. The product is a reality and the market is waiting for it to be available, help us making it true and be the first on training smart with an incredible early bird offer (up to 30%)!

 

Risks & Challenges

SUIFF has been developed at Innova Department, the tech business incubator created and funded by Estel, a consolidated company on the metallurgy industry with more than 40 years of history. Besides, Spanish referent institutions such as Technical University of Catalonia (UPC) and National Institute of Physical Education (INEF) have supported and collaborated on the project from the very beginning.

On the current stage we face the challenge of successfully launch it to the market and we want you to be a part of the last sprint and the first market launch, and had the opportunity of improving your training experience.

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Maybe you are not a sport fan but we are sure you are surrounded by some! This friend who runs at 06.00am before going to the office, the dad who wants to lose the beer belly or those who just want to feel better by turning into the healthiest way of life... Let them know about us! They will appreciate it!

story:
Have you ever felt helpless when a friend or loved one was struggling with cancer? Sadly, many of us have. You now have the absolute power to change someone's life for the better! If you have been blessed, bless someone else. This is your chance to pay it forward.  Give graciously, generously, and to the fullest extent that you can. Go beyond "giving back". Give a gift from the heart. 

Why I do what I do...

My name is Tim Cox of Sacred Line Collective, a fine art and medical tattoo studio. I have been a professional artist for over 25 years and a tattooist since 2009. When my ex wife was diagnosed with stage IV breast cancer, I turned my attention to medical tattooing in an effort to show my two beautiful daughters that cancer would not be allowed to define us. I wanted to use my skills to make a difference. 

Why there is a need...

The Womens Health & Cancer Right's Act of 1998 (WHCRA) requires areola and nipple reconstruction be paid by insurance. (see Dept of Labor website link below). If everyone had insurance, and insurance companies did the right thing, there would be no need for this fund. Unfortunately, there are many women that are under or uninsured. This leaves a large percentage of women unable to afford the final stage of their journey. Doctors send me women in this situation from around the country. However, I simply can't afford to continue to provide all of these procedures pro bono.

http://www.dol.gov/ebsa/newsroom/fswhcra.html

This is where you come in...

Your donations are needed to provide women with the closure they deserve. The  funds will be used to help off set the costs associated with 3-D areola tattoos and/or scar camouflage ie: topical anesthetics, pigments, equipment, needles, travel, as well as other materials necessary for the procedures to be performed safely and effectively. 

The more money we raise the more women's lives we can change. If the goal is exceeded, it will simply expand the number of women I can provide these services for.  Don't just give til it hurts...Give til it Heals.

Where the money goes...

All of the money raised is used entirely for the purpose of these ladies (and men) who are in need of 3-D areola and scar camouflage. Providing them with the most up to date process of camouflage and realistic 3-D areola tattoos. By doing so we are giving them closure and a sense of normalcy they thought they might never feel again. There is no limit to the amount of money we need to raise for this campaign simply because there is a never ending need! Therefore, the more funds we can raise the more women are touched by this generosity for a life changing experience.

Because of your willingness to be a part of this process, we would like to offer you some perks. We realize this isn't necessary for you to be generous, but it doesn't hurt. Please check our perks here on the campaign page. Please remember that no amount is too small, but the big support is where the SWAG is at.  Your contribution will also be recognized and featured on our Facebook page to show how awesome you are.

How You Can Join Us and "Get Your Indiegogo On!"

  • Contribute today. Give graciously, generously, and to the fullest extent that you can. Go beyond "giving back". Give a gift from the heart. Invest in today, tomorrow, and hope.
  • Make some noise! Ask your family, friends, and co-workers to help spread the word about our Indiegogo crowdfunding campaign. Check out Indiegogo's easy to use share tools above.
  • Stay connected. Check back often as our campaign success unfolds and we talk more about the progress of those lives you are changing and you are helping through this fund. Connect with the Sacred Line Collective and through our Website, Facebook or Twitter.

story:
Short Summary

Dear all,

This is Dr Konstantinos Farsalinos, a well-known researcher on smoking and electronic cigarettes, with a significant number of publications in peer-reviewed scientific journals.


A previous crowdfunding campaign (https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/electronic-cigarette-liquids-analysis-evaluating-potentially-harmful-ingredients) proved to be extremely important and crucial in confirming the less harmful potential of electronic cigarettes but also in identifying an avoidable risk (smaller than in tobacco cigarettes) which can be removed, thus making e-cigarettes even safer. That study has been already published in a peer-reviewed medical journal (http://ntr.oxfordjournals.org/content/early/2014/08/30/ntr.ntu176.abstract) and we are certain that it will contribute significantly to the development of even safer products.

Continuing our commitment for unbiased research on e-cigarettes, we are now launching a new campaign to assess the important issue of electronic cigarette use in Malaysia. 

Malaysia is one of the many countries where vaping is controversial. There are concerns expressed by the government and local medical authorities that electronic cigarettes promote smoking, are used by teenagers and are a method of inhaling illegal substances. However, there is no research on the patterns of use of electronic cigarettes among Malaysians. 

This study will address those issues by analyzing the characteristics and patterns of use of Malaysian vapers through an online questionnaire.

The survey has been completed with massive participation. More than 8000 Malaysian vapers have participated to the survey. We now initiate this crowdfunding campaign to proceed with the data collection, analysis (including complex statistical analysis) and interpretation.


Protocol design

An online questionnaire, based on our previous similar study which was the largest ever survey of electronic cigarette users (more than 19,000 participants).

The main goals of this research project are:

  • Examine the characteristics of Malaysian vapers.
  • Determine the patterns of electronic cigarette use by Malaysian users.
  • Examine the association between electronic cigarette use and smoking (smoking cessation vs. dual use vs. electronic cigarette use initiation).
  • Explore potential abuse of electronic cigarettes. 



Other Ways You Can Help

Some people may not be able to contribute, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help:

  • We encourage you to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Please use social media and Indiegogo sharing tools.

Thank you.

story:
Short Summary

  • Drink spiking is the serious criminal act of adding drugs surreptitiously to drinks

  • The DrinkGuardian Company is co-owned by Andrew Goodall and Roger Crates.  Andrew Goodall is a specialist in his chosen field and has worked in special effects and animatronics since 1996. He is a well-known figure in the Australian Motion Picture Industry.  Most of his projects are subject to Non Disclosure Agreements.  He has recently been commissioned to build specialist water filter controllers for Third World countries and develops special projects like the DrinkGuardian anti-drink-spiking device.

  • Roger Crates has had careers in the marketing industry and creative innovative marketing programs. As fund-raising manager and a well regarded public speaker he raised funds for the Guide Dogs Association and created the Guide Dogs 'Book Journey'. While working in the Gold and Jewellery industry he designed, invented and successfully promoted the 'soft fit ring'.

  • The campaign for which we are seeking crowd funding is to produce, promote and distribute a brand new invention  -  the DrinkGuardian anti-drink-spiking device, which will detect and prevent the harmful and criminal act of drugging drinks. The DrinkGuardian also has the potential to identify the offender at the  very moment of the offence. 

  • This device has been created by Roger Crates and Andrew Goodall and will revolutionise the ability for young women to feel confident that they can drink safely on their nights out.

  • Roger Crates says: “My interest in the eradication of drink spiking started, when I found out my grand-daughter had probably been subjected to drink spiking. She was fortunately  taken home by friends after this drink spiking  attempt, but the outcome could have been dire.  She was lucky, but this incident prompted me to research the subject. I was staggered to find the seriousness and extent of this criminal and sexually motivated crime.  I imagined a definitive solution to the problem and asked Andrew Goodall to build what is now the DrinkGuardian anti-drink-spiking device, and to make it inexpensive to make it available at a reasonable price.

  • This funding campaign, with your help, will enable Andrew and Roger to finalise the creation of a new and highly technical component, and allow them to get the product manufactured for sale, initially in Australia and internationally.
  • The provisional patent number is 2014905170.

This is a socially important product that effectively stops drink spiking from happening in the first place and in the rare instance where someone may try to tamper with a glass protected with a DrinkGuardian the offender will be identified immediately. 

  • DrinkGuardian  is low cost, reusable, and rechargeable and has the potential to save lives while ensuring the safety of its user in any situation where alcoholic drinks are consumed. The device addresses all problems connected to drink spiking.

It is battery operated (long-life and re-chargable), inexpensive, portable, stylish simple and foolproof and will appeal to younger women, their parents and husbands who are concerned with safety.

The user simply places the DrinkGuardian  on the top of the glass. After switching on the device it will be in the ready mode via radio signal, from a transmitter worn on the wrist or placed in a handbag etc much like a close range garage door opener. The display shows green. The flashing red and blue lights activate when touched by anyone other than the user.

It is obvious that no perpetrator would dare to be seen or heard tampering with a drink protected by DrinkGuardian in a public place. THEY WILL BE CAUGHT.

  • Drink spiking is a serious crime against women, the object of which is at best robbery and at worst rape or even murder. Your contribution will go a long way to ensuring women will be protected from the criminals who place drugs in  drinks in a social situation.

Drink spiking is typically perpetrated against young women in socially vulnerable situations where alcohol is served. The end result is at best, sexual abuse, with rape as the objective. Many cases result in murder.  It has been estimated this sexual abuse is happening on a vast scale, some estimates are in the millions annually worldwide. In the extreme, drink spiking is often the starting point for obtaining women for the sexual slave trade.

In the extreme, drink spiking is often the starting point for obtaining women for the global sexual slave trade.

Unfortunately the authorities around the world have difficulty in their estimates simply because in many cases the victim does not know what actually happened,

Such is the effect of several date rape drugs including Rohypnol. In many other cases the victims are under the impression they got carried away emotionally while drunk, and sadly come out of the incident with a feeling of guilt. Naturally this is not true.  It is not their fault! In other instances the victim is too embarassed to report the rape or sexual assault.

It is well known that the perpetrators of this heinous behaviour often hide behind the uncertainty or embassesment of the victims and the devestating effect the episode has on them.

The team at DrinkGuardian believe all people deserve to have their night out in safety away from these criminals and the appalling acts they commit.

Up till now the actual capture of the perpetrators has been very difficult because the perpetrator has to be seen to actually tamper with the drink to be charged with that offense. 

DrinkGuardian  not only makes it impossible to contaminate a drink when in use but the perpetrator will be SEEN to be trying to place drugs in the drink. No other drink spiking system is able to do this,. This ensures the completeness of the DrinkGuardian  approach to this terrible practice. (Provisional Patent  #2014905170) 

 

 What We Need & What You Get

  • We are seeking fifty thousand dollars.  This will ensure the final vigorous testing and accreditation will be completed and initial production, release and distribution of the DrinkGuardian anti-drink-spiking device will be carried out.
  • As part of our fund raising campaign and in appreciation of your contribution of one hundred and fifty dollars or more we will send you a complimentary DrinkGuardian anti-drink-spiking device free of charge as a thank you gesture.  We are also considering setting up an affiliate program.
    When the DrinkGuardian is available for sale, it is anticipated the recommended retail price will be only $69.95 Au (or equivalent USD)
  •  If we do not reach our goal of fifty thousand dollars we will continue to look for ways to fund our dream using the money you have entrusted to us.  We will be able to start with less but naturally it is better to have an initial starting point adequate to provide the best reach for the DrinkGuardian anti-drink-spiking device.
  • The provisional patent number is 2014905170, and DrinkGuardian is trademarked.


The Impact

  • The DrinkGuardian project is unique in that we are producing a product which will actually prevent drink spiking from happening.  There are other protective systems and while they can detect drugs already in the drink they don't stop drink spiking from happening in the first place.  DrinkGuardian is unique in that it has the potential to actually stop the criminal practice of drink spiking in its tracks.
    Drink spiking is at best an attempt to rob and/or rape, and tragically young women have been murdered after drink spiking. On occasions drink spiking has been known to be the first step in slave trading of women for prostitution.
    Drink spiking is prevalent in most of the western world.  Police from many countries have been frustrated in their attempts to successfully charge and bring to just the perpetrators, as it has been almost impossible to detect a drink spiking incident, which is one crime, and then connect it to the robbery or sexual assault that follows.  Our product identifies the perpetrator instantly,


Risks & Challenges

This is an entirely new product which has never been seen before, and people may compare it with other products on the market. It will be vital to explain why this is a far better and more effective product, and what makes it unique. 
The idea can be stolen in this early stage and inferior imitations produced if we do not get the funding to manufacture quickly enough.

In marketing and promoting this brand new product we will need to explain that whilst all other products currently on the market only detect the presence of drugs in the drink after the event, our product is unique in that it will actually prevents the drink spiking and also identifies the perpetrator if he even touches the DrinkGuardian.

  • Andrew's innovative technical expertise allows the DrinkGuardian product to go into the manufacturing as a fully tested and long lasting product.  Roger's understanding of marketing process and understanding of charitable endeavours  provide a unique blend of talents to make this project an international success. 
    We have a provisional patent  #2014905170 .
  • The best way to combat commercial theft is to gain market ascendancy in the first place.  There is an adage in the Intellectual Property “Market dominance goes to those who enter the market first”. Therefore we need to move as quickly as possible.
    With your contribution we can enter the market first with a fine product that offers significant social benefits at a reasonable price. 
    We have a detailed Marketing Plan in place with extensive marketing strategies, based on the originators’ experience and research. One of the strategies for non-English-speaking countries is to joint venture with women’s anti-violence charities.


Other Ways You Can Help

Andrew and Roger will be marketing the DrinkGuardian via the Net including Facebook, Youtube and other social media, as well as direct response television advertising .  You can make all the difference by mentioning the DrinkGuardian anti-drink-spiking device on your web pages, blog and Facebook page Twitter and other social media, and sharing with your friends. Your help is invaluable to spread the word that young women deserve to be able to go out, have a drink and a dance, safely.  After all, you and they deserve to have a safe night out.

Survey: We also have a 30 second survey on our website http://www.drinkguardian.net/?page_id=51 . You can help by completing this survey and telling your friends about it.

Note  the worthwhile benefits of joining Indiegogo  and using ‘Share tools’. Indiegogo's  model, technology, and team of in-house experts make them the most trusted platform in the crowdfunding industry. They leverage all the tools in their power to amplify campaigns, so you can raise maximum awareness—and funds. 

Thanks very much for your interest and your valued contribution.
story_txt:
Short Summary 

Drink spiking is the serious criminal act of adding drugs surreptitiously to drinks 
The DrinkGuardian Company is co-owned by Andrew
Goodall and Roger Crates.  Andrew Goodall
is a specialist in his chosen field and has worked in special effects and
animatronics since 1996. He is a well-known figure in the Australian Motion
Picture Industry.  Most of his projects
are subject to Non Disclosure Agreements. 
He has recently been commissioned to build specialist water filter controllers
for Third World countries and develops special projects like the DrinkGuardian
anti-drink-spiking device. 
Roger Crates has had careers in the marketing
industry and creative innovative marketing programs. As fund-raising manager and a well regarded public speaker he raised funds for the  Guide Dogs Association and created the Guide Dogs 'Book Journey'.  While working in the Gold and Jewellery industry he designed, invented and successfully promoted the 'soft fit ring'.

The campaign for which we are seeking crowd funding is to produce, promote and distribute a brand new invention  -  the DrinkGuardian anti-drink-spiking device, which will detect and prevent the harmful and criminal act of drugging drinks. The DrinkGuardian also has the potential to identify the offender at the  very moment of the offence. 
This device has been created by Roger Crates and Andrew Goodall and will revolutionise the ability for young women to feel confident that they can drink safely on their nights out.
Roger Crates says: “My interest in the
eradication of drink spiking started, when
I found out my grand-daughter had probably been subjected to drink spiking. She
was fortunately  taken home by friends
after this drink spiking  attempt, but
the outcome could have been dire.  She
was lucky, but this incident prompted me to research the subject. I was
staggered to find the seriousness and extent of this criminal and sexually
motivated crime.  I imagined a definitive
solution to the problem and asked Andrew Goodall to build what is now the DrinkGuardian
anti-drink-spiking device, and to make it inexpensive to make it available at a
reasonable price.
This funding campaign, with your help, will enable Andrew and Roger to finalise the creation of a new and highly technical component, and allow them to get the product manufactured for sale, initially in Australia and internationally.
The provisional patent number is 2014905170.
This is a socially important product that effectively stops drink spiking from happening in the first place and in the rare instance where someone may try to tamper with a glass protected with a DrinkGuardian the offender will be identified immediately.  
DrinkGuardian  is low cost, reusable, and rechargeable and has the potential to save lives while ensuring the safety of its user in any situation where alcoholic drinks are consumed. The device addresses all problems connected to drink spiking. It is battery operated (long-life and re-chargable), inexpensive, portable, stylish simple and foolproof and will appeal to younger women, their parents and husbands who are concerned with safety.The user simply places the DrinkGuardian  on the top of the glass. After switching on the device it will be in the ready mode via radio signal, from a transmitter worn on the wrist or placed in a handbag etc much like a close range garage door opener. The display shows green. The flashing red and blue lights activate when touched by anyone other than the user. It is obvious that no perpetrator would dare to be seen or heard tampering with a drink protected by DrinkGuardian in a public place. THEY WILL BE CAUGHT.
Drink spiking is a serious crime against women, the object of which is at best robbery and at worst rape or even murder. Your contribution will go a long way to ensuring women will be protected from the criminals who place drugs in  drinks in a social situation.Drink spiking is typically perpetrated against young women in socially vulnerable situations where alcohol is served. The end result is at best, sexual abuse, with rape as the objective. Many cases result in murder.  It has been estimated this sexual abuse is happening on a vast scale, some estimates are in the millions annually worldwide. In the extreme, drink spiking is often the starting point for obtaining women for the sexual slave trade.In the extreme, drink spiking is often the starting point for obtaining women for the global sexual slave trade.Unfortunately the authorities around the world have difficulty in their estimates simply because in many cases the victim does not know what actually happened, Such is the effect of several date rape drugs including Rohypnol. In many other cases the victims are under the impression they got carried away emotionally while drunk, and sadly come out of the incident with a feeling of guilt. Naturally this is not true.  It is not their fault! In other instances the victim is too embarassed to report the rape or sexual assault. It is well known that the perpetrators of this heinous behaviour often hide behind the uncertainty or embassesment of the victims and the devestating effect the episode has on them.The team at DrinkGuardian believe all people deserve to have their night out in safety away from these criminals and the appalling acts they commit. Up till now the actual capture of the perpetrators has been very difficult because the perpetrator has to be seen to actually tamper with the drink to be charged with that offense.  DrinkGuardian  not only makes it impossible to contaminate a drink when in use but the perpetrator will be SEEN to be trying to place drugs in the drink. No other drink spiking system is able to do this,. This ensures the completeness of the DrinkGuardian  approach to this terrible practice. (Provisional Patent  #2014905170)

story:
Time Is Your Scarcest Resource

What Is The 29 Minute Workout?

While the benefits of weight training are well known and documented, getting into the gym is no easy endeavour for the broad majority of working adults. Many training methods devised by full-time subject experts (personal trainers, strength coaches, elite athletes) cannot be easily assimilated into the daily lives of the average working professional.

The 29 Minute Workout is not one of those routines. It is inspired by the belief that less is more, and challenges the “established” notion that an effective workout has to last for at least an hour. On the contrary, the most effective workout is the one that is short and painless enough to be repeated consistently enough to yield results.

The 29 Minute Workout is equal parts ideology, inspiration and instruction, neatly packaged in what will be hopefully a joy for you to read. It will initially be made available in the form of a digital eBook; dynamic updates and instructional videos will be also be posted online at a later date.

Is The 29 Minute Workout For You?

Not if you are a competitive athlete or hardcore bodybuilder! However, if you find it a chore to get to the gym and aren't particularly fond of working out, then the 29 Minute Workout is exactly what you need!

Campaign Objectives

Before committing the time and resources required to complete the eBook and accompanying website, I need validation that this project will be useful and relevant to a broad audience.

The funds will primarily be used to create and host a professionally designed website, which will also serve as a distribution platform for the eBook and subsequent updates.

For the price of a day pass to your local gym, you can make a difference in getting this project off the ground!

Risks & Challenges

The projected timeline for delivering both the eBook and website is July 2015. Like most ordinary people, I have a full-time job which may impede the progress of the project. Nonetheless, I do not anticipate any major delays and remain fully committed to keeping the project on track once the campaign goal is reached!

Other Ways You Can Help

Regardless of whether you choose to back this campaign, you can still help by getting the word out! If you know someone who would benefit from The 29 Minute Workout, don’t hesitate to share this campaign via social media. Every "share" counts and will bring this project one step closer to fruition!

About The Author

Leonard is a full-time finance professional who sucks it up every morning and jumps head first into his 50 hour work weeks. He has been working for 8 years, and working out for 18. When he is not involved in corporate shenanigans, he enjoys eating well, watching mindless action movies and online shopping. He has always wanted to write a book; if this campaign takes off, he just might!

story:
stappone constructs a multidimensional view of your foot and body. The longer you use it, the more precise it becomes. Try it.

 

Sometimes the key to feeling healthier and more energised during the day is a small change in your posture or movement. For example, sitting too long (especially with bad posture) may lead to pinched nerves and increased fatigue. stappone recognises these bad posture habits and helps you correct them:  

Fatigue

Back pain

Foot and neck pain

Restricted movement

Foot deformities

Misalignment of the spine

Musculoskeletal weakness

 

stappone’s smart textile insole has GPS sensors, accelerometers, and location trackers that collect immense amounts of information:  

Weight

Calorie Burn

Skeletal Deformities (yes, through your feet!)

Posture Activity - running, walking, sitting, riding a bike - even taking the elevator

 

 "Regular and long-term gait tracking contributes to creating a coherent data profile of activities and in this context health. This helps both in the prevention of inappropriate biomechanical stress as well as the diagnosis of abnormalities".

 "The stappone insole with its accurate and long enduring textile sensors is a leading high-tech innovation. It shows that our region Vorarlberg is on the right track to becoming the textile silicon valley. We are proud to call stAPPtronics GmbH a valued member of our platform".

 "Physical activity is considered a highly effective measure against several kinds of diseases. You do not need to achieve top athletic performance to prevent cardiovascular diseases. It’s the small things that help best - even the daily walk to the office has an effective preventive function."

 

stappone’s app takes the incredible amount of information that is recorded by the insole and translates it into an interface that’s understandable, helpful, and easy-to-use.

We have developed stappone primarily to prevent pain, injuries and common diseases. Furthermore, your stappBuddy will let you know if there might be possible problems that maybe a doctor should take a look at. The app also allows you to share your data, such as gait patterns, exercise activities, etc. for a period of your choosing with your doctor. By providing your doctor with better data for his diagnosis, it will allow for a more accurate diagnosis and may therefore recommend a more targeted treatment.

 

Simply being told you haven’t moved enough today is no help. 

stappone’s virtual support system recognizes the right time to suggest precise advice, based on your unique body blueprint, on how to promote your posture and health. No pressure to perform, just useful information at the right time. stappone measures your progress and motivates you by granting Activity Points for the different forms of activity you perform throughout the day.

 

DISCREET  

Not everyone has to know that you’re counting steps or monitoring your health. stappone does everything from within your shoes, so you have full discretion.  

PRIVATE 
We care about your privacy. The information collected by stappone stays yours and only yours, and will never be traded, for any reason unless explicitly approved by you.   

AND SAFE
We tested stappone from every possible angle to ensure that it is safe to use, and complies with all the strictest quality-control standards, so you can enjoy your stappone without worrying about safety issues.

 

Unlike most fitness trackers, stappone doesn’t have to be connected to your phone in order to work. Need some privacy? Your phone died in the middle of a week-long hike in the woods? No worries. The insoles will continue recording your performance. Once you reconnect with your phone, stappone will sync everything so you don’t lose anything. stappone can even continue tracking your location without draining your phones battery and data plan.

 

Every package comes with two wireless charges which can work with your phone or tablet too. To charge your insoles, simply place stappone’s wireless chargers on your insoles. Simple as that.

 

 

 

The insole represents the ultimate Bio-Feedback experience: 

Cork Base: Form-Stable Design - instead of using the usual polyethylene, stappone’s base is made of high-quality cork; besides being an ecology friendly material, it is also both form-stable and cushioning, so it keeps its form under pressure of up to 1.25 tons and still remains comfortable and flexible. The cork base also houses and protects stappone’s processing center. 

Textile sensors - stappone’s middle layer collects information about your posture, distribution of weight, and movement, in any situation (and we mean any situation). It can detect the smallest shifts in weight and limitations in movement. 

CoolMax® cover - The top layer is made of high-quality CoolMax® fabric, which is both super-comfortable and conductive. It is the perfect surface to read your unique footprint.

 

 

                           

INSOLE:

Weight: 110g per insole

Washing: Hand washable. For cleaning instructions see FAQ

Sizes: 4 sizes that cover 36 - 47 EU sizes. Read about how to choose your size in the FAQ

Dimensions: Front - 2mm | Back - 9.25mm

Temperature: 0° to 50° Celsius in use | -20° to 60° in Storage

Parts: Top - CoolMax® cover. Read more about CoolMax® in the FAQ | Middle - textile sensors | Base - High-quality cork, independent IQ (CPU, GPS, accelerometers, Bluetooth, memory), battery

CHARGER:

Weight: 50g

Dimensions: Height - 40mm | Width - 57mm | Length - 60.5mm

Charging time: 4-6 hours

Use: For phones and tablets as well

CERTIFICATIONS:

We designed stappone to comply with the strictest certifications - FCC, CE & Transport, and Safety. 

 

 

 

We already have our shipping and fulfillment mechanisms in place, so you can expect smooth fulfillment and quick delivery.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

During a lunch together with his friend physicist Philip, Peter came up with the idea of a smart insole that would track movement and help the user lead a more active life and correct posture and movement problems without additional time and pressure to perform. The expert knowledge of the foot was found in the renowned podiatrist Sylvia Strell. Here is the full team:

 

and our most important partners:

story:
Joelle & Sonia have created FunkkOFF! TeethRefreshers to solve a simple problem with a brilliant solution!  We need YOUR help bringing it to market. 

Your pre-orders and pledges will enable us obtain the funding to manufacture this amazingly innovative product and put it in all of our hands, pockets and purses. 

So what is FunkkOFF! ??

On a trip to Napa in 2010, Joelle realized her white teeth turned a Funkky shade of purple from the red wine she was drinking.

It was so embarrassing!  

Joelle was constantly brushing her teeth in between selfies & wine tastings to get the "Funkk" "OFF" of her teeth. She asked herself... 

Why lug around a bulky toothbrush and tube of toothpaste when you need fresh teeth on-the-go? When she reached into her purse and grabbed her lipstick, she looked at it and wanted something just like it but for her teeth.  Lipsticks refresh our lips on-the-go and are reusable & compact...why not have something like that to refresh our teeth?! FunkkOFF! TeethRefreshers was born!

FunkkOFF! is the world’s FIRST reusable  all-in-one toothbrush + toothpaste that removes the '‘Funkk” from your teeth when you’re on-the-go...

FunkkOFF! refreshes your teeth back to white...from your morning coffee to your red wine at night...and all meals in between!  And, it lasts about a month!

 

 

FunkkOFF! Features:

  • Fluoride-Free, all-natural peppermint tooth gel
  • Recyclable plastic container (yay!)
  • Reusable - about 30x

 

FunkkOFF! Inc. owns 8 U.S. Patents and 4 U.S. Trademarks.

 

About Joelle & Sonia...Did you know that these two have been best friends since 7th grade?!?

I've always been an Entrepreneur.  I LOVE to use my wild imagination to creatively find easy solutions to simple problems - and build companies from the ground up!  At 22, I became a Stockbroker which gave me the financial tools and practices that I use in my business ventures today.  I needed to solve a personal problem I had of trying keeping my teeth white and clean on- the-go... and didn't see a product on the market...so I invented and patented FunkkOFF!

From an undergraduate degree in Finance to an MBA focused on Marketing, I have spent years working on businesses, big brands and innovation in Fortune 100 corporations.  I've always been passionate about product development and bringing brands to life. Then I realized I really needed THIS product and wanted to have it with me all the time everyday.  So I decided to put all those years of marketing experience to work to have FunkkOFF! in my purse and yours too! 

 

Risks & Challenges:

With two businesswomen that have decades of experience, this product is not just a fun idea. It’s been drafted, designed, prototyped and demonstrated in front of competitive corporations and sizable investors. Market research with consumers has validated strong interest in this innovative product. The tooth gel has been formulated in an esteemed factory that is home to major oral care products, and 8 U.S. Patents have been secured. As with any manufacturing, there may be hiccups in the process of getting this product to shelves, but with the many years of research and development put into this revolutionary product and with experienced and proven partners, the only goal left now is finalizing the funds to make mass manufacturing commence. The risks have been minimized with the prototypes and we are ready to launch FunkkOFF! TeethRefreshers with your help!
story_txt:
Joelle & Sonia have created FunkkOFF! TeethRefreshers to solve a simple problem with a brilliant solution!  We need YOUR help bringing it to market. 
Your pre-orders and pledges will enable us obtain the funding to manufacture this amazingly innovative product and put it in all of our hands, pockets and purses. 
So what is FunkkOFF! ??
On a trip to Napa in 2010, Joelle realized her white teeth turned a Funkky shade of purple from the red wine she was drinking.
It was so embarrassing!  
Joelle was constantly brushing her teeth in between selfies & wine tastings to get the "Funkk" "OFF" of her teeth. She asked herself... 
Why lug around a bulky toothbrush and tube of toothpaste when you need fresh teeth on-the-go? When she reached into her purse and grabbed her lipstick, she looked at it and wanted something just like it but for her teeth.  Lipsticks refresh our lips on-the-go and are reusable & compact...why not have something like that to refresh our teeth?! FunkkOFF! TeethRefreshers was born!
